column2: <size=200%>Stop!</size>
column3: <size=200%>หยุด!</size>

column2: There is nothing to see where we sleep, if you are not a disciple of this sect, don't wander around!
column3: ที่ที่พวกเรานอนไม่มีอะไรให้เจ้าดูหรอก หากเจ้าไม่ใช่ศิษย์ในสำนัก ก็อย่าเดินเพ่นพ่านสิ!

column2: Join
column3: เข้าร่วม

column2: I have heard of the Crime Investigation Bureau for a long time, and I came to visit today.
column3: ข้าได้ยืนชื่อสำนักสืบสวนมานานแล้ว วันนี้จึงมาเยี่ยมเยียน

column2: {yell} How dare a nobody like you step into the Crime Investigation Bureau. Get out!
column3: {yell} คนไร้ชื่อเสียงเรียงนามเช่นเจ้า กล้าดียังไงถึงก้าวเข้ามาในสำนักสืบสวน ออกไปซะ!

column2: Such a violent temper, really not giving people any face.
column3: ช่างอารมณ์ร้อนนัก ไม่ไว้หน้าผู้ใดเลย

column2: {PlayerSurName} Young hero, what brings you here?
column3: จอมยุทธน้อย {PlayerSurName} มีอะไรถึงมาที่นี่รึ

column2: Ask about the history of the Crime Investigation Bureau.
column3: ถามถึงประวัติศาสตร์ของสำนักสืบสวน

column2: Ask what can be learned from the Crime Investigation Bureau.
column3: ถามว่าจะได้เรียนรู้อะไรจากสำนักสืบสวนบ้าง

column2: <color=#0574a8>Join the Crime Investigation Bureau</color>.<color=#097a76>(Benevolence reaches 40)</color>
column3: <color=#0574a8>เข้าร่วมสำนักสืบสวน</color> <color=#097a76>(คุณธรรมถึง 40)</color>

column2: Don't want to join for now.
column3: ยังไม่อยากเข้าร่วมตอนนี้

column2: The Crime Investigation Bureau was established decades ago by a predecessor known as the "world's number one divine detective".
column3: สำนักสืบสวนถูกก่อตั้งเมื่อหลายสิบปีก่อนโดยท่านบรรพบุรุษ ผู้ซึ่งเป็นที่รู้จักในฐานะ "นักสืบเทวะอันดับหนึ่งของยุทธภพ"

column2: It oversees all theft investigations across the world, and all the local county government's constables are from our Crime Investigation Bureau.
column3: เราคอยตรวจสอบดูแลการสืบสวนทั่วหล้า เจ้าหน้าที่ระดับหัวหน้าทั้งหมดของทางการต่างก็มาจากสำนักสืบสวนเราทั้งนั้น

column2: Royal prestige: Has the right to question all cases in the world, possessing the supreme Executioner's power.
In recent years, not only difficult cases from various local governments, but also some bloody and strange cases in the martial arts world are handled by our Crime Investigation Bureau.
column3: ไม่กี่ปีมานี้ ไม่เพียงแต่คดียากๆจำนวนมากจากทางการ แม้แต่คดีแปลกๆ และเหี้ยมโหดในยุทธภพอีกมากมายต่างถูกจัดการโดยสำนักสืบสวน

column2: Although the Crime Investigation Bureau is a martial arts sect, it always acts impartially and does not favor personal feelings, so joining this sect inevitably offends various martial arts forces.
column3: แม้ว่าสำนักสืบสวนจะถือเป็นสำนักวรยุทธ แต่ก็ประพฤติเป็นกลางไม่ยึดถือความรู้สึกส่วนตัวมาตลอด ดังนั้น การเข้าร่วมสำนักอาจเป็นการล่วงเกินกองกำลังในยุทธภพจำนวนมากได้

column2: You might want to think it over before making a decision.
column3: เจ้าอาจจะอยากคิดให้ดีก่อนตัดสินใจนะ

column2: I will personally teach you a <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> skill, which is not a martial arts but a special skill I developed from various finger techniques, specifically used to restrict the target's actions.
column3: ข้าจะสอนวิชา <color=#c44b0e>จี้จุด</color> ให้เจ้าด้วยตัวเอง ซึ่งนี่ไม่ใช่วิชายุทธ แต่เป็นทักษะพิเศษที่ข้าได้คิดค้นขึ้นจากวิชาดรรชนีหลากหลายชนิด มีไว้เพื่อหยุดการเคลื่อนไหวของเป้าหมายโดยเฉพาะ

column2: My <color=#c44b0e>Flirting Star Sword</color> and Brother Qiu's <color=#c44b0e>Empty Blade</color> are the two great sword techniques of the Crime Investigation Bureau, with great power. If you want to learn these two skills, you can only join the Crime Investigation Bureau.
column3: วิชา<color=#c44b0e>กระบี่หยอกดารา</color>ของข้า และวิชา<color=#c44b0e>ดาบสูญจำรัส</color>ของพี่ชิวถือได้ว่าเป็นยอดวิชาของสำนักสืบสวน หากอยากฝึกสองวิชานี้ คงได้แต่เข้าร่วมสำนักสืบสวนแล้ว

column2: The Crime Investigation Bureau also has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>, which can send a message to nearby constables during a fight, and someone will come to assist immediately.
column3: นอกจากนี้แล้วสำนักสืบสวนก็ยังมีวิชาประจำสำนักที่ชื่อ <color=#c44b0e>แหฟ้าตาข่ายดิน</color> อีกด้วย ซึ่งจะเป็นการส่งสารไปยังเจ้าหน้าที่ที่อยู่ใกล้ๆการต่อสู้ ทำให้พวกเขาส่งคนมาช่วยเหลือในทันที

column2: Learning these martial arts tricks in the Crime Investigation Bureau is secondary, the most important thing is to learn to be fair and selfless!
column3: ในสำนักสืบสวน การฝึกสอนวรยุทธเป็นเพียงเรื่องรองเท่านั้น สิ่งที่สำคัญที่สุดคือการสอนให้รู้จักความยุติธรรม และเสียสละต่างหาก!

column2: From today, {PlayerName} you are a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau!\nI hope you won't tarnish the fame of the Crime Investigation Bureau and live up to my expectations of you.
column3: นับจากวันนี้ {PlayerName} เจ้าคือสมาชิกของสำนักสืบสวน!\nข้าหวังว่าเจ้าจะไม่ทำให้สำนักสืบสวนเสียชื่อ และไม่ทำให้ข้าผิดหวังล่ะ

column2: I will definitely not let down the Chief Constable's expectations!
column3: ข้าจะไม่ทำให้ท่านหัวหน้าผิดหวังอย่างแน่นอน!

column2: Come find me when you've thought it through.
column3: คิดถี่ถ้วนแล้วก็มาหาข้าละกัน

column2: Is there anything else you want to know?
column3: มีอะไรที่เจ้าอยากรู้อีกไหม

column2: Since you decided to leave the Crime Investigation Bureau that day, there is no chance for you to return to the Crime Investigation Bureau in this life.
column3: ตั้งแต่เจ้าตัดสินใจออกจากสำนักสืบสวนในวันนั้น ชีวิตนี้ก็ไม่มีโอกาสที่จะได้กลับเข้ามาในสำนักสืบสวนอีก

column2: I see!
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว!

column2: {PlayerName} has been brought here.
column3: ข้าพาตัว {PlayerName} มาแล้ว

column2: Good!
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name?
column3: ข้าชื่อ {PlayerName} ไม่ทราบว่าท่านชื่ออะไร

column2: Thanks to your help, otherwise Qianxue would have completely lost face for the Crime Investigation Bureau this time.
column3: ขอคุณที่เจ้าช่วยเหลือ ไม่เช่นนั้นเฉียนเสวี่ยคงทำให้สำนักสืบสวนเสียชื่อแล้ว

column2: I know my mistake and will accept the punishment!
column3: ข้ารู้ความผิด และขอรับการลงโทษ!

column2: {PlayerName}, I am Luo Tianxiong, the Chief Constable of the Crime Investigation Bureau!\nYou have been kind to the Crime Investigation Bureau, and since you want to join the Crime Investigation Bureau, I will make an exception to accept you.
column3: {PlayerName} ข้าคือลั่วเทียนเซี่ยง หัวหน้ามือปราบแห่งสำนักสืบสวน!\nเจ้าได้ช่วยเหลือสำนักสืบสวนเอาไว้ และในเมื่อเจ้าอยากเข้าร่วมกับสำนักสืบสวน ข้าจะยอมรับเจ้าเข้ามาเป็นกรณีพิเศษ

column2: From today, {PlayerName} you are a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau!\nI hope you won't tarnish the fame of the Crime Investigation Bureau and live up to my expectations of you.
column3: นับจากวันนี้ {PlayerName} เจ้าคือสมาชิกของสำนักสืบสวน!\nข้าหวังว่าเจ้าจะไม่ทำให้สำนักสืบสวนเสียชื่อ และไม่ทำให้ข้าผิดหวังล่ะ

column2: I will definitely not let down the Chief Constable's expectations!
column3: ข้าจะไม่ทำให้ท่านหัวหน้าผิดหวังอย่างแน่นอน!

column2: Learn Crime Investigation Bureau Skills
column3: เรียนรู้ทักษะของสำนักสืบสวน

column2: Skill
column3: ทักษะ

column2: Use <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> to fix the Machinery person in place.
column3: ใช้ <color=#c44b0e>จี้จุด</color> เพื่อหยุดมนุษย์กลไกให้อยู่กับที่

column2: Talk to <color=#c44b0e>Luo Tianxiong</color>.
column3: คุยกับ <color=#c44b0e>ลั่วเทียนเซี่ยง</color>

column2: {PlayerName}, don't be too greedy as a newcomer to our sect. You need to gain more experience in the Crime Investigation Bureau to earn my approval.
column3: {PlayerName} พึ่งเข้ามาก็อย่าโลภนักเลย เจ้ายังต้องสะสมประสบการณ์ในสำนักสืบสวนอีกถ้าจะให้ข้าอนุญาต

column2: You can take tasks from the bulletin board within our sect. Completing tasks can improve our sect's Relations. When our sect's Relations reach <color=#c44b0e>10</color>, I will teach you the skill of <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color>.
column3: เจ้าสามารถเลือกภารกิจจากกระดานข่าวในสำนักเรา. ทำภารกิจสำเร็จจะเพิ่มความสัมพันธ์สำนัก. เมื่อค่าความสัมพันธ์สำนักถึง <color=#c44b0e>10</color>, ข้าจะสอนเคล็ดวิชา <color=#c44b0e>จี้จุด</color>ให้แก่เจ้า.

column2: Today, I will teach you the skill of <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> of our sect.
column3: วันนี้, ข้าจะสอนเคล็ดวิชา <color=#c44b0e>จี้จุด</color> ของสำนักเราให้แก่เจ้า.

column2: Follow my instructions and use the method of <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> to immobilize the Machinery man in front of you.
column3: ทำตามที่ข้าบอก และใช้วิธีการ <color=#c44b0e>จี้จุด</color> เพื่อหยุดการเคลื่อนไหวของมนุษย์กลไกตรงหน้า

column2: First, keep a distance from the target, then enter the <color=#c44b0e>Stealth</color> state...
column3: ก่อนอื่น รักษาระยะห่างจากเป้าหมาย แล้วเข้าสู่สถานะ <color=#c44b0e>พรางตัว</color>...

column2: Then go behind the target and choose <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color>...
column3: เข้าไปข้างหลังเป้าหมายแล้วเลือก <color=#c44b0e>จี้จุด</color>...

column2: As long as the timing is right, once successful, it will be immobilized for a short time.
column3: ตราบใดที่จังหวะถูกต้อง เมื่อทำสำเร็จแล้ว เป้าหมายจะเคลื่อนไหวไม่ได้เป็นระยะเวลาสั้นๆ

column2: It seems you are really good at criminal investigation!
column3: เหมือนเจ้าจะเก่งเรื่องสืบสวนคดีจริงๆนะ!

column2: {PlayerName}, I solemnly remind you, although this skill is not highly regarded, as long as it is used for the right cause, you can be at peace with yourself.
column3: {PlayerName} ข้าขอเตือนเจ้า แม้ว่าวิชานี้อาจจะไม่ได้ได้รับการเชิดชูนัก แต่ตราบที่เจ้าใช้มันเพื่อจุดประสงค์ที่ดี เจ้าก็ไม่จำเป็นต้องกังวลไป

column2: If one day I find out that you are doing evil and damaging the Fame of the Crime Investigation Bureau, I will personally kill you!
column3: หากวันหนึ่งข้าพบว่าเจ้าทำเรื่องชั่วร้าย และทำลายชื่อเสียงของสำนักสืบสวนล่ะก็ ข้าจะลงมือสังหารเจ้าด้วยตัวเองซะ!

column2: Yes, I will always remember your teachings!
column3: ครับ ข้าจะจำคำสอนนี้เอาไว้เสมอ!

column2: I've completed the task, it's time for me to leave, right?
column3: ข้าทำภารกิจสำเร็จแล้ว ถึงเวลาต้องไปแล้วใช่มั้ย

column2: Our Crime Investigation Bureau has always been free to come and go, but there are a few things I need to make clear to you...
column3: สำนักสืบสวนของเรานั้นสามารถไปไหนมาไหนได้ตามใจ แต่มีบางอย่างที่ข้าต้องบอกให้เจ้าเข้าใจ...

column2: Once you leave the Crime Investigation Bureau, you will have nothing to do with the Crime Investigation Bureau. Not only will the <color=#c44b0e>Crime Investigation token</color> be taken back, but also the talent <color=#c44b0e>Discerning eyes</color> will be erased. You need to think carefully.
column3: เมื่อเจ้าออกจากสำนักสืบสวนแล้ว เจ้าจะไม่มีอะไรข้องเกี่ยวกับสำนักสืบสวนอีกต่อไป ไม่เพียงแต่ <color=#c44b0e>ป้ายคาดเอวสำนักสืบสวน</color> จะถูกเรียกคืน ความสามารถ <color=#c44b0e>สายตาเฉียบคม</color> ก็จะถูกลบด้วย เจ้าต้องคิดให้รอบคอบ

column2: Already decided.<color=#097a76>(Return the Crime Investigation token)</color>
column3: ตัดสินใจแล้ว! <color=#097a76>(ส่งคืนป้ายคาดเอวสำนักสืบสวน)</color>

column2: I'll think about it.
column3: ข้าจะคิดดู

column2: Since you are determined, from now on, you are no longer a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau. Let's forget about the past!
column3: เนื่องจากเจ้าตัดสินใจแล้ว, จากนี้ไป เจ้าจะไม่ใช่สมาชิกของสำนักงานสืบสวนอาชญากรรมอีกต่อไป มาลืมเรื่องที่ผ่านไปแล้วกันเถอะ!

column2: I hope you don't commit any crimes in the future. If you fall into our hands, no one will show you any mercy because of the past.
column3: หวังว่าคราวหลังเจ้าจะไม่ก่อคดีอีก หากมาตกอยู่ในมือเราล่ะก็ จะไม่มีใครปราณีเจ้าเพราะเรื่องในอดีตอีก

column2: I can't repay you for your contribution to our sect. I knew this day would come. Your world is in a bigger place.
column3: ข้าคงไม่อาจตอบแทนสิ่งที่เจ้าทำเพื่อสำนักเราได้หมด ข้ารู้อยู่แล้วว่าสักวันวันนี้ต้องมาถึง โลกของเจ้าใหญ่กว่าที่นี่มากนัก

column2: But we can't break the rules of our sect. The <color=#c44b0e>Crime Investigation token</color> still needs to be taken back!
column3: แต่เราไม่สามารถฝ่าฝืนกฎของสำนักเราได้ <color=#c44b0e>ป้ายคาดเอวสำนักสืบสวน</color> ยังคงต้องถูกยึดคืน!

column2: Then let's say goodbye!
column3: เช่นนั้นก็ลาก่อน!

column2: The Crime Investigation Bureau has always been strict. If you cannot return the <color=#c44b0e>Crime Investigation token</color> and insist on leaving, you will break with the Crime Investigation Bureau and become enemies in the future.
column3: สำนักงานสืบสวนอาชญากรรมมีความเข้มงวดมาโดยตลอด หากเจ้าไม่สามารถคืน <color=#c44b0e>ตราสำนักสืบสวน</color> มาได้ และยังยืนยันจะจากไป ก็จะถือเป็นการแตกหักกับสำนักตรวจสอบ และจะเป็นศัตรูกับเรานับจากนี้

column2: Your Relations with our sect will decrease!
column3: ความสัมพันธ์กับสำนักเราจะลดลง!

column2: Already decided!<color=#097a76>(Relations with Crime Investigation Bureau drop to -20)</color>
column3: ตัดสินใจดีแล้ว! <color=#097a76>(ความสัมพันธ์กับสำนักสืบสวนลดเหลือ -20)</color>

column2: Think about it again
column3: คิดดูอีกที

column2: Exterminate
column3: กวาดล้าง

column2: Do you have the courage to repeat what you want to do?
column3: เจ้ากล้าพูดสิ่งที่เจ้าอยากทำซ้ำหรือไม่

column2: Destroy the Crime Investigation Bureau!<color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
column3: ทำลายสำนักสืบสวน! <color=#c44b0e>(เริ่มสงครามโดยตรง)</color>

column2: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
column3: แค่พูดเล่นเท่านั้น โปรดอย่าจริงจัง

column2: Words can't be spoken casually. If you say the wrong thing, there will be no chance to correct it.
column3: คำพูดบางคำไม่อาจล้อเล่น หากเจ้าพูดผิดที่ผิดทาง อาจไม่มีโอกาสให้แก้ไขได้อีก

column2: This is your last chance to be presumptuous in front of me, don't blame me for being rude if you continue to talk nonsense!
column3: นี่คือโอกาสสุดท้ายที่ข้าจะให้เจ้าได้ทำตัวอวดดีต่อหน้าข้า หากยังพูดจาไร้สาระอีกอย่าหาว่าข้าเสียมารยาทล่ะ!

column2: Very well...
column3: ดีมาก...

column2: The Crime Investigation Bureau hasn't been this lively for a long time, and it's been a long time since blood has been shed here.
column3: สำนักสืบสวนไม่ได้ครื้นเครงเช่นนี้นานมากแล้ว นานมากจริงๆที่ที่นี่ไม่ได้เปื้อนเลือด

column2: {PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to be this kind of person!\nFrom this day on, we are irreconcilable!
column3: {PlayerName} ไม่คิดเลยว่าเจ้าจะเป็นคนเช่นนี้!\nจากวันนี้ไป พวกเราไม่เกี่ยวข้องกันอีก!

column2: {PlayerName}, you harbor evil intentions, you deserve to be punished!
column3: {PlayerName} เจ้าคนใจบาป เจ้าสมควรถูกลงโทษ!

column2:
You seem to have heard the opponent's last breath...
The battle is over.
This place once judged the good and evil of the martial arts world,
Whether it's impartial or a lackey of the court.
Good and evil are just people's wishful thinking.
And for you, all of this has become unimportant.
Let the people of the martial arts world say what they want to say...
column3:
ท่านเหมือนได้ยินลมหายใจสุดท้ายของศัตรู...
การต่อสู้จบลงแล้ว
ที่แห่งนี้เคยเป็นสถานที่ซึ่งตัดสินดีชั่วในยุทธภพ
ไม่ว่าจะเป็นกลาง หรือเป็นสุนัขรับใช้ของเบื้องสูง
จะดีจะเลวล้วนเป็นเพียงความคิดของผู้คน
และสำหรับท่าน มันล้วนไม่สำคัญ
ชาวยุทธอยากพูดอะไรก็ปล่อยให้พูดไปเถอะ

column2: The Crime Investigation Bureau, they are all a bunch of nobodies!\nWith this level of strength, they want to maintain the order of the martial arts world, it's simply a dream!
column3: สำนักสืบสวน ก็แค่พวกคนไร้ชื่อเสียง!\nด้วยฝีมือเพียงเท่านี้ คิดอยากจะยืนหยัดในยุทธภพงั้นรึ ฝันไปเถอะ!

column2: So strong, worthy of the Crime Investigation Bureau!\nThe best plan is to retreat!
column3: ช่างแข็งแกร่งนัก สมแล้วที่เป็นสำนักสืบสวน!\nทางที่ดีรีบหนีดีกว่า!

column2: Assessment
column3: การประเมิน

column2: {PlayerName}, you have been with the Crime Investigation Bureau for some time now, and today we have prepared an entry-level assessment to test your strength.
column3: {PlayerName} เจ้าก็อยู่ในสำนักสืบสวนมาสักพักแล้ว วันนี้ข้าได้เตรียมบททดสอบแรกเข้าไว้ เพื่อทดสอบฝีมือของเจ้า

column2: If you are ready for the assessment, let's start on the horse.
Ask about the assessment rules.
column3: ถามถึงกฎเกณฑ์การประเมิน

column2: Participate in the assessment. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
column3: เข้าร่วมการทดสอบ<color=#097a76>(เข้าสู่การต่อสู้)</color>

column2: Not ready yet.
column3: ข้ายังไม่พร้อม

column2: The assessment is for you to face the four constables of our bureau alone. If you can beat them by yourself, you will have passed the entry-level assessment.
column3: บททดสอบของเจ้าคือการต่อสู้กับมือปราบของเรา 4 คนด้วยตัวคนเดียว หากเจ้าชนะได้ ก็ถือว่าผ่านการทดสอบแรกเข้า

column2: After passing the assessment, you will gain the unique talent of the Crime Investigation Bureau - <color=#c44b0e>Discerning eyes</color>. From then on, the bulletin board inside the Crime Investigation Bureau will also post more challenging tasks for you.
column3: หลังผ่านการทดสอบ เจ้าจะได้รับวิชาเฉพาะของสำนักสืบสวน - <color=#c44b0e>สายตาเฉียบคม</color> และที่กระดานข่าวของสำนักสืบสวนจะมีภารกิจที่ท้าท้ายยิ่งขึ้นให้เจ้า

column2: In short, only by passing this assessment can you initially gain my approval and truly become a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau.
column3: สรุปสั้นๆ มีเพียงการผ่านบททดสอบนี้ เจ้าถึงจะได้รับการยอมรับจากข้า และจะถือเป็นสมาชิกของสำนักสืบสวนอย่างแท้จริง

column2: Let me see how far your skills have come.
column3: ให้ข้าดูว่าเจ้ามีฝีมือมากขึ้นแค่ไหน

column2: As expected, you didn't disappoint me, the Crime Investigation Bureau finally has another good hand!
column3: อย่างที่คิด เจ้าไม่ทำให้ข้าผิดหวัง ในที่สุดสำนักสืบสวนก็ได้มือดีอีกคนแล้ว!

column2: What are you waiting for? Either continue with the assessment or go practice!\nIf you can't even pass this simple entry-level assessment, you don't need to stay in the Crime Investigation Bureau anymore.
column3: มัวรออะไรอยู่ ถ้าไม่รับบททดสอบต่อก็ไปฝึกซะ!\nหากแค่บททดสอบแรกเข้าจะยังผ่านไม่ได้ ก็ไม่ต้องอยู่ในสำนักสืบสวนอีก

column2: A small test of skill
column3: บททดสอบทักษะเล็กๆ

column2: Mission
column3: ภารกิจ

column2: Eliminate any of the <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Camp, Blue Wind Camp, or Sea Jiao Gang</color>
column3: กวาดล้าง หนึ่งในนี้ <color=#c44b0e>ค่ายโจร, ค่ายวายุคราม, หรือ กองโจรทะเลเจียว</color>

column2: Report back to Chief Constable Luo Tianxiong.
column3: กลับไปรายงานแก่หัวหน้ามือปราบ ลั่วเทียนเซี่ยง

column2: {PlayerName}, I have an important task here that I hope you can complete, but this task is quite risky, you can first understand the task situation, and then decide whether to accept it.
column3: {PlayerName} ข้ามีภารกิจสำคัญให้เจ้าทำให้สำเร็จ แต่ภารกิจนี้ค่อนข้างอันตรายนัก เจ้าลองฟังเนื้อหาก่อน แล้วค่อยตัดสินใจว่าจะรับหรือไม่

column2: Understand the task related situation.
column3: ฟังเนื้อหาของภารกิจ

column2: Accept the task.
column3: รับภารกิจ

column2: Not ready yet.
column3: ข้ายังไม่พร้อม

column2: There are three notorious forces in the martial arts world, which have become increasingly restless recently.
column3: ปัจจุบันมีสามกองกำลังในยุทธภพที่กำลังสร้างปัญหาเพิ่มขึ้นในช่วงนี้

column2: <color=#c44b0e>Sea Jiao Gang</color>, involved in human trafficking, murder and robbery. It is reported that their traces have been found at the Ferry in the Nameless area.
column3: <color=#c44b0e>กองโจรทะเลเจียว</color> นั้น ทั้งยุ่งเกี่ยวกับการค้ามนุษย์ ฆาตกรรม และลักขโมย มีรายงานมาว่าพบร่องรอยอยู่บริเวณท่าเรือเขตแดนไร้นาม

column2: <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Camp</color>, a group of lawless bandits gathered together, often looting villages and passers-by in the Nameless area.
column3: <color=#c44b0e>ค่ายโจร</color> กลุ่มโจรนอกกฏหมายที่รวมตัวกัน มักจะออกปล้นหมู่บ้าน และคนผ่านทางในเขตไร้นาม

column2: <color=#c44b0e>Blue Wind Camp</color>, under the guise of robbing the rich to help the poor, they defy the laws of the court and openly kidnap and extort in Chuxiang City, they are truly lawless!
column3: <color=#c44b0e>ค่ายวายุคราม</color> ภายใต้คำพูดที่ว่าจะปล้นคนรวยเพื่อช่วยคนจน พวกมันละเมิดกฏหมาย ลักพาตัว และกรรโชกทรัพย์อย่างเปิดเผยในเมืองฉู่เซียง

column2: These three forces have already aroused public outrage. The court is putting pressure on the Crime Investigation Bureau, ordering us to eradicate them as soon as possible to vent the public's anger.
column3: ทั้งสามกองกำลังเหล่านี้ได้ทำให้ผู้คนโกรธเกรี้ยวเป็นอย่างมาก เบื้องบนจึงได้กดดันมายังสำนักสืบสวน สั่งการให้เรากวาดล้างพวกมันให้เร็วที่สุดเพื่อระงับความโกรธของผู้คน

column2: Now the Crime Investigation Bureau is short of hands, after much thought, I fear you are the most suitable candidate at present.
column3: ขณะนี้สำนักสืบสวนขาดกำลังคน หลังจากที่ข้าคิดอย่างถี่ถ้วนแล้ว น่ากลัวว่าเจ้าจะเป็นผู้ที่เหมาะสมที่สุดในตอนนี้แล้ว

column2: As long as you eliminate any one of these forces, I will teach you the ultimate move of the Crime Investigation Bureau, <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>.
column3: ตราบใดที่เจ้ากำจัดกองกำลังเหล่านี้ออกไปได้, ข้าจะสอนเจ้าถึงวิทยายุทธไม้ตายของสำนักสืบสวนเรา <color=#c44b0e>แหฟ้าตาข่ายดิน</color>

column2: Remember, you can return to report after eliminating any of the <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Camp, Blue Wind Camp, or Sea Jiao Gang</color>!
column3: จำไว้ เจ้าจะกลับมารายงานได้ก็ต่อเมื่อ กำจัดหนึ่งใน <color=#c44b0e>ค่ายโจร ค่ายวายุคราม หรือกองโจรทะเลเจียว</color> ซะก่อน!

column2: Indeed, heroes come from the youth!\nI have always been accurate in judging people. With such achievements at a young age, your future is bound to be limitless.
I will now teach you our sect's ultimate move, <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>.
column3: ตอนนี้ข้าจะสอนเจ้าถึงวิทยายุทธไม้ตายของสำนักเรา <color=#c44b0e>แหฟ้าตาข่ายดิน</color>

column2: The beauty of this move is that if we are outnumbered, it can call for fellow sect members to Assist and turn the tide; if the situation is unfavorable, fellow sect members will rush to hold off the enemy, buying you a chance to survive.
column3: ความยอดเยี่ยมของวิชานี้ก็คือหากเราศัตรูมีจำนวนมากกว่า จะสามารถเรียกสหายร่วมสำนักมาช่วยเหลือ และพลิกสถานการณ์ได้ หรือหากสถานการณ์ไม่เข้าข้าง สหายร่วมสำนักก็จะช่วยถ่วงเวลาศัตรูไว้ ให้เจ้ามีโอกาสหนีรอดได้

column2: Thank you, Chief Catcher!
column3: ขอบคุณ หัวหน้ามือปราบ!

column2: {yell} You actually wiped out the Bandit Camp, Blue Wind Camp, and Sea Jiao Gang!!!
column3: {yell} เจ้ากวาดล้างค่ายโจร ค่ายวายุคราม และกองโจรทะเลเจียงได้จริงๆ!!!

column2: This news is too shocking, it's hard to believe!

We have been investigating these three forces for many years, with countless brothers killed and injured, but we could never touch them. This time you have wiped them all out, truly venting our anger for the Crime Investigation Bureau!
Your merit this time is too great, I must reward you heavily!
I will now teach you our sect's ultimate move, <color=#c44b0e>No Escape</color>.
column3: ตอนนี้ข้าจะสอนเจ้าถึงวิทยายุทธไม้ตายของสำนักเรา <color=#c44b0e>แหฟ้าตาข่ายดิน</color>

column2: The beauty of this move is that if we are outnumbered, it can call for fellow sect members to Assist and turn the tide; if the situation is unfavorable, fellow sect members will rush to hold off the enemy, buying you a chance to survive.
Your merit this time is too great, in addition to the sect's ultimate move, I must reward you heavily!
Qianxue, step forward!
column3: เฉียนเสวี่ย ก้าวออกมา!

column2: Yes!
column3: ใช่!

column2: Qianxue, how do you feel about these days of experience with {PlayerName}?
Although {PlayerSurName} is a junior disciple, his experience and martial arts cultivation are above me. These days of experience have benefited me greatly.
I hope you two can work together sincerely. Whether the Crime Investigation Bureau can flourish in the martial arts world depends on you young people.
Subordinates obey!
This task requires a high level of strength, it's best if you can find some reliable friends in the martial arts world to help you complete this task.
Come find me when you've thought it through.
column3: คิดถี่ถ้วนแล้วก็มาหาข้าละกัน

column2: What happened?
column3: เกิดอะไรขึ้น!

column2: Luo Tianxiong, I heard that a few small sects have caused heavy casualties to you, and now only a few cats are left. I really don't know what the need for the Crime Investigation Bureau is.
Have you heard? A few days ago, a young hero wiped out three notorious thief dens, the Bandit Camp, Blue Wind Camp, and Sea Jiao Gang, all by himself.
Our family has Recognized, but what does this have to do with you?
That young hero is from our Crime Investigation Bureau!
column3: นั่นจอมยุทธน้อยจากสำนักสืบสวนของเรา!

column2: {PlayerName}, step forward and let Tong Daofu of the Imperial City Department see!
{PlayerName}, pay respects to the Chief Catcher!
column3: {PlayerName} ทำความเคารพท่านหัวหน้ามือปราบ!

column2: {PlayerName}, pay respects to Lord Tong!
Our family thought it was some three-headed six-armed immortal descending to the earth, but it turns out to be a mortal of flesh and blood.

Although my Crime Investigation Bureau is not what it used to be, we can still find some promising talents. With proper cultivation, we will soon restore the former glory of the Crime Investigation Bureau.

As for Lord Tong's Imperial City Division, it's like a tree without roots, a river without a source. I wonder if there will be any need for its existence in a few years, when Lord Tong can no longer move?
You, you...
column3: เจ้า เจ้า...

column2: {PlayerName}, step forward and let Tong Daofu of the Imperial City Department see!
{PlayerName}, pay respects to the Chief Catcher!
column3: {PlayerName} ทำความเคารพท่านหัวหน้ามือปราบ!

column2: {PlayerName}, pay respects to Lord Tong!
Kid, since the Chief Catcher values you so much, I will have to keep an eye on you in the future.
Lord Tong, you didn't come to the Crime Investigation Bureau today just to show off, did you?
Chief Luo, I know you are always impartial and do not favor personal relationships...
However, now that you have offended both Prince Qi and Prince Kang, they jointly issued an edict to the Imperial City Division to eliminate the Crime Investigation Bureau. I can only do my duty.
Just by you? That seems a bit presumptuous.
Come out and see for yourself.
Lord Tong, it seems that these few people can't swallow the Crime Investigation Bureau, can they?
How can these ants swallow an elephant?\nBut, if the elephant is weak, do these ants have a chance?
Despicable, you poisoned!
It's not surprising that a cunning eunuch like him would do something without a bottom line. It's my fault for being careless.
Luo Tianxiong, and that kid surnamed {PlayerSurName}...
{yell}<size=150%>You all go to hell!!!</size>
Who would have thought... the Crime Investigation Bureau and the Imperial City Division... founded on the same day and destroyed on the same day... it's fate...
Chief Catcher, the Crime Investigation Bureau is not dead yet, we are still alive, cheer up!
{PlayerName}, the Crime Investigation Bureau is now in ruins and can no longer shelter you...
From today on... you are no longer a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau...
If... you have a chance, please send my... and the Crime Investigation Bureau brothers'... regards to Prince Qi and Prince Kang...
Cough, cough...
You dare to resist, you dare to resist!!
You are all traitors, traitors!!!
This is what happens when you're too clever for your own good, and it costs you your life.
You! You!! You...

Ever since the Emperor was captured, the Crime Investigation Bureau has been marginalized and walking on thin ice every day. If we want to restore the former glory of the Crime Investigation Bureau, we need to find the Emperor as soon as possible and welcome him back to the palace, otherwise the next disaster for the Crime Investigation Bureau is unpredictable.
{PlayerName}, as a member of the Crime Investigation Bureau, it is your duty to find the Emperor. I will help you when the time comes!
Chief Catcher, I'm sorry.\nI can't die yet, I will avenge you!

You fled the Crime Investigation Bureau in panic, but you could still faintly hear the screams of your fellow disciples behind you.
Those who used to practice with you, laugh with you, one by one, lost their lives.
You are powerless to do anything about it, because you have to survive, only by surviving do you have a chance.
The once mighty Crime Investigation Bureau has now become a victim of power struggles and will no longer exist...
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Crime Investigation Bureau, annihilated!</color></size>

The Chief Catcher unfortunately passed away, and no one can support the Crime Investigation Bureau anymore. It will soon face retaliation from all sides. Should I take this opportunity to leave the Crime Investigation Bureau?
Leave the Crime Investigation Bureau
Stay with the Crime Investigation Bureau
Since you chose to run away from the Crime Investigation Bureau, there's no need for me to stay with you. \nFrom now on, we'll go our separate ways. Take care.
{PlayerName}, thank you for choosing to stay with me in the Crime Investigation Bureau. \nThis is my home, and now it's yours too. You are my family.
How could this happen! Why did this happen!!!
The Chief Catcher, Sister Qianxue, Brother Qiu... I couldn't save any of them...
Is the Crime Investigation Bureau really gone...
How could this happen! Why did this happen!!!
The Chief Catcher couldn't be saved...
Is the Crime Investigation Bureau really gone...
There's no feast that doesn't end, {PlayerName}, let's part ways here. \nI can't abandon the Crime Investigation Bureau and save myself, this is my fate, not yours.
There's no feast that doesn't end, {PlayerName}, let's part ways here. \nI can't abandon the Crime Investigation Bureau and save myself, this is my fate, not yours.
Dark scene, Luo Tianxiong stands in the middle of the table, Qiu Zhimo and Luo Qianxue on either side
What happened?
Luo Tianxiong, I heard that a few small sects have caused heavy casualties to you, and now only a few cats are left. I really don't know what the need for the Crime Investigation Bureau is.
Hmph, so it's the Deputy of the Imperial City Bureau, Tong Daofu's lapdog! \nWhen did you start showing off your power as a deputy?
Luo Tianxiong, you'd better be polite to our guests. \nThe current Imperial City Bureau is not something your small Crime Investigation Bureau can provoke.
{PlayerName}, step forward and show the Deputy Commander of the Imperial City Bureau what you've got!
{PlayerName}, pay respects to the Chief Catcher!
{PlayerName}, pays respects to the Deputy Commander!
So it's a greenhorn, the people of the Crime Investigation Bureau are indeed getting worse with each generation.
Deputy Commander, you didn't come to the Crime Investigation Bureau today just to show off your eloquence, did you?
Chief Luo, I have no grudge against you, and I admire a man like you...
But, since Mr. Tong is temporarily away from the Imperial City Bureau, I'm afraid I won't be able to convince the public, so I have to use your Crime Investigation Bureau to establish my authority.
Just by you? That seems a bit presumptuous.
Come out and see for yourself.
Deputy Commander, with so few people, it seems you can't swallow the Crime Investigation Bureau, can you?
How can these ants swallow an elephant?\nBut, if the elephant is weak, do these ants have a chance?
Despicable, you poisoned!
It's not surprising that a cunning eunuch like him would do something without a bottom line. It's my fault for being careless.
Luo Tianxiong, and that kid surnamed {PlayerSurName}...
{yell}<size=150%>You all go to hell!!!</size>
Cough, cough...
You dare to resist, you dare to resist!!
You are all traitors, traitors!!!
This is what happens when you're too clever for your own good, and it costs you your life.
You! You!! You...
If it weren't for you stepping in today, I'm afraid the entire Crime Investigation Bureau would have been wiped out.
If there's anything you need in the future, I'll be there for you, no matter what!
Although the Emperor has been saved, the court is still controlled by treacherous villains. The Crime Investigation Bureau is still being marginalized, living on thin ice every day.

{PlayerName}, the hope of revitalizing the Crime Investigation Bureau lies with your generation. I hope that one day you can eliminate the villains and bring clarity to the world. As the Chief Catcher, I will lend you a hand when the time comes.
This is where our disciples rest and stay, please stop!
<size=200%>Stop!</size>
column3: <size=200%>หยุด!</size>

column2: This is a forbidden area of the Crime Investigation Bureau, non-disciples are not allowed to enter!
Go to jail
Wait patiently for the results of the Crime Investigation Bureau's investigation.
How do you like the taste of prison?
When are you planning to release me, let me out now!
That's not possible, we need to investigate your background. If you're innocent, we'll let you go; if you're a criminal, you'll only have one way to go - death!
There's nothing to eat or drink here, by the time you finish your investigation, I'll starve to death.
Who told you to get involved with thieves? If you starve to death, it's your own fault!
Here are some steamed buns. If you're hungry, make do with them; if you're bored, go sleep on the straw mat for a few shichen, someone will wake you up when it's time.
You're finally here, can you let me go now?
After investigation, you indeed made unwise friendships, but you yourself have no bad records, so you can run away from here now.
You locked me up for no reason for a day, and just dismissed me like this, shouldn't there be some compensation?
How about compensating you with a month's worth of prison meals?
Forget it, I don't want to stay a moment longer.
Take care, no need to see you out!
You're finally here, can you let me go now?
Unfortunately, I'm afraid you won't be able to leave...
What does it mean?
You have a heavy aura of malevolence, I'm afraid you've done something against Benevolence.\nWe've known each other for a while, and I came here specifically to see you off.
Don't do evil in your next life, or the net of heaven has wide meshes but lets nothing through!
I, the younger generation {PlayerName}, have long admired the reputation of Langya Sword Pavilion, and hope to join and become a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: ผู้น้อย{PlayerName} เลื่อมใสในชื่อเสียงของศาลากระบี่หลางหยามานานแล้ว และหวังว่าจะได้ฝากตัวเป็นศิษย์ของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: Every disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion has some understanding of the path of the sword. Let me first see if you are qualified...
column3: ศิษย์ทุกคนของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา มีความเข้าใจในวิถีกระบี่อยู่บ้าง ให้ข้าดูก่อนว่าเจ้ามีคุณสมบัติหรือไม่...

column2: At least a <color=#c44b0e>Sword level of 50 or above</color> is required to be a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion. You have not yet met the basic requirements for entry.
column3: ต้องการ <color=#c44b0e>ทักษะกระบี่ระดับ 50 หรือสูงกว่า</color> จึงสามารถเข้าเป็นศิษย์ศาลากระบี่หลางหยาได้ ท่านยังไม่มีคุณสมบัติตรงตามข้อกำหนดสำหรับการเข้า

column2: Although I am temporarily unable to join the Langya Sword Pavilion, could you reveal some information about the Langya Sword Pavilion to me?
Since it's not meant to be, why force it? More words are useless.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, your fate with Langya Sword Pavilion has not yet arrived. Don't waste your time here with me, please go back.
column3: จอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} โชคชะตาของท่านกับศาลากระบี่หลางหยายังมาไม่ถึง อย่าได้เสียเวลากับข้าที่นี่เลย โปรดกลับไปเสียเถิด

column2: I, the younger generation {PlayerName}, have long admired the reputation of Langya Sword Pavilion, and hope to join and become a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: ผู้น้อย{PlayerName} เลื่อมใสในชื่อเสียงของศาลากระบี่หลางหยามานานแล้ว และหวังว่าจะได้ฝากตัวเป็นศิษย์ของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: Those who wish to become disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion are all people who have some understanding of the way of the sword. Let me see if you are qualified...
Hmm, {PlayerSurName} young hero, you are young and have a quite impressive understanding of the way of the sword. Under my personal guidance, you will surely become a great person in the future!
May I ask how to address the old predecessor?
I am the master of Langya Sword Pavilion - Jian Chi!\nIf a talent like you is buried, it would be my blindness!
column3: ข้าคือปรมาจารย์ของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา - มารกระบี่!\nหากมองไม่เห็นพรสวรรค์ของเจ้าที่ซ่อนอยู่ ข้าคงตาบอดแล้ว!

column2: (Jian Chi seems a bit too excited, I'd better ask clearly before making a decision.)
column3: (ผู้อาวุโสมารกระบี่ดูตื่นเต้นเกินไปเล็กน้อย ข้าควรถามเขาอย่างรอบคอบก่อนตัดสินใจ)

column2: Inquire about the history of Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: สอบถามประวัติความเป็นมาของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: Ask what can be learned from Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: ถามว่าท่านเรียนรู้อะไรได้บ้างจากศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: <color=#0574a8>Join Langya Sword Pavilion.</color>
column3: <color=#0574a8>เข้าร่วมศาลากระบี่หลางหยา</color>

column2: Don't want to join for now.

Langya Sword Pavilion was founded by me thirty years ago. It was originally a place to store my collection of divine weapons, Sharp. Now, its reputation in the martial arts world is only slightly inferior to the "Three Teachings" of Confucianism, Buddhism, and Taoism.

Nowadays, three or four out of ten divine weapons, Sharp, that appear in the martial arts world are from the Sword Pavilion. Therefore, as long as the disciples of the Sword Pavilion do not make Nemesis when they go out into the martial arts world, other sects will mostly give some face to the disciples of the Sword Pavilion.

I accept disciples widely, not only teaching swordsmanship, but also the method of forging divine weapons, Sharp. The mine in the back mountain of our sect is rich in resources, inexhaustible and inexhaustible, which is convenient for our disciples to practice forging.

The two main disciples under my sect are both rare swordsmanship geniuses, but they have different styles. One is ethereal and elegant, and the other is simple and thick. All disciples of the Sword Pavilion can Request swordsmanship from them.

There is also a unique skill in the Langya Sword Pavilion, known as <color=#c44b0e>Ten Thousand Swords</color>! It is a killing move that I realized in my old age, using Qi to control the sword. Once this move is used, it can kill both gods and Buddhas.
column3: นอกจากนี้ยังมีวิชาพิเศษของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา <color=#c44b0e>หมื่นกระบี่หวนกลับ</color>! เป็นท่าไม้ตายที่ข้าบรรลุในวัยชรา ใช้ลมปราณควบคุมกระบี่ เมื่อใช้กระบวนท่านี้ เรียกได้ว่าพบเทพประหารเทพ พบพุทธะสังหารพุทธะ

column2: From today, {PlayerName} is a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion!
column3: ตั้งแต่วันนี้ {PlayerName} จะเป็นศิษย์ของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา!

column2: Looking at your outstanding talent, your future achievements may far exceed those of my disciples. The rise and fall, honor and disgrace of the Langya Sword Pavilion in the future will all depend on you, the second generation disciples.
I will definitely not let down the expectations of the Pavilion Master!
Come find me when you've thought it through.
column3: คิดถี่ถ้วนแล้วก็มาหาข้าละกัน

column2: Is there anything else you want to know?
column3: มีอะไรที่เจ้าอยากรู้อีกไหม

column2: Your fate with the Sword Pavilion has come to an end in this life, there is no need to do useless work.
Eager to find talents
Invite Wang Dachui to the team and go to Langya Sword Pavilion with Ou Ye Heng.
Please ask the blacksmith to forge some good weapons, the materials and wages are all here...
You've got the wrong person, I'm just an ordinary blacksmith, usually making farming tools for the villagers.
If you want to forge some good weapons, I don't have the ability, please find someone else.
Hammering like rain...
Hammering like a ghost crying at night...
Who are you!
I am Ou Ye Heng from Langya Sword Pavilion, I pay my respects to Mr. Wang Dachui!
column3: ข้าคืออู๋เย่เหิงจากศาลากระบี่หลางหยา ขอคารวะท่านหวังต้าชุย

column2: Langya Sword Pavilion...
column3: ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา...

column2: Master... is he still well?
The master is in good health, but he has been melancholy for many years because of a worldly matter...
Alas, you go. I have nothing to do with Langya Sword Pavilion anymore, if there is nothing else, I will not accompany you.
May I ask what happened?
I am Ou Ye Heng, a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion, and I am here to invite Brother Dachui back to the sect on the orders of my master.
He doesn't seem to be very enthusiastic about you, and he doesn't seem to want to go back with you.
Brother Dachui was extraordinarily talented in his youth and was quite famous in the martial arts world. He was known as "Jade-faced Ganjiang" Wang Dachui!
Jade, jade-faced? Are you sure you didn't get it wrong?!
I heard it from my master by chance, but unfortunately I didn't see Brother Dachui's youthful demeanor with my own eyes.
Well, that's not important.
Brother Dachui was young and energetic, and he believed that he had learned all the teachings of the master, so...
Hey, you two, enough is enough! If you want to chat, go outside, don't disturb my work.
My master once promised that if anyone could forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword, he would be the next master of the Langya Sword Pavilion.
Brother Dachui believed that the time was ripe, so he proposed to the master to forge the <color=#c44b0e>Xuanyuan Divine Sword</color>.

Little did he know that the requirements for forging the Xuanyuan Divine Sword were extremely strict in terms of wealth, love, law, and land. Brother Dachui naturally couldn't handle it, so the master refused his request.

Brother Dachui thought that the master was deliberately making things difficult for him, so he secretly opened a furnace to forge the sword on the back mountain without the master's knowledge. In the end, the furnace exploded and he was injured, losing a lot of precious materials. The master was so angry that he punished him to reflect on the back mountain and forbade him to forge swords for ten years.
Brother Dachui harbored resentment and left the Langya Sword Pavilion, wandering the martial arts world.
Now that the ten-year period has passed, the master has ordered me to find Brother Dachui and persuade him to return to the sect.
How confident are you in persuading him to return to the Langya Sword Pavilion?
column3: เจ้ามั่นใจแค่ไหนในการชักชวนให้เขากลับไปที่ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา?

column2: Before leaving, my master once said that Big Hammer Senior Brother is proud and arrogant. Even if he admits his mistake in his heart, he won't admit it verbally. He has already announced his withdrawal from Langya Sword Pavilion, so he probably won't go back easily now.
What if I can persuade him to wander the rivers and lakes with me, and then visit your sect in the name of accompanying me, can this indirectly achieve the goal?
Good idea, I'll leave this matter to you.
However, there's no benefit for me if this matter is successful, I think I'd better forget it.
If you can make this happen, I will recommend you to join Langya Sword Pavilion in front of my master, how about that?
Cut it out, if I want to join any sect, do I need someone else's recommendation? Besides, what's so good about joining Langya Sword Pavilion, why should I join you?

Nowadays, three or four out of ten divine weapons, Sharp, that appear in the martial arts world are from the Sword Pavilion. Therefore, as long as the disciples of the Sword Pavilion do not make Nemesis when they go out into the martial arts world, other sects will mostly give some face to the disciples of the Sword Pavilion.

Langya Sword Pavilion recruits disciples widely, not only teaching swordsmanship, but also teaching the method of forging divine weapons Sharp. The mine in the back mountain of our sect is rich in resources, inexhaustible and inexhaustible, which is convenient for the disciples to practice forging.

My master also has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>Ten Thousand Swords</color>, the so-called ten thousand swords come out, all evils are easy to avoid! This unique skill is never passed on to outsiders, only to outstanding disciples of our sect.
Having a face when going out, being a survival expert, and being invincible in fights! Isn't this the sect I've been dreaming of!
Senior Brother, please accept my salute!
First help me invite Big Hammer Senior Brother. I can only <color=#c44b0e>stay here for two days</color>, you have to hurry up.
I didn't expect you to really invite Big Hammer Senior Brother!
If you are ready, I will take you to <color=#c44b0e>Langya Sword Pavilion</color>.
column3: หากเจ้าพร้อมแล้ว ข้าจะพาไปที่ <color=#c44b0e>ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา</color>

column2: Why haven't you succeeded yet? You need to hurry up!
I'm ready! <color=#c44b0e>【Join the Sect】</color>
Wait a moment.
You set off for Langya Sword Pavilion...
column3: ท่านกำลังเดินทางไปที่ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา...

column2: I didn't expect to come back here in my lifetime...
Weren't you unwilling to come back?
Don't talk to me, I want to catch up with these old friends.
Let's go, I'll take you to see the master.
Master, I have fulfilled my mission and finally invited Big Hammer Senior Brother back.
It's good to be back, it's good to be back. I thought I would never see him again in my lifetime.
Thanks to the young hero {PlayerSurName} for helping Big Hammer Senior Brother return to the sect.
I think the young hero {PlayerSurName} is a promising talent. As the Sword Pavilion needs people, I beg the master to accept the young hero {PlayerSurName} into the sect.
Junior {PlayerName}, meet the senior.
Well, I am Jian Chi, the master of Langya Sword Pavilion. Since Heng'er vouches for you, I will make an exception and accept you as a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
Disciple {PlayerName}, meet the master!
Good, very good!
From today, {PlayerName} is a disciple of the Langya Sword Pavilion!
column3: ตั้งแต่วันนี้ {PlayerName} จะเป็นศิษย์ของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา!

column2: Looking at your outstanding talent, you are no less than my few direct disciples. The rise and fall of Langya Sword Pavilion in the future will all depend on you young people.
I will definitely not let down the expectations of the Pavilion Master!
I don't have much time left here. Once the time comes, I must run away immediately. Don't blame me for leaving without saying goodbye.
Senior brother, our sect's ability to <color=#c44b0e>forge weapons</color> is legendary in the martial arts world. When will I be able to learn it?
What's so difficult about that? I'll teach you.
Ou Ye Heng taught you the unique forging method of Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: อู๋เย่เหิงสอนเคล็ดลับการตีเหล็กของศาลากระบี่หลางหยาแก่ท่าน

column2: I can only teach you to this extent. Here are some blueprints for you to study carefully.\nThe rest depends on your daily practice and continuous honing of your skills.
As the saying goes, practice makes perfect. Any skill can be turned from decay to magic when practiced to the extreme.
A journey of a hundred miles is half over at ninety. If you leave the pavilion now, all your hard work will be in vain.

If you leave Langya Sword Pavilion, you will have nothing to do with the pavilion. Not only will the sect token <color=#c44b0e>Black iron token</color> be taken back, but also the sect talent <color=#c44b0e>Weapon expert</color> and Sect contribution will be erased. Think twice before you act.
column3: หากเจ้าออกจากศาลากระบี่หลางหยาเจ้าจะไม่มีอะไรเกี่ยวข้องกับศาลานี้ ไม่เพียงแต่ตราประจำสำนัก <color=#c44b0e>ตราเหล็กดำ</color> จะถูกนำกลับ แต่ยังรวมถึง <color=#c44b0e>เชี่ยวชาญอาวุธ</color> ของสำนักและความดีความชอบสำนักด้วยจะถูกลบด้วย คิดให้รอบคอบก่อนกระทำ

column2: I've already decided! <color=#097a76>(Return the Black iron token)</color>
column3: ข้าตัดสินใจแล้ว! <color=#097a76>(ส่งคืนตราเหล็กดำ)</color>

column2: I'll think about it.
column3: ข้าจะคิดดู

column2: Since you are so determined, from now on, you are no longer a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.\nAll past feelings are written off!
Alas! Since you give up the identity of the young master of the pavilion, I will not stop you.
However, the <color=#c44b0e>Black iron token</color> needs to be taken back!
column3: อย่างไรก็ตาม <color=#c44b0e>ตราเหล็กดำ</color> จะต้องถูกยึดคืน!

column2: In that case, you can go!
The Sword Pavilion never forces anyone to stay, but you can't return the <color=#c44b0e>Black iron token</color>.
column3: ศาลากระบี่ไม่เคยบังคับให้ใครอยู่ แต่เจ้าไม่สามารถคืน <color=#c44b0e>ตราเหล็กดำ</color> ได้

column2: Your relationship with Langya Sword Pavilion will decrease!
column3: ความสัมพันธ์ของท่านกับศาลากระบี่หลางหยาลดลง!

column2: Already decided! <color=#097a76>(Relationship with Langya Sword Pavilion drops to -20)</color>
column3: ตัดสินใจแล้ว! <color=#097a76>(ความสัมพันธ์กับศาลากระบี่หลางหยาลดลงเหลือ -20)</color>

column2: Think about it again
column3: คิดดูอีกที

column2: Exterminate
column3: กวาดล้าง

column2: I haven't seen such a courageous young man in a long time. Dare you say it again?
Destroy Langya Sword Pavilion! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
column3: ทำลายศาลากระบี่หลางหยา! <color=#c44b0e>(เริ่มสงครามโดยตรง)</color>

column2: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
column3: แค่พูดเล่นเท่านั้น โปรดอย่าจริงจัง

column2: I've heard a lot of arrogant words in my life, but most people don't get a chance to say them a second time.
Young man, the more you talk, the more mistakes you make. Your life is just a thought away from me.
Arrogant fool!
Let me see what makes you dare to destroy my Langya Sword Pavilion!
column3: ให้ข้าดูว่าอะไรทำให้เจ้ากล้าทำลายศาลากระบี่หลางหยาของข้า!

column2: The only way out now is to kill...\nI will make you bandits accompany Langya Sword Pavilion in death!
Ten thousand swords return...
column3: หมื่น-กระบี่-หวนกลับ...

column2: <size=300%><color=#E3170D>Sect!!!</color></size>

The sword intent engulfs you in an instant, your vision goes blank, and your hands keep swinging.
The surroundings are silent, and your connection with the world seems to be severed.
After a while, you realize that your consciousness is still there, you take a long breath, you are still alive.
The ultimate skill that Jian Chi burned to the last HP did not cause you a Finishing Strike.
Generations have changed, and the glorious era of Jian Chi has come to an end in your hands.
column3:
เจตกระบี่กลืนกินเจ้าในทันที การมองเห็นของเจ้าว่างเปล่า และมือของเจ้ายังคงแกว่งไปมา
สภาพแวดล้อมรอบตัวเงียบสงบ และการเชื่อมต่อของเจ้ากับโลกดูเหมือนจะถูกตัดขาด
ผ่านไปสักพักเจ้าก็รู้ว่าจิตสำนึกของเจ้ายังคงอยู่ เจ้าหายใจเข้ายาว เจ้ายังมีชีวิตอยู่
ทักษะขั้นสูงสุดที่มารกระบี่เผาเลือดจนหยดสุดท้ายไม่ได้ทำให้เจ้าได้รับการโจมตีถึงตาย
รุ่นต่างๆ มีการเปลี่ยนแปลง และยุคอันรุ่งโรจน์ของมารกระบี่ได้สิ้นสุดลงแล้วในมือของเจ้า

column2: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Langya Sword Pavilion, annihilated!</color></size>
column3: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา ถูกทำลายแล้ว!</color></size>

column2: {PlayerName}, is this the path you chose?\nSorry, I can't agree!
Today, with my sword, I salute you, a person I once admired.
Too strong! The best plan is to run!
column3: แข็งแกร่งยิ่งนัก! ถอยกันก่อนดีกว่า!

column2: Test
column3: ทดสอบ

column2: {PlayerName}, you have been in my sword pavilion for some time, today I will give you a special test.
If you are ready, come to me to take the test.
Ask about the test.
column3: ถามถึงบททดสอบ

column2: Participate in the test.<color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
column3: เข้าร่วมการทดสอบ<color=#097a76>(เข้าสู่การต่อสู้)</color>

column2: Not ready yet.
column3: ข้ายังไม่พร้อม

column2: The way of the test is for you to face the four disciples of this sect alone. If you can beat them by yourself, you will pass the test.

After passing the test, you will gain the unique talent of this sect - <color=#c44b0e>Weapon expert</color>. The bulletin board inside the sword pavilion will also post more challenging tasks for you.
column3: หลังจากผ่านการทดสอบ เจ้าจะได้รับพรสวรรค์เฉพาะตัวของสำนักนี้ - <color=#c44b0e>เชี่ยวชาญอาวุธ</color> กระดานข่าวภายในศาลากระบี่จะโพสต์ภารกิจที่ท้าทายมากขึ้นสำหรับเจ้า

column2: Only by passing this test will you become a true disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion!
Don't let me down!
Indeed extraordinary!\nIt seems that Langya Sword Pavilion has a successor.
column3: วิเศษจริงๆ!\nดูเหมือนว่าศาลากระบี่หลางหยาจะมีผู้สืบทอดแล้ว

column2: Don't be arrogant if you win, don't be discouraged if you lose. Since you lost, go down and practice hard, and then come to compete.
Suspicious person
column3: บุคคลที่น่าสงสัย

column2: Find all suspicious people in Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: ค้นหาผู้ต้องสงสัยทั้งหมดในศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: Inform the pavilion master, Jian Chi, of the progress of the matter.

{PlayerName}, there have been suspicious people lurking among the disciples of our pavilion recently. The old man orders you to find them all within <color=#c44b0e>two shichen</color> to prevent the Sword Pavilion from suffering unexpected events. Remember, don't miss any corner, including the back mountain.
Master, are there any clues about these people? Where should I start to find them?
Since these people have a plot, their walking routes in the sect must be abnormal. Pay close attention and you will find clues.
Also, listen to the disciples' self-talk, and you may find Vulnerable from it.

This Weapon Pavilion is hard to get into...|This old guy Jian Chi is really old and dim-sighted.|What to do... what to do...|I haven't got it yet... how can I explain this...|Take a little more is a little more.|I look left and right, up and down.|These rubbish disciples are all idiots.|Not being discovered... very good.
(Is this person confirmed to be the suspicious person who sneaked into Langya Sword Pavilion?)
column3: (คุณแน่ใจหรือไม่ว่าบุคคลนี้เป็นผู้ต้องสงสัยที่แอบเข้าไปในศาลากระบี่หลางหยา?)

column2: Confirm! <color=#097a76>(Protagonist solo)</color>
Not sure.
Stop pretending, I have discovered your true identity!
Junior brother, what are you looking for me for?
If I don't give you some hardship, I'm afraid you won't admit it.
Fighting with fellow disciples will be expelled from the sect, have you forgotten!
It seems to be a mistake...
Hehe, junior brother, I'm just joking with you, please don't mind.
Hmph!
This move, how is it our sect's martial arts...
Fighting with fellow disciples will be expelled from the sect, have you forgotten!
Don't blame me for being rude if you continue to act recklessly.
How did you discover my disguise?
I guessed right, it wasn't a waste of time after all.
You just guessed...
Surrender now!
I'm done playing with you!
Run, he ran away...
I'm done playing with you!
Run, he ran away...
Could these three be all the suspicious people who infiltrated the Sword Pavilion?
I should inform the Pavilion Master about this.
Senior Jian Chi, your disciples have been lured away by us, do you really think you can handle us alone?
You few are not worthy of my action.
Such arrogance!
The arrogant one is you.
So it's you!
What a pity, you were so close to ruining our plan.\nIt seems that the heavens are no longer watching over your Langya Sword Pavilion.
So it's you guys who infiltrated the Sword Pavilion, as expected, you're no good.\nSince you're all gathered here, it saves me the trouble of finding you one by one.
{PlayerName}, these are people from <color=#c44b0e>Dragonfly City</color>, don't let any of them escape.
Yes!
column3: ใช่!

column2: Speak, what is your purpose for infiltrating the Sword Pavilion?
Victors and losers, don't expect to get a word out of me!
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: I didn't expect him to commit suicide by poison.\nThese people from Dragonfly City are so decisive, they are not to be underestimated.
Master, rest assured, no matter how many of these characters come, we will eliminate them all.
{PlayerName}, I didn't expect your skills to improve so much, it's time to learn this technique.

This is the top internal skill that I relied on to make my name. If you can master our sect's unique skill in the future, the two will complement each other, and there will be few opponents in the world.
Thank you for your kindness, Master!
We can't stay here for long, retreat first!
Yes!
column3: ใช่!

column2: Want to leave? Stay!
Aerial Sword Qi, is just so-so!
What is your intention for infiltrating the Sword Pavilion?
A defeated general, don't expect to get a word out of me!
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: I didn't expect him to commit suicide by poison.\nThese people from Dragonfly City are so decisive, they are not to be underestimated.
{PlayerName}, there are many dangers in the martial arts world. If you don't have strong personal strength, it's hard to stand for long. You must strive for strength in the future.
I will follow the Master's teachings.
Today's matter is over, go rest.
The time agreed by the Master has passed, I should go and report the progress to him.

They are using a trick to lure the tiger away from the mountain, to get our disciples far away, so they can act conveniently. I will use their plan against them, let the disciples go and investigate, leaving me here alone, just to bait them.
Isn't the Master putting himself in danger by doing this?
Just a few thieves from Dragonfly City, I don't take them seriously. But what they are trying to do this time, I'm afraid it's hard to figure out.
{PlayerName}, you've worked hard too, go rest, you don't need to worry about this anymore.
Yes.
Forge Sword
Forge Sword
Train your Craft Weapon Skill to <color=#c44b0e>Master</color>.
Ask Jian Chi what he wants to tell.
column3: ถามมารกระบี่ว่าเขาต้องการบอกอะไร

column2: Forge a <color=#c44b0e>Xuanyuan</color> sword.
Inform Jian Chi of the result.
column3: แจ้งผลให้มารกระบี่ทราบ

column2: Our sect's weapon forging technique is unparalleled in the world, yet you have made no progress in this area. As my disciple, isn't it a shame for other sects to laugh at my teaching?
When you have mastered the skill of forging weapons to the level of <color=#c44b0e>Master</color>, I have an important task to entrust to you.
Don't disturb me again until you reach Master.
Sect leader, I have finally mastered the art of forging to the level of Master.
Good, good, good!
I once promised that if any disciple could forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword, he would be the successor of the Langya Sword Pavilion.
Now that your weapon forging skills have reached perfection, you can try to forge this Xuanyuan Divine Sword.
{PlayerName}, go and forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword, don't keep me waiting too long.
The materials needed to forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword are not cheap, you need to solve it yourself, I can't help.
<color=#c44b0e>Xuanyuan</color> is here, please take a look, sect leader!
What, you actually forged Xuanyuan?
It is indeed the Xuanyuan Divine Sword!
Today is a great joy for the Langya Sword Pavilion, it's a great joy in decades!
{PlayerName}, I keep my word, I plan to make you the next leader of the Langya Sword Pavilion, what do you think?
(Once you become the next leader, you will be bound to the Langya Sword Pavilion for life, do you agree?)
column3: (เมื่อท่านขึ้นเป็นผู้นำคนต่อไป ท่านจะต้องผูกมัดกับศาลากระบี่หลางหยาไปชั่วชีวิต ท่านตกลงหรือไม่?)

column2: <color=#0574a8>Agree to become the next leader!</color>
I don't want to be the next leader
You refuse something that everyone wants?!!
I'm sorry, I can't accept the sect leader's love.
I aspire to travel and gain knowledge, I'm afraid I can't shoulder the heavy responsibility of the sect leader.
Well, alright... I won't force you.
Even though you refuse to accept the position of the next sect leader, you should still accept the reward you deserve.
{PlayerName}, today I will pass on the sect's ultimate technique - Ten Thousand Swords to you, remember it!
Thank you for your teaching, sect leader!
Send a message, summon all disciples to gather in the main hall, I have something to announce!
Today, I want to announce a matter concerning the hundred-year heritage of the Langya Sword Pavilion in front of all disciples...
column3: วันนี้ ข้าจะประกาศเรื่องสำคัญเกี่ยวกับมรดกร้อยปีของศาลากระบี่หลางหยาต่อหน้าศิษย์ทุกคน

column2: Your junior brother, {PlayerName}, although he joined the sect last, he has worked hard and has a unique talent, he has far surpassed you in forging weapons.
I once said that whoever can forge the Xuanyuan Divine Sword by hand will be the successor of the Langya Sword Pavilion.
Now, Xuanyuan has appeared, and it was {PlayerName} who did it alone!
This can't be true
How is it possible
Has he reached Master level?
Did someone help him?
Among you, there may be those who question, those who are unconvinced, those who feel...
But what can that change? The fact is so, seeing is believing!
Today, I hereby announce {PlayerName} as the next Pavilion Master of Langya Sword Pavilion. After my hundred years, he can officially take over. All disciples must not defy my command!
{PlayerName}, today I will pass on the sect's ultimate technique - Ten Thousand Swords to you, remember it!
Thank you for your teaching, sect leader!
Congratulations, junior brother!
Congratulations, young Pavilion Master!
{PlayerName}, as the next Pavilion Master, you have a superior status in the pavilion, and there is actually another privilege...
Our pavilion's forbidden area - the Weapon Pavilion, you can enter and exit at will, and most of the weapons inside are at your disposal.
Who's there?
column3: นั่นใคร?

column2: I am {PlayerName}, a new disciple who has recently joined the Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: ข้าน้อยคือ{PlayerName} ศิษย์ใหม่ที่เพิ่งเข้าร่วมศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: So it's the junior brother, what brings you to the Weapon Pavilion today?
column3: แล้วเจ้าล่ะน้องชาย เจ้ามาทำอะไรที่หอศาสตรา?

column2: Request identity of the other party.
Ask the senior brother for martial arts training. <color=#097a76>(Stamina 20, specific battle)</color>
Request information about the Weapon Pavilion.
column3: ขอข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับหอศาสตรา

column2: Excuse me, Run away.
column3: ขออภัย ข้าขอตัวก่อน

column2: What does the junior brother want to do in the Weapon Pavilion today?
column3: น้องชาย เจ้าต้องการทำอะไรที่หอศาสตราล่ะ?

column2: I am Du Gu Jianyi, the current chief disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion.
column3: ข้าคือ ตู๋กูเจี้ยนอี้ ผู้นำศิษย์คนปัจจุบันของศาลากระบี่หลางหยา

column2: Now I am ordered to guard the Weapon Pavilion, and at the same time bear the heavy responsibility of testing the martial arts level of the junior brothers.
Junior brother, if you have nothing to do, you can come and compete with me.
When the master was young, he was rarely defeated. The weapons stored here are the ones that the master confiscated after defeating his opponents, which made them famous.

The real divine weapons in this Weapon Pavilion are actually the three swords treasured in the pavilion. These three swords are ancient divine weapons, and it took the master a lot of effort to bring them back to the world.
These weapons are just left here to gather dust, isn't it a waste?
These are the memories and peak power evidence of the master when he was young, they are of extraordinary significance...
However, there are exceptions. The next successor of Langya Sword Pavilion has the right to dispose of these weapons at will. However, it is extremely difficult to get into the master's eyes!
The junior brother is the most understanding, knowing that I am bored here, and specially came to accompany me.
So refreshing!
But with so many people rushing up, my exquisite moves can't be used.\nJunior brother, let's have a one-on-one competition again.
It's so cool, I haven't had such a hearty fight for a long time!
Hehe, junior brother, go and practice your swordsmanship for a few more years before coming to compete with me.
Junior brother, your foreplay is too short, I haven't enjoyed it yet!
I am {PlayerName}, I have long admired the Weapon Pavilion, and I came to visit today.
column3: ข้าน้อยคือ {PlayerName} ข้าเลื่อมใสหอศาสตรามานานแล้ว จึงมาเยี่ยมชมในวันนี้

column2: I am Du Gu Jianyi, ordered to guard this place.\nThe Weapon Pavilion is a forbidden place in our sect, and no one is allowed to enter without the Pavilion Master's permission!
column3: ข้าคือตู๋กูเจี้ยนอี้ ได้รับคำสั่งให้มาปกป้องสถานที่แห่งนี้\nหอศาตราคือสถานที่ต้องห้ามของสำนักเรา หากเจ้าสำนักไม่อนุญาตใครก็ไม่สามารถเข้าไปได้!

column2: Force your way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
Excuse me, Run away.
column3: ขออภัย ข้าขอตัวก่อน

column2: It seems that you are determined to be an enemy of Langya Sword Pavilion!
Now the divine weapons in this Weapon Pavilion are going to change their surname to {PlayerSurName}!
column3: ตอนนี้อาวุธศักดิ์สิทธิ์ในหอศาสตรา จะเปลี่ยนชื่อเป็น {PlayerSurName}!

column2: What are you doing here again?\nThe Weapon Pavilion is a forbidden place in our sect, and no one is allowed to enter without the Pavilion Master's permission!
This is not a place where you can come and go at will, please Run away.
Stop!
column3: หยุด!

column2: This is a forbidden place in the Sword Pavilion, and non-sect disciples are not allowed to enter!
Rats, dare to harm the disciples of our pavilion and trespass into our pavilion's forbidden area!\nThis is really unforgivable!
Old man, your era is over!\nLangya Sword Pavilion no longer has any reason to exist.
The best strategy is to retreat!
The sect has been destroyed, and now I have become a <color=#c44b0e>clanless</color> person.
Wow! It smells so good!
It seems like there are footsteps over there!
Oh no, someone is coming!
Please don't let it be the leader...
Shut up, you jinx!
{yell}Who goes there!
Hmm? It's you two!
So it's Brother {PlayerSurName}!
It's our benefactor!
You scared us, we thought it was the leader!
You guys are slacking off instead of guarding the gate...
It seems like the smell is coming from the forest over here!
How is that possible, aren't we hungry?\nHow can we protect the stronghold without a full stomach!
Exactly!
Brother {PlayerSurName}, would you like to join us for a bite?
Exactly!
{yell} Damn it! Are you sick again? You're always agreeing!
Let me go in and take a look!
Haha, big brother, you found a good place!
Humph! Keep it down!
Can't even shut your mouth with food, can you?
Yes, yes, yes!
Big...big...big brother!
What now? Didn't I tell you to keep quiet?
Then I won't be polite!
Thank you for your hospitality, it feels so good to be full!
Not at all.
We eat here at this time every day.
If the young hero doesn't mind, you can join us for meals and drinks anytime.
Exactly!
We're going back to guard the gate, please make yourself at home.
I'm really sorry!
I have some things to take care of!
I appreciate your kindness!
In that case, there's only one way up the mountain.
I assume the young hero came here to deal with something at Blue Wind Camp.
We'll go and clear the way for you!
Exactly!
Thank you very much!
Hmm? Who are you two?
Breaking into Blue Wind Camp in the middle of the night, I think you're tired of living!
This guy is really weak!
Exactly!
He fell down after a few hits.
Let's go!
Well...we'll take advantage of your kindness, but you have to consider our situation!
Exactly!
We can't handle eating with you 5 times in a row!
Exactly!
Let's call it a day, benefactor! We're going to guard the gate!
Exactly!
Stop! This road is closed!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
I am {PlayerName}, here to visit the leader. <color=#097a76>(Fame reached level 2 Well-known)</color>
I have a Blue Wind token, can I enter? <color=#097a76>(Show Blue Wind token)</color>
Turn around and run away
Looking for death!
A bunch of thieves dare to block my way, really overestimating yourselves.
{PlayerName}...never heard of it, definitely not a big shot.\nGet out, don't think you can fool me!
What an ignorant fellow.
{PlayerName}! You are actually {PlayerName}!!!\nI've heard about your deeds long ago, and I admire you very much. I didn't expect to see you in person today!
Can I enter the Blue Wind Camp now?
Of course, I wouldn't dare to stop you even if I had ten times the courage.
{PlayerName}! You are actually {PlayerName}!!!\nI've heard about your deeds long ago, and I admire you very much. I didn't expect to see you in person today!
Exactly!
Can I enter the Blue Wind Camp now?
Of course, I wouldn't dare to stop you even if I had ten times the courage.
Exactly!
Are you itching for a fight again?
Yes, yes...
Brother, I was wrong.
I don't know where you got this thing from, but even with it, I can't let outsiders come and go freely.
You should go back, don't be an eyesore here.
What an unreasonable fellow.
You actually have this Blue Wind token!\nAlthough you are not a brother of the camp, having this token naturally makes you our friend!
Can I enter the Blue Wind Camp now?
Brother, you really have a sense of humor.\nSince we're friends, how could I stop you?
I don't know where you got this thing from, but even with it, I can't let outsiders come and go freely.
Exactly!
I'm not an outsider, this is a token given to me personally by the leader.
If the token was given by the leader himself, then he is really not an outsider...
What kind of bullshit look is that, this is clearly a fake to deceive us.
Yes, yes...
Brother, this is real... even the anti-counterfeit mark left by the leader himself is there.
Damn, it seems to be real!
Hehe, it seems we made a mistake.\nIt seems that you are one of us, please forgive us for our previous misunderstanding.
Exactly!
So it's the benefactor who has come, please come in.
Stop!\nThis is not a place you can come, run away quickly!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
I am {PlayerName}, I came to visit because of your reputation.<color=#097a76>(Fame reached level 3 Reputable)</color>
Let Hua Qingqing handle it.<color=#097a76>(Hua Qingqing is accompanying)</color>
Can this prove my identity?<color=#097a76>(Show Claw blade)</color>

column2: Turn around and run away.
Looking for death!
A bunch of thieves dare to block my way, really overestimating your abilities.
I've heard of your name, please wait here, I'll go in and report.
After a while...
Our boss invites you in, please come in.
Hey, {PlayerName} is my friend, if you make things difficult for him, you are against me!
Haha, we dare not oppose you.\nSince he is your friend, let him in.

column2: Turn around and run away.

column2: Having someone without discernment as a gatekeeper can bring unnecessary enemies to your sect.
I didn't expect that our Tomb Raider Sect is so low-key, yet young hero {PlayerSurName} came to visit, it's really an honor.

column2: Turn around and run away.
Daring to cause trouble at the Crime Investigation Bureau, you really don't know the word 'death'!
Can't even guard your own home, what a bunch of wastes.

So it's Young Hero {PlayerName}, my apologies.\nHowever, the Crime Investigation Bureau is a place for detaining serious criminals. Without the chief's order, we can't let anyone in. Please understand, Young Hero {PlayerSurName}.
{PlayerName} is my friend, and I'm here to discuss important matters with the chief. You must not stop me.
Since you are a friend of Luo, and you're here to see the chief, we will let you pass.
So, the young hero was once a colleague of the Crime Investigation Bureau, we are all family then.\nYou must have important matters to attend to, I will let you pass, please feel free.
The protagonist runs away a certain distance
Young Hero, please stop!\nThis is a military area, no unauthorized entry is allowed!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
I am {PlayerName}, here to visit because of your reputation.<color=#097a76>(Fame reaches Level 4 Rising Star)</color>
Let Ye Yinping handle it.<color=#097a76>(Ye Yinping accompanies)</color>
Turn around and run away.
Chuxiang City is surrounded, please send troops to rescue, General Ye!
Guards, someone is intruding the camp!
I've heard about the undefeated Ye Family Battalion, today I see it's nothing special!
So it's Young Hero {PlayerName}, my apologies.\nBut without General Ye's order, we can't let you in. Please understand.
{PlayerName} is my friend, he has important matters to discuss with my father, you must not stop him.
Since Miss Ye is accompanying, then please come in, Young Hero {PlayerSurName}.
Such a big matter!\nYoung Hero, you can go in and report to the marshal yourself.
Young Hero, please stop!\nThis is Langya Sword Pavilion, ordinary people are not allowed in.
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
I am {PlayerName}, here to visit because of your reputation.<color=#097a76>(Fame reaches Level 4 Rising Star)</color>

column2: Let Du Gu Jianyi handle it.<color=#097a76>(Du Gu Jianyi accompanies)</color>

column2: Turn around and run away.
Those who offend the Sword Pavilion, die!
Langya Sword Pavilion is nothing special!
So it's Young Hero {PlayerName}, my apologies.\nYoung Hero {PlayerSurName}, please feel free.
{PlayerName} is my close friend, not an ordinary person.
Since Brother Ou Ye vouches for you, there's naturally no problem.\nYoung Hero {PlayerSurName}, please come in.
So the young hero is from the same sect, then you are not an ordinary person.\nPlease feel free, Young Hero.
{PlayerName} is my close friend, not an ordinary person.
Since Brother Dugu is vouching for you, there's naturally no problem.\n{PlayerSurName} Young hero, please come in.
This is Jiujiang Water Camp, not a place you can just barge into!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
I am {PlayerName}, I came to visit because of your reputation.<color=#097a76>(Fame reached level 3 Reputable)</color>

column2: Turn around and run away.
Kid, you're courting death!
I really don't like fighting and killing, it's just the situation that forces me.

Are you {PlayerName}? You're quite famous now.\nOur water stronghold is currently short of manpower. If a brave man like you could join us, you would certainly be highly valued by the stronghold leader.
If you have something to discuss with the camp leader, just go straight in.
Where are your eyes?\nDo you pierce my existence?
So it's the young lady!\nPlease forgive us, young lady. We didn't know this person was your friend. We will let him pass now.
It's a case of the water flooding the Dragon King's Temple - it's our own brother visiting!\nWelcome, welcome, please come in.
Monks are not allowed to leave the temple without the abbot's permission.\nPlease go back, junior brother!
Halt, ordinary people are not allowed to enter, please state your name!
What's so special about this place that ordinary people can't enter? Is there any particular rule to enter here?

The so-called "talk and laugh with great scholars, no commoners come and go", this is the Confucius Temple, the people who come and go are either great scholars or famous people. If commoners mingle among them, wouldn't it spoil the scenery?
I suspect you're mocking me for being an uneducated nobody, not worthy to enter your Confucius Temple!
Why humiliate yourself by pointing out the obvious?
(The gatekeepers of this Confucius Temple are so arrogant, I'm really curious about what's so special about this Confucius Temple that makes them so condescending!)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
I am {PlayerName}, here to visit you by reputation.<color=#097a76>(Fame reached level 5 Famous)</color>
Let Cai Youzhi handle it. <color=#097a76>(Cai Youzhi accompanies)</color>
Can this prove my identity? <color=#097a76>(Show Gentleman gem)</color>
