column2: Turn around and run away.
I am the newly promoted scholar {PlayerName}, I came to visit out of admiration.
Present the recommendation letter from Qi Wang.
Today, let's open your eyes, not only does the Confucius Temple monopolize literary talent, but it also tops the three teachings in martial arts!
The Confucius Temple's overconfidence is indeed second to none, I've learned a lot today.
So it's Master {PlayerSurName}, I apologize for my ignorance.\nWelcome to Master {PlayerSurName}, please come in.
{PlayerSurName} is my friend, he came here to learn from my father, there's no need to stop him.
Yes!
column3: ใช่!

column2: I didn't expect you to have such a deep connection with the Confucius Temple!\nSince you have the Confucius Temple token, please come in.
So you're the newly promoted scholar that the master often mentions!\nThe master specifically instructed that if you come, there's no need to stop you. Please come in.

The master instructed that recently there have been many imposters, so all scholars who enter the temple for the first time need to match three pairs of couplets to distinguish the real from the fake, and then they can enter.
Just three pairs of couplets, it's nothing to me!\nPlease give me the question.
Okay, listen carefully, young hero.
The young master is truly knowledgeable and has passed the test, please proceed into the hall.
You, Graduate, have doubts and cannot enter without passing the test.
This is not a place for people like you.\nPlease don't lose your dignity and embarrass yourself!
So you are the one recommended by Qi Wang, then you are a distinguished guest of Confucius Temple, please come in.

I, the younger generation {PlayerName}, have long admired the Taoist Sect, and I am here today to pay a visit.\nI sincerely ask the master to accept me as a disciple, I will not disgrace the reputation of the Taoist Sect.
Every disciple of the Taoist Sect is virtuous and all-around.\nLet the old Taoist see what your character is like...
A moment later...
What a pity, what a pity.
Although your aptitude is good, your character does not meet the requirements of the old Taoist, so you are temporarily not destined for the Taoist Sect.
May I ask the master, where exactly do I not meet the requirements, and how much is the difference?
It can only be understood and not explained, you should try to understand it yourself.
Good, good.
column3: ดี ดีมาก

column2: Your character and aptitude are very satisfactory to the old Taoist, and you have passed the basic test of the old Taoist.
So, do I have a chance to join the Taoist Sect?
Haven't asked the master how to address him?
I am Zhong Yangzi, currently the head of the Taoist Sect.
column3: ข้าคือ ฉงหยางสื่อ, เจ้าสำนักคนปัจจุบันของลัทธิเต๋า.

column2: Young people are impulsive and easy to get agitated.\nJust be patient, listen to the old Taoist's introduction first, and then make a decision.
Tell me, what do you want to know?
<color=#0574a8>Join the Taoist Sect.
Ask about the history of the Taoist Sect.
Ask what can be learned from the Taoist Sect.
<color=#0574a8>I don't want to join for now.</color>
The Taoist Sect has been established for hundreds of years and is one of the <color=#c44b0e>three religions</color> in the world.

Every disciple of the Taoist Sect must pay attention to their own <color=#c44b0e>benevolence and righteousness</color>.\nIf you do something against benevolence and righteousness, you will face the wall in light punishment, and in severe cases, your power will be abolished and you will be expelled from the Taoist Sect.
Our sect is good at <color=#c44b0e>fist and sword techniques</color> in external skills, and our internal skills lean towards defense, emphasizing readiness!
column3: พรรคของเรามีความเชี่ยวชาญวิทยายุทธ์ในด้าน<color=#c44b0e>วิชาหมัดมวยและเพลงดาบ</color> ส่วนในด้านกำลังภายในของเราเอนเอียงไปทางการป้องกัน โดยเน้นไปที่ความพร้อม!

column2: The old Taoist has a unique skill called <color=#c44b0e>Taichi Thirteen Forms</color>, which will be taught to the best disciples.
column3: ผู้อาวุโสลัทธิเต๋ามีวรยุทธ์เฉพาะที่เรียกว่า <color=#c44b0e>ไทเก็กสิบสามลักษณ์</color> ซึ่งจะสอนให้กับศิษย์ที่เก่งที่สุด

column2: There are also methods of refining medicine and pills, which are rare skills in the world.
column3: นอกจากนี้ยังมีวิธีการกลั่นยาและยาเม็ดซึ่งเป็นทักษะที่หายากในโลก

column2: {PlayerName}, from this moment on, you are a disciple of the Taoist Sect!\nI hope you will not forget the way of benevolence and righteousness, and do not disgrace the Taoist Sect.
Every day at <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color>, disciples of our sect must attend morning classes at the <color=#c44b0e>Star Observatory</color>. Do not be late.
Disciple {PlayerName}, I pay my respects to the headmaster.\nI will definitely not forget the teachings of the headmaster today.
Choose the sword technique "Seven Stars Sword"
Choose the boxing technique "Five Elements Fist"
Thank you for teaching me martial arts.
Come find the old Taoist when you have made up your mind.
column3: มาตามหานักพรตเต๋าเฒ่าเมื่อเจ้าตัดสินใจได้แล้ว

column2: Is there anything else you want to know?
column3: มีอะไรที่เจ้าอยากรู้อีกไหม

column2: What's done is done, your fate with the Taoist Sect in this life is over, don't force it.
Who is the uncle between us?
...Of course it's you.
You little brat, you still recognize me as your uncle!\nSince I'm your uncle, shouldn't you listen to me in everything?
Uncle, everything else is fine, but this...
Young man over there, can you help me settle this dispute?\nI, as an elder, told this brat to respect his elders and love the young, that's not wrong, right?
Respecting the old and loving the young is a virtue of our generation, of course it's not wrong!
I am his uncle, he is my nephew, he should listen to me, right?
In principle, there should be order between the old and the young, the nephew should listen to the uncle, of course that's not wrong!
Now that I, as an uncle, am short of money,\nasking my nephew to get some drinks, that's not too much, right?
Of course it's too much!\nUncle, you want to pawn our master's personal sword for drinks!
I can't comply with this matter, no matter what!
Look at this stubborn kid, he's even more troublesome than his master.\nYoung man, we're destined to meet, can you help me out?
Is this bottle of wine to your taste?<color=#097a76>(Jiannan wine1 pot)</color>
column3: เจ้าชอบสุราไหนี้ไหม?<color=#097a76>(สุราเจียนหนาน1 ไห)</color>

column2: It's better to meet by chance than to invite. Today, I'll treat you two! <color=#097a76>(1000 wen, one shichen)</color>
It's hard for a clean official to settle domestic disputes, I can't interfere in your affairs.
Is this really for me?\nYou're not planning anything, are you?
If you don't trust me, I'll take it back, as if I never came.
Just a joke, why so serious?
Oh dear, just a joke, why so serious?\nIf you don't know me, you must be a newbie in the martial arts world, no wonder you look so naive.
Listen up, kid!\nIn the drunkenness, Heaven and Earth are vast, and the sun and moon are long in the pot - I am <color=#c44b0e>La Tazhang of the Taoist Sect</color>.
Taoist Sect? One of the three major sects in the martial arts world, the Taoist Sect??
column3: ลัทธิเต๋า? หนึ่งในสามสำนักหลักในโลกยุทธภพ สำนักเต๋า??

column2: Junior {PlayerName} pays respect to Elder Zhang.\nI didn't recognize Mount Tai, and unexpectedly met a senior from the Taoist Sect here.
Go away, what junior and senior, I hate these formalities the most!\nI'm going to taste the good wine. Kid, we'll meet again if we're destined!
I am Chang Chunzi, thank you for your help. My uncle and I have to go to <color=#c44b0e>Lin'an City</color> for business, so we can't accompany you. See you later.
Hey, this is...
It seems to be the understanding of this boxing technique? It must have been left by that senior.\nConsider it his return gift for this bottle of wine, I'll just take it without being polite!
This is great, someone is treating, and the worms in my stomach can be happy again.
Good wine, good food, good kid!\nThere are such delicacies in the world, my trip is not in vain!
Kid, you treated me to this meal, if you still don't know my name, wouldn't it be a loss?
Let me tell you, remember, I am La Tazhang of the Taoist Sect.
Taoist Sect? One of the three major sects in the martial arts world, the Taoist Sect??
column3: ลัทธิเต๋า? หนึ่งในสามสำนักหลักในโลกยุทธภพ สำนักเต๋า??

column2: Junior {PlayerName} pays respect to Elder Zhang.\nI didn't recognize Mount Tai, and unexpectedly met a senior from the Taoist Sect here.
Go away, what junior and senior, I hate these formalities the most!
I'm full today, we'll meet again if we're destined!
In the drunkenness, Heaven and Earth are vast~
And the sun and moon are long in the pot~
I am Chang Chunzi, thank you for your hospitality. My uncle and I have to go to <color=#c44b0e>Lin'an City</color> for business, so we can't accompany you. See you later.
Huh? This Pill is...
Search for people in Lin'an
Search for people
Get <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> to attract La Tazhang, or search every corner of Lin'an City.
column3: รับ<color=#c44b0e>สุราวานร</color>เพื่อดึงดูด ลาทาจาง หรือค้นหาทุกซอกทุกมุมของเมืองหลินอัน

column2: Walk around the remote areas of Lin'an City with Monkey wine, you might discover something.
column3: ลองเดินไปรอบ ๆ บริเวณที่ที่เข้าถึงยากของเมืองหลินอัน พร้อม"สุราวานร", เผื่อเจ้าจะพบเจออะไรบ้างอย่าง

column2: Go to the bridge in the city and inform Chang Chunzi.
Talk with Chang Chunzi.
Where can I find Monkey wine in Lin'an City...\nCan you help me figure it out?
column3: ข้าจะหาสุราวานรนี้ได้ที่ไหนในเมืองหลินอัน...\nเจ้าช่วยข้าคิดได้ไหม?

column2: I'll help you find your uncle.
I'm really helpless.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, can you help me find my uncle now?
I'll help you find your uncle.
I still have no clue.
What do you want to do?
I'll exchange a pot of good wine with you.<color=#097a76>(Luofu spring wine1 pot)</color>
column3: ข้าจะแลกเปลี่ยนสุราชั้นยอดกับเจ้า<color=#097a76>(สุราใบไม้ผลิลั่วฟู 1 ไห)</color>

column2: Is this money enough to buy your Monkey wine? <color=#097a76>(2000 Wen)</color>
column3: เงินเท่านี้พอซื้อสุราวานรหรือไม่ <color=#097a76>(2000 อีแปะ)</color>

column2: Or would you like me to teach you some advanced Beast Taming techniques? <color=#097a76>(Beast Taming reaches Advance)</color>
If you don't drink the toast, you have to drink the penalty, I'm going to rob it by force! <color=#c44b0e>(Trigger battle)</color>
Honorable people don't snatch what others like, let's find another way.
However, if you're willing to spar with me, I won't bother with that kid.
I'll accompany you till the end, but please show mercy. <color=#097a76>(Main character duels)</color>
I can't afford to hurt you by accident.
Come on, spar with me for a few more rounds!
I'll accompany you till the end, but please show mercy. <color=#097a76>(Main character duels)</color>
I can't afford to hurt you by accident.
Young hero, we meet again, what a coincidence.
Why are you in such a hurry, Taoist? Did you run into any trouble?
Ah, my uncle master, who finds me too talkative, has now run off somewhere to find peace.\nGiven his temperament, if no one looks after him, I don't know how much trouble he'll cause.
But I'm not familiar with Lin'an City at all, so I'm worried about where to find him.
Given his temperament, this kind of situation probably isn't the first or second time.\nHow did you usually find him?
Uncle master loves the taste of <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> the most,\nIf he's in the mountains, I can find him based on this.
column3: อาจารย์อาชอบรสชาติของ<color=#c44b0e>สุราวานร</color>มากที่สุด\nถ้าเขาหนีไปอยู่บนเขา ข้าสามารถติดตามหาเขาได้จากสิ่งนี้

column2: Monkey wine? How can this help find him?
column3: สุราวานร? สิ่งนี้จะช่วยตามหาเขาเจอได้อย่างไร?

column2: Whenever uncle master hides because of his temper, as long as I bring Monkey wine and walk around the mountain,\nUncle master will show up when he smells it.
column3: ทุกครั้งที่อาจารย์อาหนีไปซ่อนตัวเพราะอารมณ์ของท่าน ตราบใดที่ข้านำสุราวานรมาเดินเล่นรอบภูเขา\nอาจารย์อามักจะออกมาเองเสมอเมื่อได้กลิ่นของมัน

column2: (He can show up by smelling it, this La Tazhang's nose is even better than a dog's...)\nDon't you have a method?
Where can I find Monkey wine in Lin'an City...\nCan you help me figure it out?
column3: ข้าจะหาสุราวานรนี้ได้ที่ไหนในเมืองหลินอัน...\nเจ้าช่วยข้าคิดได้ไหม?

column2: What a fragrant Monkey wine!\nIt must be that stinky kid teasing my appetite again.
column3: ช่างเป็นสุราวานรที่หอมกรุ่นจริงๆ!\nคงเป็นเด็กเหม็นนั่นที่แกล้งข้าอีกแล้ว

column2: Why is it you? I thought it was that stinky kid Chang Chunzi.\nBut knowing this method to lure me out, it must be him who told you.
Well, this Monkey wine is mine!\nI, the Taoist master, won't bother with a child.
column3: สุราวานรนี้เป็นของข้า!\nข้าปรมาจารย์ลัทธิเต๋า, จะไม่เข้าไปยุ่งเรื่องของเด็กๆ

column2: Why are you hiding here, you really made me look for you!
So what if you found me, I, the Taoist master, won't go back with you to see that stinky kid.\nHe's always nagging, I knew it would be like this, I might as well hide in the mountains for peace.
However, if you're willing to spar with me, I won't bother with that kid.
Don't worry, I, the Taoist master, know how to control my strength.
I was careless, I was afraid of hurting the kid, I, the Taoist master, even held back, I didn't expect...\nForget it, I accept the bet and lose, I'll go find that kid Chang Chunzi.
No, no, it's not fun at all!\nIt's boring, I, the Taoist master, won't play with you anymore!
Young hero, why are you here?\nDid you find uncle master?
I found him... it's just that he insisted on fighting with me, and I couldn't beat him...
I'm afraid uncle master got bored and left...
Anyway, thank you for your help, young hero.\nI still have to go and find uncle master, we'll meet again.
Coward, you won't amount to much in the future.
Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, for helping me find uncle master.
{PlayerSurName} kid, don't always help this stinky kid.\nIf he doesn't experience hardships now, how can he stand on his own in the future!
I, the Taoist master, have to go to <color=#c44b0e>Daliang City</color> for serious business, we'll meet again if we're destined~
Uncle master, wait for me!
column3: อาจารย์อา, รอข้าด้วย!

column2: This La Tazhang really is elusive.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, have you not chosen uncle master yet?
Come on, have a few moves with me!\nI, the Taoist master, will go back after the match!
If you really can't find <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color>,\nyou'll have to search every inch of Lin'an City, you'll always be able to find uncle master.
column3: หากเจ้าหา <color=#c44b0e>สุราวานร</color> ไม่ได้จริงๆ\nเจ้าจะต้องค้นหาทุกๆ ตารางนิ้วของเมืองหลินอัน เจ้าถึงจะสามารถหาอาจารย์อาเจอได้

column2: I'll search with the young hero.
column3: ข้าจะร่วมค้นหากับจอมยุทธ์หนุ่ม

column2: Monkey wine...Monkey wine...I wonder if it has any relations with monkeys.\nWhy not ask this monkey performer if he's heard of it.
column3: สุราวานร...สุราวานร...ข้าสงสัยว่ามันมีความสัมพันธ์อะไรกับลิงหรือเปล่า\nทำไมไม่ลองถาม"นักแสดงละครลิง"คนนี้ว่าเขาเคยได้ยินเรื่องนี้บ้างไหม

column2: Excuse me, brother, have you heard of Monkey wine?
column3: ขอโทษนะพี่ชาย ท่านพอจะรู้จักสุราวานรไหม?

column2: Are you here to snatch my <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> too?\nI only have one pot left, and no one is going to get their hands on it!
column3: เจ้ามาที่นี่เพื่อแย่งชิง <color=#c44b0e>สุราวานร</color> ของข้าด้วยเหรอ?\nข้าเหลือมันเพียงไหเดียวเท่านั้น และไม่มีใครกล้าแย่งมันไปจากข้า!

column2: What a coincidence, I came for it.
column3: บังเอิญจังเลย, ข้ามาเพื่อสิ่งนี้

column2: What do you want to do?
column3: เจ้าอยากทำอะไรล่ะ?

column2: Drinking Monkey wine every day does get a bit boring, it's nice to change the taste!
column3: ดื่มสุราวานรทุกวัน มันก็จะน่าเบื่อหน่อยๆ เปลี่ยนรสชาติบ้างก็ดีนะ!

column2: I didn't expect this Monkey wine to be so valuable, if I had known, I would have brought more pots.\nOnce the money and goods are settled, you can't back out.
column3: ข้าไม่คิดว่าสุราวานรนี้จะมีค่าขนาดนี้ ถ้าข้ารู้ คงเอามาเพิ่มอีกสักหลายไห\nเมื่อจ่ายแล้ว ไม่รับคืนนะ

column2: If you can make my monkey listen to you, I'll believe you have this ability.
column3: ถ้าเจ้าทำให้ลิงของข้าฟังเจ้าได้, ข้าจะเชื่อว่าเจ้ามีความสามารถนี้

column2: Squeak-squeak-squeak
column3: เจี๊ยก-เจี๊ยก-เจี๊ยก

column2: Wow! I've never seen a monkey so happy, did you really make it understand human language?!\nThis ability is really amazing, you must teach me quickly.
column3: ว้าว! ข้าไม่เคยเห็นลิงมีความสุขขนาดนี้ เจ้าทำให้มันเข้าใจภาษามนุษย์ได้จริงๆ หรือ!\nความสามารถนี้น่าทึ่งมาก, ท่านต้องสอนมันให้ข้าอย่างรวดเร็ว

column2: It seems very powerful, I need to practice more.\nIf I can reach your level, this monkey can help me do more things.
column3: ดูเหมือนมีพลังมาก ข้าต้องฝึกฝนให้มากกว่านี้\nถ้าข้าไปถึงระดับของเจ้าได้ ลิงตัวนี้สามารถช่วยข้าทำสิ่งต่างๆ ได้มากขึ้น

column2: Here is the <color=#c44b0e>Monkey wine</color> I promised you, please accept it.
column3: นี่คือ <color=#c44b0e>สุราวานร</color> ตามสัญญา, โปรดรับมันไป

column2: You think I'm easy to bully?\nLet you know how powerful my monkey is!
column3: เจ้าคิดว่าข้าจะยอมถูกรังแกง่ายๆ เหรอ?\nให้มันรู้ซะบ้างว่าลิงของข้าร้ายกาจขนาดไหน!

column2: You are powerful, here is the Monkey wine, don't bother me again.
column3: เจ้าแข็งแกร่ง, นี่คือสุราวานร อย่ามารังควานข้าอีก

column2: Want to snatch my things, it's simply wishful thinking! Get out of here now!
column3: อยากจะแย่งของของข้า, มันเป็นแค่ความคิดฟุ้งซ่าน! ออกไปจากที่นี่เดี๋ยวนี้!

column2: The Way of Alchemy
column3: วิถีแห่งการปรุงยา

column2: Prescription
Make a <color=#c44b0e>Illness removal pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
column3: ทำยา <color=#c44b0e>ยารักษาโรค</color> และมอบให้กับ ลัทธิเต๋า·เภสัชกร

column2: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Revitalization pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
column3: ทำยา <color=#c44b0e>เม็ดยารวมฟื้นฟู</color> และมอบให้กับ ลัทธิเต๋า·เภสัชกร

column2: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Seven stars pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
column3: ทำยา <color=#c44b0e>โอสถเจ็ดดาว</color> และมอบให้กับ ลัทธิเต๋า·เภสัชกร

column2: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Blue wave powder</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
column3: ทำยา <color=#c44b0e>ผงคลื่นคราม</color> และมอบให้กับ ลัทธิเต๋า·เภสัชกร

column2: Make a <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten pill</color> and give it to the Taoist Sect·Apothecary.
column3: ทำยา <color=#c44b0e>โอสถรู้แจ้ง</color> และมอบให้กับ ลัทธิเต๋า·เภสัชกร

column2: Are you the new disciple who just joined recently?
column3: เจ้าเป็นศิษย์ใหม่ที่เพิ่งเข้าร่วมเมื่อเร็ว ๆ นี้หรือไม่?

column2: My name is {PlayerName}, please give me some guidance, senior brother.
column3: ข้าชื่อ {PlayerName} โปรดให้คำแนะนำแก่ข้าหน่อย, ศิษย์พี่

column2: All of us in the Taoist Sect, in addition to being skilled in martial arts, are experts in alchemy. Now I will guide you in this skill.
column3: พวกเราทุกคนในสำนักเต๋า นอกเหนือจากความชำนาญด้านศิลปะการต่อสู้แล้วยังเป็นผู้เชี่ยวชาญด้านการปรุงยาอีกด้วย ตอนนี้ข้าจะแนะนำเจ้าเกี่ยวกับทักษะนี้

column2: I'll give you a prescription, try to make an <color=#c44b0e>Illness removal pill</color> and give it to me.
column3: ข้าจะให้เทียบยาแก่เจ้า, ลองปรุง<color=#c44b0e>ยารักษาโรค</color>แล้วส่งมาให้ข้า

column2: Don't disturb me before the pill is made.\nYou can buy ordinary herbs from me, high-quality herbs you need to find a way yourself.
column3: อย่ารบกวนข้าก่อนที่ยาจะถูกปรุงขึ้น\nเจ้าสามารถซื้อสมุนไพรธรรมดาจากข้าได้, สมุนไพรคุณภาพสูง เจ้าต้องหาวิธีด้วยตัวเอง.

column2: What are you here for? Have you already made the pill I asked for?
column3: เจ้ามาที่นี่เพื่ออะไร? เจ้าได้ทำยาที่ข้าขอแล้วหรือยัง?

column2: Hand over an Illness removal pill.<color=#097a76>（Illness removal pill1）</color>
column3: ส่งมอบยารักษาโรค.<color=#097a76>（ยารักษาโรค 1）</color>

column2: It's not successful yet.
column3: มันยังไม่สำเร็จ

column2: Hand over a Revitalization pill.<color=#097a76>（Revitalization pill1）</color>
column3: ส่งมอบเม็ดยารวมฟื้นฟู <color=#097a76>（เม็ดยารวมฟื้นฟู 1）</color>

column2: Hand over a Seven stars pill.<color=#097a76>（Seven stars pill1）</color>
column3: ส่งมอบโอสถเจ็ดดาว <color=#097a76>（โอสถเจ็ดดาว 1）</color>

column2: Hand over a Blue wave powder.<color=#097a76>（Blue wave powder1）</color>
column3: ส่งมอบผงคลื่นคราม <color=#097a76>（ผงคลื่นคราม 1）</color>

column2: Hand over an Enlighten pill.<color=#097a76>（Enlighten pill1）</color>
column3: ส่งมอบโอสถรู้แจ้ง <color=#097a76>（โอสถรู้แจ้ง 1）</color>

column2: Hmm, the quality is quite good.\nNext, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Revitalization pill</color> and give it to me.
column3: อืมม, คุณภาพค่อนข้างดี\nต่อไป เจ้าจะต้องปรุงยา <color=#c44b0e>เม็ดยารวมฟื้นฟู</color> แล้วมอบให้ข้า

column2: Hmm, the quality is quite good.\nNext, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Seven stars pill</color> and give it to me.
column3: อืมม, คุณภาพค่อนข้างดี\nต่อไป เจ้าจะต้องปรุงยา <color=#c44b0e>โอสถเจ็ดดาว</color> แล้วมอบให้ข้า

column2: Hmm, the quality is quite good.\nNext, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Blue wave powder</color> and give it to me.
column3: อืมม, คุณภาพค่อนข้างดี\nต่อไป เจ้าจะต้องปรุงยา <color=#c44b0e>ผงคลื่นคราม</color> แล้วมอบให้ข้า

column2: Hmm, the quality is quite good.\nNext, you are going to refine the <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten pill</color> and give it to me.
column3: อืมม, คุณภาพค่อนข้างดี\nต่อไป เจ้าจะต้องปรุงยา <color=#c44b0e>โอสถรู้แจ้ง</color> แล้วมอบให้ข้า

column2: Your alchemy skills have improved significantly, and you are now outstanding among your peers. I have nothing more to teach you.
column3: ทักษะการปรุงยาของเจ้าพัฒนาขึ้นอย่างมาก และตอนนี้เจ้าโดดเด่นในหมู่เพื่อนของเจ้าแล้ว ข้าไม่มีอะไรจะสอนเจ้าอีกแล้ว

column2: Now I will pass on to you the pill formula of our Taoist Sect. With your talent, you will definitely be able to refine this pill in your lifetime.
column3: ตอนนี้ข้าจะส่งต่อสูตรยาของสำนักเต๋าของเราให้เจ้า ด้วยความสามารถของเจ้า เจ้าจะสามารถปรุงยายาเม็ดนี้ได้ตลอดชีวิตของเจ้า

column2: If you run away from the Taoist Sect, there will be no chance of returning in the future.\nUpon leaving, the sect token <color=#c44b0e>Taichi jade ornament</color> will be taken back, the sect talent <color=#c44b0e>Authentic sect</color> will be removed, and the sect contribution will be wiped out. Think carefully before you act.
column3: หากเจ้าหนีออกจากลัทธิเต๋า จะไม่มีโอกาสกลับมาอีกในอนาคต\nเมื่อออกไป สัญลักษณ์ของสำนัก <color=#c44b0e>จี้หยกไทเก็ก</color> จะถูกนำกลับ, ความสามารถของสำนัก <color=#c44b0e>สำนักเที่ยงแท้</color> จะถูกลบออก และความดีความชอบของสำนักจะถูกลบออกเช่นกัน. คิดให้รอบคอบก่อนตัดสินใจ.

column2: Exterminate
The Taoist Sect has been established for hundreds of years, and has faced countless disasters and difficulties.\nYou are not the first one to speak wildly, and you will not be the last!
Destroy the Taoist Sect！<color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
Since it's a thoughtless remark, I won't pursue it.\nYoung man, you need to take care of yourself.
Today, I am going to open my eyes and see what kind of ability you have to dare to talk about destroying my Taoist Sect!
{PlayerName}, I cannot agree with your actions.\nToday, if you are an enemy of the Taoist Sect, you are an enemy of mine!
Kid, I really didn't expect you to be this kind of person.\nSince you've come this far, I can only be at odds with you!

This place used to be a thriving place of incense,
A place for practicing wonderful methods,
A martial arts holy land that countless people respect and yearn for,
A undefeated myth that has stood for hundreds of years.
At this moment, your blood is gradually boiling,
This time, you overturned the world's perception and shattered the undefeated myth!
A wisp of blue smoke slowly rises into the sky,
The existence that represents the Taoist Sect has become a thing of the past.
Today's battle achievements will be passed down from generation to generation...
column3:

Stubborn!

column2: Reflect on the wall
Idle, would you like to read the Tao Te Ching?
Read the Tao Te Ching in peace. <color=#097a76>(1 shichen)</color>
Not in the mood to read.

The Tao that can be spoken is not the eternal Tao.
The name that can be named is not the eternal name.
The nameless is the beginning of heaven and earth.
The named is the mother of all things.
Therefore, always desireless, you see the mystery.
Ever desiring, you see the manifestations.
These two are the same, yet they are different.
This is called the mystery, the mystery within the mystery, the doorway to all understanding.

Do not exalt the worthy, so that people will not compete.
Do not value rare treasures, so that people will not steal.
Do not display desirable things, so that people's hearts will not be disturbed.
Therefore, the sage governs by emptying their hearts, filling their bellies, weakening their ambitions, and strengthening their bones.
Always keep the people ignorant and desireless.
The sage who knows does not dare to act, and then there is nothing that cannot be governed.|Cruel World, treats all things as straw dogs.
The sage is not benevolent, treats the people as straw dogs.
The Valley Spirit is invincible, this is called the mysterious female.
The gate of the mysterious female, this is called the root of heaven and earth.
Endlessly it seems to exist, its use is never exhausted.|Heaven and earth last forever.
The reason why heaven and earth can last forever is that they do not live for themselves, hence they can live forever.
Therefore, the sage puts his body last and yet it comes first, puts it outside and yet it remains.
Is it not because he has no personal interests, so he can fulfill his personal interests?
The highest good is like water. Water benefits all things and does not compete. It stays in places that people dislike. Therefore, it is close to the Tao.
Dwell with the land, be deep in the heart, be generous in giving, speak with integrity, govern with justice, serve with ability, act with opportunity.
Only by not competing, can we live without blame.|Favor and disgrace bring one to fear. The great trouble lies in the body.
What does it mean that favor and disgrace bring fear?
Favor is degrading, fear comes when one gets it, and fear comes when one loses it.
This is what is meant by saying that favor and disgrace bring fear.
What does it mean that the great trouble lies in the body?
I have great trouble because I have a body.
When I no longer have a body, what trouble could I have?
Therefore, he who values the world as his body can be entrusted with the world.
He who loves the world as his body can be entrusted with the world.|To the utmost extent, keep to tranquility.
All things are at work, I watch their return.
Everything flourishes, each returns to its root.
Returning to the root is called tranquility, tranquility is called returning to one's destiny.
Returning to one's destiny is the eternal law. To know the eternal law is enlightenment.
Not knowing the eternal law leads to disaster.
Knowing the eternal law, one can be tolerant.
Being tolerant, one can be impartial.
Being impartial, one can be kingly.
Being kingly, one can be in tune with nature.
Being in tune with nature, one can be in accord with the Tao.
Being in accord with the Tao, one can last forever, even after the body decays.|The capacity of virtue is only from the Tao.
The things of the Tao, only elusive and vague.
Vague and elusive, yet within it there is image.
Elusive and vague, yet within it there is substance.
Dim and dark, yet within it there is essence.
This essence is very real, within it there is faith.
From ancient times till now, its name never departs, to observe the source of all things.
How do I know the nature of the source?|Bend to be complete, twist to be straight.
Hollow to be full, wear out to be new.
Have little to gain, have much to be confused.
Therefore, the sage holds on to the one and becomes the shepherd of the world.
He does not show himself, thus he is prominent.
He does not assert himself, thus he shines.
He does not boast of himself, thus he has merit.
He does not glorify himself, thus he excels.
He only strives to contend, so no one can contend against him.
The ancients who said that to bend is to be complete, were they not right?
Indeed, they return to wholeness.|There is something mixed and born before heaven and earth.
Silent and void, it stands alone and does not change.
It can be the mother of heaven and earth.
I do not know its name, so I call it Tao.
I am forced to name it as great.
Great means passing, passing means going far, going far means returning.
Tao is great, heaven is great, earth is great, and the king is also great.
In the country, there are four greats, and the king is one of them.
Man follows the earth, earth follows heaven, heaven follows Tao, Tao follows nature.|With Tao, the lord assists people, not with force in the world, his affairs are good to return.
Where the army is, thorns and briars grow.
The good man is the fruit and that's all, do not take it by force.
Fruit but do not boast, fruit but do not show off, fruit but do not brag, fruit but do not dwell, this is called fruit but not force.
Things grow old when they are strong, this is called not Tao, not Tao, soon already.
Hold the great image, the world goes, goes and does not harm, safe and peaceful, happy with bait, passers-by stop.
Therefore, the words of Tao are: bland, its tasteless, look at it, not enough to see, listen to it, not enough to hear, use it, can not be exhausted.|If you want to shrink it, you must first stretch it.
If you want to weaken it, you must first strengthen it.
If you want to remove it, you must first raise it.
If you want to take it, you must first give it.
This is called subtle clarity: soft and weak overcome strong, fish do not leave the deep, the state's sharp can not be shown to people.
Tao is always nameless, if the princes and kings can keep it, all things will transform themselves.
Transform and want to act, I will calm it with the nameless simplicity.
Calm it with the nameless simplicity, then they will not desire.
Without desire and quiet, heaven and earth will correct themselves.
It seems that a very profound martial arts is recorded on this wall...
I see!
You suddenly realize and understand the ultimate move recorded on the Cave of Infinity!

column2: It seems that a strange martial arts is recorded on this wall, I can't understand it for a while, I will copy it on paper first, and study it when I have a chance.
What is all this mess painted on the wall?\nIt must have been a predecessor who was locked up for a long time and did such a boring thing.
Senior brother, how come you are here!\nIsn't this place only for disciples who have been punished, did you also violate the rules?
I was worried that you would be bored here, so I sneaked in while the gatekeeper was not paying attention to bring you some things.
Still, senior brother takes care of me, let me see what good things you brought me.
{PlayerSurName} Junior brother, this "Combat skill" is the experience I wrote when I first started, I hope it can help you.
I can't stay here for long, in case the gatekeeper finds out.\nI will come to see you often in the future, I hope your skills have not been wasted.
{PlayerSurName} Junior brother, this "Combat skill" is the experience I wrote when I first started, I hope it can help you.
Junior brother, today the kitchen has new steamed mushroom buns, I specially brought you some to taste.
{PlayerSurName} Junior brother, I'm sorry, today I only brought steamed buns and porridge, you just make do with it.
{PlayerSurName} Junior brother, today I refined a few bottles of healing medicine, I don't need it now, I'll give them all to you.
Junior brother, I don't usually like to drink, today I brought a bottle for you, I don't know if it suits your taste.
Sword Formation
Taoist, what martial arts are you practicing here?

This is our sect's town-guarding sword formation, known as Zhenwu Sword Formation, which is derived from the Big Dipper.\nOnce the sword formation is activated, it is equivalent to several Martial Arts masters making their moves together.
How can I have the honor to witness this sword formation?
The power of the sword formation is quite large, it will only be used when the sect is in a life-and-death situation, and it is usually used for the trial of the disciples of the sect.
This sword formation is the secret of our sect, you should not waste your time trying to probe its truth.
Senior brother, what martial arts are you practicing here?

This is our sect's town-guarding sword formation, known as Zhenwu Sword Formation, which is derived from the Big Dipper.\nOnce the sword formation is activated, it is equivalent to several Martial Arts masters making their moves together.
How can I have the honor to witness this sword formation?
Are you sure you want to experience the power of this sword formation?
Really? That's what I've been hoping for!
The power of this sword formation is quite large, how much power of the sword formation do you plan to challenge?
30% power.<color=#097a76>(Stamina20, specific battle)</color>
50% power.<color=#097a76>(Stamina20, specific battle)</color>
70% power.<color=#097a76>(Stamina20, specific battle)</color>
100% power.<color=#097a76>(Stamina20, specific battle)</color>
Not ready yet.
I didn't expect that junior brother could break through the Zhenwu Sword Formation with 30% power!
The Zhenwu Sword Formation has condensed the hard work of several predecessors, even if it is 30% power, its power is not to be underestimated.
I didn't expect that junior brother could break through the Zhenwu Sword Formation with 50% power!
The Zhenwu Sword Formation has condensed the hard work of several predecessors, even if it is 50% power, its power is not to be underestimated.
I didn't expect that junior brother could break through the Zhenwu Sword Formation with 70% power!
The Zhenwu Sword Formation has condensed the hard work of several predecessors, even if it is 70% power, its power is not to be underestimated.
How is this possible!\nHow could the world-famous Zhenwu Sword Formation be so vulnerable!
You blockhead, it's so frustrating to watch!
I told you long ago that your Zhenwu Sword Formation can only bluff those mediocre guys.\nBut if a real master comes, it's all constraints, and hundreds of lives are not enough for you to lose!
Our sect's real killer move is the Star Chaser Pavilion's Star Array, the so-called Zhenwu Sword Formation is not worth mentioning in front of the Star Array.
{PlayerSurName} kid, you have brought me a lot of surprises.\nAt a young age, you have seen the weakness of this sword formation, and you will surely surpass me in the future.
Come on, I will pass on this "Nether Taichi" mental method to you!\nYou must practice it well, otherwise if you lose outside, people will say that my mental method is not powerful enough.

As the twenty-eight Taoists fell one by one, the illusion also dissipated, and you returned to reality...
What is this!!\nInfinity Origin Move, a top-grade manual!!!
column3: นี่คืออะไร!!\nพลังรวมศูนย์ไร้สิ้นสุด, เคล็ดวิชาระดับตำนาน!!!

column2: Could this be the reward for breaking the Star Chaser Formation?
{PlayerName}, are you ready to challenge the Star Array?
There is an inexplicable fear in my heart, this sect's array is not to be underestimated in terms of power.\nShould I challenge the Star Array today?
Challenge the Star Array! <color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
Turn around and run away.
As the twenty-eight Taoists fell one by one, the illusion also dissipated, and you returned to reality...
The Star Array has been broken, you are indeed the disciple that the sect leader values!\n{PlayerName}, this is the reward that the sect leader prepared for you back then, now it belongs to you.
Thank you, Sect Leader!
Despite your best efforts, you were still outnumbered.\nFortunately, your fellow disciples stopped in time, saving your life.\nA day later, you gradually woke up...
<size=200%><color=#00FFFF>Azure Dragon!</color></size>
<size=200%><color=#F0E68C>White Tiger!</color></size>
<size=200%><color=#FF0000>Vermilion Bird!</color></size>
<size=200%><color=#00FF00>Black Tortoise!</color></size>
Test
{PlayerName}, our sect has a formation called Zhenwu Sword Formation, which is specifically used for testing the disciples within the sect.
Now it's your turn to experience it, you just need to pass through the sword formation with <color=#c44b0e>30% power</color>.

The secret to cracking the Zhenwu Sword Formation lies in breaking the formation's eye first!\nAnd the formation's eye is all on Chang Chunzi, it can be said that if one prospers, all prosper; if one suffers, all suffer.
Having passed the test of the 30% power sword formation, you are now qualified to become a formal disciple of the Taoist Sect. Now I will pass on to you the unique talent of the Taoist Sect.
Thank you, Sect Leader!
Pilgrim
Help the old lady to offer incense at Taoist Sect·Zhenwu Hall.
column3: ช่วยหญิงชราถวายธูปที่ลัทธิเต๋า·โถงเจิ้นหวู่

column2: Go to see Zhong Yangzi for further information.
column3: ไปพบ ฉงหยางสื่อ สำหรับข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม.

column2: Old lady, what are you doing here?
They say the incense of the Taoist Sect is spiritually effective, but the stone steps of the mountain gate are too high, the old woman walked step by step, now I really have no strength.
column3: พวกเขากล่าวว่าธูปของนิกายเต๋ามีผลทางจิตวิญญาณ แต่บันไดหินของประตูภูเขาอยู่สูงเกินไป หญิงชราเดินขึ้นทีละก้าว ตอนนี้ข้าไม่มีเรี่ยวแรงจริงๆ

column2: Young man, can you do a small favor for the old woman?
Please tell me, old lady.
The old woman came here specially to burn incense for blessings.\nPraying that my weak and sick child can live a few more years, the old woman is still counting on him to support me in my old age.
column3: หญิงชรามาที่นี่เพื่อจุดธูปเพื่อขอพรโดยเฉพาะ\nอธิษฐานขอให้ลูกที่อ่อนแอและป่วยมีชีวิตอยู่ต่อไปอีกหลายปี, หญิงชรายังคงไว้วางใจให้เขาช่วยเหลือตัวเองได้ในวัยชรา

column2: But my legs and feet are not cooperating, I really can't walk anymore.\nCould you help me to offer incense in the main hall, the old woman will pray here.
column3: แต่ขากับเท้าไม่ประสานกัน, เดินไม่ได้แล้วจริงๆ\nเจ้าช่วยข้าถวายธูปในห้องโถงใหญ่ได้ไหม, หญิงชราจะสวดมนต์ภาวนาที่นี่

column2: This is the sandalwood that the old woman spent several days and nights making by hand, hoping that all the gods can feel the sincerity of the old woman.
Okay, I'll help you.
Young man, haven't you helped the old woman offer incense yet?
column3: หนุ่มน้อย ท่านยังไม่ได้ช่วยหญิงชราถวายธูปเลย?

column2: {PlayerName}, what are you holding in your hand?
Reply to the sect leader, an old woman with inconvenient legs and feet asked me to help her offer a stick of incense, she is praying outside for the safety of her child at home.
column3: ตอบกลับเจ้าสำนัก, หญิงชราขาและเท้าไม่สะดวกขอให้ข้าช่วยถวายธูป เธอกำลังสวดมนต์อยู่ข้างนอกเพื่อขอให้คุ้มครองลูกๆที่บ้าน

column2: It is our duty to be kind to others, you should help this old woman.\nYou go and offer the incense.
column3: หน้าที่ของเราคือมีน้ำใจต่อผู้อื่น เจ้าควรช่วยหญิงชราคนนี้\nเจ้าไปเถอะและก็ถวายธูป

column2: Strange, it seems to smell an unusual scent.
{yell}{PlayerName}, hold your breath!
There's poison in this incense...
column3: ธูปนี้มียาพิษ...

column2: Good child, you really listened to granny's words.
This voice sounds so familiar...
Old witch, you dare to disguise and deceive me!
It's not very polite to call an old lady like that!\nYou've done something for granny, granny should thank you.
Master, how does the Heart eater taste?
May I ask your name, sir?
The old woman has long forgotten her name, people in the martial arts world call me Du Yapo, although I don't like it, you can use this name when you complain to the King of Hell.
I've heard that a wicked old woman has recently appeared in the martial arts world, who confuses people's minds with poison and traffics women and children. It must be you.
That's right, it doesn't matter if I tell you.\nYou can't even protect yourselves, do you still want to stand up for them?
(Lighting the special sandalwood made by the old woman and placing it in the incense burner)
column3: (จุดไฟธูปไม้จันทน์พิเศษที่หญิงชราทำแล้ววางไว้ในกระถางธูป)

column2: {PlayerName}, what is the noble purpose of the Taoist Sect?
Eliminate evil and kindness, maintain the righteous path of the world!
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้ายและความเมตตา รักษาวิธีอันชอบธรรมของโลก!

column2: Forget about everything, cut off all troubles!
Educate all people, benevolence influences the world!
Now that the villain is right in front of you, what should you do?
Eliminate evil completely!
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้ายให้หมดสิ้น!

column2: Persuade her to repent and be good.
Give her a way out.
Young man, the old woman admires your courage, but also worries about your brain.\nDo you really not see the situation? Do you think you've been poisoned normally?
Zhong Yangzi, I know you've been poisoned too, why are you still so pretentious at this time, is the righteous path just a shiny surface for outsiders to see?
column3: ฉงหยางสื่อ, ข้ารู้ว่าเจ้าก็ถูกวางยาพิษเหมือนกัน, ทำไมเจ้าถึงยังเสแสร้งขนาดนี้, เส้นทางแห่งคุณธรรมเป็นเพียงแค่เปลือกให้คนภายนอกมองอย่างนั้นหรือ?

column2: Hehe, what is evil, what is good?
You self-proclaimed righteous and honorable people like to define right and wrong, the old woman doesn't care about your set.
Today, the old woman is going to shake your martial arts myths!
Hahaha, young man, are you stupid?
You can't even protect yourselves, and you're still talking about giving the old woman a way out...
At this point, can you still kill the old woman?
Enough, old witch!\nToday I will make you pay a heavy price even if I have to risk my life!
This is impossible, why didn't the poison work on you!

Your poison incense did work, it's just that my determination to eliminate evil suppressed the pain caused by the poison, although this will bring some risks, but it's worth it to bring you, the old witch, to justice!
column3: ธูปพิษของเจ้าได้ผล, แค่ความมุ่งมั่นของข้าที่จะกำจัดความชั่วร้ายได้ระงับความเจ็บปวดที่เกิดจากพิษ, แม้ว่ามันจะนำมาซึ่งความเสี่ยงบ้าง แต่มันก็คุ้มค่าที่จะนำเจ้า, แม่มดเฒ่า, ไปสู่ความยุติธรรม!

column2: You're a madman, you're so young and you don't want to live!
Rather than sitting and waiting for death, it's better to take a risk and fight, it's best to kill you, the old witch, even if I can't, I'll make you look down on my Taoist Sect!
What a bunch of madmen! The old woman doesn't plan to exchange life with you.
Where are you running, old witch!
Uh--
Your vision goes black, your body can't exert any strength, you fall straight to the ground, unconscious.\nYou finally woke up after a whole day and night...
{PlayerName}, you're awake. How are your injuries?
Reporting to the Sect Leader, it's no longer a problem.
The poison you were poisoned with, I have used MP to force it out of your body, no hidden dangers will be left.
Thank you, Sect Leader!
{PlayerName}, the old Taoist sees his younger self in you - passionate, impulsive, and upright. You've done well, and the old Taoist is pleased.
As a reward for your outstanding performance, the old Taoist will pass on to you a secret technique that he has been meditating on for many years!
Thank you for teaching me the secret technique, Master!
You have made significant contributions to the Taoist Sect, and the old Taoist has specially allowed you to enter the Star Chaser Pavilion!
I was so close, I could have...
Uh--
Boy, the old woman will send you on your way first, then that old thing!
Hmph, you really have no idea about the situation in front of you.
What? How come you're not poisoned!
column3: เป็นไปได้ยังไง? ทำไมเจ้าถึงไม่ถูกวางยาพิษ!

column2: Leave the antidote, or die!
You were seriously injured and unconscious, slumbering for a whole day and night...
{PlayerName}, you're awake. How are your injuries?
Reporting to the Sect Leader, it's no longer a problem.
The poison you were poisoned with, I have used MP to force it out of your body, no hidden dangers will be left.
Thank you, Sect Leader!
The old Taoist can't protect you for a lifetime. In the future, your generation will need to shield the Taoist Sect from wind and rain. So, {PlayerName}, you need to work hard.
The Successor of the Three Sects
Successor
Invite Lai Toudian and Cai Youzhi to the Buddha Temple to challenge the demon.
Go back and report the situation to Zhong Yangzi.
column3: กลับไปและรายงานสถานการณ์ให้ ฉงหยางสื่อ ทราบ.

column2: {PlayerName}, have you ever heard of the story of the Successor of the Three Sects?
I haven't heard of it.
There is a hidden story in it, and it's time for you to know.
Decades ago, the masters of the three sects came out in full force and jointly attacked a demon. For some reasons, they couldn't kill him and could only trap him.
In the end, the three sects and the demon made a bet, which made him give up resistance and willingly be imprisoned.
What kind of bet could make the demon willingly be captured?

The three sects had to select the most outstanding disciples of the past decade to represent the Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, and Confucius Temple, as the successors of the three sects, to challenge the demon together.

If they can defeat the demon with half of his strength, the demon promises to willingly be imprisoned for another ten years. If they fail, he will break out of prison and reappear in the martial arts world!
At that time, the demon was already invincible in the world. If he reappears in the martial arts world, he will inevitably stir up a bloody storm again, and no one will be able to compete with him.
{PlayerName}, you are extraordinary and talented. You can represent the Taoist Sect and join the other two sects to complete this great task of suppressing the demon!
Who are the successors of the Shifa Temple and Confucius Temple? And where can we find this demon?
The successor of the Shifa Temple is <color=#c44b0e>Lai Toudian</color>, and the successor of the Confucius Temple is <color=#c44b0e>Cai Youzhi</color>.
The demon is now trapped in the <color=#c44b0e>Tongtian Tower in the Buddha Temple</color>. Don't provoke him unless you are absolutely sure.
{PlayerName}, this matter concerns the lives of all people in the world, so don't act rashly.
I will follow the Master's teachings!
Master, the great demon Chu Kuangsheng was accidentally killed in the chaos. I can't escape the blame, please punish me.
How is that possible... Did he say anything before he died?
No, he didn't leave any words.
Alas, it's fate.
{PlayerName}, you have made contributions in suppressing the demon. Here are your rewards.
This great demon is powerful, do not engage him without full confidence, lest he escapes in the midst of chaos.
The martial world can be peaceful for another ten years...
{PlayerName}, you have made a great contribution to this demon suppression, I am quite pleased, these are your rewards.
Ah! This, this, this is bad...\nThe martial world may be plunged into chaos again...
{PlayerName}, have you ever heard of the story of the Successor of the Three Sects?
I haven't heard of it.
There is a hidden story in it, and it's time for you to know.
Decades ago, the masters of the three sects came out in full force and jointly attacked a demon. For some reasons, they couldn't kill him and could only trap him.
In the end, the three sects and the demon made a bet, which made him give up resistance and willingly be imprisoned.
What kind of bet could make the demon willingly be captured?

The three sects had to select the most outstanding disciples of the past decade to represent the Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, and Confucius Temple, as the successors of the three sects, to challenge the demon together.

If they can defeat the demon with half of his strength, the demon promises to willingly be imprisoned for another ten years. If they fail, he will break out of prison and reappear in the martial arts world!
At that time, the demon was already invincible in the world. If he reappears in the martial arts world, he will inevitably stir up a bloody storm again, and no one will be able to compete with him.
{PlayerName}, you are extraordinary and talented. You can represent the Taoist Sect and join the other two sects to complete this great task of suppressing the demon!
The head of the sect need not worry.
Some time ago, when I was traveling down the mountain, I happened to repel a strange man who called himself "Chu Kuangsheng".
How is that possible...\nDid he say anything before he left?
No, he didn't leave any words.
Alas, it's fate.
{PlayerName}, your unintentional act has saved the entire martial world from a great disaster, these are your rewards.
Finally, a fish has taken the bait, it's worth waiting here for so long...
Why are they all small fish and shrimps? It really disappoints me.
Tong, who are you calling small fish and shrimp!
Oh, I thought it was someone else? You little guy is still alive?\nToday is just right, I can settle this matter.
Who is the small fish and shrimp is still unknown, perhaps you are not even as good as a fish worm!

You don't even recognize me, you are indeed a newborn calf who is not afraid of tigers.\nLet me tell you, so you won't be a confused ghost in the underworld, I am Tong Daofu from the Imperial City Division!
Oh, isn't this the famous hero {PlayerSurName}?\nI didn't expect that I would catch you while fishing, what a pleasant surprise.
Tong, so it was you who set up the trap, trying to catch all the martial artists who came for the treasure with your so-called treasure?
Oh, I don't have such a big appetite as you said.\nIt's just that catching you, this big fat fish, is a blessing from heaven.
Who are you?\nAre you the one setting up the trap, planning to catch all the martial artists who come for the treasure with your so-called treasure?
I am Tong Daofu from the Imperial City Division.\nI don't have such a big appetite, having you, this big fat fish, is enough for me.
Why so much nonsense, if you want to fight, just do it.
Oh, don't get so angry, you're young and you're not afraid of ruining your health.\nDo you think I'm easy to bully because I'm alone?
column3: โอ้, อย่าโกรธมากนะ เจ้าอายุยังน้อยและไม่กลัวที่จะทำลายสุขภาพของตัวเอง\nเจ้าคิดว่าข้าจะยอมถูกรังแกง่ายๆ เพราะฉันอยู่คนเดียวเหรอ?

column2: You set up the trap on purpose, naturally you won't take risks easily, I suppose you have already surrounded this place.
Hehehe, it's a rare blessing for a smart little guy like you to die in my hands.
Now, who is the butcher and who is the meat?
Hehehehe——
Kid, you're still too green.\nI am the commander of the Imperial City Division, how could I have only this trick.
Do you have any other tricks?
{yell}, all of you go to hell!
That was close, I didn't expect this guy to have such strength left.
With one less schemer like this in the martial world, there will be more peace.
You all, in front of my Fu Bu Bingwei, are nothing but ants!
What is this guy doing here again?
The barbarians of the small island, trying to get their hands on the treasures of the Central Plains, are simply overestimating themselves.
Although the martial arts of the Central Plains are not united, it's not your turn to stir up trouble.
You rats of Dragonfly City, my Langya Sword Pavilion is at odds with you!
Hahaha, hypocrite!\nIf you have the guts, join forces and bring me down first.
(Do you want to intervene?)
Join the siege of Fu Bu Bingwei. <color=#c44b0e>(Specific battle)</color>
Just watch the changes.
The rats of Dragonfly City are nothing more than that!
Has the Central Plains martial arts opened your eyes?
Don't be arrogant, wait for me to come back another day!
You, are you not afraid of death?
You're just a defeated general, what right do you have to be so arrogant.
You know nothing about me!
You can remain unscathed even when besieged by disciples of several major sects, I'm not sure I can handle you.
You're frank enough, but I don't plan to let you live to run away.
In that case, shut up and make your move!
I wonder if this battle counts as eliminating a major hidden danger for the future.
If all the martial arts in the Central Plains are as cowardly as you, I don't need to worry!
Hmph! You're not worthy to fight with me!
Mediation
Do you need Linlang Temple to mediate for you, young friend?
Need mediation.
Not for now.
It's better to resolve disputes than to create them, young friend, you should be forgiving when you can.
This chess game is broken, there's nothing to see.
The layout of this chess game seems a bit peculiar, do you want to play a game?
Touch the chessboard and chess pieces. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
Do nothing.
It turns out that cracking this chess game will reward a manual, this is unexpected.\nI'd better keep it safe, so as not to benefit others.
With my current strength, I can't crack this chess game yet, I'll come back later.
This chess game is so profound?
I feel dizzy!
Wolf Trouble in Xiangfan
Help the bailiff of Chuxiang City collect 10 Wolf fangs.
Go to the notice board to find the bailiff of Chuxiang City.
Young hero, wait a moment!
I see that you are brave and extraordinary, you must be a martial artist.\nDid you just make a move to take on this task from the notice board?
I'll check the difficulty of the task first, then decide whether to take it.
Please do me a favor, young hero, there will be a reward upon completion.
What do you want me to do for you?
There is a valley outside Chuxiang City, called Wild Wolf Valley!\nIt's full of wolves, and all the people who come and go avoid it.
I would like to ask you to go to Wild Wolf Valley to clear out these wild wolves and bring back <color=#c44b0e>10 Wolf fangs</color> as proof.
Such a dangerous place, you don't go yourself but ask me to go to die, what's your intention?
Under heavy reward, there must be a brave man. If you can help me with this, I will give you a <color=#c44b0e>treasure that generates money every day</color>!
I've got 10 Wolf fangs, I wonder if the bailiff in the city is still waiting for me.
There are many wild wolves in Wild Wolf Valley, don't go too deep, be careful not to get flanked and can't get out.
How's the collection of 10 Wolf fangs going?
I've collected them all. <color=#097a76>(10 Wolf fangs)</color>
Not yet, you wait a little longer.
Young hero, you are indeed reliable. I didn't wait for you in vain.\nHere is the treasure I promised you. Keep it safe.
Why would you want to exchange this treasure for a few Wolf fangs with me?

This Three-legged golden toad may seem like a treasure, but it's actually quite useless. It's better to exchange it for some practical benefits. These Wolf fangs are my achievements and proof of my bravery in killing wolves. They will be useful for my promotion in the future!
I need to hand in these Wolf fangs as soon as possible, so no one else can get to them first.
Brother, do you know why I brought you to Lin'an City?
Isn't it to show me the prosperity of Lin'an City?
No, no!\nI've heard rumors from my brothers in the martial arts world that there's a rare treasure hidden in Lin'an City!
Are you here to hunt for treasure?
Since it's a treasure, many people must be coveting it. Let's just watch the excitement.
Being able to see a rare treasure with my own eyes is indeed worth the trip.
It is said that the treasure is hidden at the top of the <color=#097a76>Enlighten Tower</color>. Let's go and see the excitement.
It's really a bad year. We've been robbed by bandits time and time again. This Government Office is just like a decoration.
column3: เป็นปีที่แย่จริงๆ เราถูกโจรปล้นครั้งแล้วครั้งเล่า ศาลาว่าการนี้เปรียบเสมือนของตกแต่ง

column2: Could it be the thieves from the Horse King Cave outside the city?
Who else could it be!
The government's reward notice has been posted for many years. Many heroes have gone and never returned, and they have become even more rampant!
I hope there will be a highly skilled hero who can eliminate this trouble for us.
Alas, I hope so...
Jianghu Master
column3: ผู้นำยุทธภพ

column2: Head to the Ritual Platform to prepare to take over as Jianghu Master.
Head to Ritual Platform, prepare to be re-elected as Jianghu Master.

"The Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Water Camp, and Crime Investigation Bureau jointly recommend {PlayerName} to take over the position of Jianghu Master that has been vacant for many years..."

"The <#c44b0e>Ritual Platform</color> is where the various sects of the martial arts world elect the Jianghu Master. Please go to the Ritual Platform to participate in the Jianghu Master succession ceremony!"

Choosing to hold the Jianghu Master succession ceremony here is really ambitious!\nI need to be fully prepared to participate in this succession ceremony, so as not to fail their test and be laughed at.
Join the Jianghu Master ceremony! (Companion leaves the team)
Not ready yet.
The foreign enemy Yan Kingdom's Agile invasion, the various forces of the court each holding their own territory, the constant strife among the martial arts sects...
In such a chaotic time, we need a person who is the hope of everyone, to turn the tide and support the collapsing building.
{PlayerName}, you are a rare young hero in recent decades, and now you are highly respected by all major sects. You are the person everyone is hoping for!
According to the rules of the past, anyone who is elected as Jianghu Master must defeat all the sect leaders present one by one to gain final recognition.
In that case, I ask the sect leaders to teach me!
Which sect leader will teach me first?
{PlayerName}, I, Luo Tianxiong from the Crime Investigation Bureau, will learn from you!
Master Luo, please!
I admit defeat, as I am not as skilled as you.
I will compete with you in this round.\nJiujiang Water Camp·Ding Fengbo, please teach me!
Master Ding, please!
Young hero, you are superior in skills. I admire you!
I will accompany you in this battle.\nConfucius Temple·Cai Yuanchang, please make your move, young hero.
Master Cai, please!
Indeed, the student surpasses the master.
Langya Sword Pavilion·Jian Chi, please make your move, young hero!
column3: ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา·มารกระบี่ โปรดลงมือเถอะ จอมยุทธน้อย!

column2: Senior, please enlighten me!
A hero in his youth, this old man can't keep up anymore.
Amitabha, let this old monk make the move in this round. \nShifa Temple·Hui Yuan, please make your move, benefactor.
column3: อมิตาพุทธ!, ขอให้พระเฒ่าท่านนี้เป็นผู้ลงมือในรอบนี้เถิด\nอารามฉีฟา·ฮุ่ยหยวน โปรดลงมือเถอะ, ผู้มีพระคุณ.

column2: Master Hui Yuan, please!
column3: ไต้ซือฮุ่ยหยวน, ได้โปรด!

column2: Well, well.
This is the final battle. If you can defeat the long sword in the hands of the old Taoist, you will truly be a Jianghu Master.
Taoist Sect·Zhong Yangzi, please make your move, young hero!
column3: ลัทธิเต๋า·ฉงหยางสื่อ, โปรดลงมือเถอะ จอมยุทธน้อย!

column2: Head of the sect, please!
Boundless Heavenly Lord!
{PlayerName} is universally acknowledged, and his martial arts skills are unparalleled. The old Taoist announces: {PlayerName} is the new Jianghu Master!
Congratulations to the leader {PlayerSurName}!
Now I have become the universally honored Jianghu Master, what should I do next?
End of the martial arts career.
Continue to travel in Jianghu.
column3: ท่องยุทธภพต่อไป

Now is a critical moment for Inseparable's survival. We must make a careful choice. Never, never make a mistake!

({PlayerName}, I've never judged a case before, what should I do next?)

Old lady, please tell me in detail what happened.

The old lady was walking at night with her Inventory, when a man took advantage of the darkness to steal the Inventory and run away. Fortunately, a kind passerby happened to pass by and helped the old lady chase after him.
When the old lady caught up, she found two people fighting, both claiming that the other was the one who stole the Inventory.

The old lady didn't get a good look at the thief's face when the Inventory was stolen, so she couldn't tell which one of them stole her Inventory. That's why she came to the government to judge the case.
({PlayerName}, what should I do next? I have no clue about this case.)
Let the two of them have a race to see who runs faster.
Punish <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color>!

Intimidate <color=#c44b0e>Zhao Wangcai</color>.

Spare me, sir, I confess, I did steal the old lady's Inventory.

column2: Hmm, I didn't think you looked like a good person, and I was right.
Miss, is the case closed like this?
Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
Hmph, beaten into confession, huh?
Miss Ye, if Marshal Ye knew about your reckless judgement, he would surely punish you according to your family rules.
Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
I'm innocent, please don't wrong a good person, Miss.
Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, yet there's still no result after all this time.\nIf it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for disrupting the court!
Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
Impudent commoner Zhao Wangcai, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with three heavy planks first!
I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
Ouch...
What?! You actually beat him to death.

column2: Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, you actually beat a man to death!\nIf it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for taking a life!
Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
I'm innocent, please don't wrong a good person, Miss.
Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, are you planning to beat a confession out of him?\nIf it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for disrupting the court!
Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
Impudent commoner Zhao Wangcai, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with five heavy planks first!
I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
Intimidate <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color>.
Punish <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color> with three heavy planks.
Punish <color=#c44b0e>Li Maodan</color> with five heavy planks.
No punishment for now.
Impudent commoner Li Maodan, it's clear that you stole the old lady's Inventory, confess quickly to avoid further pain!
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: What?! He was scared to death.
column3: อะไร?! เขากลัวจนตาย.

column2: Miss Ye, you have such a great official power, you actually scared someone to death! If it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, I would have punished you for killing!
Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
I confess, it was indeed me who stole this old lady's Inventory.\nLater, Zhao Wangcai chased after me, he wouldn't let me go, so we started fighting.

You're honest, from the result of your race just now, I can tell that Zhao Wangcai runs faster than you, so he's not the one who stole the Inventory, otherwise, how could you catch up with him with your speed.
Miss, you indeed have discerning eyes, a true justice in this world.
Hmm, that makes sense.
Spare me, sir, I confess, I did steal the old lady's Inventory.
