column2: Hmm, I didn't think you looked like a good person, and I was right.
Miss, is the case closed like this?
Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
Hmph, that's all.
Without any evidence, you're wronging me, I won't accept this!
Impudent commoner Li Maodan, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with three heavy planks first!
I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
Ouch...
Zhao Wangcai fades out.
What?! You actually beat him to death.
column3: อะไร?! เจ้ารังแกเขาจนตายจริงๆ

column2: Miss Ye, you're quite authoritative, you actually beat a man to death!\nIf it weren't for Marshal Ye's sake, this office would have punished you for taking a life!
Both of you, please leave the court, I don't want to see you now!
Without any evidence, you're wronging me, I won't accept this!
Impudent commoner Li Maodan, since you refuse to confess, you will be beaten with five heavy planks first!
I won't accept this! I won't accept this!|I'm innocent!|Ah...|It's not me.|You've got the wrong person!|Wa...
Zhao Wangcai, when you two were competing just now, you revealed your Horse's foot, you move lightly and swiftly, clearly sharing the same characteristics with those flying thieves.
Therefore, I conclude that you are the thief who stole the Inventory!
I'm innocent, you can't judge the case so recklessly!
The case is closed, take Zhao Wangcai into custody!
Miss, is the case closed like this?
Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
Hmph, that's nonsense.
Miss Ye, this office does not agree with your judgement, it's completely one-sided and baseless, not convincing at all.
There's no need for Miss Ye to judge the case anymore, both of you can leave.

Li Maodan, from the result of your race just now, I can tell that Zhao Wangcai runs faster than you, so he's not the one who stole the Inventory, otherwise, how could you catch up with him with your speed.
So, the truth is that you stole the old lady's Inventory and ran away, Zhao Wangcai chased after you from behind, because he's faster than you, that's why he caught up with you.
Alas, there's nothing I can say now.
Miss, you indeed have discerning eyes, a true justice in this world.
Hmm, that makes sense.
Li Maodan, although this lady has not witnessed the event with her own eyes, the heart reflects the face. I see that your face is not good, you must not be a good person.
Therefore, I conclude that you are the thief who stole the Inventory!
This is simply nonsense, I have never seen such a random judgment.
The case is closed, come on, take Li Maodan into custody!
Miss, is the case closed like this?
Yes, it couldn't be simpler. You see, he confessed, didn't he?
Hmph, that's nonsense.
Miss Ye, this office does not agree with your judgement, it's completely one-sided and baseless, not convincing at all.
There's no need for Miss Ye to judge the case anymore, both of you can leave.
I'm sorry I couldn't help you with the case.
I was too reckless, I thought it was easy to judge a case, but I didn't expect it to be so complicated.
Sitting in that position, easily deciding others' Inseparable, is this power...
A city's prefect controls the Inseparable of the people in the city, and those powerful and noble people play with the Inseparable of the people in the world...
My father refused to collude with those powerful officials, so he kept himself clean, formed the Ye Family Battalion, and devoted himself to defending the territory, never interfering in politics.
We messed up the case today, your father won't blame you, will he?
Even if my father knows, by the time I get home, his anger will have mostly subsided.
However, I've been out for quite a while, it's time to go back.
Remember to come to Ye Family Battalion when you have time, if my father is still angry, you can help me plead~
I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
{PlayerName}, see you later.
Indeed, a tiger father has no dog daughter, today this mansion has really opened my eyes.
However, Miss Ye doesn't need to worry about the next case, this mansion will handle it impartially and will not be biased.
Thanks to you today, I was reckless and boasted, fortunately, we cooperated perfectly and did not lose face for my father.
This is also my first time participating in a trial, fortunately, I did not wrong a good person.
We judged the case so beautifully today, will your father praise you when he knows?
My father is very strict, if he knows that I interfere in local affairs, he will definitely spank me.
However, I've been out for quite a while, it's time to go back.
Remember to come to Ye Family Battalion when you have time, if my father is still angry, you can help me plead~
I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
{PlayerName}, see you later.
{PlayerName}, I heard that you are now the champion of the Hero Association?
It turns out to be Miss Ye, I didn't expect you to be so well-informed.
I was planning to participate in the Hero Association, but I was delayed on the way. When I arrived, I found that the registration had ended and the competition was nearing its end.
column3: เดิมทีข้าวางแผนว่าจะเข้างานชุมนุมชาวยุทธ์ แต่เนื่องด้วยว่าการเดินทางล่าช้า เมื่อมาถึงข้าพบว่าปิดการลงทะเบียนแล้วและการแข่งขันเอง นั้นก็กำลังสิ้นลง

column2: It's a pity that I didn't have a chance to compete with Miss Ye.
So you think so too, that's great!\nLet's have a competition here today, let me see the skill of the champion of the Hero Association!
I was just being polite, don't take it seriously.
Stop talking nonsense, make your move!
It seems that your title of champion of the Hero Association is indeed well-deserved, I'm afraid there are not many people in the younger generation who can beat you.
I wonder how Marshal Ye's spear technique is, I really want to have a chance to learn.
You are a bit overconfident, you even dare to challenge my father, you really don't know the height of the sky.
It would be good to get some advice from Marshal Ye, it would definitely save a lot of detours.
Okay, when I return to the camp, you come to find me, I will introduce you to my father.
When are you going back to Ye Family Battalion, I can't wait.
Let me think...
It seems that I have been out for a long time, it's time to go back.\nRemember to come to Ye Family Battalion to find me, let me see what it's like for you to compete with my father.
I still want to visit other cities, maybe we will meet again.
{PlayerName}, see you later.
Alas, I was happy for nothing, I thought I could meet a decent opponent.
How boring, I should go elsewhere to find a formidable opponent.
I heard you are the champion of the Heroes' Assembly?
Indeed, I am. May I ask if the lady has any advice?

My name is Ye Yinping. I originally planned to participate in the Heroes' Assembly, but I was delayed on the road. When I arrived, I found that the registration had already closed and the competition was nearing its end.
I am {PlayerName}, it's a pity that I didn't get a chance to spar with Miss Ye.
So you think so too, that's great!\nLet's have a competition here today, let me see the skill of the champion of the Hero Association!
I was just being polite, don't take it seriously.
Stop talking nonsense, make your move!
{PlayerName}, I have some unfortunate news for you. My father thinks I've caused too much trouble this time, so he has grounded me. I can't go on adventures anymore.
My father is very angry right now, you better not provoke him.
{PlayerName}, I pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
Oh, it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}. What can I do for you?
About Miss Ye being grounded...
What are you trying to say?
Miss Ye just wanted to prove herself. Although she was wrong, she had good intentions.
My daughter, the daughter of Ye Pengju, was robbed in broad daylight and lost her money bag, along with the Ye Family Battalion's token, which has not been recovered yet. Is this excusable?
column3: ลูกสาวของข้า ซึ่งเป็นลูกสาวของเย่เผิงจู ถูกปล้นในเวลากลางวันแสกๆ และทำกระเป๋าเงินของเธอหาย พร้อมกับเหรียญตราของกองพันตระกูลเย่ ซึ่งยังไม่ได้รับคืน นี่เป็นข้อแก้ตัวหรือไม่?

column2: She interfered with local government affairs, mocked the imperial officials, took it upon herself to judge cases, made arbitrary sentences, and disregarded the law. Is this excusable?

She completely disregarded the Ye family's reputation, forced people in the martial arts world to spar with her everywhere. If she won by luck, people would say that the Ye family bullied others with their power; if she lost, people would say that the Ye Family Spear was nothing special. Is this excusable?
Well, that...
Ye Yinping is not a soldier of the Ye Family Battalion, nor does she hold any military position. If it weren't for this, I would have dealt with her according to military law long ago.
Grounding her is just me enforcing family rules, this is a very light punishment. There's no need for you to plead for her anymore.
You are indeed trustworthy. Weren't you planning to spar with my father? Are you ready now?
Stop dawdling, are you ready or not?
Hehe, this is going to be interesting!
Reporting to the Marshal, the champion of the Heroes' Assembly in Chuxiang City, {PlayerName}, is here to pay his respects.
I, a humble commoner {PlayerName}, pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, there's no need for formalities.\nBottle has already informed me about your situation, I understand why you are here.
Considering that you have helped Bottle to maintain the Ye family's reputation on many occasions, I agree to give you some guidance.
Bottle, don't think about slacking off and watching the fun. You are involved in this matter, you can't escape responsibility.
Well, I can't watch the fun now.
Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, Bottle!\nYou two do your best to attack me, I will only use thirty percent of my strength. How much you can comprehend from this will depend on your own understanding.
It's a pity that we are still too far behind Marshal Ye's level, and we couldn't comprehend much.
Ferocious Dragon Charge!
column3: มังกรร้ายจู่โจม!

column2: Ferocious Dragon Charge!!!
column3: มังกรร้ายจู่โจม!!!

column2: This move is indeed stunning. I didn't expect Miss Ye to comprehend Marshal Ye's ultimate move so quickly.
What just happened? It seems that Miss Ye has performed some extraordinary technique.
Thank you, Marshal Ye, for your guidance.
Hehe, thank you, Daddy, you're the best!
Huh?!
Yes, thank you, Father Marshal, for your wisdom!
Thanks to you for the trip to various cities some days ago, Daddy said I handled it well, so he won't restrict me from going out to the Jianghu anymore.
{PlayerName}, I pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, no need for formalities.
Marshal, I know that you've been taking care of Silver Vase during her training and didn't cause any big trouble. You've worked hard.
Marshal, you're too kind. It's just a small effort, not worth mentioning.
Considering your help in maintaining the face of the Ye family for Vase, I agree to give you some guidance. Are you ready now?
I'm ready!
Hold on a moment.
I still have a lot of things to do that don't require help from others, so let's go our separate ways.
Without my father's permission, I dare not run around freely. His family law is ruthless, I don't want to be beaten and unable to get out of bed for days.
{PlayerName}, don't try to make connections with me. We're not familiar with each other, don't try to win me over.
Finally, I can venture into the martial world again, I've been stifled these past few days.
Your team doesn't have a single vacancy. Inviting me to join is quite insincere, don't you think?
Ye Family Battalion and Yan Army are incompatible, you better give up!\nIf you don't leave quickly, I'll stab a few holes in you!
The emperor values royal dignity the most. If he doesn't agree, no one can take me away from Duke Kang's manor.
I finally got out to enjoy a few days of freedom, I don't want to follow others' ideas and go to places I'm not interested in.
With our current Relations, I don't want to have any more involvement with you.
Sir, why did you only come to pick me up now?
I'm so happy, I can finally go out and play again.
So many people gathered together, although it's lively and I like it, there's no place for me to join.
Benevolence
column3: ศีลธรรม

column2: Miss Forgetful's Medical skills are exquisite, it's a waste to be hidden here all the time.
The world is unpredictable, it's quieter here.\nLess disturbance, I can study medical books and cultivate medicinal herbs, so that the Medical of my sect won't be lost in my hands.
They say reading ten thousand books is not as good as traveling ten thousand miles, why not go out with me to save the world? Not only will it broaden your horizons, but also promote your sect.
Saving the world...
This grand goal is too far away for me. If you are willing, when you reach the realm of benevolence and boundless love, I can pass some Medical knowledge to you.
Miss Forgetful, it's a pity if your Medical skills are buried here. As a doctor, don't you think about the responsibility of saving the world?

The appearance reflects the mind, I have sensed your temperament through your face.\nWith your temperament, you are more suitable than me to save the world, and also more suitable to inherit the medical path of the Plant Sect.
column3: รูปร่างหน้าตาสะท้อนถึงจิตใจ ข้าสัมผัสได้ถึงอารมณ์ของเจ้าผ่านใบหน้าของเจ้า\nด้วยนิสัยของเจ้า เจ้าเหมาะสมกว่าข้าที่จะช่วยโลก และยังเหมาะสมกว่าที่จะสืบทอดเส้นทางการรักษาของสำนักพฤกษาด้วย

column2: Special Medicine Guide

·Looking for a person with excellent swordsmanship
·Looking for a person with strong Strength
·Looking for a person with abundant MP
·Looking for a person with excellent Toxicology
·Looking for Thunderstruck wood
Who are these people in the yard, they seem to be suffering?
These are my patients.
Why doesn't Miss Qu treat them?
column3: เหตุใดแม่นางฉู่จึงไม่ช่วยพวกเขา?

column2: It's not that I refuse to treat them, but their strange diseases have specific remedies, yet the medicinal ingredients are hard to find, and any slight deviation could cause the patient to die on the spot.

Moreover, they are not ordinary patients, each of them has profound skills, but for some reason, they all suddenly developed strange diseases on the same day. It's suspicious, so I'm still hesitating...
Life is of paramount importance, Miss Qu, you don't need to hesitate anymore.\nYou can tell me what medicinal ingredients are needed to treat these people, and I will help you find them.

One person <color=#c44b0e>has more than ten gu worms burrowing inside his body, moving under the surface of his skin. It requires someone with extremely high sword skills to quickly pierce the skin and remove the gu worms when they are moving.</color>

One person <color=#c44b0e>has more than ten twisted bones in his body, the patient has already lost his sanity and is extremely strong. It requires someone with great Strength to restrain him and help him reset his bones one by one.</color>

One person <color=#c44b0e>has chaotic internal energy in his body, as if several incompatible internal energies are repelling each other. It requires someone with abundant MP to help him infuse MP and guide the chaotic internal energy.</color>

One person <color=#c44b0e>has been poisoned by a strange poison, and there is currently no antidote. It requires someone who is proficient in using poison to use the method of fighting poison with poison, applying another poison to his body to neutralize the two poisons and make them disappear.</color>

The last person <color=#c44b0e>has been poisoned by a profound cold poison, his body is overflowing with cold air, and his body is gradually stiffening. It requires something of pure yang to cure him, such as the rare Thunderstruck wood!</color>
I need to keep making Soup medicine here to alleviate their pain, so the task of finding the medicinal ingredients can only be entrusted to {PlayerSurName}.

Also, after {PlayerSurName} finds the medicinal ingredients, you can choose the appropriate medicinal ingredients for these patients yourself. You must not make any mistakes in the process, otherwise unpredictable consequences may occur.
Could Miss Qu please tell me again what medicinal ingredients these people need?
Miss Qu, I have successfully treated all these people's diseases.
column3: แม่นางฉู่ ข้ารักษาพวกเขาได้สำเร็จแล้ว

column2: {PlayerSurName}, you've worked hard.
Qu Wangyou, I didn't expect you to cure such difficult diseases, are you trying to cut off our source of income?
Evil doctor, these strange diseases on these people were caused by you, weren't they?
Yes, over the years I have secretly created many strange diseases that are difficult to cure. I didn't expect you to neutralize them so easily, are you deliberately opposing me?
Evil doctor! You were once a disciple of the Plant Sect, is this how you use the medical skills taught by the Plant Sect to act recklessly?
column3: หมอปีศาจ! เจ้าเคยเป็นศิษย์ของสำนักพฤกษา นี่เป็นวิธีที่เจ้าใช้ทักษะทางการแพทย์ที่สอนโดยสำนักพฤกษา เพื่อกระทำเรื่องชั่วช้าพวกนี้หรือ?

column2: The world has changed, the old ways of the Plant Sect can no longer stand in the world.\nAre you planning to take those secret ancient prescriptions that you refuse to pass on into the coffin?
column3: โลกเปลี่ยนไปแล้ว, วิถีการเก่าๆ ของสำนักพฤกษาไม่สามารถยืนหยัดอยู่ในโลกได้อีกต่อไป\nเจ้าวางแผนที่จะนำเทียบยาโบราณที่เป็นความลับที่เจ้าปฏิเสธที่จะถ่ายทอดเข้าไปนอนกอดในโลงศพด้วยหรือ?

column2: Qu Wangyou, the Plant Sect is declining day by day, as the current sect leader, don't you feel ashamed? The Plant Sect is destined to perish in your hands!
column3: ฉู่หวังโหย่ว, สำนักพฤกษามีกำลังลดลงทุกวัน ในฐานะเจ้าสำนักคนปัจจุบัน เจ้าไม่รู้สึกละอายใจบ้างเหรอ? สำนักพฤกษาถูกกำหนดให้พินาศในมือของเจ้า!

column2: I would rather see the Plant Sect gradually decline, and the people under the sky no longer suffer from illness; unlike you, who tamper with prescriptions to reduce their efficacy, brew diseases to poison the people...
column3: ข้าอยากเห็นสำนักพฤกษาค่อยๆเสื่อมถอยลง และผู้คนภายใต้แผ่นฟ้าไม่ต้องทนทุกข์ทรมานจากความเจ็บป่วยอีกต่อไป; ไม่เหมือนเจ้าที่ยุ่งเกี่ยวกับเทียบยาลดประสิทธิภาพลง, สร้างโรค วางยาพิษผู้คน...

column2: You are not only unfit to practice medicine, but also unfit to be a human!
You don't know how grateful they are to me when I treat those ignorant people.
In your eyes, I am a demon, a disgrace to the Plant Sect; but in their eyes, I am like their biological parents, with kindness as great as life itself!
column3: ในสายตาของเจ้า, ข้าคือปีศาจ, สร้างความอับอายให้กับสำนักพฤกษา; แต่ในสายตาของพวกเขา ข้าเป็นเหมือนพ่อแม่ร่วมสายเลือด มีความเมตตายิ่งใหญ่เท่ากับชีวิต!

column2: These people all cherish their lives, I don't even have to think of excuses to defraud them, they will give me silver desperately, and if they don't spend the money, they will worry that I won't try my best to save them.
Hahaha, as the head of the Plant Sect, how do you feel?
column3: ฮ่า ฮ่าฮ่า, ในฐานะเจ้าสำนักพฤกษา เจ้ารู้สึกอย่างไร?

column2: Now that I have blocked your source of wealth, it shows that most people are still sober and will not be deceived by your ghostly tricks.

Therefore, the Plant Sect is destined to be trampled under my feet. After today, there will be no more name of the Plant Sect in the martial arts world. Those people you watched over will eventually have to come to me for treatment!
column3: ดังนั้น, สำนักพฤกษาจึงถูกกำหนดให้จมอยู่ใต้ฝ่าเท้าของข้า หลังจากวันนี้ จะไม่มีชื่อของสำนักพฤกษาในโลกยุทธภพอีกต่อไป, ในที่สุดผู้คนเหล่านั้นที่เจ้าคอยช่วยเหลือ จะต้องมาหาข้าเพื่อรักษาพวกมัน!

column2: Want to destroy the Plant Sect?
column3: ต้องการทำลายสำนักพฤกษาหรือไม่?

column2: With you, a beast that is inferior to pigs and dogs?
Or the five guys who repay kindness with ingratitude that I just saved?
Or the group of rotten fish and shrimps you brought with you, showing their teeth and claws?
Since you guys don't want to be human, then I'll send you to reincarnate. In your next life, you'll surely get what you wish for!
Junior sister, spare me, I know I was wrong.\nOur Plant Sect is already declining, we can't fight each other anymore.
column3: ศิษย์น้องหญิง, โปรดไว้ชีวิตข้า ข้ารู้ว่าข้าหลงผิดไป\nสำนักพฤกษาของเราเสื่อมถอยลง, เราไม่สามารถต่อสู้กันเองได้อีกต่อไปแล้ว

column2: Now you remember that you are a member of the Plant Sect?\nNow you remember that we can't fight each other?
column3: ตอนนี้เจ้าพึ่งจะจำได้ว่าเจ้าเป็นศิษย์ของสำนักพฤกษา?\nตอนนี้เจ้าพึ่งจะจำได้ว่าเราไม่ควรต่อสู้กัน?

column2: Junior sister, I have worked so hard to make the Plant Sect famous!
column3: ศิษย์น้องหญิง, ข้าทำงานหนักมากเพื่อทำให้สำนักพฤกษามีชื่อเสียง!

column2: You are using the name of the Plant Sect to make money, you are tarnishing the Plant Sect, and the reputation you are spreading is a bad one!
column3: เจ้าใช้ชื่อของสำนักพฤกษาเพื่อชื่อเสียงเงินทอง, เจ้ากำลังทำให้สำนักพฤกษามัวหมอง และชื่อเสียงที่เจ้ากำลังสร้างนั้นมันก็ไม่เห็นมีเรื่องดีเลยสักเรื่อง!

column2: What are you, this is a family matter of the Plant Sect, you are an outsider, why are you interfering!
column3: เจ้าเป็นใคร นี่เป็นเรื่องภายในของสำนักพฤกษา, เจ้าเป็นคนนอก, ทำไมเจ้าถึงเข้ามายุ่ง!

column2: {PlayerSurName} young hero is my friend, and also a friend of the Plant Sect, what he said is also what I think.
column3: จอมยุทธ์หนุ่ม {PlayerSurName} คือเพื่อนของข้าและยังเป็นเพื่อนของสำนักพฤกษา สิ่งที่เขาพูดก็เป็นสิ่งที่ข้าคิดอยู่เช่นกัน

column2: Junior sister, with my brain and your medical skills, we can definitely make the Plant Sect shine again. Only in this way can we live up to the master's lifelong efforts.
column3: ศิษย์น้องหญิง, ด้วยสมองของข้าและวิชาแพทย์ของเจ้า เราจะทำให้สำนักพฤกษากลับมาเปล่งประกายได้อีกครั้งอย่างแน่นอน ด้วยวิธีนี้เท่านั้นที่เราจะดำเนินชีวิตตามความต้องการชั่วชีวิตของอาจารย์ได้.

column2: "Whether the Plant Sect is declining or thriving, I have no regrets in my heart" - these were the words the master said to me before he died, and now I give them to you.
column3: “ไม่ว่าสำนักพฤกษาจะถดถอยหรือเจริญรุ่งเรือง ข้าก็ไม่เคยเสียใจในใจ” นี่คือคำพูดที่อาจารย์พูดกับข้าก่อนที่ท่านจะเสีย และตอนนี้ข้าจะมอบมันให้กับเจ้า

column2: Senior brother, the master once told us to help each other and not to kill each other. I won't hurt you, you run away, the Plant Sect has nothing to do with you from now on.
column3: ศิษย์พี่, อาจารย์เคยบอกให้เราช่วยเหลือกันไม่ฆ่ากันเอง. ข้าจะไม่ทำร้ายเจ้า เจ้าจากไปสะ สำนักพฤกษากับเจ้านับจากนี้ไป ไม่ขอข้องเกี่ยวกันอีก.

column2: Humph, since junior sister doesn't want to make the Plant Sect prosperous, then we have different paths and I won't accompany you.
column3: ฮึมมม, หากศิษย์น้องหญิงไม่ต้องการทำให้สำนักพฤกษาเจริญรุ่งเรือง ได้เราก็มีเส้นทางที่แตกต่างกันและข้าจะไม่ขอข้องเกี่ยวกับเจ้า

column2: Stop~
column3: หยุด~

column2: Kid, we'll settle our accounts later, you better take care of your life.
Kill the evil man here.
Let the evil man go.
I don't have the habit of giving my enemies a chance to breathe after making them my enemies.\nI don't want to be a fool who lets the tiger return to the mountain, so let's settle our grudges today.
Junior sister! This kid wants to take my life, are you going to do something?
You are no longer a member of the Plant Sect, this is a dispute between you and {PlayerSurName} young hero, I have no right to interfere.
column3: เจ้าไม่ได้เป็นสมาชิกของสำนักพฤกษาอีกต่อไป, นี่เป็นข้อขัดแย้งระหว่างเจ้ากับจอมยุทธ์หนุ่ม {PlayerSurName} ข้าไม่มีสิทธิ์เข้าไปยุ่ง.

column2: Fine, if you don't let me live, you won't have a good time either!
Junior sister, junior sister, save, save me...
Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName} for helping me clean up my sect.
Don't you blame me for killing your former senior brother?
He was not only my senior brother, but also the youngest son whom my mentor loved the most...\nI couldn't bring myself to do it, so it was only fitting for you to do it.
You're right, the Plant Sect taught me all my medical skills, which should be used for the benefit of the people, especially in these troubled times, we healers should step forward.
column3: เจ้าพูดถูก สำนักพฤกษาสอนทักษะวิชาแพทย์ทั้งหมดให้แก่ข้า ซึ่งควรใช้เพื่อช่วยเหลือผู้คน โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่งในช่วงเวลาที่ยากลำบากเช่นนี้ พวกเราผู้รักษาควรยื่นมือออกไป

column2: I agree to run away with you, young hero {PlayerSurName}. There should be more people outside who need my help. I can't claim to be a world savior, but at least I can truly be at peace with myself, worthy of being a successor of the Plant Sect.
column3: ข้าตกลงที่จะหนีไปพร้อมกับเจ้า จอมยุทธ์หนุ่ม {PlayerSurName} ข้างนอกน่าจะมีคนต้องการความช่วยเหลือจากข้ามากกว่านี้ ข้าไม่สามารถอ้างว่าเป็นผู้กอบกู้โลกได้ แต่อย่างน้อยข้าก็สามารถมีความสงบสุขกับตัวเองได้อย่างแท้จริง และคู่ควรกับการเป็นผู้สืบทอดของสำนักพฤกษา

column2: Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, for helping me through this crisis.
I just let the evil doctor go, will it cause you trouble in the future?

He was not only my senior brother, but also the youngest son whom my mentor loved the most...\nIf he still insists on having the Plant Sect, I will give it to him, as a repayment for my mentor's kindness.
column3: เขาไม่ใช่แค่ศิษย์พี่ของข้าเท่านั้น แต่ยังเป็นลูกชายคนเล็กของอาจารย์ของข้าที่ท่านโปรดปรานมากที่สุด...\nหากเขายังคงยืนกรานที่จะมีสำนักพฤกษา ข้าจะมอบมันให้กับเขาเพื่อเป็นการตอบแทนความมีน้ำใจของอาจารย์

column2: After this incident, I feel the need to go out, there should be more people outside who need my help. I can't claim to be a world savior, but at least I can truly be at peace with myself, worthy of being a successor of the Plant Sect.
column3: หลังจากเหตุการณ์นี้ ข้ารู้สึกว่าจำเป็นต้องออกไปยังข้างนอก น่าจะมีคนข้างนอกมากกว่านี้ที่ต้องการความช่วยเหลือจากข้า ข้าไม่สามารถอ้างว่าเป็นผู้กอบกู้โลกได้ แต่อย่างน้อยข้าก็สามารถมีความสงบสุขกับตัวเองได้อย่างแท้จริง และคู่ควรกับการเป็นผู้สืบทอดของสำนักพฤกษา

column2: I agree to run away with you, young hero {PlayerSurName}. Come find me when you're ready.

Also, I have to tell you, the Plant Sect will eventually belong to the Nine Factions Sect, I have pledged my loyalty to the leader of the Nine Factions Sect, your gift today will be returned a hundredfold in the future!
column3: นอกจากนี้, ข้าต้องบอกเจ้าว่าในที่สุดสำนักพฤกษาจะเป็นของนิกายเก้าฝ่าย ข้าให้คำมั่นว่าจะจงรักภักดีต่อผู้นำของนิกายเก้าฝ่าย ของขวัญของเจ้าในวันนี้จะถูกส่งคืนเป็นร้อยเท่าในอนาคต!

column2: Qu Wangyou, even your Plant Sect can kill people with your treatments!
column3: ฉู่หวังโหย่ว, แม้แต่สำนักพฤกษาของเจ้าก็สามารถฆ่าผู้คนได้ด้วยการรักษาของเจ้า!

column2: Qu Wangyou, aren't you proud of your medical skills?
How come you can't solve such a simple disease, and even killed a person in the Plant Sect, it's really embarrassing.
column3: ทำไมเจ้าถึงไม่สามารถแก้ปัญหาโรคง่ายๆ แบบนี้ได้ แถมยังฆ่าคนในสำนักพฤกษาด้วยซ้ำ มันช่างน่าละอายจริงๆ

column2: It was my oversight, I didn't follow Miss Qu's method to treat the patient, it's not her fault.
I feel like there are hundreds of bugs crawling all over me, please save me, I'm about to be eaten by them...
What method should I use to save him?
Use excellent swordsmanship.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's Sword reaches 50)</color>
Use domineering strength.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's Strength reaches 8)</color>
Use profound MP.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's MP reaches 800)</color>
Use exquisite toxicology.<color=#097a76>(Any team member's Toxicology reaches 50)</color>
Use Thunderstruck wood.<color=#097a76>(1 Thunderstruck wood)</color>
Do not save for now.
A moment later...
Finally survived...
Damn it, you took so long, making me suffer so much!
Ah--
column3: อ่า--

column2: I feel so uncomfortable, it's like every joint is twisted and deformed, it's so painful!!!!
A moment later...
Phew, I got my life back...
Don't expect me to thank you, this is what you should do!
Ah--
column3: อ่า--

column2: It feels like there are several chaotic energies rampaging inside me, as if my meridians are about to burst, please save me.
A moment later...
Phew, finally feel better.
column3: ฟู่ว~ รู้สึกดีขึ้นเยอะเลย

column2: In consideration of your rescue, here's a piece of advice for you: this place is full of disputes, better run away as soon as possible.
Ah--
column3: อ้า--

column2: I'm beyond saving, still don't know what poison I've been afflicted with, I'm not willing to die like this!!!
A moment later...
I'm actually cured! It's miraculous!
Thank you, young man.
Ah--
column3: อ้า--

column2: Hehehe... I'm so cold, so cold...
A moment later...
I'm not cold anymore, I'm cured!!!
Unexpectedly, you managed to get your hands on the rare Thunderstruck wood. It's a waste to use it for healing.
Ah--
column3: อ้า--

column2: You little brat, I've been waiting here for a long time!
I let you run away back then, don't you regret it?
Regret? I didn't do anything wrong, what is there to regret?
One day, I will make a comeback and reclaim the Plant Sect!\nThe Plant Sect is mine, I am the master of the Plant Sect!
column3: วันหนึ่ง, ข้าจะกลับมาและทวงคืนสำนักพฤกษา!\nสำนักพฤกษาเป็นของข้า, ข้าเป็นเจ้าของสำนักพฤกษา!

column2: Ah, I didn't expect your obsession to be so deep. You still don't understand why the master let me take charge of the Plant Sect.
column3: อาา, ไม่คิดว่าเจ้าจะหมกมุ่นถึงขนาดนี้ เจ้ายังไม่เข้าใจอีกหรอว่าทำไมอาจารย์ถึงให้ข้าดูแลสำนักพฤกษา

column2: Qu Wangyou! You said you wouldn't run away from the Plant Sect, how could you break your vow?
column3: ฉู่หวังโหย่ว! เจ้าบอกว่าจะไม่ย่างกายออกไปจากสำนักพฤกษา เจ้าจะผิดคำสาบานของเจ้าได้อย่างไร?

column2: I was just unwilling to go with the flow, unwilling to deal with those mundane matters. It doesn't mean I won't travel outside for the rest of my life.
Damn it, there can't be two tigers on one mountain. Your medical skills are superior to mine. What's the point of my existence then? You, you...
Go to hell!!!
Miss Qu, be careful!
column3: แม่นางฉู่ ระวัง!

column2: Junior sister, junior sister, save, save me...
column3: ศิษย์น้อง, ศิษย์น้องหญิง ช่วย.. ช่วยข้าด้วย...

column2: Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName} for helping me clean up my sect.
Don't you blame me for killing your former senior brother?
He was not only my senior brother, but also the youngest son whom my mentor loved the most...\nI couldn't bring myself to do it, so it was only fitting for you to do it.
What right do you, a beast blinded by greed, have to be the master of the Plant Sect!
column3: ถูกของเจ้า, สัตว์ร้ายที่ตาบอดด้วยความโลภ ต้องเป็นเจ้าแห่งสำนักพฤกษา!

column2: Hehehe, I'll let you see my true power and tell you why I'm qualified to be the master of the Plant Sect!
column3: ฮี ฮิฮี, ข้าจะให้เจ้าได้เห็นพลังที่แท้จริงของข้า และบอกเจ้าว่าทำไมข้าถึงมีคุณสมบัติที่จะเป็นเจ้าสำนักพฤกษา!

column2: Junior sister, junior sister, save, save me...
column3: ศิษย์น้อง, ศิษย์น้องหญิง ช่วย.. ช่วยข้าด้วย...

column2: Still hoping that Miss Qu will soften her heart and save him when he's on the brink of death, he's really hopeless.
Mission
column3: ภารกิจ

column2: {PlayerName}, Luo Qianxue!
column3: {PlayerName} ลั่วเฉียนเสวี่ย!

column2: I'm here!
Recently, we received news that there have been sightings of men in black taking children in and out of a mountain cave in Zhongzhou. We suspect it's a base for child trafficking.
I order you to capture these men in black and rescue the children.
Should we bring these men in black back for trial?
These heinous criminals should be killed on the spot, no need to bring them back to the Crime Investigation Bureau.
Understood!
How is the mission going?
(Tell the chief about the results.)
All the men in black in the mountain cave have been killed.
All the men in black in the mountain cave have been released.
The mission is not yet complete.
Time is of the essence. The sooner we eliminate these criminals, the sooner the kidnapped children can be rescued.
Well done, you did the right thing!\nHave all the children been returned to their parents? Don't keep them waiting.
Qianxue, you look pale. Are you sick?
Those children... they don't have parents...
Nonsense! Every child has...\nWait, are you saying they are all orphans?
Hmph, these scoundrels are still guilty for trafficking orphans!
That's not the case... they, they...
A chief of the Crime Investigation Bureau, crying like this, what a disgrace!
Chief, those children were homeless orphans. They were taken to the mountain cave by those people, provided with food and clothes, allowing them to barely survive.
So, those people were actually kind-hearted?

These black-clad men are disciples of Nest of Swallow. They do take in orphans, but they also teach them the art of Steal, under the guise of self-reliance, they are actually raising a group of little thieves.
{yell} What! Nest of Swallow is really bold!
How are those little thieves, oh no, those children now?
Without the protection of those disciples from Nest of Swallow, these children are likely to die of starvation, or be devoured by beasts, or die in the chaos of war...
Qianxue, I understand why you were crying just now.\nThere's no way around it, for the justice that the Crime Investigation Bureau defends, sometimes it's impossible to have the best of both worlds.
You guys did nothing wrong in this matter, don't dwell on it.\nYou guys go ahead, don't let trivial matters shake your faith.
{yell} Nonsense! How dare you make decisions on your own!
Brother, those...
Call me the Chief Catcher!
Reporting to the Chief Catcher, those children are orphans taken in by the disciples of Nest of Swallow. Some of the children might have starved to death if they hadn't been rescued in time.
What! Those black-clad men are actually thieves from Nest of Swallow!\nTheir adoption of these orphans is a sham, the real purpose is to train the next generation of thieves!
You guys actually let them go!\nDo you know the serious consequences of doing so!
Whether they can become thieves is still too early to say, but if we punish those people from Nest of Swallow, these children will not be able to survive on their own, and will die soon.
You two remember, as members of the Crime Investigation Bureau, don't let personal feelings influence your likes and dislikes. Our existence is to uphold justice, not to condone evil!
You have disappointed me, half of your contributions to the Bureau will be deducted as punishment!\nYou don't need to worry about this matter anymore, I will arrange for others to handle it.
{PlayerName}……
Hmm?
column3: อืมม?

column2: We did nothing wrong this time. Although we were punished by the Chief Catcher, we feel incredibly relieved. The long-standing frustration in our hearts has finally disappeared.
{PlayerName}, thank you.
Don't bother me, my Steal skill is not yet perfected, I don't want to hold everyone back.
Get lost——!!!
column3: ไสหัวไป——!!!

column2: Hey, you're not a member of Nest of Swallow anymore, why are you still bothering me?
Even if you've run away from Nest of Swallow, I'm still yours, I don't mind being entangled with you.
It's a pity that your team is already full, I can't accompany you to wander the martial arts world for now.
Don't forget to teach me the Steal skills you've learned. If you can't teach me, I'll make you regret it!
It's a pity that your team is already full, I can't accompany you to wander the martial arts world for now.
Where have you been fooling around again? Now you remember me? Humph!
Why are you looking for me when you don't even have a place for me in your team? Humph!
Luo Qianxue, you jerk!\nWhy are you in {PlayerName}'s team?
Can't I? If even you, a thief, can join the team, why can't I, a dignified catcher of the Crime Investigation Bureau?
Humph, don't be too proud!\nIf I don't like you one day, we'll have another fight!
This hero statue has been standing for decades, and people still worship it to this day.
{PlayerName}, have you kowtowed yet? I heard it's quite effective.
{PlayerName}, why do I feel this new statue bears some resemblance to you?
This General Lü Wenhuan really knows how to enjoy life...
I seem to smell the presence of a fellow practitioner here.
I didn't expect to find a few genuine items in such a small shop. Although there are a few bodyguards, they are like nothing in my eyes.
{PlayerName}, there are quite a few good things in this room. Do you dare to get them?
If one day all the children could have books to read and schools to attend, what a wonderful thing that would be.
Hey, do you still remember how scared you were? When I asked you to hunt some wild game in the forest, you were terrified.
Hey, {PlayerName}, did you eat the heart of a bear and the gall of a leopard? \nBringing me to the Crime Investigation Bureau? If you want to die, don't drag me down with you.

It seems that the refugees here have been receiving aid all along, otherwise they wouldn't have survived.\nThe Nest of Swallow has also provided aid to many such Refugee Camps, but it's simply not enough.
{PlayerName}, we in the Nest of Swallow only take the treasures above ground; the underground treasures belong to the Tomb Raider Sect. Don't break the rules.
column3: {PlayerName} พวกเราอยู่ในรังนกนางแอ่นที่จะเก็บสมบัติเหนือพื้นดินเท่านั้น สมบัติใต้ดินเป็นของสำนักปล้นสุสานอย่าฝ่าฝืนกฎเกณฑ์

column2: {PlayerName}, if it weren't for you accompanying me, I might never have had the chance to meet so many people and experience so many things. After all these experiences, I feel like I've grown subtly.
What makes you think you can invite me? Aren't you afraid I'll poison you?
No matter how powerful you are, I will not join your team.
It took you so long to remember me. Indeed, men are always unsatisfied.
With a master like you to protect us along the way, we will surely be much safer.
Your team is overcrowded, there's no place for me now.
Jiang Ziyan, let's see where you can run!
You guys are really persistent, are you here to die again?
Our patience is limited, don't think that finding this pretty boy to back you up means you can rest easy.
Hey, can you be more considerate when you speak, think about the feelings of the person involved.
{PlayerName}, our Jiuli tribe has noted your name, we advise you not to meddle in our affairs, or else, your death will be miserable...
(It's time for a tough decision again, this guy is threatening me, as if they will resort to any means to deal with me if I make a choice they don't like, what should I do at this moment?)
Hand over Jiang Ziyan, stay out of this.
Protect Jiang Ziyan, kill any god or Buddha in the way.<color=#c44b0e>(Specific Battle)</color>
I thought your abilities were enough to protect me, I didn't expect...
{PlayerName}, I don't blame you, after all, the Jiuli tribe is a formidable force for you. This is between me and them, I won't drag others into it, take care.
What are you looking at! Go, what else can you expect?
Jiang Ziyan has repeatedly angered the Jiuli tribe, if he falls into their hands, there's no way out.
Jiang Ziyan, do you trust me?
I wouldn't normally trust anyone, but given the circumstances, I have no choice but to trust you now!
Since you're willing to trust me, I won't let you down!\nI, {PlayerName}, will never let my friends down!
The Jiuli Tribe, no matter how arrogant and domineering you are, you're no different from a pack of mad dogs in my eyes.
I'd like to see how capable you are of taking my friend away from me!
I've set up a No Escape here, I'd like to see how you few can escape!
column3: ข้าได้เตรียมแหฟ้าตาข่ายดินไว้ที่นี่, ข้าต้องการเห็นเจ้าจะหลบหนีพ้นได้อย่างไร!

column2: Is this your No Escape? It's not even enough to fill the gaps between my teeth!
column3: นี่คือแหฟ้าตาข่ายดินของเจ้าจริงใช่ไหม? อุดช่องว่างระหว่างฟันอย่างเดียวยังไม่พอเลย!

column2: Don't rush, that was just an appetizer, let's see how big your appetite is.
Interesting, but it's nothing.\nIs an ambush by a bunch of small fries a bit childish?
Hehe, do you think the Jiuli Tribe only has this much ability?
What, what have you done to me!
Enfeeble pill!
column3: โอสถพิษไร้พลัง!

column2: You guys even managed to concoct such a strange poison!
Jiang Ziyan, this Enfeeble pill was originally prepared for you, but it seems that it's put to better use on {PlayerName}.
column3: เจียงจือเหยียน, เดิมทียาโอสถไร้พลัง นี้เตรียมไว้สำหรับเจ้า แต่ดูเหมือนว่ามันจะดีกว่าถ้านำไปใช้กับ {PlayerName}

column2: It's just an Enfeeble pill, if you have any other tricks, use them all!
column3: มันเป็นเพียงยาโอสถไร้พลัง หากเจ้ามีลูกเล่นอื่นๆ ก็ใช้มันออกมาให้ทั้งหมด!

column2: Kid, it seems you have no idea how powerful the Enfeeble pill is.
column3: เจ้าหนู ดูเหมือนเจ้าจะไม่รู้ว่ายาโอสถไร้พลัง นั้นทรงพลังแค่ไหน

column2: Once poisoned by the Enfeeble pill, even if you have great abilities, you won't be able to use your internal energy. Now that you can't use your internal energy, I'd like to see how you digest the upcoming feast!
column3: เมื่อได้รับพิษจากยาโอสถไร้พลัง แม้ว่าเจ้าจะมีความสามารถที่ยอดเยี่ยม เจ้าจะไม่สามารถใช้กำลังภายในของเจ้าได้ ตอนนี้เจ้าไม่สามารถใช้กำลังภายในได้ ข้าอยากจะดูว่าเจ้าจะแยกแยะพิธีฉลองที่กำลังจะมาถึงได้อย่างไร!

column2: Is this all the people you have?
{PlayerName}, I admit you're very powerful, even poisoned by the Enfeeble pill, you're still brave. However, you've underestimated the Jiuli Tribe.
column3: {PlayerName} ข้ายอมรับว่าเจ้าแข็งแกร่งมาก แม้จะโดนวางยาโอสถไร้พลัง  เจ้าก็ยังกล้าหาญ อย่างไรก็ตาม เจ้าประเมินเผ่าจิ่วลี่ต่ำไป

column2: I didn't expect you to have so many people ambushed here, the Jiuli Tribe from the far southwest has infiltrated so many people, I suppose there must be your insiders in the Central Plains.
There's no need to know so much when you're about to die.
Who's about to die is still unknown.
What do you mean?
I have to thank you for your Enfeeble pill, it gave me a lot of inspiration.\nIt's impolite not to reciprocate, now you can experience my return gift.
column3: ข้าต้องขอบเจ้าสำหรับยาโอสถไร้พลัง ของเจ้า มันทำให้ข้ามีแรงบันดาลใจมากมาย\nมันไม่สุภาพที่จะไม่ตอบแทน ตอนนี้เจ้าสามารถสัมผัสประสบการณ์การคืนของขวัญของข้าได้แล้ว

column2: Muscle Relaxant Incense——
What! What kind of Toxicology is this?\nMy body is gradually becoming numb, I can hardly exert any strength, such a terrifying poison!
Retreat, retreat quickly!!!
column3: ถอย ถอยก่อนเร็ว!!!

column2: Did these people just retreat? What just happened?
Don't worry about the details, the people of the Jiuli Tribe should not dare to mess with me again.
So you're saying you don't need my protection anymore, planning to Run away?
I have to admit, I did have that plan at first, because I don't trust anyone, it's all about using and being used in Relations.
However, I've changed my mind, you're someone I can Trust.\nIn times of crisis, even when you were surrounded, you didn't hand me over, you're a partner I can entrust my life to.
If one day you do something that disappoints me, I will make sure you experience the taste of wanting to live but not being able to die before I Run away.
Yes... (Kong Yidao just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, because there are no extra spots in the team.)
Yes, master...
The team has no extra space, unable to invite him to join the team.
I'm the leader of the Blue Wind Camp after all, your request is a pipe dream.
(How should I Invite Kong Yidao to join my team?)
Have him take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color><color=#097a76>(Heart Broken pill x1)</color>

column2: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color><color=#097a76>(Jianghu Master token x1)</color>
Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.
It's thoughtful of you, but I won't eat something of unknown origin.
Since you're so cautious, I'll have to take matters into my own hands and make you submit.
You forced Kong Yidao to take the Heart Broken pill. After a while, Kong Yidao's eyes became hazy, and he seemed confused.

column3: ประสก, ใบหน้าของเจ้าเต็มไปด้วยวิญญาณชั่วร้าย ยาเม็ดนี้ไม่ใช่สิ่งที่ดีใช่ไหม

column2: Since you have seen it, I have to do it myself, please master to surrender.
You forced Hui Yuan to take the Heart Broken pill, and after a while, Hui Yuan's eyes were blurred, and his mind was confused.
column3: เจ้าบังคับให้ ฮุ่ยหยวน กินยาหัวใจสลาย, หลังจากนั้นไม่นานดวงตาของ ฮุ่ยหยวน ก็พร่ามัว และจิตใจของเขาก็สับสน.

column2: Master Hui Yuan, let go of your obsession.\nFrom now on, I {PlayerName} will be your new faith, worship at my feet.
column3: ไต้ซือฮุ่ยหยวน จงละทิ้งความหลงใหลของท่าน.\nจากนี้ไป ข้า {PlayerName} จะเป็นศรัทธาใหม่ของท่าน นมัสการแทบเท้าของข้า.

column2: Amitabha...
Donor, the Heart Broken pill you gave me has now been detoxified.
column3: ประสก, ยาหัวใจสลาย ที่เจ้าให้ข้าได้ถูกขจัดพิษออกไปแล้ว

column2: What?
column3: อะไรนะ?

column2: Donor, you have committed heavy sins, let me enlighten you.
Master Hui Yuan, I have treated you well along the way, and you want to kill me!
column3: ไต้ซือฮุ่ยหยวน,ข้าปฏิบัติต่อท่านอย่างดีมาโดยตลอด, แต่ท่านกลับต้องการสังหารข้าอย่างนั้นหรือ!

column2: Amitabha, The Devil should be punished by everyone.\nDonor, you have now entered the evil path, and from now on, Shifa Temple will be incompatible with you!
Seeing that he could not get rid of you, Hui Yuan had to dodge and return to Shifa Temple.
column3: เมื่อเห็นว่าเขากำจัดคุณไม่ได้, ฮุ่ยหยวน จึงได้หลบหนีกลับไปที่อารามฉีฟา.

column2: Jianghu Master's gold order is here!\nMaster Hui Yuan, am I qualified now?
A single golden order can Invite any sect leader to serve you. Although it only lasts for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color>, it's enough for you to do a lot.
So, do you accept my Invite?
column3: เจ้ายอมรับคำเชิญของข้าหรือไม่?

column2: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
I didn't expect you to use a Jianghu Master token to invite me back into the world.
So, do you accept my Invite?
column3: เจ้ายอมรับคำเชิญของข้าหรือไม่?

column2: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
The ten-day limit of the Jianghu Master token has arrived, I will return to Shifa Temple, {PlayerSurName} donor, see you later.
Although the ten-day agreement has not arrived, but this time you let me run away, then our agreement is terminated.
Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} donor, I'm sorry I can't accompany you.
Amitabha...
The donor's team does not have a place for the old monk, good and good.
Yes... (Cai Yuanchang just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, because there are no extra spots in the team.)
Yes, master...
The team has no extra space, unable to invite him to join the team.
I am the master of Confucius Temple, you are like a dragonfly in front of me, what qualifications do you have to let me stand up for you?
(How should I invite Cai Yuanchang to join my team?)
Have him take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color><color=#097a76>(Heart Broken pill x1)</color>
column3: ให้เขากิน<color=#c44b0e>ยาหัวใจสลาย</color><color=#097a76>(ยาหัวใจสลาย x1)</color>

column2: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color><color=#097a76>(Jianghu Master token x1)</color>

column3: แสดง <color=#c44b0e>ตราจักรพรรดิ</color> ! <color=#097a76>(1 ตราจักรพรรดิ)</color>

column2: Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.
It's Heart Broken pill!\nDo you want to use this poison on me?
column3: มันคือยาหัวใจสลาย!\nเจ้าต้องการใช้ยาพิษนี้กับข้า?

column2: Since you have seen it, I have to do it myself and serve the master medicine.
You forced Cai Yuanchang to take the Heart Broken pill, and after a while, Cai Yuanchang's eyes were blurred, and his mind was confused.

column2: The master of Confucius Temple is nothing more than that, and he still bows his head in front of me.
Cai Yuanchang, from now on I will be your master, you must listen to me!
Yes... master...
column3: ขอรับ... นายท่าน...

column2: The Heart Broken pill has worn off...
column3: ยาหัวใจสลายหมดฤทธิ์แล้ว...

column2: What?
column3: อะไรนะ?

column2: {PlayerName}, how dare you let me recognize you as the master!\nThief, looking for death!!!
Cai Yuanchang, I have treated you well along the way, and you want to kill me!
Thief, you are lucky today, I want to see how long you can be arrogant!
Seeing that he could not get rid of you, Cai Yuanchang had to dodge and return to Confucius Temple.
Jianghu Master's gold order is here!\nMaster Cai Yuanchang of Confucius Temple, am I qualified now?
A single golden order can Invite any sect leader to serve you. Although it only lasts for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color>, it's enough for you to do a lot.
So, do you accept my Invite?
column3: เจ้ายอมรับคำเชิญของข้าหรือไม่?

column2: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
Since you have the Jianghu Master token in your hand, you naturally have this qualification.
So, do you accept my Invite?
column3: เจ้ายอมรับคำเชิญของข้าหรือไม่?

column2: I will follow the order of Jianghu Master!
The ten-day limit of the Jianghu Master token has arrived, I have fulfilled my promise and can't accompany you.
Although the ten-day agreement has not arrived, but this time you let me run away, then our agreement is terminated.
Imperial token is here, as if the emperor is here!\nMaster Cai Yuanchang of Confucius Temple, am I qualified now?
column3: ตราจักรพรรดิอยู่ที่นี่ เสมือนว่าองค์จักรพรรดิอยู่ที่นี่!\nเจ้าสำนักไช่หยวนฉางแห่งวัดขงจื้อ, ตอนนี้ข้ามีคุณสมบัติหรือยัง?

column2: I, Cai Yuanchang, will follow the imperial edict!
I don't welcome you here, please feel free.
If those people in the rivers and lakes know that I am back in the rivers and lakes, I don't know what they will think.
Your team has no vacancies, I can't help.
Bronze man
column3: มนุษย์ทองแดง

column2: Since I was grounded by that fat man Hui Yuan, I have never had the chance to taste delicious food.\nI really miss the days when I used to steal food from the imperial kitchen.
column3: ตั้งแต่ข้าถูกควบคุมโดยเจ้าอ้วนฮุ่ยหยวนคนนั้น, ข้าก็ไม่เคยมีโอกาสได้ลิ้มรสอาหารอร่อยอีกเลย.\nข้าคิดถึงวันคืนที่เคยได้ขโมยอาหารจากครัวของจักรพรรดิจริงๆ.

column2: Why was the master grounded by the abbot?
Why was the master grounded by the abbot?

It was nothing serious. This poor monk just occasionally went down the mountain for a meal, but the chicken leg hidden in my clothes was discovered by that fat man, so he punished me with confinement.
It turns out that the confinement was to prevent you from continuing to go down the mountain to steal food, not because you ate meat.
As long as this poor monk can break through this golden body bronze man formation, the punishment of confinement will be lifted.
So you haven't broken through this bronze man formation yet?

The higher the Benevolence of the person who breaks the formation, the smaller the Power of the bronze man; however, this poor monk has repeatedly broken the precepts, so this bronze man formation is almost like a hell for me.
(Do you want to help Lai Toudian break through the bronze man formation?)
Help break the formation. <color=#097a76>(Specific battle)</color>
Stand by and watch.
Alas, when can this confinement end?
This poor monk has been waiting for you, a great benefactor of ten lifetimes. Let's strive for First blood and break through this bronze man formation in one fell swoop!
You help me break the formation? This is not impossible, it depends on our fate.
Don't harm me, you have a face full of evil spirits, let's not be blown into slag as soon as we enter the bronze man formation.
It seems that this poor monk has to continue to be confined.
The formation is broken! The formation is broken! Finally, the confinement can be lifted!!!
The hard days of hunger have finally come to an end, this poor monk is going down the mountain~
Did the master bring help to break the formation today?
Hey, as long as we can win, it doesn't matter if I bring help or not!
In that case, let's get started.
Donor is not a disciple of Shifa Temple, you can't stay here for long, please leave quickly.
You go to Arhat Hall first, I'll be there soon.
This poor monk is in confinement and can't go anywhere.
Alas, when will these hard days end?
(Smack... Smack... Smack...)
Completely pierced.
Stomach, stomach, this time you have to enjoy the blessing with this poor monk~
{PlayerName}, is this little guy next to you the Ingredient prepared for this poor monk?
Save a place for this poor monk quickly, I can't wait to go down the mountain~
Want to Invite me Shen Wuqi?\nIt's simple, either become a regular customer of Night Demon Square, or we become Intimate.
Given our current Relations, I won't do anything for you anymore!
I'd be happy to serve you.
Your team is full, I'm sorry I can't help.
Why is a woman running the show here?
Are you looking down on me?\nThe entire Zhangyue Casino is my property, can't I run it myself?
So you're the boss of Zhangyue Casino, I'm sorry for my rudeness.\nWhat's your name, boss?
People gave me a nickname called <color=#c44b0e>Yi Zhihua</color>, some also call me Sister Hua, anyway, call me whatever you like, I don't care.
Why are you talking so much nonsense, come and play with me!
Dice
column3: ทอยเต๋า

column2: Go away, you're not welcome here!
Sir, you look unfamiliar, is this your first time here?\nWould you like to hear me explain the rules of the dice?
Listen to his introduction of the dice rules
Don't want to listen to the introduction
It seems that the guest is an expert, then I wish the guest a good time.
Pop up the dice guide picture.
Apologies, sir, this table is temporarily closed. Please play at another table.
The minimum bet is 500 wen each time. Do you plan to join the game, sir?
Place a bet of 500 wen to join the game! <color=#097a76>(500 wen)</color>
Let me think about it.
It's really disappointing. I really can't touch this thing again in the future.
Take your time, sir. We'll keep your seat for you. Remember to come often.
There are few people with self-control like me. I won't be foolish enough to lose everything here.
Don't rush to leave, sir. Are you going to give up the opportunity to make a fortune?
Apologies, sir, this table is temporarily closed. Please play at another table.
The minimum bet is 1000 wen each time. Do you plan to join the game, sir?
Place a bet of 1000 wen to join the game! <color=#097a76>(1000 wen)</color>
Please hold on, sir. Let's play another round. If you win all the money in my hand, I will give you a <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color>. What do you think?
column3: กรุณารอสักครู่, นายท่าน มาเล่นกันอีกรอบ หากเจ้าชนะเงินทั้งหมดในมือของข้า ข้าจะให้ <color=#c44b0e>โอสถลืมเลือน</color> แก่เจ้า เจ้าคิดอย่างไร?

column2: (If you win all his money, you can get an extra <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color>. Do you want to play another round?)
column3: (หากเจ้าชนะเงินทั้งหมดของเขา เจ้าจะได้รับ <color=#c44b0e>โอสถลืมเลือน</color> พิเศษ เจ้าต้องการเล่นอีกรอบไหม?)

column2: Let's play another round!
Quit while you're ahead.
What a loss! You've just lost the money you've earned. It's a real loss!
Take care, sir. We look forward to your return to conquer the world again!
You should quit while you're ahead. Don't play anymore, or you might risk losing everything.
<color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color> is a rare item, it's a pity that you missed it.
column3: <color=#c44b0e>โอสถลืมเลือน</color>เป็นของหายาก เสียดายที่พลาดไป

column2: I'm really unlucky today, I lost again.\nI admit defeat, this <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten pill</color> is yours now.
column3: วันนี้ข้าโชคไม่ดีจริงๆ แพ้อีกแล้ว\nข้ายอมรับความพ่ายแพ้ <color=#c44b0e>โอสถลืมเลือน</color>นี้เป็นของเจ้าแล้ว

column2: This table is temporarily closed, please go to another table to play.
Kid, you want to just walk away after winning money?
If you allow them to open a shop, you should allow others to win money. It's all about skills.
I'll play a round with you. If you win, you can leave; if you lose, you can also leave.
(What should I do now?)
Let's play another round!
I don't want to accompany you! <color=#097a76>(Specific Battle)</color>
I don't have 1000 Wen on me anymore, are you sure you still want to play this round with me?
column3: ข้ามีเงินไม่ถึง 1000 อีแปะแล้ว เจ้าแน่ใจเหรอว่าอยากเล่นกับข้าอีกรอบ?

column2: What's the problem? I'll cover your 1000 Wen!
column3: ไม่มีปัญหา ข้าจะให้เจ้า 1000 อีแปะ!

column2: Are you satisfied now? Can I go?
Of course, you can go wherever you want, we won't stop you anymore.
Either win all my money, or lose all your money, otherwise you can't run away.
Kid, you are the first person to beat me with real strength, the younger generation is indeed to be feared.
Can I go now?
Of course, but before you leave, I want to give you something. Consider it a reward for beating me!
You've got guts. In that case, I'll have to teach you a lesson first.
Kid, you've made an enemy of the Relic House today, you're no longer welcome here!
You've beaten me up like this, can you let me go now?
No way! Either win all my money, or lose all your money, otherwise you can't run away.
Kid, why aren't you gambling anymore?
You think you can bully our Relic House, huh?
column3: เจ้าคิดว่าจะรังแกหอสมบัติของเราได้ใช่ไหม?

column2: Keep gambling!
Go all out! (Trigger fight)
Good lad, you've got guts!
Humph, seeing how desperate you are, I'll let you go today.
Leave half of your money and get lost!
The minimum bet is 1000 wen each time. Do you plan to join the game, sir?
Place a bet of 1000 wen to join the game! <color=#097a76>(1000 wen)</color>
Let me think about it.
You're not welcome here, get lost for me!
You're not a chick who doesn't know the rules, are you?\nWould you like me to explain the rules of the dice to you?
Listen to her explain the rules of the dice
Don't want to listen to the introduction
You've got character, but don't cry if you lose your pants later.
The game is closed here, I can rest for a few days, you go play elsewhere.
Each game here requires at least 5000 Wen to join, do you plan to join?
Bet 5000 Wen to join! <color=#097a76>(5000 Wen)</color>
Let me think about it.
It's really disappointing. I really can't touch this thing again in the future.
You're a loser, aren't you going to pick yourself up where you fall?
There are few people with self-control like me. I won't be foolish enough to lose everything here.
What I despise most are those timid and cowardly men, what can they achieve by being cautious?
The game is closed here, I can rest for a few days, you go play elsewhere.
People outside are unpredictable, I'd rather stay in the Plant Sect for the rest of my life.
column3: ผู้คนภายนอกยากแท้หยั่งถึง, ข้าอยากจะอยู่ในสำนักพฤกษาไปตลอดชีวิต

column2: Please respect yourself, I have nothing to do with you!
My lord, where are we going this time?
{PlayerSurName} young hero, where are we going this time?
The team is full, I'll accompany you next time.
You suddenly smell some mysterious fragrance.
(Do you want to go deeper into the roadside for Info)
Go to Info
Continue on your way
You go deeper and indeed find an exceptionally beautiful flower.\nYou get close and take a deep sniff.
This fragrance is strange, it actually has a weak toxicity, what a bad luck.
After smelling it, you feel refreshed and your Mood is pleasant.
You find a Near-death middle-aged man lying on the roadside.
(Do you want to go to the roadside for Info)
Go to Info
Continue on your way
You slowly approach the man and find that his leg has been bitten off by a wild beast.
Unfortunately, your Medical level is limited, you can only simply treat the Open wound and let it heal itself.
You use your Medical to bandage and Heal him, the middle-aged man slowly wakes up and is very grateful to you.\nYour Mood is very good, and you continue on your way to your destination.

Your Horse carriage is bumping along the rugged mountain road, you steady your body while carefully watching the road.\nSuddenly, you notice a monkey waving at the roadside ahead, as if it wants to communicate with you.
(Do you want to stop the carriage and communicate with the monkey)
Stop the carriage and communicate with the monkey (Beast Taming>=3)
Keep going

You stop the Horse carriage, go to the roadside and greet the monkey,
The monkey seems very interested in your arrival, making constant noises, as if it wants to say something.
You try to communicate with it, and soon find out that it wants you to follow it for a while.
It leads you through a small mountain, and you surprisingly find some scattered Coins in an open space.

You stop your Horse cart and greet the monkey by the roadside,
The monkey seems very interested in your arrival, making constant chattering noises, as if it wants to say something.
You try to communicate with it and quickly realize that it wants you to follow it for a while.
It leads you through a small hill.
Suddenly, a monkey flashes from the side, snatches your Money bag, and disappears into the deep forest.
Helplessly, you can only return to the Horse cart and continue on your way.
column3:
เจ้าหยุดรถม้าและทักทายลิงข้างถนน
ดูเหมือนว่าลิงจะสนใจการมาถึงของเจ้ามาก โดยส่งเสียงพูดพล่อยๆ อยู่ตลอดเวลา ราวกับว่ามันต้องการจะพูดอะไรสักอย่าง
เจ้าพยายามสื่อสารกับมันและรู้อย่างรวดเร็วว่ามันต้องการให้เจ้าติดตามมันไปสักพัก
มันจะพาเจ้าผ่านเนินเขาเล็กๆ
ทันใดนั้น ลิงตัวหนึ่งก็แวบขึ้นมาจากด้านข้าง คว้าถุงเงินของเจ้า แล้วหายตัวไปในป่าลึก
เจ้าทำได้เพียงกลับไปที่รถม้าและเดินทางต่อ

column2: You arrive in a dense forest, with a small stream ahead.
(Do you want to rest by the stream)
Rest by the stream
Keep going

You find a gentle rock to sit on, stretch your limbs, and eat some of your own dry food.\nJust as you are about to get up and continue on your way, you suddenly notice a pack of wolves approaching you.
After defeating the wolves, you rest for a while and then continue on your way.
As you travel along the road, you suddenly see an ancient land temple ahead.
(Do you want to enter the land temple)
Enter the land temple Info
Continue on your way
You walk into the land temple, where the light is very dim.\nYou look around and suddenly hear a dull noise.
You narrowly avoid the Machinery hidden arrow and feel very dangerous, so you quickly retreat.\nWhen you come out, you are lucky to find 2 pieces of Scrap silver at the door.
Despite your best efforts to dodge, you are still grazed by the incoming arrow.\nYou feel it's not a good place to stay, so you quickly Run away.
You rush to a highway pass, where several Officials are checking pedestrians.\nCoincidentally, the Officials found a fugitive on the run, who is quite skilled.
(Do you want to help)
Help
Run away in the chaos
You successfully help the Officials catch the fugitive.\nAs a thank you, they give you some Scrap silver.
Unexpectedly, your martial arts are not as good as theirs, and you are defeated first.\nThe Officials can only let the fugitive go helplessly.
There is a strange Herb growing on the cliff by the road.
(Do you want to pick it)
Go pick it (Strength>=8)
Continue on your way
You climb the cliff barehanded and pick the Herb.\nAlthough it's a bit thrilling when you climb down the cliff,\nyou still safely reach the ground.
You climb the cliff barehanded and pick the Herb.\nWhen you climb down the cliff, a stepping stone loosens,\nand you accidentally fall down.
Kid, you're wanted! Either surrender or we'll make you surrender!
(Oh no, these people have found me outside the city! What should I do?)
Fight back (Fight)
Surrender
Good boy, if you don't drink the toast, you'll have to drink the punishment. What are you waiting for? Do it!
Humph! A bunch of nobodies dare to make trouble?
Kid, this time you're in even more trouble, wait for the prefect to sentence you
You're sensible! Let's go, take him to the Government Office!
column3: เจ้ามีเหตุผล! ไปพาเขาไปที่ศาลาว่าการกันเถอะ!

column2: {PlayerName}? Humph, it must be you!
(Oh no, these people have found me outside the city! What should I do?)
Fight back (Fight)
Surrender
Start a fight on your own? It must be the wanted criminal {PlayerName}, take him down!
The patrol officers of Daliang City are really bad!
Wanted criminal {PlayerName}, finally caught you! Let's go, take him to the Government Office!
column3: ต้องการตัวอาชญากร {PlayerName} ในที่สุดก็จับเจ้าได้แล้ว! ไปพาเขาไปที่ศาลาว่าการกันเถอะ!

column2: Wanted criminal {PlayerName}, it would be better if you surrender voluntarily.
Hmm? This person seems to be a wanted criminal?
(Oh no, these people have found me outside the city! What should I do?)
Fight back (Fight)
Surrender
column3: ยอมแพ้

column2: He's about to attack! Brothers, don't worry about whether he is or not, take him down!
Hmph! The constables of Lin'an City are really incompetent!
Retreat first, this person is confirmed to be the wanted criminal {PlayerName}!
You really are the wanted criminal {PlayerName}, take him down!
