While passing through Crime Investigation Bureau, a disciple of Crime Investigation Bureau gave you some small gifts.
While passing through Crime Investigation Bureau, <color=#c44b0e>Luo Tianxiong</color> taught you some Immobilize EXP.
column3: ขณะเคลื่อนผ่านสำนักสืบสวน <color=#c44b0e>ลั่วเทียนเซี่ยง</color> สอนเคล็ดลับจี้จุด เพิ่มค่าประสบการณ์จี้จุดให้แก่ท่าน.

column2: While passing through Crime Investigation Bureau, <color=#c44b0e>Luo Qianxue</color> gave you some small gifts.
The Ice Prison where the demon head is imprisoned must be under this stone tower, do you want to enter the Ice Prison?
Enter the Ice Prison!
Not ready yet.
Hehehe, it's been a long time since I've seen a fresh face...
Is it the time of the year again? The coming days won't be so boring.
What's this noise, what did you do?
This is the sound of the Ice Prison door closing, it will only automatically open after <color=#097a76>five days</color>, during this time you can only be trapped here like me.
Little guy, let me see, which sect's disciple are you...
Take a sniff~
Touch~
Taste~
Pah, pah, pah, it's indeed the disciples and grand-disciples of those old Invincibles from the three sects!
Get away from me, there's not a single good person among you three sects, don't provoke me, or I'll break your neck!
Finally, I see a little guy from outside the three sects, my mood is slightly better.
Little guy, we need to get close in these few days, maybe if I'm happy, I'll teach you some skills, and you'll rise to the top in one step.
There's no such thing as Lao Motou here. I'm not going to be stuck here for several days on my own, am I?
<color=#097a76>The first day</color> has passed, and there are still four days to run away from here, I hope nothing unexpected will happen.
It's really boring here. It's only <color=#097a76>the second day</color>. How am I going to get through the following days?
Unconsciously, it's already <color=#097a76>the second day</color>, should I do something?
It seems not bad to stay like this. It's only <color=#097a76>the third day</color>. It's hard to find such a quiet place.
Finally, it's <color=#097a76>the third day</color>. This kind of life is simply unbearable for normal people.
<color=#097a76>The third day</color>... I can't help but feel a bit irritable. If this continues, I'm afraid I'll lose my sanity.
I didn't expect it's already <color=#097a76>the fourth day</color>. I've gained a lot in these few days. It's worth the trip.
It's already <color=#097a76>the fourth day</color>. Just hold on a little longer, and I won't have to suffer anymore.
After suffering in this hellish place for <color=#097a76>four days</color>, I really want to die.
Spar
column3: ประลอง

column2: Kid, my fists are itching. Come and play a few moves with me to relieve my boredom, or I can't help but twist your neck!
I'm very measured in my actions. If I kill you, there will be no fun. So you can rest assured.
Duel with Lao Motou (Stamina10)
Gang up and attack Lao Motou (Stamina10)
Think about it again
column3: คิดดูอีกครั้ง

column2: You are seriously injured and unconscious for six shichen...
I'm afraid I'll kill you with one punch. I've tried my best to restrain my power. It's not fun to fight.
All of you were knocked down by Lao Motou and unconscious for six shichen...
It's so enjoyable! I won't be bored in the next few days.
Kid, it seems that you are more eager to fight than me. You didn't disappoint me.
Chat
column3: สนทนา

column2: I used to be able to fight a million soldiers with one punch. The worldly armies were nothing but ants in my eyes.|Let me tell you a truth about life. The cruel world treats everything as dogs. Life is short, if you live for others, you will end up with nothing.|When I was your age, I was already a Passive master who dominated the east, west, south, and north. Unfortunately, I still couldn't overcome the wickedness of human nature. It shows that there is no such thing as true invincibility in the world.|Those bastards from the three religions, in order to suppress me, not only used this icy dungeon to restrain my pure yang MP, and shackled my hands and feet with black iron chains; they also used the unique method of Confucius Temple to obstruct my meridians...|I really want to know, if one day you are betrayed by your closest and trusted partner, how would you feel?|No matter how suave and compassionate you are... If you were locked up in a sunless dungeon for over a decade, you would also become something not human, not ghost.|If it weren't for my Horse roaming the martial world back then, defeating the top masters of several major sects, there would be no chance for the so-called Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple to emerge. Humph, those who borrow the name of the three religions to fish for fame!
That old baldy from the Cloud Forest Temple keeps reciting nonsense scriptures, giving me headaches and making my mind a mess, I wonder why it suddenly became quiet recently.
That old baldy from the Cloud Forest Temple keeps reciting nonsense scriptures, giving me headaches and making my mind a mess. When I escape, I will personally send him to the afterlife!

If the arrangement in this Xuanbing Dungeon is not specifically against me, it is actually an excellent place for training. Kid, it's fate that you came here, why not try the method of absorbing the cold into your body, maybe you can gain some insights.
Kid, you and I have Known each other, I will give you this knife manual as a memento.
Heavens, Archdemon Blade! Legendary swordsmanship!!!\nJust give it to me so easily? Shouldn't there be a frustrating test?
column3: สวรรค์, ดาบมารสวรรค์! วิชาดาบในตำนาน!!!\nให้กันได้ง่ายๆขนาดนั้นเลยเหรอ? ไม่ควรจะมีบททดสอบที่น่าหงุดหงิดใช่ไหม?

column2: Humph, I don't care for such mediocre martial arts!\nThe peculiarity of this martial art is that the higher the Benevolence, the lower the damage, and vice versa, the Power is quite considerable.

I am quite looking forward to seeing how you will choose after getting this knife manual, whether to put it on a high shelf and continue to play the good guy, or to become a demon who brings disaster to the country and the people, and forge an invincible path!

Back then, I was quite lenient with that old turtle Hui Yuan, otherwise how could those disciples in the Shifa Temple withstand my punches and kicks, they would have been removed from the martial world long ago.
column3: ย้อนกลับไปตอนนั้น ข้าค่อนข้างอ่อนข้อให้กับเจ้าเฒ่าเต่าฮุ่ยหยวน. ไม่เช่นนั้นเหล่าบรรดาสาวกในอารามฉีฟาจะต้านทานมือและเท้าของข้าได้อย่างไร, เจ้าพวกนั้นคงถูกสังหารจากยุทธจักรไปตั้งนานแล้ว.

column2: It's strange, I clearly remember that I won that fight, how come I talked myself into losing...
What about the indestructible golden body? What about the Golden Man Formation?\nIn front of me, it's just a matter of a few more punches and kicks.
I smell the scent of those baldies on you, let me see if Hui Yuan's disciples and grandchildren have made any progress!
column3: ข้าได้กลิ่นของเจ้าพวกหัวโล้นจากเจ้า, ขอข้าดูหน่อยเถอะว่าสาวกและลูกหลานเหลนของตาเฒ่าฮุ่ยหยวนมีความก้าวหน้าอะไรบ้าง!

column2: Still the same after all these years, what a disappointment!\nWithout me stirring up trouble outside, these martial sects are really too comfortable.

Barely decent, this is the strength that a disciple of the three religions should have.\nThe Manual that I borrowed from the Shifa Temple back then, I now return it to you, so as not to waste the hard work of those past monks.
Kid, don't look at how the Taoist Sect is now, back then they couldn't make it in the martial world, it was my soft heart that didn't let them be completely wiped out.
It's strange, I clearly remember that I won that fight, how come I talked myself into losing...
What the hell is Zhong Yangzi, what invincible Reflect skill, what world-leading Zhenwu Sword Formation, didn't they all lose to me back then.
column3: ฉงหยางสือ เจ้าเป็นบ้าอะไร! ทักษะสะท้อนกลับที่ไร้เทียมทาน, ค่ายกลดาบเจิ้นหวู่ชั้นนำของยุทธจักร ตอนนั้นไม่ใช่หรือพวกเขาล้วนพ่ายแพ้ต่อข้า.

column2: I smell the scent of those old Taoists on you, let me see if Zhong Yangzi's disciples and grandchildren have made any progress!
column3: ข้าได้กลิ่นของเจ้าเฒ่าลัทธิเต๋าจากเจ้า, ขอข้าดูหน่อยเถอะว่าสาวกและลูกหลานของ ฉงหยางสื่อ มีความก้าวหน้าอะไรบ้าง!

column2: Still the same after all these years, what a disappointment!\nWithout me stirring up trouble outside, these martial sects are really too comfortable.

Barely decent, this is the strength that a disciple of the three religions should have.\nThe Manual that I borrowed from the Taoist Sect back then, I now return it to you, so as not to waste the hard work of those masters and real people.

That old man surnamed Cai, spends his days either scheming or trying out various peculiar Pills. If it weren't for the beating I gave him back then, he probably wouldn't have had the chance to sit in the position of Confucius Temple.
It's strange, I clearly remember that I won that fight, how come I talked myself into losing...

I must admit, his methods of winning people over are quite impressive. The Four arts that follow him around, each of them has exceptional talent, comparable to the leaders of the average sects in the martial arts world.

I smell the scent of those pedantic scholars from Confucius Temple on you. Let me see what's so special about the Confucius Temple under Cai Yuanchang's leadership, which values literature over martial arts!
column3: ข้าได้กลิ่นของพวกหนอนตำราผู้อวดรู้จากวัดขงจื้อที่ตัวเจ้า ข้าขอดูหน่อยเถอะว่าวัดขงจื้อภายใต้การนำของไช่หยวนฉางมีดีอะไร จะมีวรยุทธ์อะไรนอกจากวรรณกรรม บทกวี บทกลอน!

column2: Still the same after all these years, what a disappointment!\nWithout me stirring up trouble outside, these martial sects are really too comfortable.

Barely passable, this is the strength a disciple of the three religions should have. The Manual that I borrowed from Confucius Temple back then, I now return it to you, so as not to waste the efforts of those ancient sages.
Old senior, since you are an old man in the martial arts world, have you ever heard of "Chu Kuangsheng"?
Chu Kuangsheng... It's been a long time since I heard this name.
column3: ฉู่กวงเฉิง... ไม่ได้ยินชื่อนี้มานานแล้ว

column2: Could it be that you know him, senior?
More than just knowing him, I'm very familiar with him, I know his every move.
Could it be...
I am Chu Kuangsheng, the one that all three teachings avoid!
So you are Chu Kuangsheng! Do you know Fu Yaoqin?
That hot-tempered Xiao Ya, she should be married by now.
She went to the southwest and founded Melody House, and specifically asked me to find you.
This girl hasn't given up yet, tell her not to waste her efforts. I'm old enough to be her father, and my future is uncertain. Why is she so obsessed with me?
Do you know Fu Yaoqin, elder?
That hot-tempered Xiao Ya, she should be married by now.
She went to the southwest and founded Melody House, and specifically asked me to find you.
This girl hasn't given up yet, tell her not to waste her efforts. I'm old enough to be her father, and my future is uncertain. Why is she so obsessed with me?
Little one, you're not from the three religions, why did you come into this Ice Prison? Tell me your purpose.
I came with my master to save a man named Chu Kuangsheng. Could it be that you are...
I am Chu Kuangsheng, the one that all three teachings avoid!
I'm not lucky with relationships, logically there shouldn't be anyone who wants to save me. Who is your master?
My master's name is Yan Gexing.
I didn't expect him to finally take a disciple... Is your master still in good health?
My master was once ambushed, and his Meridian was severely damaged...
Who hurt {yell}! Who was it!
My master didn't say, I don't know either.
He must have been implicated by me...
Where is your master now?
My master is outside distracting the enemies so I could sneak into the Ice Prison. I'm not sure about the situation outside.
Ah, third junior brother, you must hold on.
Rock Paper Scissors
Let me teach you a fun game. If you learn it, you can keep me company in my spare time.
The two of us will simultaneously make a gesture in each round, either "rock", "scissors", or "paper". Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, paper beats rock.
Kid, what's with that look on your face? I see a mix of disdain and boredom.
Playing such a childish game with you, it feels a bit surreal.
Childish? I was the master of this game back in the day, unbeatable. If you can beat me ten or eight rounds in a row, then you can talk big!
Let's try a round first!
I don't feel like playing right now.
What will you choose for this round?
Rock!
Scissors!
Paper!
Kid, are you going to play or not? Don't dilly-dally.
<size=250%>Rock!</size>
<size=250%>Scissors!</size>
<size=250%>Paper!</size>
It's a draw, let's go again!
Just a fluke, I don't believe you can keep winning!
I'm not playing anymore, I used to be unbeatable, but today I lost to a greenhorn like you.

Maybe you're more suited to learn this strange boxing technique than I am. Take it and study it, you might surpass me. Don't come to me for Rock Paper Scissors anymore, I'll settle for being second best.
Kid, tell me the truth, were you pinching your nose and playing this boring game with me while cursing me in various ways?
Hmph, I can't be bothered to argue with a kid like you who takes advantage and then acts innocent.
Kid, you've seen how powerful I am, haven't you!
(I'm bored anyway, should I keep playing?)
Keep playing.
column3: เล่นต่อไป

column2: Stop playing.
column3: หยุดเล่น

column2: Giving up just when you're getting into it, kids these days really lack spirit.

This flat, giant stone in front of me isn't made of ice, but it's even colder. I heard that there's a kind of cold jade found in the sea. Some martial artists mine it and practice their MP on it, which is twice the result with half the effort. Could this be it?
What do you plan to do?
Sleep for a shichen.
column3: นอนหลับหนึ่งชั่วยาม

column2: Absorb the cold air and practice!
Nothing to do.
One shichen later...
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: Before I could learn the majestic MP, I was already in paradise...
Six shichen later...
column3: หกชั่วยามต่อมา...

column2: I see!
Using this unique method to learn, it seems that the efficiency of condensing MP has only slightly improved, I wonder if there are other effects.
The internal energy has become colder...
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: Uh... Uh...
This {Lao Motou}'s eyes are red, as if he's about to lose his mind, and he's constantly charging, I don't know what he's up to.
Could it be that he intends to break the chains on his hands and feet to escape?
Stop {Lao Motou}!
Just watch the changes.
<size=200%>Break it for me!!!</size>
<size=200%>Roar!!!!!!</size>
He actually broke the chains!!!
This demon has completely lost his mind, his eyes are full of infinite killing intent when he looks at me!
The demon's breath gradually calmed down, he must have regained his sanity.
Hahahaha!
I finally escaped! I finally escaped!!!
Kid, you've had a fight with me, I won't treat you badly!\nWe'll meet again, next time we meet, have a good fight with me!
Kid, in consideration of your company these days, I won't make things difficult for you.
Humph, kid, take care of yourself!
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: A day and a night later...
Old man, you're really ruthless!
Can't let him succeed, strike first!
This demon is really hard to kill, he's invincible no matter how much he's hit!
I didn't expect... my supreme divine power would, would die in your hands...
Three Sects Demon Suppression
Demon Suppression
Go to {Shifa Temple}, {Confucius Temple}, find {Hui Yuan} and {Cai Yuanchang}, invite the heirs of the two sects to gather at {Taoist Sect}.
column3: ไปที่ {อารามฉีฟา}, {วัดขงจื๊อ}, ตามหา {ฮุ่ยหยวน} และ {ไช่หยวนฉาง}, เชิญผู้สืบทอดของทั้งสองพรรคมาพบกันที่ {ลัทธิเต๋า}.

column2: {Shifa Temple}, {Confucius Temple} have agreed to the invitation, now return to {Taoist Sect} to report to {Zhong Yangzi}.
column3: {อารามฉีฟา}, {วัดขงจื๊อ} ได้ตกลงตามคำเชิญแล้ว ตอนนี้กลับมาที่ {ลัทธิเต๋า} รายงานต่อ {ฉงหยางสื่อ}.

column2: More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.

This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
The heads of the three sects joined forces, laid out several plans, went through many twists and turns, and paid a heavy price to capture him severely injured.

Not only is this person outstanding in martial arts, but he also hides the internal strength Archives of the three sects. He is the only one in the world who knows their whereabouts. In order not to cut off the unique skills of the three sects, he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, and his life cannot be taken.
Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.

There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.

During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?

Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
Risks and opportunities coexist...

{PlayerName}, the old Taoist wants you to represent the Taoist Sect, to invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition, to determine who will be the guardian this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your personal fate.
Yes, I will definitely bring honor to the Taoist Sect and let the world know that the Taoist Sect always stands at the top of the three sects!
I already know why you are here, but in the past, the Taoist Sect always sent La Tazhang, but today you are sent here. How capable can you, a young boy, be to take on this task?

If you can take this move from the old man, the Confucius Temple will naturally send someone to the Taoist Sect; otherwise, please ask the Taoist Sect to choose another successor, and don't treat the demon suppression as a child's play!
You, as a senior leader of a sect, taking action against a junior, isn't that demeaning yourself?
This is not a child's play, how can such a weak person guard the demon head, go back and tell the head of Chongyang to change someone else.
Young man, do you really want to be so stubborn? The old man wants to see how many times you will fall before you give up!
You barely have some skills, since you have passed the old man's test, the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment.

I didn't expect that the head of Chongyang would send you to participate in the competition of the successors of the three sects this time. It must be that he is fully confident. In consideration of the past, the old man will not make things difficult for you. Go back and tell the head of Chongyang that the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment on time.
Please tell the head of the sect that the Shifa Temple will send the successor to attend the appointment on time.
So easy? It's a bit unexpected.\nDon't you want to test whether I am qualified to represent the Taoist Sect?

The old monk believes that the head of the sect will not treat the demon suppression as a child's play. If you are sent here, there must be his reason, and the old monk does not need to worry about it.
{PlayerGivenName} junior brother, I have been waiting here on behalf of the Confucius Temple.
{PlayerSurName} brother, I have been waiting here for a long time.
I am Cai Youzhi, representing the Confucius Temple, and I have been waiting here for a long time.
{PlayerSurName} senior brother, the little monk is here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
You are really slow, poor monk has been waiting for you for half a day.
You are polite, poor monk Lai Toudian, here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin.\n{PlayerName} You are new to the sect and don't understand the rules, let the old Taoist explain it to you.

{PlayerName} You represent the Taoist Sect in the battle, you are the host of this time, you need to go through three competitions, the first one is you and the successor of the Shifa Temple against the Confucius Temple; the second one is you and the Confucius Temple against the Shifa Temple; the third one is you alone against the two sects.

If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon head this year; if you lose any round in the middle, this matter will have nothing to do with our Taoist Sect, do you understand?
I understand.
I don't understand.
In that case, let's start now!
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
The little monk is here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
The disciples of the Taoist Sect are indeed as good as their reputation. This year, we will rely on {PlayerGivenName} to guard the demon.
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
The little monk is here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
{PlayerName}, you have indeed lived up to my expectations. Now you have to shoulder the responsibility of guarding that demon!
The demon is now imprisoned under the stone tower in the Ice Prison of Lin'an City Cloud Forest Temple. I will tell you how to enter the Ice Prison...
You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
I will definitely remember the teachings of the master.

column2: Request for annual tribute.
Embark on a mission.
Go to Daliang City, negotiate this year's annual tribute situation with Qi Wang at Duke Ji's manor.
Inform Wan Yan Wuzhu of the results of the annual tribute negotiation.
column3: แจ้งให้หวันหยานอู๋จูทราบถึงผลการเจรจาส่งส่วยประจำปี

column2: The marshal has agreed to the negotiation results, you can now go to Qi Wang to fulfill his promise.

Previously, Wan Yan Liang went to the Zhao Kingdom to negotiate this year's annual tribute with Qi Wang, but the results were not satisfactory to me. I appoint you as the special envoy of Yan Kingdom to negotiate with Qi Wang, and you must give me a satisfactory answer!
Yes, sir!
Traitor {PlayerName}, you betray your country for glory, how dare you come here!
Today I am a special envoy of Yan Kingdom, here to discuss important matters with Qi Wang, it's best not to spoil the atmosphere.
Seeing you, the traitor, makes me angry. If you want to go in, beat us first!
The traitor is so arrogant, let's see how Qi Wang deals with you!
You should know who you're dealing with before you strike a dog. I won't take your life today, now get lost!
What brings you to my palace now that you've changed your allegiance?
column3: อะไรนำเจ้ามาที่ตำหนักของข้า หรือเจ้าเปลี่ยนความจงรักภักดีแล้ว?

column2: What is your purpose for coming to my palace?
Today, I am here as a special envoy from the Yan Kingdom, specifically for the matter of the annual tribute.
Marshal Wan Yan is being a bit excessive, isn't he?\nJust a few days ago, an envoy was sent to negotiate this year's tribute. Why send someone again?
The Marshal said he was not satisfied with the results of your negotiations.
Do you take the agreement between the two countries as a joke?\nChanging orders from day to day, how can anyone trust you!

My purpose for this trip is to negotiate a satisfactory answer with Qi Wang. Otherwise, I won't give up. As for the rest, you can vent your dissatisfaction to the Marshal, it has nothing to do with me.
Talk? You'll have to survive first before you can negotiate with me.
{yell} Guards, seize this madman for me!
Your Highness Qi Wang, can we now have a calm and peaceful discussion?
Fine, you're tough, you call the shots.
I don't have much experience with matters like the annual tribute. I only know that the Marshal was not satisfied with the results of your previous negotiations, so you need to show some sincerity.

According to Marshal Wan Yan's initial demand for eight hundred thousand annual tributes, now the princes of various places are not willing to give a penny, and they are not willing to pay any taxes. I really can't afford such a huge annual tribute expense.
How much did you agree with Wan Yan Liang last time?
Half, four hundred thousand...
You're really good at bargaining, no wonder the Marshal is unhappy. This is like slapping him in the face.
This, this was requested by Wan Yan Liang. He promised that as long as I give him a unique martial arts book from my collection, he will guarantee to persuade Marshal Wan Yan to agree to this amount.
(So there's such a trick in it, how much annual tribute should I ask Qi Wang for?)
Eight hundred thousand annual tributes, not a penny less!
Seven hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
Six hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
Five hundred thousand annual tributes, plus a unique martial arts book.
Since you are so pressing, let's see if you can get out of the palace alive!
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Eight hundred thousand annual tributes, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
Not only do I agree to these eight hundred thousand annual tributes, but I will also give you the unique martial arts book.
How can a talent like you be willing to serve under Wan Yan Wuzhu? I would be very happy to see the day when you overthrow him.
column3: บุคคลมากพรสวรรค์เช่นเจ้าจะเต็มใจรับใช้ภายใต้หวันหยานอู๋จูได้อย่างไร? ข้าคงจะดีใจมากที่ได้เห็นวันที่เจ้าโค่นล้มเขา

column2: Since you are so pressing, let's see if you can get out of the palace alive!
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Seven hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
You are even more greedy than the previous person, wanting to have both the fish and the bear's paw. Let's see if you have the ability!
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Six hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
Although it's not much different from the previous negotiation results, why do you think you can get your hands on the manual of that unique martial arts?
Hmph, I didn't expect such a young person to have such profound skills...
Five hundred thousand annual tributes and a unique martial arts book, do you have any problems, Your Highness?
As long as your Marshal has no problem, I will reluctantly agree.
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
Prince Qi Wang, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Qi Wang?\nIf it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
Prince Qi Wang, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Qi Wang?\nIf it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
You are indeed {PlayerName}, you handled this matter beautifully, and indeed made the Marshal very satisfied!
Prince Qi Wang, our marshal has agreed to the results of our negotiation, now you can give me the peerless martial arts Manual, right?
This prince always keeps his word, unlike you barbarians who go back on your words!
{PlayerName}, have you secretly accepted benefits from Prince Qi Wang?\nIf it weren't for my vigilance and surveillance, you would have fooled me again!
You have truly disappointed me, it seems I need to retest your loyalty.
Inquire
column3: สอบถาม

column2: Here comes another one, another one!
We are all people who have fallen into the world, it's fate that we meet today.
Humph, how boring!\nHow could I, the young master, be so foolish as to mingle with you guys.
What's going on?
column3: เกิดอะไรขึ้น?

column2: Looking at you, you're probably planning to join the Shifa Temple too, why not go together, so we can look out for each other in the future.
Are all of you planning to join the Shifa Temple and become monks?
The Scripture Tower in Shifa Temple collects top-notch Manuals from all over the world, and the monks in the temple are all top-notch masters. I came here specifically to learn from them.
The flowers fall with intent, but the water flows heartlessly. My sincere heart has been shattered by the beauty, so I see through the world and come to Shifa Temple to become a monk.
A bunch of worldly people!

I am not like you, I am here to become a monk just for show, to become a nominal disciple of a master in the temple, to pray for my father for a hundred days, and then to return to the secular world to continue my adventurous life.
Young man, why don't you tell us why you want to become a monk?
Who said I want to become a monk?\nI just happened to pass by, I didn't think about becoming a monk.
I don't have time to listen to your idle talk, excuse me!
Pah, what a waste of time.
Young master, wait for me.
column3: อาจารย์น้อย รอข้าก่อน

column2: Before parting, I advise you, all beauties are skeletons, don't let the love of children and women wear away your heroism.
column3: ก่อนจากกัน ข้าแนะนำให้เจ้า, ความงามทั้งหมดทั้งมวลเป็นเพียงหนังหุ้มกระดูก, อย่าปล่อยให้ความรักของเด็กและผู้หญิงมาบั่นทอนความกล้าหาญของเจ้า

column2: These guys are really weird.
May I ask what you need from this old monk?
Request information about Shifa Temple.
Inquire about Shifa Temple's Martial Arts.
Please enlighten me, master.
<color=#0574a8>Join Shifa Temple for cultivation.
Excuse me, Run away.
column3: ขออภัย ข้าขอตัวก่อน

column2: Shifa Temple has been established for hundreds of years, it was founded by a high monk from the east. Our temple has been passed down for more than thirty generations, during which many high monks have emerged, saving countless people, it is not an exaggeration to say that we have infinite merits.

The Martial Arts of our temple are vast and varied, and are rumored by the world to be magical. In the eyes of this old monk, Martial Arts are just a means for the Buddha's Vajra to protect the Dharma, to truly save all beings, we need the subtle Dharma and compassion.

Our Scripture Tower collects hundreds of thousands of archives of classics, history, and collections. As the saying goes, reading is beneficial. There was a peerless high monk in our temple who studied in the Scripture Tower for more than ten years, and finally stepped out of the tower, achieving the Buddha's golden body in one step!

Buddhism and Passives should not be lightly passed on, nor lightly taken. Only by becoming a disciple of Shifa Temple and gaining recognition can one have the chance to comprehend the subtle Dharma and receive profound Martial Arts.
Is there anything else you want to know, donor?

Our temple's martial arts are numerous and not worth mentioning, only the Vairocana Godly Palm is said to be directly passed down from the Buddha. If used by a person with a compassionate heart, every move carries the majesty of the Buddha himself!

Although the Dharma Stick Technique, which is on par with the Vairocana Godly Palm, is named after our ancestors by later generations, it does not disgrace the achievements and reputation of our predecessors in the Passive. It can at least rank in the top three among all stick techniques in the world.

The internal skills of our temple mainly focus on refining the mind and training the Constitution, all of which are Pure Yang Skills. They are not sufficient for attacking enemies, but more than enough for self-defense.
column3: วิชากำลังภายในของวัดของเรามุ่งเน้นไปที่การขัดเกลาจิตใจและฝึกฝนพลังกายเป็นหลัก ซึ่งทั้งหมดนี้ล้วนเป็นวิทยายุทธ์หยางบริสุทธิ์. ไม่เพียงแค่ใช้ในการโจมตีศัตรู แต่ยังใช้สำหรับการป้องกันตนเองอีกด้วย

column2: Is there anything else you want to know, donor?
Benefactor, you have a compassionate and benevolent heart. I am willing to lend you a helping hand.
Half a shichen later...
column3: ครึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: Buddha saves those who are destined. As long as you have good intentions, you can become a disciple of the Buddhist sect...
Benefactor, as you are currently a disciple of another sect, I cannot accept you on my own accord. Please forgive me.
Do you have any other matters, benefactor?
Your Benevolence is lacking, benefactor. You need to do more good deeds to accumulate Benevolence before you can hope to be accepted by the Shifa Temple.
Do you have any other matters, benefactor?
There are two ways to practice in Shifa Temple: <color=#c44b0e>becoming a monk</color> and <color=#c44b0e>lay practice</color>. Which one do you choose?
Request<color=#097a76>the difference</color> between <color=#097a76>becoming a monk</color> and <color=#097a76>lay practice</color>.
Choose<color=#097a76>to become a monk</color>!
Choose<color=#097a76>lay practice</color>!
I haven't decided yet.
Amitabha, practicing in the temple is not a child's play, you should indeed think it over carefully.

Becoming a monk means officially taking the vows and becoming a true monk of Shifa Temple. You need to abide by the rules and precepts, the most important of which is <color=#c44b0e>to cut off worldly attachments, practice alone in the temple, and not leave the temple without permission</color>.
Lay practice also requires you to uphold kindness and do good deeds, but you don't need to take the vows or abandon worldly life, and you are free to come and go without restrictions.
Monks of Shifa Temple can directly enter the Scripture Tower to comprehend the Dharma; lay practitioners need to pass a test to enter.

Although monks are strictly bound by the precepts, as long as they abide by them, they will benefit immensely. Lay practitioners are relatively free, but the conditions for obtaining profound Dharma and Martial Arts will be more stringent.
Have you decided how you want to practice in the temple, benefactor?
{PlayerSurName} Benefactor, can you abstain from alcohol for the rest of your life?
I can!
I can't.
Can you abstain from stealing for the rest of your life?
Can you abstain from lust for the rest of your life?
Can you abstain from killing for the rest of your life?
If someone tries to harm me, should I defend myself? Unintentional injuries or deaths may occur in a fight, does this count as breaking the precepts?
Enough talk, just answer yes or no!
{PlayerSurName} Benefactor, your six senses are not yet pure, it is indeed not suitable for you to become a monk now.
Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} benefactor, you should go and deal with worldly matters first, there's no rush to become a monk.
column3: อมิตาพุทธ ประสก{PlayerSurName} เจ้าควรไปจัดการเรื่องทางโลกเสียก่อน ไม่จำเป็นต้องรีบเร่งที่จะบวช

column2: {PlayerName}, if you insist on becoming a monk, I will choose to run away, as if you never existed, and our friendship will be severed from then on!
Still insist on becoming a monk!
Give up becoming a monk.
{PlayerSurName} Benefactor, your six senses are not yet pure, it is indeed not suitable for you to become a monk now.
Amitabha, {PlayerSurName} benefactor, you should go and deal with worldly matters first, there's no rush to become a monk.
column3: อมิตาพุทธ ประสก{PlayerSurName} เจ้าควรไปจัดการเรื่องทางโลกเสียก่อน ไม่จำเป็นต้องรีบเร่งที่จะบวช

column2: Good, good.\n{PlayerSurName}, you and I are destined, I will personally shave your head!
Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
A moment later...

{PlayerName}, the worldly affairs are now irrelevant to you.\nAccording to the order of Pu, Hui, Hua, and Shi, you are now in the Shi generation, and I give you the Dharma name <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color>, which means to give up your original name.
You can go to the Training field to request martial arts from your second senior brother Shi Yu; go to the Scripture Tower guarded by your master Hua Yan to read the Archive.
column3: เจ้าสามารถไปที่ลานฝึกซ้อมเพื่อขอเรียนวิทยายุทธจากศิษย์พี่รองของเจ้า สือหยู; ไปที่หอพระคัมภีร์ซึ่งได้รับการคุ้มครองโดยอาจารย์ฮวาหยานของเจ้าเพื่อท่องพระคัมภีร์

column2: You must not leave the temple at will, if you want to leave the temple, you must pass my test.
<color=#c44b0e>Every day at Chen Shi, you must attend the morning class at the Hall of Great Strength, remember not to interrupt!</color>
column3: <color=#c44b0e>ทุกวันที่ Chen Shi เจ้าต้องเข้าร่วมชั้นเรียนช่วงเช้าที่หอแห่งความยิ่งใหญ่, จำไว้ห้ามมาขัดจังหวะ!</color>

column2: As a disciple of Shifa Temple, you must not do anything against benevolence, otherwise, if discovered by the law enforcement disciples, you will be severely punished according to the temple rules!
Disciple will remember the abbot's teachings.

{PlayerName}, according to the order of Pu, Hui, Hua, and Shi, you are now in the Shi generation, and I give you the Dharma name <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color>, which means to give up your original name. From now on, all the same generation disciples in Shifa Temple are your senior brothers, and you must not lose your manners.

You can go to the Training field to request martial arts from your second senior brother Shi Yu; go to the Scripture Tower guarded by your master Hua Yan to read the Archive, but you need to pass his test.
column3: เจ้าสามารถไปที่ลานฝึกซ้อมเพื่อขอเรียนวิทยายุทธจากศิษย์พี่รองของเจ้า สือหยู; ไปที่หอพระคัมภีร์ซึ่งได้รับการคุ้มครองโดยอาจารย์ฮวาหยานของเจ้าเพื่อท่องพระคัมภีร์, แต่เจ้าต้องผ่านการทดสอบของเขา

column2: You can choose whether to attend the morning class at the Hall of Great Strength every day, there is no requirement for secular disciples.
column3: เจ้าสามารถเลือกได้ว่าจะเข้าเรียนภาคเช้าที่หอแห่งความยิ่งใหญ่ทุกวันหรือไม่ก็ได้ ไม่มีข้อกำหนดสำหรับสาวกฆราวาส

column2: Although secular disciples do not have to be bound by too many precepts, it is the duty of Buddhist disciples to do good deeds, so do not do anything against heaven and reason, otherwise, you will be severely punished!
Disciple will remember the abbot's teachings.
Thank you, master, for your blessing.
Is there anything else you need, donor?
Amitabha!
As the saying goes, every cause has an effect! {PlayerSurName}, since you chose to run away from Buddhism, why bother trying again?
(She casually plucks the strings of the zither, the cold tune seems to tell you that if you insist on becoming a monk, she will run away from you, and your friendship with her will be severed.)
If you can't let go of worldly thoughts, it's better not to become a monk to avoid the trouble of returning to secular life later.
Kid, if you choose to become a monk, it will be like being in prison for a long time. You will have no connection with the outside world. Think it over!
Please stop, donor.\nThis is where the monks of our temple rest, it is not convenient for outsiders to enter, please understand.
Amitabha!
Donor, please stop!
This is a key area of our temple, non-disciples are not allowed to enter without permission!
column3: นี่คือพื้นที่สำคัญของวัดของเรา, ผู้ที่ไม่ใช่ศิษย์สำนักไม่ได้รับอนุญาตให้เข้าไปโดยไม่ได้รับอนุญาต!

column2: Secular disciples of our sect are not allowed to enter the Scripture Tower without permission!
Entering the Scripture Tower as a secular disciple requires a deduction of 100 Sect contributions.
column3: การเข้าสู่หอพระคัมภีร์ในฐานะศิษย์ฆราวาสจะต้องหัก 100 ค่าความดีความชอบสำนัก

column2: Enter (100 Sect contributions)
column3: เข้าไป (100 ค่าความดีความชอบสำนัก)

column2: Wait a bit longer
Amitabha!
Amitabha!
Scripture Tower
column3: หอพระคัมภีร์

column2: Enter the tower
Secular disciples who want to enter the Scripture Tower need to read the "Temple Rules" and reach a Trust relationship with Shifa Temple.
Master Hua Yan, I want to request a way to enter the Scripture Tower.
When you <color=#c44b0e>finish reading the "Temple Rules" and reach a Trust relationship with our temple</color>, I will allow you to enter the Scripture Tower.

Lay disciples need to <color=#c44b0e>consume 100 points of Sect contribution</color> each time they enter the Scripture Tower. Therefore, if you want to visit the Scripture Tower frequently, you need to work diligently.
column3: ศิษย์ฆราวาสจะต้อง<color=#c44b0e>ใช้ 100 ค่าของความดีความชอบสำนัก</color>ทุกครั้งที่เข้าไปในหอพระคัมภีร์ ดังนั้นหากเจ้าต้องการเยี่ยมชมหอพระคัมภีร์บ่อยๆ เจ้าต้องทำงานอย่างขยันขันแข็ง

column2: Thank you for the information, master.
You now meet the conditions to enter the Scripture Tower. You can enter the tower to read scriptures as long as you prepare the corresponding contributions each time.
After you <color=#c44b0e>have studied the "Temple rules" and your Relations with this temple reach Trust</color>, I will allow you to enter the Scripture Tower.
It seems that you can directly leap into the second or third floor of the Scripture Tower by using Qinggong from here!
Should I enter the Scripture Tower in this way? If the disciples in the tower find out, it won't be a joke.
Leap into the second floor of the Scripture Tower. <color=#097a76>Requires Qinggong 180</color>
column3: กระโดดขึ้นไปบนชั้นสองของหอพระคัมภีร์ <color=#097a76>ต้องการวิชาตัวเบา 180</color>

column2: Leap into the third floor of the Scripture Tower. <color=#097a76>Requires Qinggong 300</color>
column3: กระโดดขึ้นไปบนชั้นสามของหอพระคัมภีร์ <color=#097a76>ต้องการวิชาตัวเบา 300</color>

column2: I don't plan to try.
Oh no...
My skills are still not good enough.
Return to secular life
As a Buddhist disciple, how dare you talk about returning to secular life lightly?
If you return to secular life, it is equivalent to completely ruining the opportunity to seek truth and prove the fruit. The past merits will be lost in one day. Don't do foolish things!

Moreover, for a monk to return to secular life, he needs to go to the <color=#c44b0e>Arhat Hall</color> alone to break through the golden body bronze man array. This is a temple rule set a hundred years ago and cannot be compromised.
Amitabha, you have indeed broken through the bronze man array. It seems that your determination to return to secular life is quite firm. There is no need for me to retain you.
I am unable to focus on my Buddhist practices due to unresolved mundane matters, I hope the master can understand.
Amitabha, you are after all a person of the martial world, and the affairs of the martial world are the most difficult to resolve. I understand your predicament.
Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
{PlayerSurName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple, you can recover your original appearance.

Your hair has not yet fully grown back since you returned to secular life, and your appearance is slightly unseemly. I have a <color=#c44b0e>hair headgear</color> here, you can wear it to make up for it.
The master is always thoughtful.
Disciples of this temple who wish to return to secular life must pass through the Golden Body Bronze Man formation alone. If you are ready, you can challenge the formation at any time.
Challenge the formation!
I'll think about it.
Wait until you have the skill to pass through the Bronze Man formation, then consider returning to secular life.
You have passed the test of the Bronze Man Formation, now you can go to Abbot Hui Yuan to apply for secularization.
column3: เจ้าได้ผ่านการทดสอบค่ายกลมนุษย์ทองแดงแล้ว, ตอนนี้เจ้าสามารถไปหาเจ้าอาวาสฮุ่ยหยวนเพื่อลาสิกขากลับไปเป็นฆราวาสได้.

column2: Those who practice should never give up halfway. Although you are a secular disciple, I can't bear to see your past achievements lost overnight.
Already decided! <color=#c44b0e>(Buddha prayer beads×1)</color>
I'll think about it.
To realize one's mistakes and correct them, there is no greater virtue.
Since you insist on this, it's not appropriate for this old monk to force you.\nEveryone has their own fate, all the events today are the result of karma.
{PlayerSurName}, from today onwards, you are no longer a disciple of Shifa Temple.
Thank you, master, for your fulfillment.
{PlayerName}, as a lay disciple of Shifa Temple, although you are not bound by the Defender's rules and precepts, you will still be punished for your wrongdoings!
May I ask, senior brother, what mistake have I made to deserve punishment?
Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
You are now full of malice, with no compassion in your eyes...
You are at odds with your fellow disciples, causing many disputes...
You harm your fellow disciples, showing no restraint...
You harm your fellow disciples, showing no regard for the bond between you!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined in the Repentance room and copy the Temple rules <color=#c44b0e>five times</color> as punishment!

column2: The punishment is over, you can run away now.\nAlthough writing the precepts can help you get rid of your anger and calm your mind, I don't want to bring you here for punishment again!
You have been studying Buddhist scriptures for many years, and your understanding of Buddhism is increasing day by day.
No one knows how far your Buddhist cultivation has reached.
At this moment, you are dignified and solemn,
There seems to be a faint glow flowing around you, like pearls and gems, naturally shining.
Please stop, benefactor!
column3: ได้โปรดหยุด, ผู้มีพระคุณ

column2: This place is not open to the public, please go back, benefactor.
Junior brother, stop!
Junior brother, you are not allowed to enter the Arhat Hall without permission.
Junior brother, to enter the Arhat Hall, you need to find the second senior brother to pass the Arhat formation and get permission to enter.
Junior brother, don't be careless when you first enter the Arhat Hall, the power of the Bronze Man formation is far superior to the Arhat formation.
Thank you for your advice, senior brother. I appreciate your kindness.
Read other Scriptures.
Get up and run away.
Well, well.
This is, this is...
Lipo Lipo Di, Qiuhe Qiuhe Di, Tuoluoni Di, Nihe Luo Di, Pilini Di, Maha Jia Di, Zhen Ling Qian Di, Sopo He...
{yell}Seven Buddha Punishment Word!
I didn't expect that the real words of the Buddhist legend were hidden in a few Buddhist scriptures.
You really make me worry, don't expect me to bring you food and drink if you get locked up in such a broken place again.
I secretly roasted a chicken here when I was a monk. Can you still smell the lingering scent?
I know you don't have a habit of drinking, so I asked you to accompany me for a few drinks. So you won't be lonely, and I can have a quiet place to drink.
It's okay to make small mistakes, who hasn't been a regular here after staying in the temple for more than a decade?\nI picked a few radishes on the way here to change your taste.
If you can't copy it yourself, why don't you think of asking for help!\nYou're so stupid, you might as well kill yourself with this piece of Tofu.
Today is a rare leisure day, I came to see how embarrassed you are when you are punished to copy books.\nAlas, it's disappointing, you're still so lively, this medicine is taken for nothing.
Why were you punished this time, tell your senior brother, let me be happy.\nDon't be so stingy, at worst I'll give you a Novel to relieve your boredom, even though you can't read it.
An old lady pitied me for being too young and kindly gave me a few Chicken eggs. I brought a few, you can try to hatch them into chicks.
Considering the hard work of your senior brother, if one day I'm unlucky and get grounded, you have to bring things to see me, these are just stored here in advance.

Junior brother, you look a little pale, haven't you been resting well these days?\nI'm a prophet, I specially brought you a sleep aid, count it hundreds of times every day, I don't believe you won't be sleepy.
Eat it if you're hungry.
You are being punished here, but your martial arts must not be neglected.
If you dare to violate the temple rules again, I won't be soft on you!
Only this time, it won't happen again!
If you can't remember the precepts, read them a few more times!
You are not yet allowed to view this Scripture, please leave quickly!
{yell}Which thief dares to steal the scripture here!
If you dare to act like a rat in the scripture repository again, be careful of my fists and feet, they might hurt your life!
I dare not, I will never dare again.
Without the annoying guy, let me look carefully for any unique martial arts Manual.
Thanks to my fast running, otherwise I would have died here.
Huff... Huff...
(The Scriptures in this cabinet are in a mess, I don't know if there are any good things, do you want to search for them?)
Search the bookcase. <color=#097a76>(Consume 4 quarters)</color>
Not interested.
Half a shichen later...
column3: ครึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: This, this is the Prajna Palm Manual!!!
column3: นี่. นี่มันเคล็ดวิชาฝ่ามือปัญญา!!!

column2: This, this is the Evil Destroyer Diamond Staff Manual!!!
column3: นี่, นี่คือคัมภีร์วิชาพลองวัชระปราบมาร!!!

column2: "Little guy, there's good stuff hidden in this cabinet, you need to work hard~"\n"......Lai Toudian was here"
"Greedy little one, everything here has been taken, if you don't mind wasting time, feel free to continue"
Wasted time for nothing, didn't find anything useful.
Could it be this Manual that the junior brother is looking for?\nI've been engrossed in it these past few days and forgot to put it back in the bookcase, please forgive me.
Could it be this Manual that the junior brother is looking for?\nI've been engrossed in it these past few days and forgot to put it back in the bookcase, please forgive me.
Teaching
You can choose one of these two basic external skill Manuals to learn on your own.
Choose <color=#c44b0e>Arhat Fist Manual</color>.
Choose <color=#c44b0e>Veda Staff Manual</color>.
column3: เลือก <color=#c44b0e>ตำราพลองพระเวท</color>

column2: To learn the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Palm</color>, you must practice Arhat Fist to the eighth level at least!
column3: หากต้องการเรียนรู้วิทยายุทธขั้นสูง <color=#c44b0e>ฝ่ามือยูไล</color> เจ้าต้องฝึกฝนหมัดอรหันต์ถึงระดับที่แปดเป็นอย่างน้อย!

column2: This is the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Palm</color> Manual, cultivation depends on the individual, do not neglect your martial arts.
column3: นี่คือวิทยายุทธขั้นสูงตำรา <color=#c44b0e>ฝ่ามือยูไล</color> การฝึกฝนขึ้นอยู่กับแต่ละบุคคล อย่าละเลยวรยุทธ์ของเจ้า

column2: To learn the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten Staff</color>, you must practice Veda Staff to the eighth level at least!
column3: หากต้องการเรียนรู้วิทยายุทธขั้นสูง <color=#c44b0e>ไม้เท้ารู้แจ้ง</color> เจ้าต้องฝึกฝนพลองพระเวทถึงระดับแปดเป็นอย่างน้อย!

column2: This is the advanced martial art <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten Staff</color> Manual, cultivation depends on the individual, do not neglect your martial arts.
column3: นี่คือวิทยายุทธขั้นสูงตำรา <color=#c44b0e>ไม้เท้ารู้แจ้ง</color> การฝึกฝนขึ้นอยู่กับแต่ละบุคคล อย่าละเลยวรยุทธ์ของเจ้า

column2: Teaching

Shifa Temple's internal strength is known for its defense, which can offset some damage in battle.\nThis is the basic internal strength Manual of our temple, whether to learn or not depends on your personal Passive choice.
column3: วิชากำลังภายในของอารามฉีฟา ขึ้นชื่อในด้านการป้องกัน ซึ่งสามารถชดเชยความสามารถในการโจมตีบางส่วนในการต่อสู้ได้\nนี่คือพื้นฐานวิชากำลังภายในของอารามเรา ไม่ว่าจะเรียนรู้ได้หรือไม่นั้นขึ้นอยู่กับพลังแฝงที่เจ้ามีติดตัวมา

column2: I have a second-class internal strength Manual called "Forging Golden Body", when your <color=#c44b0e>Buddhist comprehension reaches 70</color>, I will teach it to you.
Your current Buddhist comprehension is only <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, which does not meet my requirements.
Your Buddhist comprehension has now met my requirements, this "Forging Golden Body" internal strength Manual is now yours.
What a big bell hammer! But it's better not to touch it...
Morning Bell
Morning Bell
Responsible for ringing the Big bell at Mao Shi every day in Shifa Temple.\nHas rung the bell for {TagNum:释法寺敲钟} days.
Inform the eldest senior brother that the morning bell has been rung ten times.
Junior brother, according to the rules of our temple, newcomers must ring the morning bell ten times to truly become a part of Shifa Temple.
Starting from tomorrow, you will be responsible for the <color=#c44b0e>Mao Shi bell ringing</color> for the next few days.
Just ring the bell at Mao Shi every day, once a day, ring it for <color=#c44b0e>ten days</color> to complete the task.
It's not Mao Shi yet, you can't ring the bell at will.
Do you want to start ringing the bell now? According to custom, it needs 108 times, which is a very exhausting task.
Start ringing the bell. (<color=#c44b0e>Consume 25 Stamina, 1 shichen</color>)
Not ready yet.
The bell rings 108 times, the sound gradually fades...
Finally completed the ten bell strikes, now I should be considered a true member of Shifa Temple.

Good job, good job. You've been ringing the bell for your senior brother for ten days, he should reward you well.\nHere's a copy of the "Heart Sutra" for you. As they say, reading is always beneficial. It's always good to read more scriptures in the temple.
column3: ยอดเยี่ยม, ยอดเยี่ยม. ท่านได้สั่นระฆังให้ศิษย์พี่ของท่านมาสิบวันแล้ว, เขาควรจะตอบแทนท่านเป็นอย่างดี\nนี่คือคัดลอกคัมภีร์ของ "ปรัชญาปารมิตาหฤทัยสูตร" สำหรับท่าน อย่างที่พวกเขาพูดกันว่าการท่องตำรามีประโยชน์เสมอ เป็นเรื่องดีเสมอที่จะท่องพระคัมภีร์ในพระวิหารมากขึ้น

column2: Didn't you say that newcomers have to ring the bell ten times to officially join the Shifa Temple? Why do you say it's to help you ring the bell?

Would you be willing to help me ring the bell if I didn't say that? Who can get up so early in the morning? Anyway, there are so many junior brothers, if they take turns to help me ring it, we can get through the year.
Remember, you can only ring the bell at Mao Shi every day. It takes exactly one hundred and eight rings, which is very tiring. It's best to go after you've eaten.
Senior brother, I've finally finished ringing the bell ten times. I've done what I promised you...
I want to spar with the second senior brother. I hope you won't hesitate to teach me.
This time I'll spar with you using thirty percent of my strength. Be careful!
Go ahead! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10, protagonist duels alone</color>)
column3: เข้ามาเลย! <color=#c44b0e>(ต้องการ 10 แรงกาย, ตัวละครเอกสู้คนเดียว)</color>

column2: Not ready yet.
Normal, next time I'll use more strength in our match.
If you're lazy in your regular training, you won't have enough lives to lose when you really fight someone.
This time I'll spar with you using fifty percent of my strength. Be careful!
This time I'll spar with you using seventy percent of my strength. Be careful!
Your skills are now on par with mine. This time I'll respond with all my strength!
Let's stop here. You've already surpassed me. I don't have much to teach you anymore.

Let's stop here. You've already surpassed me. I don't have much to teach you anymore. With your talent, if you can comprehend the martial arts in this manual, you will surely become even stronger, with unlimited potential.
Senior brother, you're talking a lot today. Aren't you usually very reserved?

You're progressing rapidly in martial arts, and I'm far behind. I won't have many opportunities to guide you in your training in the future, and even fewer chances to talk to you. So I might as well say a few more words today.
Hehe, if senior brother feels lonely, junior brother is always willing to keep you company.
Go away, stop making noise. Who needs your company!
Practice
Don't rush when practicing. Now build a solid foundation on the wooden dummy, so you won't be restrained when you're in a real fight.
How many wooden dummies are you planning to challenge this time?
Challenge 1! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
column3: ท้าทาย 1! <color=#c44b0e>(ต้องการ 10 แรงกาย)</color>

column2: Challenge 3! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
column3: ท้าทาย 3! <color=#c44b0e>(ต้องการ 10 แรงกาย)</color>

column2: Challenge 5! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
column3: ท้าทาย 5! <color=#c44b0e>(ต้องการ 10 แรงกาย)</color>

column2: Challenge 10! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 10</color>)
column3: ท้าทาย 10! <color=#c44b0e>(ต้องการ 10 แรงกาย)</color>

column2: Not ready yet.
Defeating one ordinary wooden dummy is nothing to brag about.
If you can't even defeat a wooden dummy, will you still be alive when you meet a real person!
Defeating a few ordinary wooden dummies is nothing to brag about.
Defeating a few wooden dummies is nothing to brag about.
These wooden dummies really need to be repaired. They can't even defeat a novice junior brother.
Break through the formation
You must break through my Arhat formation alone to qualify to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Golden Body Bronze Man formation!
Are you planning to challenge the Arhat Formation?
Prepare to challenge the Arhat Formation! (<color=#c44b0e>Requires Stamina 20</color>)
Not ready yet.
column3: ข้ายังไม่พร้อม

column2: Breaking the formation is expected, there's nothing to be proud of.\nThe Golden Body Bronze Man Formation of Shifa Temple is the foundation of the temple, its Power is extraordinary, don't be complacent.
Hmph, you're not qualified to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Golden Body Bronze Man Formation yet!
Kitchen Helper
Many new disciples have recently joined the temple, and the Kitchen is a bit overwhelmed.\nI wonder if there's any kind-hearted junior brother willing to lend a hand.
The Kitchen is running out of firewood. Could you please get me <color=#c44b0e>10 Branches</color> for cooking?
There are plenty of trees to cut down in the forest behind the temple, they will Recovery over time, so don't worry if you can't find Branches for a while.
column3: มีต้นไม้มากมายให้ตัดในป่าด้านหลังวัด ต้นไม้จะฟื้นตัวเมื่อเวลาผ่านไป ดังนั้นอย่ากังวลหากคุณหากิ่งก้านไม่พบมาระยะหนึ่งแล้ว

column2: Help Third Brother with his tasks.
Maybe another day.
Third Brother, here are the Branches you asked for.
column3: พี่สาม นี่คือกิ่งไม้ที่ท่านขอ

column2: Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Did you forget what you were supposed to do?
I want to do something different.
I don't want to help today.
Understood.
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว.

column2: Let me see what else needs to be done...
Alright, I'll do it myself today.
We're running out of Mushrooms and Fungus for the vegetarian dishes, could you help me gather <color=#c44b0e>5 Fungus and 5 Mushrooms</color>?
There are plenty of Mushrooms around the Pond and Forest Tower, and Fungus often grows on tree trunks. These two items will grow back over time, so don't worry about running out.
column3: มีเห็ดมากมายรอบๆ บ่อน้ำและวิหารป่า และเห็ดรามักจะเติบโตบนลำต้นของต้นไม้ สิ่งของทั้งสองนี้จะเพิ่มขึ้นตามกาลเวลา ดังนั้นอย่ากังวลว่าจะหมด

column2: Third Brother, here are the Mushrooms and Fungus you asked for.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Today we need to make hundreds of Steamed Buns, which will take a lot of effort and time,
Help Third Brother with his tasks. (<color=#c44b0e>Consumes 1 shichen, requires Stamina 25</color>)
Help Third Brother with his tasks. (<color=#c44b0e>Consumes 2 shichen, requires Stamina 50</color>)
Maybe another day.
One shichen later...
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: I didn't expect your cooking skills to be so good, with your help we finished making the Steamed Buns in half the time.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Two shichen later...
column3: สองชั่วยามต่อมา...

column2: Phew, finally done...
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
It would be great if you could help in the kitchen tomorrow as well.
Today I'll teach you some cooking skills, so you won't starve when you're out in the world.
Hehe, helping you in the kitchen will be easier in the future.
I should give you something in return. This cookbook is my masterpiece from when I was young, I'll give it to you today.
Why don't you make me a dish to taste instead?
There are dozens of people who have booked ahead of you, and I can only make one dish a day at most, so wait if you can.
I could make it myself in this time, who cares about your cooking.

Little junior brother, no matter what happens in the future, we've Known each other, and that's fate.\nThis cookbook of mine is as famous as the Vairocana Godly Palm of our temple in the martial arts world, I'll give it to you today as a keepsake.
Are you planning to settle your affairs?\nI'll gladly accept any other good things you have.
Being too familiar with you is not good, you're taking advantage of me, it's really funny.
Remember to be good to your senior brother, maybe one day he will need your help, don't forget to show some kindness.
Your senior brother's business is my business, no doubt about it!
Remember your promise, it's worth our brotherhood.
