column2: Three Sects Demon Suppression
Demon Suppression
Go to Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple, find Zhong Yangzi and Cai Yuanchang respectively, invite the successors of the two sects to meet at Shifa Temple.
column3: ไปที่ลัทธิเต๋าและวัดขงจื้อ, ตามหา ฉงหยางสื่อ และ ไช่หยวนฉาง ตามลำดับ, เชิญผู้สืบทอดของทั้งสองพรรคมาพบกันที่อารามฉีฟา.

column2: Taoist Sect and Confucius Temple have agreed to the appointment, now return to Shifa Temple and report to Hui Yuan.
column3: ลัทธิเต๋าและวัดขงจื๊อได้ตกลงตามคำเชิญแล้ว ตอนนี้กลับมาที่อารามฉีฟา รายงานต่อไต้ซือฮุ่ยหยวน.

column2: More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.

This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
The heads of the three sects joined forces, set up several times, after many twists and turns, paid a heavy price to capture him seriously injured.

Not only is this person outstanding in martial arts, but he also hides the internal strength Archives of the three sects. He is the only one in the world who knows their whereabouts. In order not to cut off the unique skills of the three sects, he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, and his life cannot be taken.
Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.

There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.

During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?

Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
Risks and opportunities coexist...

Shiming, I want you to represent Shifa Temple, invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition, to decide who will guard this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your own fortune.
Yes, I will definitely bring honor to Shifa Temple and let the world know that Shifa Temple always stands at the top of the three sects!
I already know why you're here, but in the past, it was always Lai Toudian from Shifa Temple who came. Today, they sent you, a young boy, how capable can you be to take on this task?

If you can take my move, Confucius Temple will naturally send someone to Shifa Temple; otherwise, please ask Shifa Temple to choose another successor, don't treat this important task as a child's play!
You, as a senior leader of a sect, taking action against a junior, isn't that demeaning yourself?
This is not a child's play, how can such a weak person guard the demon, go back and tell Hui Yuan, ask him to choose someone else.
column3: นี่ไม่ใช่การละเล่นของเด็กน้อย, คนอ่อนแอเช่นนี้จะปกป้องปีศาจได้อย่างไร, กลับไปบอกฮุ่ยหยวน และขอให้เขาส่งคนอื่นมาซะ.

column2: Young man, do you really want to be so stubborn? The old man wants to see how many times you will fall before you give up!
You barely have some skills, since you have passed the old man's test, the Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend the appointment.

I didn't expect Hui Yuan to send you to participate in the competition of the successors of the three sects this time, he must be very confident. Considering our past relationship, I won't make things difficult for you, go back and tell Hui Yuan, Confucius Temple will arrange for the successor to attend on time.
column3: ข้าไม่ได้คาดหวังว่า ฮุ่ยหยวน จะส่งเจ้ามาเข้าร่วมการแข่งขันของผู้สืบทอดของทั้งสามพรรคในครั้งนี้, เขาคงมั่นใจมาก. เมื่อคิดถึงความสัมพันธ์ในอดีตของเราแล้ว ข้าจะไม่ทำให้เรื่องมันยากอีกต่อไป กลับไปบอกฮุ่ยหยวน วัดขงจื้อจะจัดให้ผู้สืบทอดมาร่วมงานตรงเวลา.

column2: Please tell Hui Yuan that Taoist Sect will send the successor to attend on time.
column3: โปรดบอกฮุ่ยหยวนว่าลัทธิเต๋าจะส่งผู้สืบทอดไปเข้าร่วมตรงเวลา.

column2: That was easy? A bit unexpected.\nAren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Shifa Temple?
I believe Hui Yuan wouldn't treat this important task lightly, he must have his reasons for sending you here, I don't need to worry about it.
column3: ข้าเชื่อว่าฮุ่ยหยวนจะไม่ปฏิบัติต่องานสำคัญนี้อย่างขอไปที, เขาต้องมีเหตุผลในการส่งเจ้ามาที่นี่, ข้าไม่จำเป็นต้องกังวลเกี่ยวกับมันอีก.

column2: {PlayerGivenName} junior brother, I have been waiting here on behalf of the Confucius Temple.
{PlayerSurName} brother, I have been waiting here for a long time.
I am Cai Youzhi, representing the Confucius Temple, and I have been waiting here for a long time.
{PlayerSurName} senior brother, I'm here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
You're slower than a turtle, if I had known, I would have taken a nap first.
I'm La Tazhang, here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin.\n{PlayerName} You're new here, you don't understand the rules, let me explain them to you.

{PlayerName} You represent Shifa Temple, as the host, you need to go through three rounds of competition, the first round you and Taoist Sect against Confucius Temple; the second round you and Confucius Temple against Taoist Sect; the third round you alone against the two sects.
If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon this year; if you lose any round, this matter will have nothing to do with Shifa Temple, do you understand?
I understand.
I don't understand.
In that case, let's start now!
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
I'm here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
The disciples of Shifa Temple are indeed well-deserved, this year we will have to trouble {PlayerGivenName} junior brother to guard the demon.
Don't underestimate the ability of the Confucius Temple!
Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
Stop dawdling, let's get started.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
Stop dawdling, let's get started.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
The Confucius Temple stands tall among the three religions due to its literary talent, not its martial arts.
I'm here to learn from the two senior brothers.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful, senior brother.
Fists and feet have no eyes, be careful!
There's nothing to say if the skill is not as good as others...
You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
{PlayerName}, you really didn't let me down, now you have to take on the responsibility of guarding that demon!
The demon is currently imprisoned in the <color=#c44b0e>Ice Prison under the stone tower of Lin'an CityCloud Forest Temple</color>. I will tell you the method to enter the Ice Prison...
You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
I will definitely remember your teachings.
I will definitely remember your teachings.
Break through the formation
You can bring a maximum of one companion to break through the Bronze Man Formation of any level.
Yellow Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
Mysterious Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
Earth Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
Heaven Character Bronze Man Formation (<color=#097a76>Consumes 25 Stamina points, 1 shichen</color>)
Not ready yet
I can't believe I broke through the Bronze Man Formation in one go, I didn't know I was so powerful!
This is just the simplest level, there are four levels in total: Heaven, Earth, Mysterious Yellow. The Heaven Character is the famous Eighteen Golden Body Bronze Man Formation!
You have broken through the Mysterious Character Bronze Man Formation, you can now ascend to the 3rd floor of the Scripture Tower.
Hehe, what about the Mysterious Character Bronze Man Formation, it still became my sparring tool.

For the first time, you have passed the Earth Character Bronze Man Formation, the test set by the abbot for the monks. As long as your understanding of Buddhism is not bad, the abbot should allow you to leave the temple for practice.
It's a bit boring to practice with these guys pretending to be bronze men every day, I should have a chance to learn from real masters.
You defeated these eighteen golden body bronze men, and a hint of enlightenment arose in your heart.
Congratulations on receiving the blessing of the Arhat golden body, in the past hundred years, only you have received this honor!
Is there no reward for defeating the eighteen bronze men?

Congratulations on becoming the youngest secular disciple to break through the Eighteen Bronze Man Formation in nearly a hundred years. With this record, you can look down upon all heroes in the world.
The eighteen bronze men are nothing more than that, it seems that I have achieved great success and can go to fight for the first place in the world.
It seems that your skill is not enough.
Leave the Temple

Since you have broken through the Earth Character Bronze Man Formation, and your understanding of Buddhism has reached a high level, I will allow you to leave the temple for practice. You don't have to insist on morning classes in the future.
Thank you for your permission, Abbot!

Although you have broken through the Earth Character Bronze Man Formation, your understanding of Buddhism is not deep, and you cannot resist the various temptations of the secular world. When your understanding of Buddhism reaches 130, I will allow you to leave the temple. Now your understanding of Buddhism is only <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, it's still too early.
I recognize all the characters on this stone tablet when I look at them separately, but I can't understand what they mean when they are put together.
I can actually read the text on this stone tablet, it seems that the high monks of the past have incorporated their understanding of Buddhism into the Passive...
I seem to get a hint of inspiration from these predecessors, but it's elusive and indescribable.
Even a trace of remnant thought is so powerful, the strength of the high monks of the past is really not to be underestimated.
It seems that there is a scripture engraved on this stone tablet, but my understanding of Buddhism is insufficient, so I can't understand what it means.
With my current understanding of Buddhism, the content on this tablet is not difficult for me.
The text on the stone tablet is becoming more and more difficult to understand, it doesn't seem like ordinary text.
The text on this stone tablet seems to be recognized not by the naked eye, but by the heart. If I hadn't studied Buddhism for so long, I might not be able to understand the content.
column3: ข้อความบนแผ่นหินนี้ดูเหมือนจะไม่สามารถรับรู้ได้ด้วยตาเปล่า แต่รับรู้ได้ด้วยใจ หากข้าไม่ได้ศึกษาพระธรรมมาอย่างยาวนานก็คงไม่เข้าใจเนื้อหา

column2: This is just like a ghost drawing, I really don't know what these stone tablets are for.
Why does the inscription on this stone tablet seem to come alive, could it be that I'm hallucinating...
By cross-referencing the content on these four stone tablets, it seems...
I see!!!
I have already pondered the content on this stone tablet...
Commission
Junior brother, wait, I have a task for you!
Help me clean up the Forest Tower, 1000 wen each time, will you do it?
column3: ช่วยข้าทำความสะอาดวิหารป่า, ครั้งละ 1,000 อีแปะ จะทำไหม?

column2: Help me clean up the Forest Tower (<color=#c44b0e>consume 2 shichen, require Stamina35</color>).
column3: ช่วยข้าทำความสะอาดวิหารป่า (<color=#c44b0e>ใช้เวลา 2 ชั่วยาม ต้องการ 35 แรงกาย</color>)

column2: I'm busy now.
Hmph, asking you for help is a favor to you, you really don't appreciate it.
Go and do your job, don't keep me waiting.
Sigh, I owe you, consider it a contribution to the temple.
You spent 2 shichen and finally cleaned up the Forest Tower.
column3: เจ้าใช้เวลา 2 ชั่วยาม และในที่สุดก็ทำความสะอาดวิหารป่าได้

column2: I'm exhausted, I'm going to find Shi Man for my wages.
What are you waiting for, go clean up the Forest Tower!
column3: เจ้ากำลังรออะไร ไปทำความสะอาดวิหารป่าสิ!

column2: Here is the wage I promised you, don't forget to come and work tomorrow, I don't want to do such low-end physical work.
Here is the wage I promised you, don't come to me tomorrow, I'm out of money.
There's nothing for you to do today, don't hang around in front of me, it affects my mood.
I'm out of <color=#c44b0e>Stamina</color>, I can't help Shi Man anymore.
I'd better rest and eat something first.
Senior brother, wait, I have a task for you!
I'm short of money recently, as long as there is money to be made, I'll do anything.
Do you have a copy of the Temple rules?
column3: เจ้ามีคัดลอกกฎของวัดหรือไม่?

column2: I still have some left from the last punishment.
When you're free, copy the Temple rules, 50 wen per copy, I'll come often!
column3: หากเจ้าว่างๆ, ก็คัดลอกกฎของวัด, ค่าคัดลอกฉบับละ 50 อีแปะ, ไว้ข้าจะมาบ่อยๆ!

column2: This... okay...
I'm short of money recently, isn't this the Temple rules you asked me to copy last time, do you still want it?
column3: ช่วงนี้ข้าขัดสน, นี่ไม่ใช่กฎของวัดที่เจ้าขอให้ข้าคัดลอกครั้งที่แล้วหรอกหรือ, เจ้ายังต้องการอยู่ไหม?

column2: How many copies of the Temple rules do you want to buy?
column3: เจ้าต้องการซื้อกฎของวัดกี่ชุด?

column2: Buy 1 copy of the Temple rules (<color=#c44b0e>50 wen</color>).
column3: ซื้อสมุดคัดลอกกฎของวัด 1 ชุด (<color=#c44b0e>50 อีแปะ</color>).

column2: Buy 3 copies of the Temple rules (<color=#c44b0e>150 wen</color>).
column3: ซื้อสมุดคัดลอกกฎของวัด 3 ชุด (<color=#c44b0e>150 อีแปะ</color>).

column2: Buy 5 copies of the Temple rules (<color=#c44b0e>require 250 wen</color>).
column3: ซื้อสมุดคัดลอกกฎของวัด 5 ชุด (<color=#c44b0e>250 อีแปะ</color>).

column2: I haven't decided yet.
My dear junior brother, if you have a chance to make money, think of your senior brother.
My dear junior brother, you should patronize my business more.
I recognize all the characters on this stone tablet when I look at them separately, but I can't understand what they mean when they are put together.
Buddhism
Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, just reaching the initial stage of understanding Buddhism.

Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, you are no longer just staying on the surface, but starting to practice through the contemplation of truth, gradually understanding the meaning of Buddhism, this is very good.

Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, through cultivation, you can now make your mind peaceful, able to quietly face various emotions in your heart, this will be a sign of your realm improvement.

Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>. You have seen your own emptiness and realized the hypocrisy and transition of self-consciousness. You have begun to transcend yourself. It's not easy to reach this point.

Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, your understanding of truth has become clearer and more accurate, able to correctly distinguish right from wrong, good from evil, you are not far from attaining Buddha.

Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>. Now, by understanding emptiness and consciousness-only, you have freed yourself from killing and uncompassionate mindset. You are only one step away from achieving the ultimate fruit.

Your current understanding of Buddhism is <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:佛法感悟}</color>, you have far surpassed the old monk, in terms of the realm of Buddhism, you are undoubtedly the best in Shifa Temple for nearly a hundred years!
Master, something terrible has happened!\nI'm incompetent, Lao Motou has broken free and escaped.
Alas, sending you to guard this demon is to do your best and leave the rest to fate, since this is the will of heaven, it is beyond human control.
Zhong Yangzi, among the three teachings, only you know to follow the will of heaven, unlike those fools, each of them wants to go against the heavens.
column3: ฉงหยางสื่อ, ในบรรดาท่านทั้งสาม, มีเพียงท่านเท่านั้นที่รู้ว่าต้องทำตามเจตจำนงของสวรรค์, ไม่เหมือนคนโง่พวกนั้น, แต่ละคนต้องการจะฝืนสวรรค์.

column2: Chu Kuangsheng, are you here today to settle the old scores?

If it weren't for your expert Tai Chi shifting skills back then, making me hurt the enemy a thousand and self-damage eight hundred, even if I was ambushed and confused, I wouldn't have been subdued by you guys.
Today, let me see your skills again, to see if there is any difference from more than ten years ago.
(This person is not well-intentioned, should I step forward to stop him?)
Step forward!<color=#c44b0e>Main character solo</color>
Remain silent.
If you want to run wild in Taoist Sect, you have to pass me first!
Kid, I spared your life before, since you don't appreciate it, I'll take this life back.
You haven't beaten me yet, I won't allow you to offend the real person of the headmaster!
{PlayerName}, step back.\nThe grudges of more than ten years must be resolved by the old Taoist himself.
You were once the person I trusted the most...
And it was I who personally locked you in the Ice Prison.
If it weren't for me helping you break through the mysterious gate years ago, I'm afraid the position of Taoist Sect leader wouldn't have fallen to you...
The unique skills of my Taoist Sect are indeed the perfect counter to yours.
I should also thank you for not severing my Meridian limbs back then...
After all, you are a rare genius, a freak of nature. If you were to be wasted, wouldn't it be a waste of heaven's gifts?
Hmph, what a grateful Taoist Sect leader, what an Evil slayer Zhong Yangzi you are.
column3: ฮึ่มม, สมกับเป็นเจ้าลิทธิเต๋าจริงๆ, เจ้าคือผู้สังหารปีศาจ ฉงหยางสื่ออะไรกัน.

column2: The debt I owe you, let's settle it in this battle!
I will never make the foolish mistake of raising a tiger to cause trouble again, so...
{yell}Taoist Sect, you are hereby expelled!!!
I didn't expect that your skills have improved a lot over the past decade, it seems I'm having some trouble dealing with you.
Leave, old man owes you nothing.
Humph, hypocritical, old man doesn't need your favor.\nThe three religions are still irreconcilable with the old man, don't expect me to stop!
Alas, the higher the Tao, the higher the devil, this matter is not easy to end.
With the emergence of the devil, the martial arts world is likely to stir up a bloody storm again.\n{PlayerName}, the safety of the martial arts world is left to your generation to guard.
Yes!
I didn't expect you to hide your skills before, now it's a bit tricky for the old man to deal with you.
Lao Motou, surrender!
Old man is curious where this little guy gets his confidence from?

The reason I came here is to inform all of you old friends that I have returned to the martial arts world! Those who were involved in that incident back then, none of you can escape, I will settle the scores with you one by one.
Zhong Yangzi, such a good seedling has joined your Taoist Sect, the future is bleak, what a pity...
column3: ฉงหยางสื่อ, ต้นกล้าที่ดีได้เข้าร่วมลัทธิเต๋าของเจ้าแล้ว, อนาคตช่างสิ้นหวัง, น่าเสียดาย น่าเสียดายจริงๆ...

column2: With the emergence of the devil, I'm afraid there will be another bloody storm in the martial arts world.\n{PlayerName}, today I will pass on the unique skills of our sect to you. The safety of the martial arts world will be left to your generation to guard.
Yes!
Recently, the old Taoist felt a hint of fate, the Taoist Sect may face a catastrophe.
Master, something terrible has happened!\nI'm incompetent, Lao Motou has broken free and escaped.
Alas, sending you to guard this demon is to do your best and leave the rest to fate, since this is the will of heaven, it is beyond human control.
Headmaster, Lao Motou, who was locked in the ice cellar, went mad and almost broke free. I had no choice but to kill him accidentally. Please punish me.
You took advantage of his restricted movement and killed him by dishonorable means, didn't you?
If it were me, I'm afraid there would be no better way under the circumstances.
Alas, I didn't expect that Chu Kuangsheng, a generation of heroes, would end up like this...
Although this was a forced situation, it inevitably clouded your Dao heart. I will punish you to meditate in the Cave of Infinity for ten days. Do you accept?
column3: แม้ว่านี่จะเป็นสถานการณ์บังคับ แต่ก็ทำให้หัวใจเต๋าของเจ้าขุ่นมัวอย่างหลีกเลี่ยงไม่ได้ ข้าจะลงโทษเจ้าให้นั่งสมาธิในถ้ำไร้ประมาณเป็นเวลาสิบวัน เจ้ายอมรับหรือไม่?

column2: I willingly accept the punishment.
Good, law enforcement disciples, please escort {PlayerName} to the Cave of Infinity for a ten-day retreat!
column3: ดี, ผู้คุมกฎ ได้โปรดพา {PlayerName} ไปที่ถ้ำไร้ประมาณเพื่อคุมขังเป็นเวลาสิบวัน!

column2: {PlayerName}, you shall reflect here in peace.\nI will take you to run away <color=#c44b0e>ten days later</color>.
Abbot, something terrible has happened!\nI failed, and Lao Motou broke free and escaped.
This demon will surely cause great trouble once he escapes, and there will be no peace in the world.
Hui Yuan, you bald donkey, you must know why that disaster happened back then, right?\nIf I cause trouble today, you should know who to thank!
column3: ฮุ่ยหยวน, เจ้าลาโง่หัวโล้น, เจ้าต้องรู้ว่าเหตุใดภัยพิบัติครั้งนั้นจึงเกิดขึ้นใช่ไหม?\nถ้าข้าก่อปัญหาในวันนี้, เจ้าควรรู้ไว้ว่าจะขอบคุณใคร!

column2: Amitabha, Chu Kuangsheng, long time no see.
column3: อมิตาพุทธ ประสกฉู่กวงเฉิง ไม่ได้พบกันเสียนาน

column2: Old bald donkey, I've been thinking about this reunion day and night for the past ten years.
I'm sorry for your concern, I feel guilty.
Back then, your Buddha Golden Body was not yet complete, and you couldn't withstand a few punches from me. I wonder how much progress you've made compared to before?
(This Lao Motou is up to no good, should I step forward to stop him?)
Step forward!<color=#c44b0e>Main character solo</color>
Remain silent.
This is a pure land of Buddhism, how dare you, a demon, run wild here!
Kid, I spared your life before, since you don't appreciate it, I'll take this life back.
Hmph, just as I thought.
Amitabha, {PlayerName}, stop, only I can neutralize the cause and effect of this matter.
You were once the person I admired the most...
I will kill your master, who is full of thieves and prostitutes, right in front of you!
When you were young and falsely accused, it was I who vouched for you...
Everyone knew that I was framed back then, but no one stood up for me!
There were people who suggested to get rid of you once and for all, it was I who saved your life...
If I hadn't hidden the martial arts techniques of your three sects in advance, and you didn't know where to turn to, I'm afraid I would have been dead long ago.
The past grudges are too complicated to untangle, why don't you fight me and end this feud?
I will never make the foolish mistake of raising a tiger to cause trouble again, so...
{yell} You are hereby expelled from the Shifa Temple!!!
I didn't expect that your skills have improved a lot over the past decade, it seems I'm having some trouble dealing with you.
Stay, I am willing to use ten years of merit to neutralize your hostility.
Hmph, even if you were Buddha reincarnated, you couldn't neutralize the hatred I've accumulated over the years!
With the emergence of the devil, the martial arts world is likely to stir up a bloody storm again.\n{PlayerName}, the safety of the martial arts world is left to your generation to guard.
I will follow the abbot's decree.
I didn't expect you to hide your skills before, now it's a bit tricky for the old man to deal with you.
Lao Motou, surrender!
Old man is curious where this little guy gets his confidence from?

The reason I came here is to inform all of you old friends that I have returned to the martial arts world! Those who were involved in that incident back then, none of you can escape, I will settle the scores with you one by one.
Hui Yuan, such a promising talent has joined your Shifa Temple, what a pity for his bleak future...
column3: ฮุ่ยหยวน, ผู้มีพรสวรรค์ที่สดใสได้เข้าร่วมอารามฉีฟาของเจ้าแล้ว, ช่างน่าเสียดายอนาคตช่างสิ้นหวัง, น่าเสียดาย น่าเสียดายจริงๆ...

column2: With the emergence of the devil, the martial arts world is likely to be plunged into chaos again.\n{PlayerName}, this time you stepped forward and repelled the strong enemy. I am very pleased. I will pass on the unique skills of our temple to help you improve your Martial Arts!
Thank you, Abbot.
Today, my Buddha beads shattered for no reason, I'm afraid it's not a good omen.
Reporting to the Abbot, Lao Motou in the ice cellar went mad and almost broke free. I had no choice but to kill him by accident. Please punish me, Abbot.
Amitabha, you did what you had to do in a difficult situation, it must have been hard for you.
I have broken my vows and should be punished.

This big demon Chu Kuangsheng, although a generation of heroes, but his sins are monstrous. Killing him is to save him; killing one to save thousands, this is a great merit, you don't need to blame yourself.
Killing to protect life, I understand.
I have fulfilled my duty and completed the task of guarding Lao Motou, I am here to report.
Another year of peace in the martial arts world, it's a blessing in disguise.
Master, is this Lao Motou really so ferocious?
If this Lao Motou breaks free, the first one he will come to take revenge on is our Taoist Sect, which will then cause turmoil in the martial arts world and countless deaths.
This matter is over, you have made great contributions. With outstanding juniors like you in the Taoist Sect, I can rest easy.
I have fulfilled my duty and completed the task of guarding Lao Motou, I am here to report.
Good, good.
Master, this Lao Motou is now trapped in the Ice Prison and can't move a step. Is he really an evil demon who is beyond redemption?
If this Lao Motou breaks free, the first one he will come to take revenge on is our Shifa Temple, which will then cause turmoil in the martial arts world and countless deaths.
You alone have not only brought a year of peace to the martial arts world, but also indirectly saved the lives of countless martial artists and innocent people. Your merit is immeasurable.
Amitabha.
Ahead is Lin'an City, I am now carrying the marshal's military order, should I attack Lin'an City?
Attack Lin'an City!
Think thrice before you act.
Battle of Lin'an
column3: การต่อสู้ที่หลินอัน

column2: Lead the Iron Army of Yan Yun to attack Lin'an City!
Return to the Southern Invader camp of Yan Country to report.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, I've been waiting for you here for a long time.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, you have returned victorious and are exhilarated, what are your plans for the future?
I haven't thought that much, I will follow the marshal's arrangements.
Now that the world is settled, you have conquered Chu Xiang and Lin'an all by yourself, your merit is high and shocking!
If I'm not mistaken, with Wan Yan Wuzhu's nature, he will soon turn against you.
column3: หากข้าจำไม่ผิด ด้วยนิสัยของหวันหยานอู๋จู เขาจะหันมาต่อต้านเจ้าในไม่ช้า

column2: The marshal won't be so ungrateful, stop trying to scare me with your words!
Those who are not of our kind will surely have different hearts, believe it or not.\nWhether this trip to report to the Marshal is a trap or a celebration, you'd better pray for your own luck.
I have fulfilled my mission, Lin'an City has been taken!
{PlayerName}, you have worked hard, please get up.

I, the Marshal, have been waiting for you for a long time to welcome you and wash away the dust of your journey.\n{PlayerName}, you have had a hard journey, first drink this cup, I, the Marshal, will toast to you.
Drink the wine.
Refuse to drink.
Detect poison in the wine!
As expected, when the cunning rabbit dies, the hunting dog is cooked. It seems that I, {PlayerName}, am just a pawn to the Marshal.
Do you underestimate me, the Marshal?
Such a strong cup of poison, Marshal, are you afraid that I won't die thoroughly?
{PlayerName}, although I, the Marshal, appreciate your talent, your merit is too great, I have to be cautious.
Wan Yan, you are indeed insightful, the Marshal is indeed narrow-minded and cannot tolerate outsiders.
Wan Yan Liang, are you betraying me, the Marshal?
You have occupied the position of Marshal for long enough, it's time to give way to the virtuous.
Let's see if you have the ability to take the position!
Thank you, {PlayerSurName}, for your help!\nNow that Wan Yan Wuzhu is dead, I need to return to Palace Camp as soon as possible to clean up the mess, we will meet again in the future!
column3: ขอขอบคุณ {PlayerSurName} สำหรับความช่วยเหลือของท่าน!\nตอนนี้หวันหยานอู๋จูตายแล้ว ข้าต้องกลับไปที่ค่ายกองทัพหลวงโดยเร็วที่สุดเพื่อทำความสะอาดความยุ่งเหยิง แล้วเราจะพบกันใหม่ในอนาคต!

column2: The famous Yan Yun Iron Army, who would have thought that the trouble would start within, there is no good future for staying here, I might as well continue to wander the Jianghu.
If you want to kill me, let's see if you, Wan Yan Marshal, have the ability!
It's too dangerous to negotiate with a tiger, power struggles are not for me, I'd better continue to wander the Jianghu.
There's poison in this wine!
{PlayerName}, I, the Marshal, will not feel at ease with an uncontrollable person by my side, so you must die!
If there is a next life...
Good courage! Aren't you afraid that I, the Marshal, will kill the dog after the rabbit is dead?
I serve the Marshal, even if this life is given to the Marshal, the servant cannot be invincible.
Don't worry, I, the Marshal, will not do anything to harm myself!
I, the Marshal, have reported your merits to the Emperor of Yan, and the Emperor has specially decreed to reward you!
Accept the reward. (Achieve the <color=#c44b0e>Foreign Duke</color> ending).
Refuse the reward and continue to wander the Jianghu.
Such a great reward is only for you, don't be confused for a moment.
I have already decided, please persuade the Emperor to withdraw his decree.
Alright, since you are not interested, I, the Marshal, will not force you, but it's a pity for your extraordinary merits.
It's already a great honor for me to be recognized by the Marshal. Power and position are external things to me. I still want to continue to wander the Jianghu and broaden my horizons in my lifetime.
Alright, I, the Marshal, will respect your wishes.
Thank you, Marshal, for your understanding.
Marshal Wan Yan, once this cup of wine is drunk, I'm afraid even those with great abilities won't be able to stand up again, right?
Do you doubt my sincerity?
One must always be wary of others, I have heard a bit about the Marshal's character.
Marshal, you have been in this position for long enough, it's time to give way to the virtuous.
Alright, it seems you've already conspired.\nToday, let this marshal see what qualifications you have to dare to sit in this marshal's position!
What if I suspect you?\nStrike first and gain the upper hand, I won't sit and wait for death!
Your Highness Kang Wang, now that our Great Yan Nation is marching south, Undefeated!\nToday, with the lesson of Chuxiang City, do you, the small Lin'an City, also want to block the way?
column3: ฝ่าบาทคังหวัง, ตอนนี้ที่อาณาจักรหยานยิ่งใหญ่ ของเรากำลังเคลื่อนทัพลงใต้, ยังไม่ถูกทำลาย!\nวันนี้ ด้วยบทเรียนจากเมืองฉู่เซียง, ท่านจะเอาอย่างไร เมืองหลินอันเล็กๆ ต้องการขวางกั้นทางด้วยหรือไม่?

column2: {PlayerName}, this king has heard of your fame and knows your methods!\nBut no matter how great your skills are, don't think about making this king a slave of a defeated country!
You were a good person, but you chose to be a thief.\n{PlayerName}, you have disappointed this king.
Brother Wang, don't oppose {PlayerGivenName}, surrender the city.\nI will beg {PlayerGivenName} not to kill you, and from then on, you can live a life of pleasure as a prince, okay?
{yell} Shut up!
I don't have a shameless sister like you, you are not worthy to call me Brother Wang.
{PlayerName}, Brother Wang is the closest person to me, closer than you, so...
Black screen transition, the princess refreshes next to Kang Wang
column3: หน้าจอสีดำเปลี่ยนไป เจ้าหญิงรู้สึกสดชื่นอยู่ข้างๆ คังหวัง

column2: ...I can only choose to Run away from you.
Even if Brother Wang and I can't stop you, it's okay to die together, it's pretty good.
Machinery is too smart, it has cost your life.
{PlayerName}, we meet again.
Your refusal to cooperate with Marshal Wan Yan was expected.\nI didn't expect you to help Kang Wang defend this precarious Lin'an City...
column3: คาดว่าเจ้าคงปฏิเสธที่จะร่วมมือกับจอมพลหวันหยาน\nข้าไม่ได้คาดหวังให้เจ้าช่วยคังหวัง ปกป้องเมืองหลินอันที่ไม่คงทนนี้...

column2: Your Highness Kang Wang has been very kind to this sect leader, and you want this sect leader to help you attack Lin'an City, it's really a dream.
column3: ฝ่าบาทคังหวังมีเมตตากับเจ้าสำนักนี้มาก และเจ้าต้องการให้เจ้าสำนักนี้ช่วยเจ้าโจมตีเมืองหลินอัน มันเป็นความฝันจริงๆ

column2: Master Tie, what do you mean by this?
Now that this sect leader is standing in front of your Opposition, can't you see what it means?
column3: ตอนนี้เจ้าสำนักยืนอยู่ต่อหน้าปรปักษ์ของเจ้า เจ้าไม่เห็นหรอว่ามันหมายความว่าอะไร?

column2: Betrayal, the master of the Nine Factions Sect is really shameless.
Your Highness Kang Wang has been very kind to this sect leader, and you want this sect leader to help you attack Lin'an City, it's really a dream.
column3: ฝ่าบาทคังหวังมีเมตตากับเจ้าสำนักนี้มาก และเจ้าต้องการให้เจ้าสำนักนี้ช่วยเจ้าโจมตีเมืองหลินอัน มันเป็นความฝันจริงๆ

column2: Thirty years in the east of the river, thirty years in the west of the river, I didn't expect you {PlayerName} to be able to lead troops now.
However, this sect leader wants to try if this little skill can stop your shrimp soldiers and crab generals.
Who are you guys?
You're all going to die, there's no need to know so much.
{PlayerName}, do you have any last words to say?
The whole army--
{yell}<size=200%>Charge!!!
column3: {yell}<size=200%>พุ่งชน!!!

column2: Your Highness Kang Wang...
column3: ฝ่าบาทคังหวัง...

column2: Is this fate...

With the annihilation of forces such as Duke Kang's manor and the Nine Factions Sect, Lin'an City completely fell.\nIn order to facilitate the implementation of the Han policy, Yan State pacified the people after occupying Lin'an City,\nand did not carry out large-scale massacres, which was a blessing in disguise.
Lin'an City has been occupied, you can go back and report.
Are you trying to stop me? Can you stop me with your abilities!
This Taoist will personally send you on your way later!
Since you're a tiger's accomplice, it's not a pity to die.
The old monk will help you to be reborn in bliss, and cultivate good karma in the next life!
Killing to protect the way, no need to say more!
Known for a fight, specially here to send you off!
Want to attack Lin'an City, pass my level first!
Alas, it's incurable, really incurable.
Buddha said, who will go to hell if you don't?
Since you've chosen this path, Cai has nothing more to say.
On the road to the underworld, Cai doesn't mind sending you off.
You, leading the Yan army to attack Lin'an City, are my mortal enemy, Ye Yun!
You scoundrel, today you will witness the power of my dual hammers!
Surrendering to the Yan dogs makes you the enemy of Hongyu!
column3: การยอมจำนนต่อพวกสุนัขหยานทำให้เจ้ากลายเป็นศัตรูของหงหยู!

column2: Hongyu, a mere woman, will stand against you today for the sake of the people of Lin'an.
column3: หงหยู ผู้หญิงธรรมดาๆ จะยืนหยัดต่อสู้กับเจ้าในวันนี้เพื่อชาวหลินอัน.

column2: {PlayerName}, today either you die, or I perish!
I hate the Yan dogs the most, let me kill you today for satisfaction!
The poor way invites {PlayerName} to depart!
Today, the poor way will send you, the villain, on your way!
I was blind, if I had split you with a knife back then, it would have been over!
Although I'm not very capable, I'm willing to risk my life against you Yan dogs!
{PlayerName}, I won't show mercy to you!
I, the young lady, will definitely stab seven or eight transparent holes in you.
{PlayerName}, I worshipped you in vain, I didn't expect you to be so ambitious, today I will eliminate the harm for the people!
Drive out the barbarians and restore our rivers and mountains!
Known for a while, I came to send you off today.
How does it feel to be someone else's lapdog?
{PlayerName}, I swear to take your head today!
I always believe that evil cannot overcome good!
If I had known you were such a disaster, I should have eliminated you in the Lost Forest!
What's the harm in killing again in my remaining years!
Since I joined the Yan army, I knew this day would come...
If the world doesn't accept me, why should I cling to it...
When I hold great power in the future, why not have a horse ride in the world, then see who dares to disobey!
Hahahaha...

Despite the heavy price paid by the heroes of the world, they still failed to prevent Lin'an City from falling completely.\nFortunately, in order to implement the Han policy, the Yan country did not carry out a massacre after capturing Lin'an City, which is a silver lining in the misfortune.
Lin'an City has been occupied, you can go back and report.
You old, weak, sick and disabled want to block my tiger and wolf army?
The rise and fall of the world is the responsibility of every man!\nAlthough I'm weak, I will do my best to protect Lin'an City!
You better get out of the way, I don't want to make things difficult for you!
If you want to enter Lin'an City, step over my dead body!
You are stubborn, don't blame me for drawing my sword against you!
The whole army--
{yell}<size=200%>Charge!!!
column3: {yell}<size=200%>พุ่งชน!!!

column2: You old, weak, sick and disabled want to block my tiger and wolf army?
The rise and fall of the world is the responsibility of every man!\nAlthough I'm old and weak, I will do my best to protect Lin'an City!
You better get out of the way, I don't want to make things difficult for you!
If you want to enter Lin'an City, step over my dead body!
You are stubborn, don't blame me for drawing my sword against you!
I don't want to kill you...
You forced me, you forced me...

From the nobles to the common people in Lin'an City, everyone defended the city against the enemy.\nAlthough you have captured Lin'an City, it is almost empty, and it is difficult to recover the prosperity of the past...
At this point, I can only go back and report.
Lin'an
Congratulations to Brother Wan Yan for taking control of the Yan Yun Iron Army.

Would Brother {PlayerSurName} like to share the wealth with me?\nAfter the success, we will divide the world equally, I will be the supreme north of the Huai River, and you will be the king south of the Huai River!
Agree to Wan Yan Liang.
Reject Wan Yan Liang.
If such a talent cannot be used by me, then there is no need for him to exist in the world.
Are you going to do it to me?
If a person like {PlayerSurName} is working for others, I would be restless.
The Iron Army of Yan Yun has long been shattered by me, what qualifications does a small Wan Yan Liang have to share the world with me!
There should still be some residual forces of the Yan Yun Iron Army distributed everywhere, why not find them out one by one and catch them all!
Good, with the help of {PlayerSurName}, the big thing can be done!
The soldier is fast, please {PlayerSurName} personally lead a team to attack Lin'an City by horse!
Yes, sir!
Good, how is {PlayerSurName} doing?
I hope you can quickly capture Lin'an!
{PlayerSurName}, you have worked hard all the way, first drink this cup, I will toast you first.
Drink the wine rewarded by Wan Yan Liang.
Detect poison in the wine!
This wine, you dare to poison!
The ancient saying goes, those who are not of my race must have different hearts; but for me, I only believe in myself!
Go in peace, you are not the first, nor the last, and you will not be lonely in the underworld in the future.
Brother Wan Yan, this wine looks very special?
The top-notch nectar, specially prepared for {PlayerSurName} to welcome and dust off.
Since it's a nectar, it's a waste for me to drink it, let's return it to Brother Wan Yan.
Wan Yan Liang teleports to a certain position behind the protagonist, special effect 564 at the original standing position.
It seems that even you can't enjoy this nectar.
The ancient saying goes, those who are not of my race must have different hearts; but for me, I only believe in myself!
{PlayerSurName}, if you are invincible, I will be restless.
It's rare that we agree without consultation, now that you are dead, I can feel at ease.
Coronation ceremony
Go to the palace near Lin'an City to attend the coronation ceremony.
Just in time, please kneel down and listen to the imperial edict.
{PlayerGivenName}, the etiquette of monarchs and ministers cannot be abolished.
"The late emperor was in trouble, the mountains and rivers changed color, I was heartbroken and indignant..."
"I carry the blood of the late emperor, and my heart is concerned about the safety of the country. In order to continue the country, I decided to ascend the throne and change the Yuan to Jianyan..."
The coronation ceremony of the emperor is about to be held in the palace, please Marshal Ye and General {PlayerSurName} to watch the ceremony together.
Yes, sir.
Just after the crisis in Chuxiang City was resolved, Prince Kang couldn't wait to ascend the throne. Isn't he too anxious?

In terms of royal blood, military strength, and public sentiment, he was not fully confident of ascending the throne. Now the new commander of the army, who has accomplished the feat of defeating the Yan army, who can compete with him with this thunderous might?
But I didn't see Prince Kang making any effort to defend this Chuxiang City, how can it be counted as his credit?
You are inexperienced, these things can't be explained to you, you will understand in the future.
Now that Prince Kang's ascension to the throne is a trend, the urgent task is for you and me to go to the palace as soon as possible to attend the coronation ceremony and meet the new emperor.
You all have made great contributions to the dragon, and I will reward you heavily!
Qin Huizhi, astute and experienced, is appointed as the Privy Envoy.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Ye Pengju, adept in military affairs and loyal to the country, is appointed as the Pacification Commissioner and promoted to Junior Guardian.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Tong Daofu, loyal to the monarch and dedicated to his duty, is appointed as the Grand Commandant and continues to manage the Imperial City Department.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
The rest of the beloved officials will each receive their rewards!
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Kang Wang officially ascends to the throne under the witness of all officials and often resides in the traveling palace thereafter.
column3: คังหวังขึ้นสู่บัลลังก์อย่างเป็นทางการภายใต้สักขีพยานของขุนนางทุกฝ่าย และมักจะอาศัยอยู่ในพระราชวังที่กำลังเดินทางหลังจากนั้น

column2: The coronation ceremony of His Majesty is about to be held in the traveling palace, Marshal Ye is invited to attend.
Yes, sir.
Transition scene, Qin Huizhi is removed, everyone stands up, Ye Pengju returns to his original position, the protagonist stands in front of Ye.
Just after the crisis in Chuxiang City was resolved, Prince Kang couldn't wait to ascend the throne. Isn't he too anxious?

In terms of royal blood, military strength, and public sentiment, he was not fully confident of ascending the throne. Now the new commander of the army, who has accomplished the feat of defeating the Yan army, who can compete with him with this thunderous might?
But I didn't see Prince Kang making any effort to defend this Chuxiang City, how can it be counted as his credit?
You are inexperienced, these things can't be explained to you, you will understand in the future.
Now that Kang Wang's ascension to the throne is inevitable, I hope he can strive for good governance and not repeat the mistakes of his predecessor.

column2: Coronation ceremony
Go to the palace near Lin'an City to attend the coronation ceremony.
The once famous Ye Family Battalion has been without a decent figure since the death of Ye Pengju.
Lord Qin, are you bullying our Ye Family Battalion?
Hmph, I don't bother arguing with you ants.
The imperial edict is here! All generals of the Ye Family Battalion kneel to listen to the reading.
"The late emperor was in trouble, the mountains and rivers changed color, I was heartbroken and indignant..."
"I carry the blood of the late emperor, and my heart is concerned about the safety of the country. In order to continue the country, I decided to ascend the throne and change the Yuan to Jianyan..."
The coronation ceremony of His Majesty is about to be held in the traveling palace, General {PlayerSurName} is invited to attend.
Yes, sir.
Just after the crisis in Chuxiang City was resolved, Prince Kang couldn't wait to ascend the throne. Isn't he too anxious?
You all have made great contributions to the dragon, and I will reward you heavily!
Qin Huizhi, astute and experienced, is appointed as the Privy Envoy.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Tong Daofu, loyal to the monarch and dedicated to his duty, is appointed as the Grand Commandant and continues to manage the Imperial City Department.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Ye Pengju sacrificed himself for the country, his loyalty and bravery are commendable, his posthumous title is "Loyal and Martial".
The rest of the beloved officials will each receive their rewards!
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Kang Wang officially ascends to the throne under the witness of all officials and often resides in the traveling palace thereafter.
