column2: "...Ye Pengju sacrificed himself for the country, his loyalty and bravery are commendable, his posthumous title is "Loyal and Martial".
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Stop!\nWho are you and why are you trespassing the traveling palace?
I am {PlayerName}, here by the decree of His Majesty to attend the coronation ceremony.
So it's Lord {PlayerSurName}, my apologies for the offense, please enter the hall.
Stop!\nWho are you and why are you trespassing the traveling palace?
I am {PlayerName}, here to...
So it's Lord {PlayerSurName}, His Majesty is waiting for you, I apologize for the offense just now, please enter the hall.
Hey, {PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to walk into the trap yourself!
Force your way into the traveling palace!
Turn around and run away.
column3: หันหลังและจากไป

column2: All guards listen to the order, this is a rebel from the Ye Family Battalion, a criminal wanted by His Majesty, quickly arrest him!
Don't you dare move, do you want to be traitors too?
Yes!

Marshal Ye is a role model for us soldiers, your heroic deeds in the Supreme Court have won our admiration, you are the person we admire the most besides Marshal Ye, today's situation is unavoidable, since ancient times loyalty and righteousness cannot coexist...
I hope that when you meet His Majesty, you can seek justice for Marshal Ye--
The leading general commits suicide by sword, the remaining guards throw their weapons on the ground, stand aside with their hands down, and clear a path to the Palace hall for you.
No one is allowed to enter the traveling palace without being summoned by His Majesty!
Lord {PlayerSurName}, your contribution in exposing the rebels this time will be greatly rewarded by His Majesty, please enter the hall quickly.
Hey, who dares to trespass the traveling palace!
Force your way into the traveling palace!
Turn around and leave.
Assassin! Assassin!\nGuards, arrest the assassin quickly!
Yes!
You, you, if you dare to take another step forward, I will make sure you have no place to be buried!
You ignore the eunuch's yelling behind you and walk straight to the Palace hall.\nThe guards along the way are intimidated by your killing intent and dare not stop you easily.
Northern Expedition to the Central Plains
Return to the Ye Family Battalion camp to discuss the Northern Expedition with Ye Pengju.
(Received a pigeon message)
Marshal Ye wants me to hurry back to the Ye Family Battalion camp to discuss the northern expedition.\nHas this day finally come...
Recently, I obtained a Yan Army military map, which shows the locations of three Yan troops stationed in Zhongzhou.
These three troops should be the backup left by Wan Yan Wuzhu. As long as these three troops are not eliminated, Zhongzhou will always be under the control of Yan.
column3: กองทัพทั้งสามนี้ต้องเป็นกำลังสำรองที่หวันหยานอู๋จูทิ้งไว้แน่ ตราบใดที่กองทัพทั้งสามนี้ไม่ถูกกำจัด จงโจวจะอยู่ภายใต้การควบคุมของหยานตลอดไป

column2: {PlayerName}, listen to my command! I want you to immediately send troops to eliminate these three Yan troops and completely drive out the Yan Yun Iron Army.
Yes, sir!
Without the imperial edict, no troops shall be mobilized without authorization. Those who violate the order will be dealt with by military law!
It's you again? Why can't you get along with our Ye Family Battalion!
Impudent! I am in charge of the Privy Council, who are you to speak to me like this!
Ye Yun, don't be rude!
Hmph!

Now that I have learned about Yan's deployment in Zhongzhou, as long as we eliminate them in one fell swoop, Zhongzhou will no longer have any enemies. The speed of the troops is crucial, please ask the Privy Council to quickly play to the emperor, and order us to send troops to the northern expedition as soon as possible.
Marshal Ye, someone has impeached you for holding troops and intending to rebel. The emperor ordered me to personally investigate this case.
Nonsense!
Marshal Ye, the innocent will clear themselves.\nPlease stay with me in the <color=#c44b0e>Supreme Court</color> for some time, and you will naturally be proven innocent.
Lord Qin, my father is loyal and can be proven by the sun and the moon. You have been an official with him, do you believe these absurd words?
You can't judge a book by its cover, I can't make a rash judgment.
I am willing to go to the Supreme Court with my father, please allow it, Lord Qin.
Yun, don't be foolish!
Father, no matter what I want to do, you always teach me, please allow me to be willful this time and accompany you.
Alas, it's hard for you.
What a deep father-son affection, in that case, I am naturally happy to help.\nBoth of you, please be on your way.
Lord Qin, do you believe these absurd words?
You can't judge a book by its cover, I can't make a rash judgment.
Marshal Ye, please be on your way.
If you want to take my father away, defeat me first!
Nonsense, step back immediately!
Daddy, I want to go with you too!
Bottle, if you are locked up in the Supreme Court with me, who will clear my name?
Don't worry, daddy, I will definitely save you.
Marshal Ye, I will find a way to prove your innocence!
{PlayerName}, there are priorities in everything, is my innocence worth your time to prove?

I originally wanted to personally guide you in this spear technique, but it seems that I no longer have the opportunity. You can understand this Manual by yourself. If you can pass it on, it would be my good fortune.
What is written on this?
The final stroke of the Peng, Prismatic River!
Furious and indignant, leaning on the railing, the rain stops. Looking up, howling at the sky, with a passionate heart.
Thirty years of fame, dust and dirt, eight thousand miles of clouds and moon. Don't wait in vain, the youth's head is white, and it's sad!
The shame of Jingkang, not yet snowed. When will the hatred of the ministers be extinguished! Drive a long car and break through the Helan Mountain.
Eat the meat of the barbarians with a strong will, laugh and drink the blood of the Huns. Wait to clean up the old mountains and rivers, and face the sky.
{PlayerName}, without being summoned into the palace, are you going to assassinate me?
I want to vindicate Marshal Ye!
Do you not accept the verdict of the Supreme Court?
An absurd frame-up, a few testimonies full of loopholes, how can anyone be convinced!
Qin Huizhi, you know martial arts?
Heh heh, he's more than just knowing martial arts, you guys might even be old acquaintances.
{PlayerName}, can you handle my real strength?
Arrest the traitor {PlayerName}!
Your Majesty, I just want justice, don't force me to commit regicide!
What is the justice you want?
Your Majesty's golden words, to vindicate Marshal Ye, and to recover the Ye Family Battalion.
{PlayerName}, how about I appoint you as the deputy of the Privy Council? This is a high-ranking official with great power, why are you so attached to the Ye Family Battalion?
I just want Your Majesty to vindicate Marshal Ye and the Ye Family Battalion!

Alright, I was misled by treacherous words and wrongfully killed a loyal minister. From today, I will restore the honor of the Ye family, reactivate the Ye Family Battalion, and announce it to the world!
Misled by treacherous words, shouldn't this traitor be punished?
Qin Huizhi, since you are loyal to me, I need to borrow something from you for my current plan.
May I ask what Your Majesty wants to borrow?
I want to borrow your head to appease the people.
Your Majesty, I have been serving you since I was in the hidden residence, can you really bear to execute me?
If I could bear to let go of Ye Pengju back then, why can't I let go of you now?
I understand.
{PlayerName}, fight with me, if you win, I am willing to accept punishment!
I'll let you die in peace!
{yell} Ye Pengju, a life for a life, I owe you this life!
Drag Qin Huizhi's body out and behead it for public display!
Yes!
Well done, Nine Factions Sect, you dare to rebel!
Your Majesty, we Nine Factions Sect are not your disposable chamber pot, from now on Nine Factions Sect will no longer obey your orders, we will cut ties from now on.
The Qin family plotted against the loyal and good, execute them all; the Nine Factions Sect are all rebels, exterminate their nine clans!!!
{PlayerName}, are you satisfied now?
My wish has been fulfilled.
Get as far away from me as possible, I don't want to see you again!
Yes, Your Majesty!
In order to protect his own safety, the emperor had to sacrifice a pawn.
While you are speculating, you should be prepared to be abandoned at any time.
The merits and demerits of a thousand autumns will be judged by future generations, and you can only atone for your past wrong choices.
Reward according to merit
Go to the palace to meet the emperor.
(Received a pigeon message)
The emperor invited me to the palace to reward me for my merits...
{PlayerName} pays respects to Your Majesty.
All my beloved officials, please rise.
Thank Your Majesty.
Now that the world is initially settled, all of you are meritorious officials, why should I be stingy with rewards.
Tong, my beloved official, has collected evidence of crimes, arrested rebels, and made great contributions. He is appointed as the deputy privy councilor.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Qin, my beloved official, has planned and acted appropriately, promoted to the Duke of the State, and promoted to the Junior Guardian!
Thank you, Your Majesty!
{PlayerSurName}, my beloved official, judged the situation and killed his relatives for justice, which greatly comforted my heart. He is appointed as the Grand Commandant, a first-rank official!
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Congratulations to all the officials on their promotions and wealth.
Fu Yaozi, I heard that you don't care about worldly affairs. What brings you to my palace today?
column3: ฟู๋เหยาจื่อ, ข้าได้ยินมาว่าเจ้าไม่สนใจเรื่องทางโลก, อะไรทำให้เจ้ามาที่ตำหนักของข้าในวันนี้?

column2: I had a brief encounter with Ye Pengju back in the day. Now that he has died under unclear circumstances, I have come to seek the truth.
Ye Pengju amassed troops and intended to rebel. This was confirmed by his generals.
Don't try to fool me with such childish tricks.
Please answer me clearly, Mr. Qin, is it true that Ye Pengju was planning a rebellion?
Well, although the evidence is insufficient, there might be some truth to it.
You sentenced Marshal Ye, a loyal and patriotic man, to death based on mere speculation?
Fu Yaozi, this is the Palace hall, not your Linlang Temple. Don't forget your manners in front of the emperor!
Manners? Back in the day, I was on equal terms with the founding emperor. You are not qualified to lecture me on manners.
I didn't expect you to be the old ancestor that the late emperor often mentioned, who secretly protected the luck of our royal family!
I pay my respects to the old ancestor.
Your act of killing a meritorious official is against the will of heaven. I see your reign is coming to an end.
I beg for guidance from the old ancestor.
Give me an explanation for Ye Pengju's case!

I was misled by treacherous officials and wrongly killed a loyal official. Starting from today, I will restore the honor of the Ye family, reactivate the Ye Family Battalion, and announce it to the world!
Misled by treacherous words, shouldn't this traitor be punished?
{PlayerName}, since you are loyal to me, I need to borrow something from you now.
May I ask what Your Majesty wants to borrow?
I want to borrow your head to appease the people.
Your Majesty, I am loyal to you. Can you really bear to execute me?
I am helpless in the face of the current situation.
I understand.
Fu Yaozi, fight me. If you win, I am willing to accept my punishment!
As you wish!
Hmph, that's all.
When a country is about to prosper, there will be auspicious signs; when a country is about to perish, there will be evil omens.\n{PlayerName}, you should take care of yourself.
Everyone, leave. I want to be alone for a while.
Yes!
Under your leadership, the Ye Family Battalion has grown stronger and stronger, becoming the strongest army in the world.
You command the army to fight in all directions. Wherever you appear, the enemy flees.
Although you are not satisfied with the court's practices, as a subject,
Should I return to the Ye Family Battalion, carry forward Marshal Ye's spirit of loyalty, and fulfill his unfulfilled wish?
Return to Ye Family Battalion.
There are still things to be done.
All generals, listen to my command!
Old man, what's bothering you that you're sighing here?
I'm nearly sixty, and my lifelong wish is to study in this Confucius Temple. Unfortunately, I've been turned away more than a dozen times.
This Confucius Temple is not a wall of steel, is it that hard to get in?
You'll know when you try.
Now you know how tough it is, right? This Confucius Temple has strict rules, and only graduates or famous scholars are allowed in.
How can I get a graduate degree?

It's not easy to become a scholar. First, you need to pass the test of the old scholar in the Dragon Library in Chuxiang City, then go to the Chuxiang City Government Office to take the preliminary examination and become a "scholar".
column3: มันไม่ใช่เรื่องง่ายเลยที่จะเป็นนักปราชญ์. ก่อนอื่น, เจ้าต้องผ่านการทดสอบของบัณฑิตเก่าในห้องสมุดมังกรในเมืองฉู่เซียงก่อน จากนั้นไปที่ศาลาว่าการเมืองฉู่เซียงเพื่อทำการทดสอบเบื้องต้นและกลายเป็น "นักปราชญ์"

column2: With the Scholar title, you can then go to the Daliang City Imperial School to pass the test of the schoolmaster, and then to the Daliang Government Office to take the provincial examination. Only those with excellent results can become a "graduate"!
column3: ด้วยตำแหน่งนักวิชาการ คุณสามารถไปที่สำนักบัณฑิตหลวงเมืองต้าเหลียงเพื่อผ่านการทดสอบของผู้อำนวยการโรงเรียน จากนั้นไปที่ศาลาว่าการเมืองต้าเหลียงเพื่อทำการสอบประจำจังหวัด เฉพาะผู้ที่มีผลงานดีเยี่ยมเท่านั้นจึงจะสามารถเป็น "บัณฑิต" ได้!

column2: May I ask what your current status is, old man?
Don't underestimate me just because I'm a scholar. When it comes to learning, I'm no less than those pedants who open schools to teach.
column3: อย่าดูถูกข้าเพียงเพราะข้าเป็นปราชญ์ ในเรื่องการเรียนรู้ ข้าก็ไม่ด้อยไปกว่าพวกบัณฑิตหนอนตำราที่เปิดสำนักฝึกสอน

column2: Nearly sixty years old and still haven't passed the imperial examination... If Confucius Temple really lets you in, its reputation would be ruined.
column3: อายุเกือบหกสิบปีแล้วและยังไม่ผ่านสอบบัณฑิตหลวง... หากวัดขงจื้อยอมให้เจ้าเข้าไปจริงๆ ชื่อเสียงของวัดขงจื้อจะถูกทำลาย

column2: What a sin, what a sin......\nThe reckless man acts without considering the consequences, Confucius Temple will not let you off easily.

{PlayerSurName}Young friend {Fame} is well-known far and wide, who doesn't know about you now? {PlayerSurName}If you can make a name for yourself in {Confucius Temple} in the future, please put in a good word for this old man, I would be eternally grateful.
Could it be that you are the reincarnation of the God of Literature?\nIf not, how could you have easily achieved the title of scholar at such a young age!
The waves behind drive on those before, new people replace the old in the world of affairs.
This Confucius Temple, which once witnessed the rise and fall of the literary world, no longer exists. What's the point of my living...
I've passed the imperial examination, I've passed the imperial examination!
column3: ข้าต้องผ่านการสอบบัณฑิตหลวง, ข้าต้องผ่านการสอบบัณฑิตหลวง

column2: I am a successful candidate in the imperial examination, who dares to stop me!
column3: ข้าเป็นผู้สมัครที่ประสบความสำเร็จในการสอบบัณฑิตหลวง ใครกล้าหยุดข้า!

column2: Hahaha, I've passed the imperial examination, I've passed the imperial examination!
column3: ฮ่าฮ่า, ข้าต้องผ่านการสอบบัณฑิตหลวง, ข้าต้องผ่านการสอบบัณฑิตหลวง

column2: Hit! Hit!
Confucius Temple, I have arrived today!
I have endured for decades, and finally got what I wished for.
What a Confucius Temple, monopolizing the literary world...
Decades of cold and heat, all for today...
{yell} Damn the Confucius Temple!
Old man, watch your mouth!
Seek medical help
Treatment
Find someone who understands Medical to treat the elderly in Daliang City with leg and foot problems.
Give the medicine to the old man with mobility difficulties.
Young man, I'm having trouble moving, could you help me with something?
What do you need help with, sir?
I've been suffering from a leg disease for many years, and it's unbearable when it's damp and cold. \nCould you please find a highly skilled doctor in Medical for me?
Haven't you sought treatment from the doctors in the Clinic House in this city?
column3: เจ้าไม่ได้ไปรับการรักษาจากหมอที่โรงหมอในเมืองนี้เหรอ?

column2: These doctors always say they have a parental heart for their patients, but do you think they would save a poor person without a penny? I've spent all my savings on treating my leg disease over the years, and I can't afford to pay a penny more.
So, even if I find a doctor for you, you definitely can't afford the consultation fee, right?
Yes, that's right...
You're in luck, I happen to be proficient in Medical, I'll examine you first.

The combination of wind, cold, and dampness leads to arthralgia syndrome. If the wind is dominant, it's moving arthralgia; if the cold is dominant, it's painful arthralgia; if the dampness is dominant, it's fixed arthralgia.
Sir, you have a combination of wind, dampness, and cold. To be honest, it's a miracle that you've held on until now.
Your disease has reached an incurable stage, even if I do my best, I can only help you to unblock your blood vessels and temporarily relieve the pain.
I didn't expect you to be so young and yet you described my condition accurately. Even if you can alleviate a bit of my pain, I would be very grateful.
(Healing the old man's disease is quite laborious and time-consuming, do you want to help?)
Treat the old man! (Consume 2 shichen, Stamina 100)
Wait a moment.
Young man, you should finish what you've started, I'll be waiting for you here.
Can you treat me now?
Sir, how do you feel now?
It's indeed much more comfortable, it feels like my body is much lighter, and it's not so painful anymore.
The little miracle doctor really has a magic touch in Regenerate, but about the consultation fee...
It's a small effort, I never expected your consultation fee anyway.
I have nothing to repay you with, this little trinket is of no use to me, I'll give it to you.
And this jade bamboo, I'll give it to you as well, this thing should be useful to you.
"Benevolence" inscripted jade bamboo! How did you get it?
Cannot say, cannot say.

The combination of wind, cold, and dampness leads to arthralgia syndrome. If the wind is dominant, it's moving arthralgia; if the cold is dominant, it's painful arthralgia; if the dampness is dominant, it's fixed arthralgia.

{PlayerGivenName}, this old man has wind, dampness, and cold all at once, his disease is incurable, even if I try to save him, at most I can only dredge his blood vessels and temporarily relieve his pain.
Please Qu Wangyou to save him. (Consume 1 shichen)
Wait a moment.
Old man, bear with the pain, I will heal you, it can alleviate the pain.
What can a little girl like you do, how dare you boast.
Old man, rest assured, Miss Wangyou's medical skills are not comparable to those of ordinary doctors.
Alright, let's treat a dead horse as if it were alive.
One shichen later...
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: Sir, how do you feel now?
It's indeed much more comfortable, it feels like my body is much lighter, and it's not so painful anymore.
The little girl is really a reincarnation of Hua Tuo, a miraculous hand regenerates, but this consultation fee...
It's a small effort, I never expected your consultation fee anyway.
I have nothing to repay you with, this little trinket is of no use to me, I'll give it to you.
Alas, this is not easy to handle, let me think about it.
I'll wait here for your good news.
There is an old man in the city who is suffering from a leg disease and can't move around. Could you please make a house call to help him out?
You're talking about the old man in the wheelchair, right? No need to bother with a visit, I know his condition and how to treat it.
If that's the case, please tell me how to treat him, so that the old man doesn't have to suffer every day.
He has damp cold in his legs, it's impossible to cure, he can only rely on medicine to relieve the pain, and it takes at least ten days to see some effect.
I heard that the old man doesn't have much money, this medicine costs at least twenty guan, are you going to pay for him?
Pay twenty guan for the medicine (need 20000 wen)
Wait a moment.
If you don't have money, don't pretend to be a hero, be careful not to lose your capital.
Have you got the money? That old man is lucky to have met you, a fool.
That old man is lucky to have met you, a fool.
Old man, I've got the medicine for your disease.
Now I don't have to suffer anymore, but this medicine must not be cheap.
Consider this medicine a gift to you, I hope it works.
I have nothing to repay you with, this little trinket is of no use to me, I'll give it to you.

The combination of wind, cold, and dampness leads to arthralgia syndrome. If the wind is dominant, it's moving arthralgia; if the cold is dominant, it's painful arthralgia; if the dampness is dominant, it's fixed arthralgia.

This old brother has all three conditions of wind, dampness, and cold, and his disease has reached an incurable stage. My medical skills are limited, I can only temporarily alleviate his pain and cannot cure him.
Please ask the old man to save him. (Consume 1 shichen)
Wait a moment.
column3: รอสักครู่

column2: Old brother, bear with the pain, I will heal you right now, it can alleviate the pain.
Well, you can just treat a dead horse as a live horse doctor.
One shichen later...
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

column2: Old brother, how do you feel?
It's indeed much more comfortable, it feels like my body is much lighter, and it's not so painful anymore.
Old brother, you are really skilled, but this medical fee...
Saving lives and healing the wounded is the duty of a doctor. Since we met, it's fate, I won't charge for this consultation.
It would be great if there were more doctors like you who are compassionate.
I guessed you would come back, you came for this piece of jade bamboo, right?
Indeed it's with the old man, I wonder if you could give it to me, it's very important to me.
Half of my life was saved by you, this little thing is nothing, why not give it to you, take it!
Thank you, old man.
Good deeds will be rewarded, good deeds will be rewarded~
Eliminate violence and help the weak
column3: ขจัดความรุนแรงและช่วยเหลือผู้อ่อนแอ

column2: Punish
Go to the market to find the two young men who attacked the boxer.
The problem has been solved, reply to the boxer.
What happened to you, you seem to be seriously injured?
Oh, don't mention it, I'm the head of a school, and I was just attacked by two young men.

These two young men came to admire my name, insisted on asking me for advice, we agreed to be friends through martial arts, and stop when we touch, I saw that they were young, and didn't want to hurt these youngsters, so I planned to play with them with one hand.

I didn't expect these young people to have no respect for their elders, resorting to sneak attacks in a two-on-one fight. I can tell they are trained fighters, not weak at all, just not well-known yet. They plan to make a name for themselves by defeating me.
What can I do for you?

Before they start spreading rumors and slandering me, find them and make these young people realize their mistakes. People in the martial arts world should value peace and not resort to such tricks. Attacking two-on-one and using sneak attacks is simply against the martial arts code!
Daliang City is so big, where should I look for them? Any clues?

They seemed to be heading towards the Market. You must stop them as soon as possible. It's not just about preserving my personal dignity, but also about purifying the martial arts world. We can't let young people develop a mentality of getting something for nothing.
Young man, the future of the martial arts world depends on you!
Young man, just teach those two disrespectful young men a lesson, don't be too harsh. We martial artists must win people over with virtue.
The two young men who attacked you have received their deserved punishment. They won't do anything against the martial arts code again.
I've finally saved face.
With them as an example, the martial arts world will surely improve. Nowadays, not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry can open a martial arts school and take on disciples.

Young man, I see you are tall and slender, with long limbs and extraordinary bones. Are you interested in joining my Lightning Thunderbolt Sect? I guarantee you will learn our unique martial arts. Would you consider it?
No need to consider, I'm not interested.
Ah, it's a pity to lose such a talent, truly a regret in life...
<size=150%>Four ounces...
<size=200%>...can move a thousand pounds!!!
This Manual is the treasure of my sect. Since we've met, it's fate. I'll give it to you, young man.
I'll also give you this jade bamboo. I'm sure it will be of some use.
"Righteous" inscripted jade bamboo!
Young man, take care of yourself in the future.
Are we really going to wait here until dawn? Why don't we find a place to take a nap and come back when it's light?
Real estate is precious in big cities. If you don't grab a good spot early, this place will be taken by others tomorrow morning!

You said that as long as we come to the city and defeat one or two powerful people, we can open a martial arts school and make money, then we can eat and drink well. We even beat the master of the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect, but we haven't seen any benefits yet.

That's why we need to strike while the iron is hot and promote ourselves in crowded places. Otherwise, who would know about our skills? Only when we become famous will people come to us willingly and pay to learn from us.
You say what to do, I'll follow your lead!
(It seems they are the ones who gain fame by sneak attacking others and disregarding the martial arts code.)
Step in and stop the two (trigger fight).
Let them go.
Are you two the scum of the martial arts world who gain fame by sneak attacking others?
Fists and feet have no eyes, victory or defeat depends on one's own ability, there's no such thing as sneak attacks.
We brothers just borrowed his fame for a bit, he won't lose a piece of meat, maybe he can even gain some fame along with us.
The values of young people nowadays are really worrying. It seems necessary to teach them a lesson personally.
You're not here to snatch this feng shui treasure land too, are you? My brothers and I have claimed this place, you should look elsewhere.
I'm tired of talking to you guys, let's just use fists to educate you.
Spare us, good man. We didn't know the rules. We'll clear out for you, this place is yours now.
column3: ไว้ชีวิตพวกเรา นะท่านคนดี, พวกเราไม่รู้กฎ, เราจะหลบทางให้ท่าน สถานที่นี้เป็นของท่านแล้ว

column2: Who wants this crappy place? I'm here to reason with you on behalf of the fist masters you ambushed.
Young man, harmony is precious in the martial world. Don't be aggressive and reckless. Uphold martial ethics, don't ambush, don't gang up, and don't use others' fame to boost your own...
You guys need to reflect on this. Stay grounded, don't be impatient for quick success, and don't make such cunning moves in the future!
What you said makes sense, we will definitely remember it!
Today, let's talk about how we cracked the secret technique of the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect, and how we knocked down a martial arts grandmaster twice in a few moves.
Good!|And then?|Impressive!|Hahahaha!
(The face of the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect's leader is really lost today, should I stop these two guys?)
Step in and stop the two (trigger fight).
Let them go.
Are you two the scum of the martial arts world who gain fame by sneak attacking others?
Fists and feet have no eyes, victory or defeat depends on one's own ability, there's no such thing as sneak attacks.
We brothers just borrowed his fame for a bit, he won't lose a piece of meat, maybe he can even gain some fame along with us.
Beat him up!|What are you dawdling for?|Haha!
The values of young people nowadays are really worrying. It seems necessary to teach them a lesson personally.
You're not here to snatch this feng shui treasure land too, are you? My brothers and I have claimed this place, you should look elsewhere.
I'm tired of talking to you guys, let's just use fists to educate you.
Hey, I was enjoying the story, what are you messing around for, looking for death!
Haha!|Well done!|Always bragging!|So miserable, but very funny!
Can't afford to provoke, can't afford to provoke.
Spare us, good man. We didn't know the rules. We'll clear out for you, this place is yours now.
column3: ไว้ชีวิตพวกเรา นะท่านคนดี, พวกเราไม่รู้กฎ, เราจะหลบทางให้ท่าน สถานที่นี้เป็นของท่านแล้ว

column2: Who wants this crappy place? I'm here to reason with you on behalf of the fist masters you ambushed.
Young man, harmony is precious in the martial world. Don't be aggressive and reckless. Uphold martial ethics, don't ambush, don't gang up, and don't use others' fame to boost your own...
You guys need to reflect on this. Stay grounded, don't be impatient for quick success, and don't make such cunning moves in the future!
What you said makes sense, we will definitely remember it!
Scene transition, the two disappear.
They're gone!|Boring!|That's it?|Huh?
Young man, have you changed your mind and want to join the Lightning Thunderbolt Sect?
I'm looking for another piece of bamboo with inscriptions. If you have any clues, I hope you can enlighten me.
Since you came all the way to find me, I can't let you leave empty-handed. Here's a little something for you.
Thank you for your generosity.
Take care of yourself, young man~
Kid, I lost one of my straw sandals. Go find it for me.
Why do you ask me to pick it up among so many people?
Only you are willing to talk to me, can't you see everyone else is avoiding me?
It seems that the shoe was lost near this <color=#c44b0e>bridge</color>, you'll have to find it yourself.
Where are my straw shoes?
Hmm, hmm, this is the smell, it seems you have found my straw sandal.
Since the shoes have been found, I'll take my leave.
I just lost another straw sandal, go find it again.
I just picked up one, how did you lose another one?
People have two feet, what's so strange about losing two sandals? Hurry up and go! The <color=#c44b0e>Baoguo Temple</color> is crowded, they shouldn't step on my sandal.
Finally, my precious straw sandal is back, it's really killing me.
You can get intimate with your straw shoes after I leave, can I go now?
What a pity, what a pity, my straw sandals are so unfortunate, they can never be reunited. One comes back, the other is lost again. I have to trouble you to find it again.
You're deliberately messing with me, who has the time to find your tattered shoes!
Oh dear, ever since the old man wandered in front of <color=#c44b0e>Duke Ji's manor</color>, his feet have been cold. I don't know when he lost it.
They say practice makes perfect, your eye for details can't escape the old man's straw shoes.
Please spare me, if I do this boring thing again, I will collapse.
Oh dear, another shoe is missing, what should I do?
The mountain is nine ren high, but the work is one basket short. If it weren't for being chased by a mad dog at the door of the <color=#c44b0e>inn</color>, this shoe wouldn't have been lost.
Hey, where are you going?
I've delivered your straw shoes, find someone else if you lose them again.
Even though you are unwilling, you still picked up shoes for the old man four times, how can the old man continue to trouble you with such sincerity.
This little thing is a thank you gift for helping the old man pick up shoes.
And this jade bamboo, I'll give it to you too, this thing should be a bit useful.
So it's the "Propriety" inscripted jade bamboo, it's actually on you?
In ancient times, Zhang Liang gave shoes, now the young man picks up straw shoes, wonderful, wonderful.
The old man doesn't have any straw shoes for you to pick up now, your dragon-slaying technique is useless here.
Can the old man request to know the news of the inscripted jade bamboo?
The old man has been waiting for you to come and get it, if you come a little later, the old man will throw it out like a lost straw shoe, and you will have to turn over Daliang City to find it.
The old man can finally go home and rest.
(Pointed to a piece of paper in front of him)
"Solve five riddles, enjoy free food"
Are you ready to solve the riddles now?
Start answering.
Not free for now.
(Waved his hand, let him come another day)
(Shook his head, indicating that he couldn't guess the riddle today)
(Nodded slightly, handed over a delicate snack)
(Handed you something else)
This is...
May I ask if the old woman knows the whereabouts of the jade bamboo?
(Looked at you with a meaningful look, then handed out an object)
This is...
Brother, I have an urgent matter to run away, can you help me look after the business?
Agree to help.
Not convenient for now.
No problem helping, but how should I look after the business?
It's simple, you just need to remember the prices of these fruits, and when customers come to buy, sell them at the prices I told you.
If you get the price wrong and sell at a loss, you have to pay me; if you sell high, beware of customers making trouble and smashing the stall!
Don't worry, just tell me the prices of these fruits.
You must remember!
Apples are 9 wen per catty...
Lychees are 24 wen per catty...
Sweet melons are 50 wen per catty...
Did you remember all that?
I remembered!
I didn't remember.
column3: ขำจำไม่ได้เลย

column2: I'll leave this stall to you, I'll be back in a while.
Don't worry, I definitely won't smash your sign.
Give me <color=#c44b0e>five catties of apples</color>, calculate how much it costs.
45 wen.
column3: 45 อีแปะ

column2: 54 wen (small price increase).
column3: 54 อีแปะ (ขึ้นราคาเล็กน้อย)

column2: 72 wen (large price increase).
column3: 72 อีแปะ (ขึ้นราคาอย่างมาก)

column2: The money is well received, if it's delicious, come back to buy next time.
A moment later...
column3: สักครู่ต่อมา...

column2: Shopkeeper, how do you sell these lychees?
column3: เถ้าแก่ ลิ้นจี่นี่ขายยังไง?

column2: 24 copper coins per catty
30 copper coins per catty (slight price increase)
40 copper coins per catty (significant price increase)
It's so cheap, give me ten catties.
Well, the expensive ones must be tastier than the cheap ones. Let's start with ten catties.
The lychees this year are much more expensive than before, almost unaffordable.\nLet's start with a little, give me ten catties, just to taste it.
A moment later...
column3: สักครู่ต่อมา...

column2: Brother, how much is this melon per catty?
50 copper coins per catty
100 copper coins per catty (significant price increase)
200 copper coins per catty (huge price increase)
Others sell for 50 copper coins per catty, you also sell for 50 copper coins per catty, what's different about your melon?
There's no difference, I'm just a stall keeper. The price is set by the stall owner, not a penny more or less.
Anyway, buying from anyone is the same, I'll buy twenty catties from you!
Brother, can this melon cure all diseases when eaten?
No.
Can it prolong life?
I haven't tried.
So what's the use of eating this melon?
Quench thirst, fill stomach.
I'll try your 100 copper coins per catty melon to see what's different from others. Give me twenty catties, I'll improve my meal today and have a full melon feast.
Is the skin of your melon made of gold, or are the melon seeds made of gold?
Look around, where can you find melons now? Nowadays everything is expensive due to the chaos. If you think it's expensive, I think it's expensive too.
Alright, pick one for me.
Okay~
column3: ตกลง~

column2: Picking and choosing...
How about this one, it's big and fat?
Is this melon ripe?
As a fruit seller, how can I sell you unripe melons?
Are you sure this melon is ripe?
Are you deliberately picking a fight? Take it or leave it!
What if it's not ripe?
Well, if it's not ripe, I'll eat it myself, are you satisfied now?
That's it, let's settle the bill.
Twenty catties, a total of 4000 copper coins, thank you for your patronage.
4000 copper coins for a melon, are you robbing me!
(This guy is obviously picking a fight, what should I do?)
Don't think about running away without buying a melon!
No more melons for sale, drive away the passerby.
Wow, there's never been a tough nut to crack on this street, but today I've seen it all.
Brothers, smash his stall for me!
Forcing a sale, huh!
You dare to smash my stall!
Brother, I was wrong, can't I buy this melon?
You've smashed my stall, it's not something that can be settled with 4000 copper coins.

I'll compensate, I'll compensate all, I'll never dare to buy melons here again. I've only heard that buying Western Region cakes can bankrupt a family, I didn't expect that buying melons would end up the same way.
Boo hoo hoo hoo hoo
You want to drive me away, huh...
You dare to smash my stall!
Someone's beating people, someone's beating people
Boo hoo hoo hoo hoo
A moment later...
{yell} My melon stall, who smashed my melon stall!
Just now a troublemaker came, but I've already driven him away.\nI'll compensate you for the loss of the stall, after all, I didn't take good care of it.
The stall lost 8000 copper coins, sold five catties of apples, ten catties of lychees...\nA total of 8285 copper coins.
Thank you for your hard work, it seems everything is still normal.
You're finally back, let's hand over quickly, I still have to continue my journey in the martial arts world.
Well, sold five catties of apples, ten catties of lychees, twenty catties of melons...\nA total of 1285 copper coins.
(It seems like I've made quite a bit of money, I really have a knack for business.)
I can't let you help for nothing, I have an Appliance here that doesn't look like much, but you've traveled more than me, it will be more valuable in your hands.
I'll gladly accept it.
Alright, here's the money for the goods, we're even now.
I can't let you help for nothing, I have an Appliance here that doesn't look like much, but you've traveled more than me, it will be more valuable in your hands.
I'll gladly accept it.
I suppose you're looking for this item, I'll give it to you as well.
You're here for the jade bamboo, aren't you? Dream on, with your opportunistic business tactics, you don't deserve this jade bamboo, don't even think about entering the Confucius Temple.
I've guessed your intention, take this jade bamboo.
Thank you.
I didn't expect this person to have a "Benevolence" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
I didn't expect this person to have a "Righteous" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
I didn't expect this person to have a "Propriety" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
I didn't expect this person to have a "Wisdom" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
I didn't expect this person to have a "Trustworthy" inscripted jade bamboo, I wonder if there will be any adverse consequences for obtaining the jade bamboo in this way.
Exterminate
Our Tomb Raider Sect may not be a famous sect, but it's not something you can destroy as you wish!
column3: สำนักปล้นสุสานของเราอาจไม่ใช่สำนักที่มีชื่อเสียง แต่ไม่ใช่สิ่งที่เจ้าจะทำลายได้ตามที่เจ้าต้องการ!

column2: Exterminate the Tomb Raider Sect.<color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight directly)</color>
column3: กำจัดสำนักปล้นสุสาน.<color=#c44b0e>(เริ่มการต่อสู้โดยตรง)</color>

column2: Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
I'm not interested in joking with you, be careful not to let you live to Run away!
You're provoking, don't be too arrogant!
You're seeking your own death, don't blame others!
I declare, the Tomb Raider Sect is hereby removed from the martial arts world!
column3: ข้าขอประกาศว่า"สำนักปล้นสุสาน"ได้ถูกถอดออกจากโลกยุทธภพแล้ว!

column2: I didn't expect the small Tomb Raider Sect to have such strength, I almost lost my life there.
column3: ข้าไม่ได้คาดหวังว่าสำนักปล้นสุสานเล็กๆ จะมีพลังขนาดนี้ ข้าเกือบทิ้งชีวิตไว้ที่นั่นแล้ว

column2: I've treated you with such respect, but you're not thinking of repaying me, instead you're thinking of changing your allegiance. Have you thought about the consequences?
I'll consider it a moment of confusion on your part, go out and cool off, I won't hold it against you.
Already decided!
I'll take my leave.
Good, good, good!
If I can cultivate you, I can also destroy you. Good materials and beautiful jade that can't be used by me, it's not a pity to destroy them.
So the master of the Confucius Temple who always talks about morality and righteousness is finally not going to pretend to be Honorable anymore?
There's no one around here, why should I pretend, do I still need to put on a show for you, a dying man?
With your strength, you still want to destroy me now, it's really a pipe dream.
Do you think it's over?
Kid, you should feel lucky, today I'll let you see my true strength before you die.
Your, your face...
Go to hell!
The prophecy can't be wrong, I'm the chosen one, how can this be...
This Confucius Temple outfit is really uncomfortable, it's better to go back to my original look.
It wasn't easy for you to join the Confucius Temple, there are countless people in the world who take pride in joining the Confucius Temple, how can you not cherish it?

If you choose to leave now, not only will you lose the chance to return to Confucius Temple, but you will also have to return the sect token <color=#c44b0e>Gentleman gem</color>, renounce the sect talent <color=#c44b0e>Disciples of Confucius</color>, and all your hard-earned Sect contribution will be wiped out. Please think carefully before making a decision.
column3: หากเจ้าเลือกที่จะออกตอนนี้ ไม่เพียงแต่เจ้าจะสูญเสียโอกาสที่จะกลับไปที่วัดขงจื้อ แต่เจ้าจะต้องคืนตราสำนักด้วย <color=#c44b0e>จี้หยกสุภาพชน</color> สละพรสวรรค์ของสำนัก <color=#c44b0e>ศิษย์ขงจื้อ</color> และความดีความชอบสำนักที่หามาอย่างยากลำบากของเจ้าจะถูกลบล้าง โปรดคิดให้รอบคอบก่อนตัดสินใจ

column2: Already decided! <color=#097a76>(Return the Gentleman gem)</color>
column3: ตัดสินใจแล้ว! <color=#097a76>(คืนจี้หยกสุภาพชน)</color>

column2: Already decided, but the Gentleman gem is not with me.
column3: ตัดสินใจแล้ว แต่จี้หยกสุภาพชนไม่ได้อยู่กับข้า

column2: Break through the Four Sages Formation!
column3: ฝ่าด่าน ค่ายกลสี่ปราชญ์!

column2: Think about it again
column3: คิดดูอีกครั้ง

column2: Alas, if you insist on this, although I have a love for talent, I can't force you. From now on, you are no longer a disciple of Confucius Temple, and you can't show off in Confucius Temple attire.
{PlayerName} bids farewell to the master.
Go, the mountains are high and the rivers are long, we will meet again.
As a disciple of Confucius Temple, you actually lost the token!
Alas, forget it, since you insist on running away from Confucius Temple, and now you have lost the Gentleman gem, you can only break through the "Four Sages Formation" alone to let you go.
column3: อนิจจา ลืมมันไปซะ เนื่องจากเจ้ายืนกรานที่จะออกจากวัดขงจื้อ และตอนนี้เจ้าได้สูญเสีย"จี้หยกสุภาพชน"ไปแล้ว เจ้าทำได้เพียงบุกฝ่า "ค่ายกลสี่ปราชญ์" เพียงลำพังถึงจะปล่อยเจ้าไป

column2: Are you ready to break through the formation?
Ready!
column3: พร้อม!

column2: Wait a moment.
You failed to break through the formation, you can't leave Confucius Temple yet.
Phew, finally broke through the formation, can I run away now?

Well, I always keep my word, since you have broken through the formation, although I have a love for talent, I can't force you. From now on, you are no longer a disciple of Confucius Temple, and you can't show off in Confucius Temple attire.
{PlayerName} bids farewell to the master.
Go, the mountains are high and the rivers are long, we will meet again.
Exterminate
Ignorant boy, do you know what place this Confucius Temple is, dare to speak wildly?
Destroy Confucius Temple! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the battle directly)</color>
Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
I advise you to be cautious in your words and deeds, so as not to cause trouble.
People think that Confucius Temple is just a gathering place for literati...
People think that Confucius Temple is one of the three religions, but it's not worthy of the name...
Here and now, I will show you what is the number one Confucian sect in the world.
What is the number one Confucian sect in the world!
{PlayerName}, you are against Confucius Temple today, this is the beginning of our break!
{PlayerGivenName} boy, although you do things to my taste, but your actions today, I really can't agree.
{PlayerName}, I don't care what you do, but I won't agree if you want to smash the sign of Confucius Temple.
Sure enough, you can't judge a book by its cover, I didn't expect your scheming to be deeper than mine!
Confucius Temple is one of the three religions, and it is not to be offended easily.\nI need to escape from here as soon as possible to avoid being entangled by the shrimp soldiers and crab generals.
Is this the number one Confucian sect in the world you're talking about?
Is this what you call the number one Confucian sect in the world?
Do you think it's over?
Kid, you should feel lucky, today I'll let you see my true strength before you die.
You, are you possessed?
Go to hell!
The prophecy can't be wrong, I'm the chosen one, how can this be...

This place was once a land of etiquette and morality,
A place where saints and sages taught,
A profound and broad path of Confucianism.
At this moment, the joy in your heart is indescribable,
The holy land of morality that has been passed down for hundreds of years is now at your feet!
The sound of recitation is no longer heard, only a lament is heard everywhere.
The spirit of Confucianism will be passed on in other ways, but it has no more relations with the Confucius Temple,
From now on, the Confucius Temple only exists in people's memories...
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Confucius Temple, Annihilated!</color></size>
Stop, outsiders are not allowed to enter here.
Three Sects Demon Suppression
Demon Suppression
Go to Taoist Sect and Shifa Temple, find Zhong Yangzi and Hui Yuan, invite the successors of the two sects to gather at Confucius Temple.
column3: ไปที่ลัทธิเต๋าและอารามฉีฟา, ตามหา ฉงหยางสื่อ และ ฮุ่ยหยวน, เชิญผู้สืบทอดของทั้งสองพรรคมาพบกันที่วัดขงจื้อ.

column2: Shifa Temple and Taoist Sect have agreed to the invitation, now return to Confucius Temple and report to Cai Yuanchang.
More than a decade ago, a mysterious figure appeared in the martial arts world, unknown where he learned from, only known to have several top martial arts, his skills reached the realm of perfection.

This man not only single-handedly provoked countless disputes in the martial arts world, but even intervened in the battlefield situation of Yan and Zhao countries several times with his strong martial arts, both the martial arts world and the court have become his playthings.
The heads of the three sects joined forces, set up several times, after many twists and turns, paid a heavy price to capture him seriously injured.

Not only is this person outstanding in martial arts, but he also hides the internal strength Archives of the three sects. He is the only one in the world who knows their whereabouts. In order not to cut off the unique skills of the three sects, he can only be imprisoned and interrogated, and his life cannot be taken.
Ordinary prisons can no longer hold this great demon, so the three sects once again joined forces to design a demon trapping formation, which finally suppressed the demon.

There are a few specific days each year when the demon trapping formation is weakest. To prevent the demon from escaping, the heirs of the three sects compete, and the strongest person is responsible for guarding the demon on those days.
Guarding the demon sounds like a tough job, why do they have to compete and choose the strongest person to qualify for guarding the demon.

During the few days of guarding the demon, if you have the chance to get some guidance from the demon, or even get a few words from the sect manual from the demon's mouth, it will not only benefit the sect, but also greatly benefit your own cultivation.
Isn't it safer for the three sects to guard the demon together, and everyone doesn't have to fight, if they find out any news, isn't it better for everyone to benefit together?

Let's not mention that the three sects are ostensibly united, but in private they are actually competing with each other; let alone the strange temper and tyrannical nature of the demon head, how can he tolerate a bunch of people watching him in a pompous manner? Maybe he will get tough and kill all these people.
Risks and opportunities coexist...

{PlayerName}, as the representative of Confucius Temple, you are to invite the successors of the other two sects for a competition to determine who will guard this year. Whether you can seize this opportunity depends on your own fortune.
Yes, I will not disgrace the name of Confucius Temple!
Please inform Master Cai that Shifa Temple will send a successor to attend the meeting on time.
That was easy? A bit unexpected. Aren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Confucius Temple?
Master Cai would not joke about such a serious matter as demon suppression. If he sent you, he must have his reasons. I don't need to worry about it.
Please inform Master Cai that Taoist Sect will send a successor to attend the meeting on time.
That was easy? A bit unexpected. Aren't you going to test me to see if I'm qualified to represent Confucius Temple?
Master Cai would not joke about such a serious matter as demon suppression. If he sent you, he must have his reasons. I don't need to worry about it.
{PlayerSurName} senior brother, the little monk is here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
You are really slow, poor monk has been waiting for you for half a day.
You are polite, poor monk Lai Toudian, here to fulfill the appointment on behalf of the Shifa Temple.
{PlayerSurName} senior brother, I'm here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
You're slower than a turtle, if I had known, I would have taken a nap first.
I'm La Tazhang, here on behalf of Taoist Sect.
Now that the successors of the three sects have arrived, the competition is about to begin. {PlayerName}, you are new here and may not understand the rules, let me explain them to you.

{PlayerName}, you represent Confucius Temple and are the host of this competition. You need to go through three rounds of competition. In the first round, you and the successor of Taoist Sect will compete against Shifa Temple; in the second round, you and Shifa Temple will compete against Taoist Sect; in the third round, you will face the combined forces of the other two sects alone.
If you win all three rounds, you will be responsible for guarding the demon this year. If you lose any round, Confucius Temple will have nothing to do with this matter. Do you understand?
I understand.
I don't understand.
In that case, let's start now!
I am here to learn from the two of you.
I am here to learn from the two of you.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful.
column3: {PlayerSurName} รักษาตัวด้วย

column2: {PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
The disciples of Confucius Temple are indeed well-deserved. This year, we will have to trouble {PlayerGivenName} to guard the demon.
I am here to learn from the two of you.
Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
Stop dawdling, let's get started.
{PlayerGivenName}, please enlighten me, junior brother!
Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
Are you done yet? Finish it quickly, I still have to go to Adventurous to have fun.
Stop dawdling, let's get started.
I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
Whoever wants to go, go. I don't want to accompany that demon again.
I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
Come and taste the flavor of my Full Recovery Pill.
I am here to learn from the two of you.
{PlayerSurName}, be careful.
column3: {PlayerSurName} รักษาตัวด้วย

column2: I'm itching, scratch me quickly.
I've long been tired of that demon. It's good to change people this time. I can take a break and have some fun.
You were seriously injured and gradually woke up after being unconscious for a few shichen.
Alas, you have done your best, this is fate, don't dwell on it.
{PlayerName}, you have indeed lived up to my expectations. Now, you will have to shoulder the responsibility of guarding that demon!
The demon is now imprisoned under the stone tower in the Ice Prison of Lin'an CityCloud Forest Temple. I will tell you how to enter the Ice Prison...
You have obtained the method to enter the Ice Prison from Cicada.
Once the Ice Prison is opened, the entrance will automatically close once you enter; it will not reopen until five days later. Do not rush in without full confidence.
Never let that demon escape, the consequences are unpredictable, remember.
I will remember your teachings, Master.

column2: Master, something terrible has happened! I failed, Lao Motou has broken free and escaped.
Confucius Temple is in great danger!
Cai Yuanchang, you old fool, you should know that once I escape, I will come to settle the score with you first!
Old friend, long time no see.
Fake Honorable, who the hell is your old friend!
Chu Kuangsheng, what brings you to Confucius Temple today?
Destroy Confucius Temple, topple the statue of Confucius, and by the way, skin you, the fake Honorable!
(This Lao Motou is up to no good, should I step forward to stop him?)
Step forward!<color=#c44b0e>Main character solo</color>
Remain silent.
Confucius Temple is a place of saintly teachings, how dare you, a demon, speak such nonsense!
Kid, I spared your life before, since you don't appreciate it, I'll take this life back.
Hmph, just as I thought.
Fake Honorable, are you going to stand by and watch your disciples die for you?
Lao Motou takes a step towards Cai Yuanchang with each word he speaks.
When you were in trouble, it was I who saved your life and taught you martial arts!
Take one step at a time.

When you and I became sworn brothers, you said that if I became the number one martial artist in the world, you would become the literary leader, and we would be equally famous in both literature and martial arts!
Take one step at a time.
The Cold iron chain locked on my Lute bone was designed and supervised by you without sleep!
column3: โซ่เหล็กเย็นที่ล็อคอยู่บนกระดูกไหปลาร้าของข้าได้รับการออกแบบและดูแลโดยเจ้าโดยไม่ต้องหลับไม่ต้องนอน!

column2: Humph, defending the way and eliminating demons is the duty of the Confucius Temple, no personal feelings allowed!
I will never make the foolish mistake of raising a tiger to cause trouble again, so...
{yell} You are hereby expelled from the Confucius Temple!!!
I didn't expect the head of the Confucius Temple to enhance his own power by resorting to side doors and left paths. You will soon suffer a backlash.
Nonsense!
Humph, fake Honorable!
Today I spare your life, let you suffer a backlash in the future and make you Desperated, that's the biggest punishment for you!
With this demon escaping, the martial arts world will surely be in turmoil.\nYou must hurry to improve your skills to cope with future uncertainties.
Yes.
I didn't expect you to hide your skills before, now it's a bit tricky for the old man to deal with you.
Lao Motou, surrender!
Old man is curious where this little guy gets his confidence from?

The reason I came here is to inform all of you old friends that I have returned to the martial arts world! Those who were involved in that incident back then, none of you can escape, I will settle the scores with you one by one.
Kid, the head of the Confucius Temple behind you is very ambitious, be careful not to be used as a pawn without knowing it.

With this demon escaping, the martial arts world will surely be in turmoil.\nYou have made a contribution to repelling the demon this time, I will teach you the unique skills of our sect to cope with future uncertainties.
Yes.
I don't know why, but I've been restless all day. Is something going to happen?
Reporting to the head, Lao Motou who was locked in the ice cellar went mad and almost broke free. The disciple had to kill him in a hurry, please punish me.
Huh, is he really dead?
Absolutely.
The mighty Chu Kuangsheng died in the hands of a disciple of Confucius Temple, what a great irony.
Such a demon is a hidden danger in the world. It is the duty of the disciples of Confucius Temple to eliminate demons and defend the way. There is no mistake.
The student has fulfilled his duty and completed the task of guarding Lao Motou, and has come to report.
How is Lao Motou?
Lao Motou is now trapped in the Ice Prison and can't move a step. His situation is very miserable. Is he really a wicked demon?
Huh, are you sympathizing with that demon?

The Devil always confuses people's hearts, and many righteous people have suffered from it.\n{PlayerName}, you must not make a mistake. If I find out that you are colluding with The Devil, I will personally take action to clean up the door!
The student understands that he will never join forces with those The Devil.
{PlayerName}, as a scholar of the Confucius Temple, you failed to maintain your integrity. According to the rules of our sect, you must be punished!
May I ask what mistake I made and how you are going to punish me?
Your virtue is lacking, your conduct is flawed...
Your behavior is unchecked, often acting unkindly...
You have murderous eyes and no heart of Benevolence...
Coward, Selfish...
column3: ขลาดเขลา, เห็นแก่ตัว...

column2: Ungrateful, selfish...
Betrayal, no old feelings...
Improper behavior, words and deeds lost...
Arrogant, unscrupulous...
Dissolute, disgracing literature...
Hypocritical, saying one thing and doing another...
Fickle, untrustworthy...
Breaking promises, talking nonsense...
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined to the Disciple's room for <color=#c44b0e>five</color> days!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined to the Disciple's room for <color=#c44b0e>ten</color> days!
According to the rules of our sect, you are to be confined to the Disciple's room for <color=#c44b0e>fifteen</color> days!
According to the rules of this sect, you are sentenced to confinement in the Disciple's room for <color=#c44b0e>twenty</color> days!
Accept the punishment.
Refuse to accept the punishment! <color=#097a76>(Start a fight directly)</color>
Let's go, I'll take you where you need to go.
It seems that you have no remorse. Such a person staying in the Confucius Temple will sooner or later be a trouble! Everyone, drive him out of the Confucius Temple!
{PlayerName}, you defy the master, disrespect your superiors, I want to see how you can stand in the martial arts world in the future! From now on, the Confucius Temple is at odds with you!
I came out to wander in the martial arts world for freedom. There are too many rules in the Confucius Temple, this is not allowed, that is not allowed, I am not happy to stay.

Confucius Temple disciple {PlayerName}, defying the master, disrespecting superiors, is expelled from the Confucius Temple from today, and his words and deeds have nothing to do with the Confucius Temple from today.
Humph, if I'm not welcome here, there will be places that will welcome me!
Confucius Temple disciple {PlayerName}, shameless, immoral, disgracing the Confucian culture!
The sect decides to expel {PlayerName} from the Confucius Temple from today, and from now on, his every move has nothing to do with the Confucius Temple.
Humph, if I'm not welcome here, there will be places that will welcome me!
What should I do now?
Reflect on your own faults. <color=#097a76>(Consume 2 shichen, 25 Stamina)</color>
Read self-cultivation books.
Read books about tricks and skills.
Do nothing.
Two shichen later...
column3: สองชั่วยามต่อมา...

column2: Reflect on yourself according to the Honorable standard, correct if there is, and strive if there is not.

Let's pause here for now, I need a break...

column2: {PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>five</color> days, you are not allowed to leave without permission!
{PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>ten</color> days, you are not allowed to leave without permission!
{PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>fifteen</color> days, you are not allowed to leave without permission!
{PlayerName}, you are grounded here for <color=#c44b0e>twenty</color> days, you are not allowed to go out without permission!
{PlayerName}, your grounding has been lifted, you can now come and go freely.
Your confinement has not been lifted, you are not allowed to step outside, go back immediately!
Walk from the door to the appropriate position in the house, looking at the protagonist.
When I was grounded back in the day, no one was kind enough to bring me food. It's not too late to eat your meal while it's hot and then reflect on your actions.
How could you be so careless to let that old man Siye catch you red-handed? I'll plead for you, so he can lock you up for fewer days. Being locked up in this place is enough to drive anyone mad.
Ever since you were grounded, no one has been able to match wits with me in poetry, so I had to drown my sorrows in wine. Today, I brought a pot of crude wine to share with Brother {PlayerSurName}.
Recently, I got a piece of Nameless calligraphy, and I brought it here specifically for Brother {PlayerSurName}'s sharp eye.
You must be itching to practice your martial arts while being grounded here. How about I spar with you?
That's exactly what I had in mind! (Protagonist duels)
Not interested.
Alas, it seems I've come at a bad time. I'll come to see you another day.

During these few days of grounding, your martial arts skills have not only not fallen behind, but have actually improved. Could it be that reading really benefits martial arts cultivation? It seems I need to read a few more books myself.
It seems that your martial arts skills have greatly declined due to the confinement these past few days, which is really worrying.
After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
Where have all the moral teachings I taught you in the past gone? Go read some books again and find the path of benevolence and forgiveness that you have lost.
Honorable is as good as gold, how can you ignore your faith and become a person who goes back on his word?\nAll my teachings to you in the past have been in vain, you should reflect on yourself here!
Honorable is associated with righteousness, while the villain is associated with profit.\nRead "Spring and Autumn" carefully and think about whether you want to be honorable or a villain!
Don't look at what you shouldn't, don't listen to what you shouldn't, don't say what you shouldn't, don't do what you shouldn't!\nThink carefully about how you should behave in the world!
Knowing what you know, and knowing what you don't know, is knowledge.\nThe confinement period is a good time to read more books, reading is beneficial and increases wisdom.
I originally wanted to give you some guidance, but now I see that your reflection is not bad, knowing your mistakes and being able to improve is the greatest, you continue to reflect.
After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
Young people can't help but do some deviant things, seeing that you are not depressed, I am relieved.
I thought this insignificant punishment would have no effect on you, but seeing you looking so gloomy now, I am really disappointed.
I heard that you have several pieces of calligraphy that have not been appraised yet, bring them out quickly and let me help you appraise them.
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the Ding grade.
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the C grade.
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the B grade.
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the A grade.
Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
This is just a common piece of calligraphy, which can be seen everywhere on the street.\nI thought I could see something rare, it seems I thought too much.
This piece of calligraphy is full of strokes, the text is ups and downs, although there are flaws, it is also a good thing.

This piece of calligraphy is round and strong, elegant and full of the charm of the Wei and Jin Dynasties. However, honorable does not take what others like, although this is a good thing, it has nothing to do with me.
{yell} is actually a Draft of a Requiem to My Nephew!!!

The whole piece is full of emotion, the calligraphy is majestic, the brushwork is bold, and it is completed in one go. This kind of top-grade is rare in my life, I must borrow it for a few days to copy!
How come it's another Draft of a Requiem to My Nephew? Could it be that the previous one was fake?
No, no, my eyesight has always been good, this one should be the fake.
If I misjudge something, it would be embarrassing.
Alas, it's really disappointing to come with joy and return with disappointment.
After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
Seeing your exhilarated look, it gives me a lot of inspiration.\nI want to strike while the iron is hot and create a "Victory Return Picture".
Still no inspiration, don't waste time here.
Your gloomy state is simply great, it suddenly enlightened me.\nThis "Autumn Wind Desolate Picture" has been conceived, I have to hurry up and paint it while the mood is still there.
Demoralized, dumbfounded...
column3: ขวัญหนี,ดีฝ่อ...

column2: Amazing, amazing! If this painting is created, it will definitely be a masterpiece that will be passed down through the ages!
What are you planning to paint this time?
There's a great name that fits the scene, how about calling this painting "Hanging on the Southeast Branch"?
column3: มีชื่อที่เข้ากันดีกับฉาก งั้นเรียกภาพวาดนี้ว่า "แขวนไว้ที่สาขาตะวันออกเฉียงใต้" ดีไหม?

column2: Unprecedented and unsurpassed.
Once this work comes out, all other paintings will be discarded!
I heard you have some unappraised Paintings on you. Let me see if there's anything I like.
Hand over the Nameless painting of the lowest grade.
column3: มอบภาพวาดนิรนามระดับต่ำสุด

column2: Hand over the Nameless painting of the third grade.
column3: มอบภาพวาดนิรนามระดับสาม

column2: Hand over the Nameless painting of the second grade.
column3: มอบภาพวาดนิรนามระดับสอง

column2: Hand over the Nameless painting of the highest grade.
column3: มอบภาพวาดนิรนามระดับสูงสุด

column2: Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
This is just a mediocre painting that can be seen everywhere, it doesn't catch my eye.
The painter of this work obviously has some skills. Although it's not worth mentioning in front of me, such paintings are not common.

This painting is a rare masterpiece. Even in this Confucius Temple, there are only a few that can be compared with it. Treasure it well, and give it to someone who knows its value in the future, so as not to waste such a treasure.
{yell} is actually Along the River During the Qingming Festival!!!
The so-called Honorable is innocent, but the one who possesses the jade is guilty.\nAren't you afraid of being coveted by villains with such a treasure on you? It's safest to leave it with me!
I never thought I would see other versions of Along the River During the Qingming Festival in my lifetime. What more could I ask for with such a chance!

This version of Along the River During the Qingming Festival is more charming than the last one, with every detail of the market life vividly depicted! Let me keep it for you, so you won't lose such a masterpiece while running around.
It must be because I came in a hurry today and didn't show enough sincerity.\nI'll come to you for the painting again after I have fasted, bathed and changed my clothes next time.
After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
Stop doing boring things and come play a game of chess with me!
Agree to play chess.
column3: ตกลงที่จะเล่นหมากรุก

column2: Not interested.
column3: ไม่สนใจ

column2: You have no say in this!
You hold the black pieces, I hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
I admit defeat. It seems I still need to polish my chess skills.
In the end, my chess skills are superior. It seems you still need to polish your chess skills.
I hold the black pieces, you hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
I'll let you go today, I'll come to find you another day.
What a disappointment!
After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
Walk from the door to the designated location, looking at the protagonist.
After finishing speaking, turn around and walk out.
{PlayerName}, are you going to waste all your time here?
column3: {PlayerName} เจ้าจะมัวเสียเวลาอยู่ที่นี่ทำไม?

column2: I have pleaded with Mr. Siye and spared you from punishment. This is the only time, don't take it for granted!
If you only do those low-level things, you are not worthy to be my brother!
You are diligent and studious, never ceasing to read.
You have a deep insight and understanding of Confucian classics.
You are knowledgeable and outstanding in Coin.
Your every word and action reflects the demeanor and style of Confucianism.
You not only understand the benevolence and righteousness of Confucianism, but also incorporate it into your life.

The accumulation of years has gradually made you understand the essence of Confucian thought,
you not only understand the benevolence and morality of Confucianism, but also integrate it into your life.
You lead by example and interpret the greatness of Confucian thought with your own behavior.
The subtle influence of Confucian education naturally condenses a sense of integrity in you.
Given time, you will become a new generation of Confucian sage,
Do you want to give up your original dream of wandering the rivers and lakes now?
Devote my life to inheriting Confucianism! (<color=#c44b0e>Confucian Sage Ending</color>)
Continue the dream of wandering the world.
Morning class
The morning class has already started, go find a seat and sit down to read the books of the sages, don't waste this great time.

At the beginning of man, the nature is good|If the child does not learn, the loom is broken|Heaven and earth Mysterious Yellow, universe Primal Land|Leap year makes a year, the musical scale adjusts the sun|Zhao, Qian, Sun, Li, Zhou, Wu, Zheng, Wang|Feng, Chen, Chu, Wei, Jiang, Shen, Han, Yang|Honorable people are guided by justice, while the ignoble are guided by profit|It's not scarcity we should fear, but inequality; not poverty, but unrest|An army's commander can be captured, but a man's will cannot be taken|You throw a peach to me, I give you a plum in return|A lady of elegance and grace, a gentleman's courtship|Hold your hand, and grow old with you|Do not do to others what you do not want done to yourself|Honorable people are open and candid, while the ignoble are always in fear
One shichen later...

column2: Are you trying to probe my thoughts through chess? I won't give you the chance.
(This guy is really serious)
Kid, come and play a game of chess with me!
Agree to play chess. (Takes 2 shichen, Stamina 25)
Come back later.
You hold the black pieces, I hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
One wrong move in chess can lose the whole game.
Young people are impetuous, the outcome is already decided.
I hold the black pieces, you hold the white pieces, black goes first, white goes second.
You have already paid respects to the statue of the master today, no need to do it again.
Student {PlayerName} pays homage to the great master
You also cleaned up the fallen leaves and weeds around the statue of the master
Calligraphy
I collect unappraised calligraphy of grade C or above here. If you have extra stock, you can leave it to me. It's better than wasting it on you.
I smell an extraordinary ink fragrance from you. The ink treasure on you must be extraordinary. Bring it to me quickly!
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the C grade.
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the B grade.
Hand over the Nameless calligraphy of the A grade.
Sorry, it's not convenient to show.
Well, this piece of calligraphy is not of high grade, but it is barely qualified to fill the Literature Room.
This grade of calligraphy is rare even in the Literature Room. This time it's a real treasure.
This, this...
{PlayerName}, you have made a great contribution to the Confucius Temple this time. You are willing to give out such treasures, which shows your selflessness!
Hmph, one man's trash is another man's treasure. It's like a piece of waste paper on you.
Painting

column2: If you don't have unappraised paintings of grade C or above, don't bother me. If there's something I like, I won't let you down with the Sect contribution.

This painting is barely acceptable, I'll reluctantly accept it.
This painting is a rare treasure. I must carefully store it in the Ink House for future reference.
I never thought I would see such a miraculous painting in my lifetime...
If a man hears the Way in the morning, he can die in the evening without regret. This life is worth it!

Refuse to spar.
You'd better think it over. I'm in a good mood today. Don't regret missing the opportunity.
What kind of garbage kung fu have you learned? You're no match for me.
You've actually learned Hua Chi's unique martial art, Quiet Valley Drawing!

column2: You have to learn one of my martial arts, or don't come to me in the future!
Have you learned the martial arts I taught you? If you don't learn my martial arts, don't come to me again.
You're not planning to perfunctory me, are you? This Cao Quan Steele's kung fu is my painstaking creation. You have to practice it to justify me.
column3: เจ้าไม่ได้ตั้งใจจะแกล้งข้าใช่ไหม? วิทยายุทธ อนุสาวรีย์เฉาฉวน นี้เป็นการสร้างสรรค์อย่างอุตสาหะของข้า. เจ้าต้องฝึกมันเพื่อพิสูจน์ให้ข้าเห็น.

column2: That's more like it. When you make something of yourself in the future, I'll be proud!

Don't let Shu Kuang know that I gave you this manual, or I won't be able to live in peace.

column2: Player runs away, Ling Hongxuan recovers and stands in place, can be triggered again
Get lost!
You can go in, but don't stay too long!
My sister needs to rest more, don't always disturb her.
...My hearing is not good, I can't hear what you're saying.\nWould you dare to say it louder?
Exterminate Jiujiang Water Camp! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
Young people these days are really bold, no one has ever dared to joke with me like this!
This is the last joke you'll ever make in your life.
Alright, it seems I don't have to worry about what to feed the crocodiles today!
{PlayerName}, how dare you turn against your own brother!\nFrom today on, we are irreconcilable!
Man proposes, God disposes. I can't let you ruin my plan.
A bunch of rabble, do you really think you are a prestigious sect in the martial arts world?
People from the Central Plains, do you know what you're talking about?
Exterminate the Jiuli Tribe! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
No one dares to talk nonsense in front of me, and you are no exception.
In my Jiuli Tribe, how can we tolerate you people from the Central Plains running wild!
I am the saintess of the Jiuli Tribe, it's my duty to protect this place.\nYoung man, you can't stay here anymore, you must leave!
It was the accumulation of countless ancestors and the hard work of countless tribesmen that built the Jiuli Tribe, which dominates the southwest and covets the Central Plains.

The growth of the Jiuli Tribe is due to the arrogance of the tribal chief, and today's situation is due to the arrogance of the tribal chief.\nHe provoked an opponent he shouldn't have provoked, and one wrong step led to a deep abyss!
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Jiuli Tribe, annihilated!</color></size>
(What a vast body of water, I wonder where it leads.)
Are you going to cross the river, young man? This body of water stretches for eight hundred miles, you need to go to <color=#c44b0e>Wuyue ferry</color> and find a boatman to cross the river.
Let me remind you, there is a force called <color=#c44b0e>Jiujiang Water Camp</color> within this body of water, they are all murderous pirates, don't get involved with them.
The waves are rolling ahead, the vast body of water is endless.\nYou can only <color=#c44b0e>go to the Ferry</color> to cross the river.
This is not a place for you Central Plains people, get out!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
Let Miao Caidie handle it. <color=#097a76>(Miao Caidie accompanies)</color>
Tell them that you once helped the Jiuli Tribe.
Turn around and run away.
Dare to run wild here, you don't know what's good for you!
You're so rude, let me teach you how to behave today!
{PlayerName} is a friend of the Jiuli Tribe, don't make things difficult for him.
Welcome, Saintess!

column2: Honored guest, please come in.

column2: So you're the man from the Central Plains who helped our tribe fight against the women of Melody House a few days ago!
In that case, you are our guest.\nGuest from the Central Plains, please come in.
Not all people from the Central Plains are bad.
Are you talking to me? Do you have the guts to repeat what you just said?
Exterminate Melody House! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
Nonsense, don't take it seriously.
You have to pay a price for talking nonsense. Since it's your first offense, I'll let you off this time.
Since you like to talk nonsense so much, why don't you just rip out your tongue.
Do you think that just because Melody House is full of women, we will let you bully us?\nToday, you will understand the sorrow of being a stinky man!
Once you are a part of Melody House, you belong to Melody House for life.\nI won't allow anyone to destroy anything here!
Big brother, how could you do this!\nI've heard of the wickedness of human hearts, but it shouldn't happen to you.
How many beautiful women, how many overwhelming beauties, can't escape the fate's trickery now.
