column2: Under your ruthless hand, Melody House is like an evening primrose, blooming and then fading, and no one remembers its once vibrant colors.
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Melody House, annihilated!</color></size>
The monk has ordered, men are not allowed to set foot in Melody House!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
Let Gu Qingcheng handle it.<color=#097a76>(Gu Qingcheng accompanies)</color>
Let Yu Weier handle it.<color=#097a76>(Yu Weier accompanies)</color>
Let Fu Yaoqin handle it.<color=#097a76>(Fu Yaoqin accompanies)</color>
Inform them that you once helped Melody House.
Turn around and run away.
Deliver a letter for the chief of the Jiuli Tribe.
Sisters, don't let these stinky men tarnish our Melody House!
I hate your high and mighty attitudes, don't blame me for being a Female hater.
{PlayerSurName} is my friend and a friend of Melody House, don't stop him.
The master has ordered, no men are allowed in Melody House!\nMiss Qingcheng, please don't make it difficult for us.
Alas, {PlayerSurName}, I tried my best.
From now on, no one is to stop {PlayerName} from entering or leaving Melody House.
Yes, Master!
Big brother is my friend, please don't make it hard for him, sisters.
The master has ordered, no men are allowed in Melody House!\nWei'er, even if the master loves you the most, he won't make an exception for you.
Don't worry Wei'er, I'll think of another way.

Well, I've heard about this from the sisters, and the master said he would make an exception for you. Since that's the case, we won't stop you. But you must behave yourself in Melody House to avoid trouble!
Don't you know that the Jiuli Tribe is our sworn enemy at Melody House? By delivering their letter, are you declaring war on us?
I'm just the messenger, I don't want to get involved in your sect affairs.
Maybe you're a spy sent by the Jiuli Tribe, trying to probe Melody House under the guise of delivering a letter. Sisters, kick him out.
Get out of here, don't dirty the place of Melody House!

column2: The rebel {PlayerName} killed the guards and left the pass without permission, committing an unforgivable crime!\nThe order from the peak is to kill him on the spot; if the thief escapes, you will be punished as accomplices!
I wonder if breaking this barrier in the southwest will cause other troubles in the future.
You Melody House are really nosy, what do these people's lives and deaths have to do with you!
Just because they are people from the Central Plains, you capture young men for hard labor and young women to feed the Gu worms, what are you trying to do now!
The Jiuli Tribe should not interfere with Melody House, or you will know the consequences!
Which of your actions is not aimed at Melody House, when have you ever had good intentions! Whatever the Jiuli Tribe wants to do, we at Melody House will not let you have your way!
Hmph, very well! In that case, we'll capture you all and feed you to the Gu worms!
The Jiuli Tribe, Melody House, which side should I help?
Help the Jiuli Tribe. (Specific battle)
Help Melody House. (Specific battle)
Just watch the changes.
Unexpectedly, Melody House would also hire men as helpers, it seems that you guys can't hold on any longer!
Impudent, watch your mouth, who hired men as helpers!
If the pretty boy outside isn't your helper, then is he a man you stole from somewhere?
Kid, who are you?
column3: เจ้าหนู เจ้าเป็นใครกัน?

column2: I'm just passing by to watch the fun, I definitely won't disturb you, please continue.
Central Plains people say one thing and mean another, you must be planning to take advantage of our mutual defeat and reap the benefits!
The master said that Central Plains men are all sweet talkers, not a single good one!
Listen to my explanation!
Go to hell!

column2: Sisters, let's do it!
The entire Jiuli tribe is irreconcilable with you!
Master, take care...
What are you sneaking around for, pretty boy from the Central Plains?
Of course, I'm here to help you Jiuli.
The master said that there's not a single good man in the Central Plains, it's really true.\nSisters, let this guy experience the power of Melody House!
Take action!
Master, take care...
There's a saying in the Central Plains, those who understand the times are great men, you Central Plains people are doing well!
It's just a helping hand, no need to mention it.
To show our sincerity, this Manual is for you, there may be room for cooperation with the Jiuli tribe in the future.
What are you sneaking around for, pretty boy from the Central Plains?
Of course, I'm here to help Melody House!

column2: This is not your Central Plains, you still want to be Dependant here, it's like a fool's dream!
Sisters, let these Jiuli tribe guys experience the power of Melody House!
The entire Jiuli tribe is irreconcilable with you!
What's your motive for helping us?
Just drawing a sword to help when seeing injustice.
Hmph, the master said that there's not a single good man in the Central Plains, but you helped us out today, regardless of whether you have any other intentions, we can't attack you now.
Are you ladies from Melody House? May I ask where Melody House is, I would like to pay a visit as a newcomer.
Our leader hates men, especially men from the Central Plains. I can tell you the location of Melody House, as long as you're not afraid of death, you can try to go there.
Melody House never owes anyone, you helped us today, this Manual is for you, Melody House is clear with you.
You being here, how can I feel at ease.\nBesides, it's not proper for others to see, you better step aside first.
Alright~
{yell} You scoundrel, prepare to die!
This Melody House is full of women, what are you, a man, doing joining Melody House?
A few years ago, Melody House would hire some men as laborers, but ever since a guy named Li disguised himself as a laborer and caused a ruckus in Melody House, no men have been allowed in.
(This old woman is still holding a grudge, I must not let her recognize me...)
Don't think I don't know what kind of ghost idea you're playing!
Melody House absolutely does not allow men to join, don't mention this again, or don't blame me for being ruthless!
It seems you have an invincible thief's heart.\nWell, today is a good day to get rid of you!
You are a Central Plains person, even if I trust you, the tribe will not accept you.
The rules of the Jiuli tribe for thousands of years do not allow Central Plains people to join the tribe, in order to maintain the purity of blood and faith!
(Will Caidie be punished for breaking the rules of the tribe in the future)
There is no room for compromise on joining the Jiuli tribe, you better give up this idea.
The Jiuli Tribe will never allow outsiders to join, especially you, a Central Plains person.\nDon't think that because you've helped the tribe a little, you can take a mile!
Yes... (Miao Muli just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, it turns out that the team has no extra space.)
Yes, master...
The team has no extra space, unable to invite him to join the team.
Central Plains person, what are you trying to do!
(How should I invite Miao Muli to join my team?)
Make him take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color>

column2: Use the <color=#c44b0e>Jianghu Master token</color>
Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.

Foolish Central Plains person, our Jiuli Tribe is best at using poison, and we have long been immune to all kinds of poisons. Your Heart Broken pill is ineffective against me, in your Central Plains language, it's "showing off your skills before an expert"!
column3: คนจงหยวนที่โง่เขลา, เผ่าจิ่วลี่ของเราเก่งที่สุดในการใช้พิษ และเราได้รับภูมิคุ้มกันจากพิษทุกชนิดมานานแล้ว ยาหัวใจสลายของเจ้าใช้ไม่ได้ผลกับข้า ในภาษาจงหยวนของเจ้ามันพูดว่า"แสดงทักษะอ่อนด้อยของเจ้าต่อหน้าผู้เชี่ยวชาญ"!

column2: Jianghu Master token is here!\nWill Miao Muli of the Jiuli Tribe not obediently follow my orders?
Hahaha, I didn't expect you to be so stupid!
You Central Plains people treat the Jianghu Master token as a treasure, but in my eyes, it's just a piece of scrap metal. Your Central Plains' alliance leader can't control our Jiuli Tribe!
Yes... (Fu Yaoqin just numbly agrees, without any actual reaction, it turns out that the team has no extra space.)
Yes, master...
There is no extra space in the team, unable to invite her to join the team.
No one has ever dared to joke with me, the owner of Melody House, about serving you {PlayerName}!

Make her take the <color=#c44b0e>Heart Broken pill</color>

Give up the Invite, excuse yourself and Run away.

column3: เจ้าบังคับให้ ฟู่เหยาฉิน กินยาหัวใจสลาย หลังจากนั้นไม่นาน ดวงตาของ ฟู่เหยาฉิน ก็พร่ามัว และจิตใจของเขาสับสน

column2: Owner of Melody House, now I am your master, and you must follow my wishes in the future.
Yes... master.
{PlayerName}, how dare you do this to me!
How does the Heart Broken pill taste?
column3: ยาหัวใจสลายมีรสชาติเป็นอย่างไร?

column2: Shameless! Today I will die with you!
Since I can't beat you, I won't let you go even if I become a ghost!
Fu Yaoqin, with severe injuries, used all her remaining strength to smash her own skull. The unparalleled beauty is gone forever.
Jianghu Master token is here!\nWill the owner of Melody House not bow down and obey?
Hmph, a mere Jianghu Master token, I don't even care!
You dare not recognize this Jianghu Master token, beware of being jointly attacked by all the major sects.
Hahaha, let them come then, I want to see how many sects are willing to travel thousands of miles to Melody House to seek justice.
(I miscalculated, the Jianghu Master token is useless.)
You dare to think of making me obey you, it seems you have no good intentions.\nMen like you are a menace if they stay one more day!
I'm in a bad mood, don't bother me!
I haven't been out for a long time, it's time to meet old friends.
Am I, the owner of Melody House, not worthy of a place in your team?

Blunt the sharp, untie the knot, harmonize the light, mix with the dust...|Holding it until it's full, it's better to stop...|To the extreme of emptiness, keep quiet...|All things work together, I watch again...|Sharpen it, and it won't last long...|The heavy is the root of the light, the still is the master of the restless...|Know the male, but keep to the female, and be the stream of the world...|All things depend on it for life, and it never turns them away...|The softest thing in the world overcomes the hardest thing in the world...|Great straightness seems twisted, great skill seems clumsy...|Seeing the small is called clarity, keeping to the gentle is called strength...
Take good care of your health and come back in a day.
Hahaha, you two are doing this under the public eye!
The aura is confused, this is a sign of obsession!
Fu Yaoqin, you're having a hard time right now, aren't you? This pretty boy is useless, let me help you.
Rest assured and recuperate, I will deal with him!
Trying to take advantage of me?
I've been waiting for so many years, finally waited for this day, but you took all the advantages!
I will first sacrifice your blood to the God of Jiuli, then chop your body into pieces to feed the Gu worms!
You better survive and run away first!
If others do not provoke me, I will not provoke them. If they do, I will annihilate them completely!\nFrom today on, there is no need for the Jiuli tribe to exist.
{yell}{PlayerName}, kill him!
column3: {yell}{PlayerName}, ฆ่ามัน!

column2: Uh--
Quickly calm your mind, I will help you resist the inner demons!
How could this happen, how could this happen!
Don't mention today's events to anyone, or I will kill you!
Take this musical manual to learn, the stronger you are, the more useful you are to me.
Fu Yaoqin walks off the screen, disappears, and returns to the main hall.
The aura is confused, this is a sign of obsession!
Quickly calm your mind, I will help you resist the inner demons!
You don't need to help me practice anymore, you run away from here now!
Must you be so heartless?
Don't make me say it again!
Fine, fine, it's your territory, you call the shots.
{yell} Die!!!
Seems to smell a faint fragrance, the reaction seems a bit numb...
Someone nearby has spread a Poison that slows reactions...
The situation here seems a bit bad, should I go in?
Insist on entering the house.
Stay far away.
Transition to a dark scene, teleport the player into 2161, arrange personnel inside the house
There's poison in this house...
Someone has poisoned this room, but this level of toxicity is nothing to me.
If Melody House doesn't agree to my demands today, I'm afraid there won't be a single survivor in Melody House before sunrise tomorrow.

Humph, under your leadership, Miao Muli, the Jiuli Tribe can only resort to these despicable means! If you think you can force me, Fu Yaoqin, to submit with this, you're really underestimating the strength of Melody House.
I'll say my conditions one last time. If you still don't agree, don't blame me for being a female hater.
First, hand over all the musical collections of Melody House and destroy all copies;\nSecond, hand over Yu Weier, this little duckling, and let us take her away;\nThird...
Disciples of Melody House, listen to my command. Even if we have to fight to the death today, we can't let them succeed!
The Jiuli Tribe came to provoke, Melody House was forced to fight back, what should I do?
Help Melody House. (Specific battle)
Help the Jiuli Tribe. (Specific battle)
Wipe out both sides! (Start the fight directly)
People from the Central Plains are indeed cunning. There's a saying, "When the snipe and the clam fight, the fisherman benefits." It seems you want to be the benefiting fisherman!
I didn't expect that Melody House, after hiding its name for so many years, would be bullied by unknown juniors.

Today, I, {PlayerName}, single-handedly annihilated Melody House and the Jiuli Tribe, thus eliminating the hidden danger in the southwest. This is a great achievement that will be remembered for a thousand years.
Hmph, you're full of big talk!
Compared to dealing with the Jiuli Tribe, I'm more interested in seeing how you, an ignorant boy, will die.
The Jiuli tribe has been entrenched in the southwest for many years, but it's just so-so. I really don't know why the incompetent court can't completely wipe it out.
It's a pity that there are so many young girls in Melody House...
Central Plains people, the detestable Central Plains people, kill them!
When did Melody House get such a powerful reinforcement? Is this pretty boy the old lady's pet?
Miao Muli, if your Jiuli Tribe doesn't want to be wiped out today, get lost now!
Hmph, I'll take revenge for today when my martial arts skills are fully developed.
Boy, what's your name? Why are you helping Melody House?
I am {PlayerName}, I can't stand those strangely dressed guys bullying you girls.
Master, this man once taught the Jiuli Tribe a lesson, saving the people in the ruined courtyard from torment.
Master, he is the one who solved the puzzle in Lin'an City Maiden House...
column3: เจ้าตำหนัก, เขาคือคนที่ไขปริศนาตำหนักพิสุทธิ์ได้ทั้งหมดในเมืองหลินอัน...

column2: It's Miss Qincheng...
column3: นางคือแม่นางชิงเฉิง...

column2: Young man surnamed {PlayerSurName}, Melody House will be closed for the next <color=#c44b0e>three days</color>. Please don't linger here.
Alright, since I'm not needed for now, I'll run away.
We're all from the Central Plains, let me see how you kill each other, especially when facing such a group of beautiful girls, hehehe.
I must be blind, you dare to attack Melody House!
I didn't expect big brother to be such a person, Wei'er is so sad!
Hmph, Central Plains men, kill without mercy!
When did the Central Plains martial arts world produce such a monstrous young master...
He's just like him back then, emerging out of nowhere, looking down upon the world...
Fu Yaoqin, won't you agree to my request now?
The situation has changed, retreat to the tribe!
Well, that...
Humph, the Jiuli Tribe doesn't care about your life or death, you're just a tool they're using. Now that the Enfeeble pill's poison has been resolved, let's see how you escape!

column2: It's a pity that there are so many young girls in Melody House...
Melody House has been closed for a few days, and the master seems to be in a bad mood. I'd better not push my luck.
Rescue Yu Weier

column2: Rescue
Sneak into the Jiuli Tribe to rescue Yu Weier.
Return to Melody House to inform the master of the situation.
Return to Melody House to inform that Yu Weier has been rescued.
{PlayerName}, where did you hide Yu Weier!
I don't even know which one is Yu Weier, why would I hide her?
Isn't Yu Weier in Melody House? Why would I hide a little girl!
Wei'er is not in Melody House now!
She has never run away from Melody House!
You're the only stranger who has been here recently, if it's not you who hid her, then who else could it be!
A few days ago, Miao Muli forced you to hand over Yu Weier, now Wei'er is missing, I wonder if this has anything to do with them?
How could I forget them, that pervert Miao Muli wants to use Wei'er's special constitution to feed his Gu King!
{PlayerName}, to ensure the safety of Wei'er, I can't risk attacking the Jiuli Tribe, so now only you can save Wei'er!
Do you really trust me, a stranger, to save Yu Weier?
If you save Yu Weier, I, Fu Yaoqin, owe you a favor; if you can't save Yu Weier, don't come to see me again!
That's too domineering, it's simply unreasonable.
Wei'er's safety is paramount, if you keep dithering, I'll disable you now and find someone else.
Fine, fine, this is your territory, you call the shots.
My patience is limited, hurry up and go save her!
It seems you really need a beating!
Get out of here now!
After beating me up like this, how am I supposed to save anyone?
Hmm?
If you're capable of this, you should go save her right away!
You need to have the right attitude to save someone.
If you can't save her, I'll fight you to the death, even if it means the end of Melody House!
Unreasonable woman.
Don't be afraid, Xiao Ya.
You Central Plains people say "Since it's here, let it be", your abbess sister won't come to save you.
You're a bad guy, you're all bad guys... I shouldn't have trusted you...
Yu Weier, it's time, you have no choice!
Waah--Wei'er doesn't want to die, who will save Wei'er--
The girl trapped inside is indeed Yu Weier, the enemy is strong and numerous, should I go save her?
Yu Weier is indeed here, but the enemy is strong and numerous, should I go save her?
Rush in and save her!
column3: เร็วรีบไปช่วยเธอ!

column2: Just watch the changes.
With me, {PlayerName}, here, who dares to touch her!
Big brother, are you...?
Don't be afraid, Wei'er, I'm here to save you on the orders of the abbess of Melody House!
Wei'er will never disobey the abbess sister again.
Big brother, it's you who came to save me!
Don't be afraid, Wei'er, no one can hurt you with me here, I'll take you away from this place right now.
The ceremony has been interrupted! You, it's all because of you!
{yell}, you Central Plains people who blaspheme the gods, unforgivable!!!
I failed to protect Wei'er, how am I going to explain this to her abbess sister.
{PlayerName}, you should remember what I told you.
I did my best for Yu Weier...
I told you, if you can't save Weier, don't come to see me, Melody House doesn't welcome you!
Get out of Melody House now!
Without you, Wei'er might never be able to return.
It's okay, it's all over now. I'll protect you, no one can threaten you.
Big brother...
Hmm?
Can you protect Wei'er like the abbess sister for the rest of your life?
(Yu Weier is so young, do I really have to protect her for the rest of my life?)
Promise Yu Weier.

column2: Wei'er understands, thank you big brother for saving Wei'er...
Wei'er will learn to take care of herself, and won't need anyone's protection anymore.
You saved Wei'er, I owe you this favor!
This is the secret of Melody House, not to be passed on to outsiders, but today I'll make an exception and teach it to you!
You're still young and naive, with no sense of caution, I don't know how many bad people will bully you in the future.

column2: When big brother becomes an old man, it's Wei'er's turn to protect you!
Your nun sister must be anxious, let's go back quickly.
Great God of Jiuli, enjoy your offerings
Your devout believer is praying to you
Please grant me strength...

column2: They, they used Yu Weier as a sacrifice...\nThe tigress at Melody House will eat me, the situation is bad, I need to slip away quickly.
Who will come to save Wei'er?
Wei'er doesn't want to die yet
You saved Wei'er, I owe you this favor!
Wei'er is very dependent on you, I can rest assured to entrust her to you.
From today, I will exceptionally lift Wei'er's confinement, you can take her to Run away, there is only one condition, use your life to protect her for a lifetime!
This is the secret of Melody House, not to be passed on to outsiders, but today I'll make an exception and teach it to you!
You protected Yu Weier and finally escaped from the Jiuli Tribe
I finally managed to get you out safely.
Thank you so much, big brother. The abbess must be worried sick, let's hurry back.
The sacrifice is trying to escape, someone come!
What should we do, we've been discovered.
With me here, I'll ensure your safety!
Visit Old Friends
Old Friends
Infiltrate the three religions (Taoist Sect, Shifa Temple, Confucius Temple) to inquire about Chu Kuangsheng.
Go to Melody House to inform Fu Yaoqin about Chu Kuangsheng.
Help Fu Yaoqin to inquire about Chu Kuangsheng's whereabouts, there is no clue for the time being.
{PlayerName}, you came from the Central Plains, have you heard of Chu Kuangsheng?
I haven't heard of it.
As expected, his news was blocked.
Who is this Chu Kuangsheng? Does the monk know him?
It's more than just knowing...
{PlayerName}, I need you to do something for me, and I won't let you down when it's done.
What is it?
Help me find out the whereabouts of Chu Kuangsheng, there may be clues in the Three Teachings, I hope you can join the Three Teachings and help me find out.
I've come all this way over mountains and rivers, and you want me to go back?
Yes, you are the most suitable candidate.
Alright, for your sake, I'll make a move.
Only the high-ranking members of the Three Sects should know about this person now, so you need to gain their trust to get access to key clues.

column2: The Chu Kuangsheng you mentioned is now called Lao Motou by the high-ranking members of the Three Sects, a big villain. He has been kept in the Ice Prison under the Cloud Forest Temple in Lin'an City.
How is he now?
He, he's already dead...
column3: เขา เขาตายแล้ว...

column2: {yell} Impossible! Absolutely impossible!!!
He has unparalleled martial arts skills, invincible in the world, how could he die!
If he really was invincible, how could he be locked up in the Ice Prison by the Three Sects?
{yell} I want revenge, I want revenge!!!!!
{PlayerName}, I need your help to break through the barriers, I want to break through the mystery and enhance my power, I want those old guys from the Three Sects to pay the price!!!
How can I help you?
I'll take you to a place.

We will immerse ourselves in this Fountain of Youth together. Under the enhancement of my unique internal strength, it will promote the harmony of Yin and Yang, help me improve my cultivation, and it will also be greatly beneficial to you.
However, it only works wonders when you are Wholesome. Otherwise, the effect will be halved at best, and at worst, it will be harmful and useless.
What are you daydreaming about! Get in the water now!
Get in the water!
Don't get in the water!
In broad daylight, what a disgrace!
Pretentious pseudo-Honorable, don't regret it!
Valley God Invincible. This is called the Mysterious Female.
The gate of the Mysterious Female, is the root of heaven and earth...
Whether your current state can help me break through, it's really up to fate.

This method of improving your skills can only be used five times, after five times it will have no effect, don't waste each opportunity. <color=#c44b0e>I'll wait for you here every day at Zi Shi.</color>
It's not perfect, nothing to write home about.

This method of improving your skills can only be used five times, after five times it will have no effect, don't waste each opportunity. <color=#c44b0e>I'll wait for you here every day at Zi Shi.</color>
Your condition is good, you have not let me down.

This method of improving your skills can only be used five times, after five times it will have no effect, don't waste each opportunity. <color=#c44b0e>I'll wait for you here every day at Zi Shi.</color>
He has already escaped, now his whereabouts are unknown.
Since he has escaped, why hasn't he come to find me?
It seems he still looks down on me, thinking I'm not good enough for him!
{yell} Why, why!!!!!

column2: {PlayerName}, I want you to help me break through the barrier, I want to break through the mysterious barrier to enhance my power, I want that old guy to never look down on me again!
How can I help you?
I'll take you to a place.
Of course I've heard of him, why are you asking about him now?

Just keep this in mind for me, and let me know as soon as you get any news.
Jiuli
column3: จิ่วลี่

column2: Miao Muli, that pervert, is obsessed with using virgin blood to raise gu, many girls from Melody House have disappeared for no reason, I'm sure they fell into his hands. Now he's even targeting Weier, it's outrageous!
As long as the Jiuli Tribe exists, Melody House will never coexist with them!\n{PlayerName}, I want you to wipe out the Jiuli Tribe completely, to avenge Yu Weier and Melody House!
Why do you think I alone can exterminate the Jiuli tribe that has been entrenched in the southwest for generations?
Because of this Manual!
Everyone in Melody House, except me, can be at your disposal.
The Jiuli Tribe is skilled in toxicology, this accessory can protect you if you carry it with you.\nIf you still can't get rid of the Jiuli Tribe like this, I think you're no different from trash.
I want you to wipe out the Jiuli Tribe completely, to avenge Yu Weier and Melody House! Miao Muli is invincible, I can't rest easy until the Jiuli Tribe is destroyed!
Not only did you help Wei'er vent her anger, but you also removed a major threat for me, I will definitely not treat you badly!
Demonstrate to the Three Sects!
Three Sects
Subdue Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple
Exterminate Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple
Now is the time to make the Three Sects pay for what they have done!
You're not going to make me mess with the Three Sects again, are you?
You can exterminate the Jiuli tribe, are you afraid of a few old guys in the Three Sects?
Which head of the Three Sects is not a top-notch master, they are not comparable to that waste Miao Muli, aren't you sending me to death?
Take the Melody House's internal power method and learn it, those old guys are nothing.
You're really generous in order to send me to death.
I'm not asking you to exterminate them, just to <color=#c44b0e>subdue</color> them, to make these high and mighty sects submit to you, a young man, just like back then...
Back then? What happened back then?
This has nothing to do with you, get to work!
I'm not asking you to exterminate them, just to <color=#c44b0e>subdue</color> them, to make these high and mighty sects submit to you, a young man, just like back then...
Back then? What happened back then?
This has nothing to do with you!
Even if I don't fight to the death with this big sect, my strength is completely useless.
What if we join forces?
Of course, we'll kill gods if gods block our way, and kill Buddhas if Buddhas block our way!
What are you waiting for, let's go!
They killed Chu Kuangsheng, they must pay for this!
What do you want me to do?
Naturally, it's an eye for an eye. I want you to wipe out these three sects!
(If she knew it was my doing, would she turn against me on the spot...)
You seem to look unwell?
No, nothing.
What are you waiting for, get to work!
They killed Chu Kuangsheng, they must pay for this!
What do you want me to do?
Naturally, it's an eye for an eye. I want you to wipe out these three sects!
(If she knew it was my doing, would she turn against me on the spot...)
You seem to look unwell?
With my current strength, trying to annihilate the three sects is no different from seeking death.
What if we join forces?
Of course, we'll kill gods if gods block our way, and kill Buddhas if Buddhas block our way!
What are you waiting for, let's go!

Hmph, the so-called prestigious sects, aren't they now obediently submitting under others' feet. Just like when you didn't accept Chu Kuangsheng back then, didn't you end up submitting obediently in the end.

Perhaps you didn't accept it in your hearts, so you used despicable means to imprison him. Now that he has broken free from the prison, you traitors, wait for him to come and settle the score with you!

Hmph, the so-called prestigious sects, aren't they now obediently submitting under others' feet. Just like when they didn't accept Chu Kuangsheng back then, didn't they end up submitting obediently in the end.
Perhaps these sect leaders didn't accept it in their hearts, so they used despicable means to imprison Chu Kuangsheng.
Now that Chu Kuangsheng has broken free from the prison, those who betrayed him, wait for him to come and settle the score with you!
Zhong Yangzi, Hui Yuan, Cai Yuanchang...

column2: I will use the destruction of your three sects to commemorate the person you once admired the most...
To commemorate Chu Kuangsheng, who once dominated the martial arts world and stood above the three sects!
Zhong Yangzi, Hui Yuan, Cai Yuanchang...

column2: I will use the destruction of your three sects to commemorate the person you once admired the most...
To commemorate Chu Kuangsheng, who once dominated the martial arts world and stood above the three sects!
You have become the new master of Nine Factions Sect, under your leadership,
No one knows where the Nine Factions Sect will go,
Will it repeat the same mistakes, or never forget the initial intention?
Everything is still an unknown...
Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.\n{PlayerName}, long time no see.
Qin Huizhi! Aren't you dead?
When the hare dies, the hound is cooked. I understand the new emperor better than anyone, so I prepared in advance.
I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.
I, Qin Huizhi, have been waiting for a long time.

Qin Huizhi, the Nine Factions Sect is about to be destroyed in your hands!\nI can't let the Nine Factions Sect, which I worked hard to create, become a place to hide dirt and accept filth, let alone a tool for your power struggle!
What do you want to do?
I'm going to clean house!
Junior brother, you really can't let go!
Senior brother, step aside, I'm going to clean house today!
Don't forget, he's my disciple, if you want to deal with him, shouldn't you ask me, his master, first?
You want to stop me? You've always protected him, and you're still protecting him now!
I'm counting on him to take care of me in my old age, if you cripple him, who will I find?
Good, good, good!
Today, let's have another fight between us brothers, to see who is better!
I didn't expect it, junior brother, you've been reborn from the ashes.
What a pity, I lost most of my cultivation, otherwise I would be even stronger!
{yell} Despicable!!!
{yell} Who else in the world can stop me, who else!!!
Disciple, run!!!
No one is escaping today.
Qin, Hui, Zhi! I want you dead!!!!!
From Qin Huizhi down, all of Nine Factions Sect died, a layer of filth has finally been thoroughly cleansed...
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nine Factions Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
Disciple, the burden of Nine Factions Sect is now on you.
Master, isn't Nine Factions Sect already completely wiped out by me?
Your master is right, the old Nine Factions Sect is already rotten, has long abandoned its original mission and initial heart, all the blame is on me for not using people properly.
The new Nine Factions Sect will be established from today, always remember the original heart.
"To have a million houses for the world's cold scholars to enjoy" is your master's dream, and it was also my dream. Now it's passed on to you, I hope it will be your dream too.
I, I can't do it. You, my master and uncle, should be the head of this new Nine Factions Sect.
We two old guys have lost all our power and are now useless. If you don't lead this new Nine Factions Sect, it will soon become a sharp tool in the hands of the schemers if given to others.
Alright, I will take on this responsibility and strive to carry forward the dreams of my master and uncle.
Congratulations to {PlayerName} for becoming the new head of Nine Factions Sect!
Junior brother, your strength is still so weak in my eyes.
Qin Huizhi, what are you doing!
{yell} Beast, dare to devour my cultivation!
{yell} Hahaha, such abundant cultivation!
{yell} Despicable!!!
{yell} Who else in the world can stop me, who else!!!
Disciple, run!!!
No one is escaping today.
Qin, Hui, Zhi! I want you dead!!!!!
Uh...

column2: Uh... Uh...

If I don't help him calm the true qi that is about to burst out of his body, he might die from reversed blood flow; but he has lost his mind and will not show mercy to me.
Help him calm his true qi.
Stand by and watch.

column2: Senior Chu's Obsession caused an explosion, the stone door of the ice cellar was blasted open, I need to run away from here quickly.
The old senior's Obsession caused an explosion, the stone door of the ice cellar was blasted open, I need to run away from here quickly.
<size=200%>Break it for me!!!</size>
<size=200%>Roar!!!!!!</size>
What a terrifying power, the chains were actually broken!!!
Phew, success or failure depends on this, saving people is the most important!
The demon's breath gradually calmed down, he must have regained his sanity.
Hahahaha!
I finally escaped! I finally escaped!!!
Kid, I was Obsessed just now, but you didn't stand by and let me die. I don't want to owe you this huge favor, so I'll give you a unique heart method of mine, then we'll be even.
Is senior alright now?
Your master has been holding on alone outside for so long, hurry up and go out to check, don't let him get killed.
Number One in the World

Learn any martial arts attribute to 100.

One of your martial arts attributes (such as Fist, Sword, etc.) reaches 50 through learning from an external skill Manual.

One of your martial arts attributes reaches 100 through learning from an external skill Manual.

Anyway, I can't wash away the stains of this life, so it's better not to have this ambition to defend the country.
Marshal Ye has fallen, my future is also broken, how can I talk about defending the country in the future.
Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.\n{PlayerName}, long time no see.
Qin Huizhi! Aren't you dead?
When the hare dies, the hound is cooked. I understand the new emperor better than anyone, so I prepared in advance.
I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
I didn't expect you to be the real mastermind behind the Nine Factions Sect.
Welcome to the Nine Factions Sect, everyone.

column2: I, Qin Huizhi, have been waiting for a long time.
I didn't expect you to be the disciple of Uncle Master Yan Gexing, no wonder you often do things that make people laugh.
Why didn't my Uncle Master come with you? Is it because of a recurrence of an old injury, or he didn't want to show up, or...

Qin Huizhi, your reign as the leader of the Nine Factions Sect ends today.\nMy purpose here is to eradicate the Nine Factions Sect, this scourge of the martial arts world, let's see how long you can be arrogant.
Let me see how a mantis can block a chariot, how a dragonfly can shake a big tree!
From Qin Huizhi down, all of Nine Factions Sect died, a layer of filth has finally been thoroughly cleansed...
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nine Factions Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
"How I wish I could have a mansion with thousands of rooms, to shelter all the poor scholars in the world"...

What a great and far-reaching vision, but it has been tarnished by people like Qin Huizhi, who have made the Nine Factions Sect filthy and have long abandoned their original mission and initial heart.
Destroy before establishing! From today, the old Nine Factions Sect no longer exists, and the new Nine Factions Sect is born!
I, {PlayerName}, will be the master of this new Nine Factions Sect, and I will continue this unfinished great blueprint!

column2: {PlayerSurName} brother, with your skills and means, it's really a waste to be in this Blue Wind Camp. If you don't mind, I, old Kong, want to become inseparable brothers with you. What do you think?

column2: (The big boss is sincere, how should I respond?)
column3: (หัวหน้าใหญ่จริงจังกับเรื่องนี้ ข้าจะตอบอย่างไรดี?)

column2: Agree to become sworn brothers with the big boss.
column3: ตกลงสาบานเป็นพี่น้องกับหัวหน้าใหญ่

column2: Politely decline the big boss's kindness.
column3: ปฏิเสธน้ำใจของหัวหน้าใหญ่อย่างสุภาพ

column2: Haha, it's okay, it's me, old Kong, who was too abrupt. What I said is always valid. Whenever you want to recognize me, old Kong, as your big brother, you can find me anytime.
{PlayerSurName} brother, how do you consider the matter of becoming sworn brothers?
column3: น้อง{PlayerSurName} เจ้าคิดอย่างไรเกี่ยวกับการสาบานเป็นพี่น้อง?

column2: Hahaha, it's better to choose a day than hit the day. How about we become inseparable brothers under the witness of all the brothers in this Righteous Hall today?
column3: ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า, เลือกวันได้ดี แล้ววันนี้เราจะกลายเป็นพี่น้องร่วมสาบานภายใต้สักขีพยานของพี่น้องทุกคนในหอคุณธรรมนี้ได้อย่างไร

column2: It's all up to the big boss.

column2: I, Kong Yidao!
column3: ข้า ขงอี้เตา!

column2: {PlayerName}。

column2: If there is any violation...
column3: หากมีการฝ่าฝืนใดๆ...

column2: Listen up, you thieves of Blue Wind Camp!
column3: เหล่าโจรแห่งค่ายวายุครามจงฟัง!

column2: You harm the people and are full of evil! Today, I am here on the orders of the pacification commissioner to flatten your stronghold!
It's that guy with the surname Lu who is causing trouble again, even messing up the good things between me and {PlayerSurName} brother, he is simply intolerable!
{PlayerSurName} brother, come with me to see how many guts they have to come to Blue Wind Camp and talk big!
Go back and tell your master that if he wants to exchange the lives of my brothers in Blue Wind Camp for his own bright future, I absolutely refuse!
Big brother, rest assured, we swear to live and die with Blue Wind Camp!
Good brother, I've had enough in this life!
column3: พี่น้องที่ดี ชีวิตนี้ข้าพึงพอใจแล้ว!

column2: {yell}<size=150%>Cut the grass and remove the roots\nLeave no one!</size>
This time, our Nest of Swallow really picked up a treasure. I didn't expect you to be so proficient in the way of stealing. The future growth of Nest of Swallow depends on you!
You new disciples who have just joined the Nest of Swallow are still too weak and haven't shown any outstanding character. Come find me when you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 15</color>.
During this time, you can go to the <color=#c44b0e>practice disciples</color> of our sect to learn and improve your strength as soon as possible.
Practice Steal Skill to level 2 with Kong Kong in Nest of Swallow.

Your stealing skills are not yet proficient. Go to the sleeping area inside and practice your stealing skills with <color=#c44b0e>Kong Kong</color>. Come find me when your Steal Skill is upgraded to level 2.
There is always a vague sense of unease in my heart. Is it my illusion? \nShould I continue to go inside, or run away now...
Continue forward (intense combat)
Temporarily run away from Nest of Swallow

I didn't expect that Qianxue has recruited a master who is good at Immobilize for the Crime Investigation Bureau this time. It really proves that appearances can be deceiving. With your help, the Crime Investigation Bureau will surely be more efficient in handling cases in the future.
Your current strength is too weak, there is no possibility of passing the entry-level assessment that is about to be conducted on you. Come back to me when you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 20</color>.
During this time, you can spar with the <color=#c44b0e>practice constable</color> of our bureau to quickly improve your own strength.
Crisis
{PlayerName}, we are now facing a crisis that could lead to the destruction of the Crime Investigation Bureau at any time, and I want to know your attitude at this moment.
A crisis that could lead to the destruction of the Crime Investigation Bureau at any time...\nMy attitude...
Stand or fall with the Crime Investigation Bureau! (High-intensity battle)
Let me think about it
column3: ให้ข้าคิดดูก่อน

column2: Good, I knew I didn't misjudge you!\nNext, let's welcome our distinguished guest together.

The Langya Sword Pavilion has a rule that new disciples must pass the test arranged by the old man to truly become a disciple of the Sword Pavilion. Your current strength is too weak, wait until you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 25</color> to talk.
During this time, you can spar with the <color=#c44b0e>practice disciple</color> of our pavilion to quickly improve your own level.
Suspicious
column3: น่าสงสัย

column2: Come back to Jian Chi for a task when you reach level 35.
You can now go to Jian Chi to accept the task of investigating suspicious people.

Recently, there have been suspicious individuals lurking around this pavilion. I originally planned to assign you to investigate this matter. However, your skills are too weak to undertake this task. Let's wait until your strength improves further.
Choose one of these two manuals as the martial arts gift from the old Taoist.\nIf it doesn't match the direction of your martial arts, don't force it, you can also give it to your partner to learn.
Granny, what is this?
Hahahaha
Strange, it seems to smell an unusual scent.
{yell}{PlayerName}, hold your breath!
There's poison in this incense...
Kid, no matter how cunning you are, you can't escape my calculations.
This voice sounds so familiar...
It's you! Weren't you already...
Hehe!
Disguise, faking death... You guys really have deep plans.
What can you do now that you know?
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
I have already delivered food to the Refugee Camp today. I'll deliver more tomorrow.
The Refugee Camp outside the city is short of food. We need to arrange for people to go into the city to buy food and deliver it to the people of the Refugee Camp to alleviate their urgent needs.
Rob the rich
Have intercepted merchant teams near the Blue Wind Camp {TagNum:清风寨劫富} times.
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
We can't do this kind of business too often. We need to take it slow, otherwise who would dare to pass by here in the future.
A wealthy man who is unkind to the poor is passing by with money he has swindled. It is said that the bodyguards he hired are weak and easy to defeat. Interested brothers can go and check it out.

This time the information is accurate. The wealthy man who escaped by luck before has appeared nearby again. It is said that the bodyguards he hired are highly skilled and numerous. Brothers who are confident in their own abilities can go and check it out.
Eliminate evil
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้าย

column2: Have cleared {TagNum:清风寨杀官} corrupt officials near the Blue Wind Camp.
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
Today's task has been completed. Dealing with these corrupt officials is not an overnight job, there's no need to rush.

A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!

A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several martial arts superb officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
Rescue
Have rescued {TagNum:清风寨救人} henchmen of the Blue Wind Camp from the Chuxiang City Prison.
Failed to rescue the henchmen of the Blue Wind Camp from the Chuxiang City Prison {TagNum:清风寨救人失败} times.
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
There are no brothers who need to be rescued for the time being.\nI hope our brothers won't get into trouble and get caught by the government in the future.
This matter is against the government and has a significant impact. I don't want to involve more people, so you should not participate in this for now.
It seems that the leader still treats me as an outsider.

A brother from the mountain stronghold was caught by the officials and is now imprisoned in the Chuxiang City Government Office Prison. If we don't rush to rescue him, I'm afraid this brother will be in great danger.
column3: พี่ชายคนหนึ่งจากฐานที่มั่นบนภูเขาถูกเจ้าหน้าที่จับได้ และตอนนี้กำลังถูกขังคุกอยู่ในเรือนจำศาลาว่าการเมืองฉู่เซียง ถ้าเราไม่รีบไปช่วยเขา ข้าเกรงว่าพี่ชายคนนี้จะตกอยู่ในอันตรายใหญ่หลวง

column2: There are still jailers in the Prison. If caught again, it would be a capital crime. I don't want to take that risk.
Great, you're here to cover my retreat. I'll go first to avoid being caught by those bailiffs again.
(Looking very ill)
(Seemingly in great pain)
(Sweat beads continuously dripping from his forehead)
Brother Kong, what's wrong with you? You look very uncomfortable.
Boss, what's wrong with you? You look very uncomfortable.
Alas, it's embarrassing to say...

I used to live on the edge every day, often licking blood off the blade. External injuries are not a big deal, but multiple Internal Injuries have not healed to this day, causing occasional bouts of pain.
Ordinary doctors are helpless with this. I'm afraid only a highly skilled national doctor in Medical can cure my Old illness.
Leave it to me. I'll find those highly skilled doctors in Medical to treat your injuries.
Have you found a doctor who can Heal my Old illness?
There's no progress yet, but I'll do my best.
Rescue
Go to Crime Investigation Bureau Prison to rescue the disciples of Nest of Swallow.
To rescue the disciples of Nest of Swallow, I have already caused a ruckus in Daliang City Prison {TagNum:大梁救燕子窝} times.
To rescue the disciples of Nest of Swallow, I have already caused a ruckus in Crime Investigation Bureau Prison {TagNum:神捕门救燕子窝} times.
I wonder if the boss of Nest of Swallow has any new arrangements today.
I thought I could catch a big fish from Nest of Swallow, but it turned out to be a small shrimp.
But with your reckless actions, we will eventually find the Nest of Swallow's lair and capture you all! Today, let's start with you little shrimps!
The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?
The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?
The disciples of Nest of Swallow who were locked outside should have been rescued by now. These fools were caught on the spot for their carelessness, which is really a disgrace to Nest of Swallow.

A brother from our sect was unfortunately captured by the Official and is now imprisoned in Daliang City Government Office Prison. If not rescued soon, he may not be able to withstand the torture and reveal the location of our sect.
column3: โชคไม่ดีที่พี่ชายจากพรรคของเราถูกทางการจับตัวไป และตอนนี้ถูกจำคุกในเรือนจำที่ศาลาว่าการเมืองต้าเหลียง หากไม่ได้รับการช่วยเหลือในเร็ว ๆ นี้, เขาอาจจะไม่สามารถทนต่อการทรมานและเปิดเผยที่ตั้งของพรรคของเราได้

column2: Thank you, brother, for your Righteous rescue. The crisis is now over. I'll go first, we'll meet again.
The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?
A brother from our sect was unfortunately captured by the Crime Investigation Bureau and is now imprisoned in Crime Investigation Bureau Prison. Brothers, please hurry to the rescue!
Brother, you have suffered, I will rescue you.
It's so dangerous here, why did you come?\nYou should Run away quickly, don't worry about me, we can't all fall here!
Stop talking nonsense, hurry up and Run away with me!
Since you're here, why rush to Run away?
You thieves from Nest of Swallow, you're really like rats in the sewer, popping up one after another to annoy people!
I reckon it won't be long before we find the Nest of Swallow's lair and wipe you all out! Today, let's start with you little mice!
Thank you, brother, for your Righteous rescue. The crisis is now over. I'll go first, we'll meet again.
The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?
It's a pity that we couldn't save this brother, this mission is considered a failure.
The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?
That was too dangerous just now, I almost lost my life.\nAlas, I failed to rescue the brother from the prison, this mission is considered a failure.
The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Nest of Swallow. Could it be that Nest of Swallow has been too ostentatious recently?
Patrol
column3: ลาดตระเวน

column2: You have participated in {TagNum:神捕门巡逻} Crime Investigation Bureau patrols.
I wonder if Chief Luo has any new arrangements today.
Those who dared to offend the Crime Investigation Bureau have been mostly dealt with, at least today should be more peaceful.
Recently received a secret report, there are villains coming to Crime Investigation Bureau to break the prison. We urgently need more hands for the night patrol of our prison, to be prepared!
City Patrol
You have participated in {TagNum:神捕门巡城} Daliang City patrols.
I wonder if Chief Luo has any new arrangements today.
There won't be any more thieves sneaking into Daliang City today, you can rest now.
Thieves often appear in Daliang City at midnight, the Crime Investigation Bureau is commissioned to patrol the city at night and catch the thieves as soon as possible.
Eliminate evil
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้าย

column2: You have participated in {TagNum:中州剿匪} operations to eliminate bandits in Zhongzhou.
I wonder if Sister Qianxue has any new arrangements today.
I haven't received any other news about bandits for now. When I do, I might need your help again.
Today we received news that bandits have appeared in Zhongzhou, committing all kinds of evil deeds. Unfortunately, I have other urgent tasks now, otherwise I would not stand by and do nothing.
Eliminate evil
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้าย

column2: You have participated in {TagNum:中州剿匪2} operations to eliminate villains in Zhongzhou.
I wonder if Brother Qiu has any new arrangements today.
The evil bandits should be quiet for now. If they stubbornly continue their wrongdoings, we will have to be ruthless!
There are many villains in Zhongzhou, kidnapping young and beautiful women everywhere. The Crime Investigation Bureau is gathering forces to eliminate these thieves and restore peace to the people.
My father has heard about you and he can't stop praising you.
Now that you have realized the superior Buddhism, I will give you a brocade robe to help you save all beings and achieve enlightenment as soon as possible.
{PlayerSurName}, we have been waiting here for a long time. If there is anything you need us to do, just give the order.
Come with me!
Nothing.
Forcing into the palace.
{PlayerSurName}, you have a full entourage, I can't join your team.
It's my fortune to serve you.
{PlayerSurName}, although you are my superior, entering the palace without a decree is a crime of rebellion. I have to stop you!
{PlayerName}, it seems that you really have the intention of rebellion. I will report to the emperor and punish you for the crime of exterminating nine clans!
At this point, there is no way back for you. Today will be an Invincible situation.
Royal decree to attend the coronation ceremony.
Summoned by the emperor.
Summoned by the emperor!
To redress the injustice for Marshal Ye!
To vindicate Marshal Ye!
Force your way into the traveling palace!
Meet the emperor.
Turn around and leave.
Assassin! Assassin!\nGuards, arrest the assassin quickly!
Marshal {PlayerSurName}, leave this to us, you just go into the palace!
I'm counting on you, brothers!
The soldiers under your command rush towards the guards who intend to stop you. You walk into the Palace hall as if no one is there.
{PlayerName}, it seems that you really have the intention of rebellion. I will report to the emperor and punish you for the crime of exterminating nine clans!
Thank Your Majesty.
Now that the world is initially settled, all of you are meritorious officials, why should I be stingy with rewards.
By the grace of heaven, the emperor decrees: Tong Ai, for collecting evidence of crimes, arresting rebels, and making great contributions, is appointed as the deputy of the Secretariat.
Thank you, Your Majesty!
By the grace of heaven, the emperor decrees: Qin Ai, for his strategic planning and appropriate measures, is promoted to the Duke of the country and ascends to the position of Shao Bao!
Thank you, Your Majesty!
By the grace of heaven, the emperor decrees: {PlayerSurName}...
Read it out loud, I want everyone in the court to hear it.
Yes!
As a general, only Loyalty matters.
Shoe Loss
You lead by example, interpreting the greatness of Confucian thought with your actions.
The subtle influence of Confucianism naturally forms a strong aura in you.
Miao Muli, you finally have your day! Let's settle our new and old grudges today!
column3: เมี้ยวมู่หลี ในที่สุดเจ้าก็มีวันนี้! มาสะสางเรื่องของเราให้เรียบร้อยเถอะ!

column2: Young man, I'll leave the aftermath to you, our Jiuli tribe is willing to make friends with you.
Chu Kuangsheng, do you still recognize me?
Yaoqin girl, you, why are you here?
Great opportunity!
Master, are you okay, let me heal you.
Hmph, I don't care about this little injury.
How can I stand by and do nothing as a disciple? I'll deal with them!
Qin Huizhi, what have you done!
{yell} Beast, dare to devour my cultivation!
Qin Huizhi, I'll tear you to pieces!!!
Win the title of the world's number one in the Peak Debate.
The minimum level of all team Characters reaches level 60, with at least 5 teammates.
column3: เลเวลขั้นต่ำของตัวละครในกลุ่มทั้งหมดถึงเลเวล 60 โดยมีเพื่อนร่วมกลุ่มอย่างน้อย 5 คน

column2: Continue to travel in the martial arts world!
End of the martial arts career.
Qin Huizhi, the Nine Factions Sect is causing chaos in the world, today I am here to eradicate you completely!
Let me see how a mantis can block a chariot, how a dragonfly can shake a big tree!
{yell} How could I possibly lose, how could I lose!
The mountain is high, but the work is incomplete...
The heavens want to destroy me, it's not my fault...
From Qin Huizhi down, all of Nine Factions Sect died, a layer of filth has finally been thoroughly cleansed...
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Nine Factions Sect, annihilated!</color></size>
I heard that the leader is recruiting soldiers and buying horses, I want to know more about it.

The Jiujiang Water Camp was originally a gathering of desperate people. Some people lost their homes and lives due to heavy taxes, some people lost their wives and children due to war, in short, they were all innocent and pitiful people.

The stockpile of food in the mountain stronghold is not much. With more people joining, livelihood becomes a problem. We can't farm on the water, and the government doesn't allow us to go into the city to exchange for food, so we have to find another way.

Fortunately, there are many ships passing by on the Jiujiang River, most of which are merchant ships or public ships carrying supplies. Those goods were originally exploited from the people, and we take them for our own use, which can be considered as making the best use of everything.
Apart from the necessary expenses, the remaining goods are equally distributed to the brothers in the camp. No one in the Jiujiang Water Camp can hide private goods, not even me.

Since I took charge of the Jiujiang Water Camp, no one in the martial arts world dares to offend. There are only a handful of people who can withstand my <color=#c44b0e>Devouring Blade</color>. Not to mention that I also have a unique skill of <color=#c44b0e>Dust Clearing</color>, even if it is a thousand troops and horses, it is a one-way trip!
Now, wherever there are rivers and lakes, it is our Jiujiang Water Camp that has the final say, even if the king of heaven comes, he has to go around!
This is all I can tell you, did you hear it clearly?
I heard it clearly.
Please say it again, leader.
If you want to join the water camp, you have to pass the test, no one can be an exception.
Are you ready to take the test?
Take the test!
Ask for details about the test.
Think about it again.
The test is simple. Today a rich merchant will pass by our camp by water. If you can bring back the goods on his ship, the test is considered passed.
Isn't this asking me to be a robber who robs wealth?
If you don't do this, someone else will. That's the way the world is. If you meet someone with a kind heart, you might spare these people's lives. If you meet some people, hehe...
Are you ready to take the test?
Good! I, the leader of this stronghold, will be waiting for your good news!
{PlayerName} brother, the merchant's ship is just ahead.\nI can only take you this far, good luck.
You're unlucky to pass by here today, hand over the goods if you know what's good for you!
Water, water bandits!\nWhere are the bodyguards! Where are the bodyguards!?
Don't be afraid, boss. They're just water bandits. Leave it to us!
Alright, I'll leave it to you!\nI paid a lot for you, don't disappoint me!
Hey, boss, watch this!
Good man, good man, I have an old mother at home and a newborn baby, let's talk it out. As long as you don't kill me, you can take whatever you like from this ship!
As long as you hand over all the valuable things on the ship, I won't make things difficult for you.
Alright, alright, everything is here. Take it all, just take it all!
You plunder all the valuable things on the ship and return with a full load.
Transition to the next scene, clear the people on the ship, return to the gathering hall
Leader, all the goods from the ship are here, please have a look.
I knew I wasn't wrong about you, you're born for this job!
Thank you for your praise, leader!
{PlayerName}, since you've already run away, stick to your original decision!
{PlayerName}, you can come and go freely in Jiujiang Water Camp, but if you want to leave, you need to leave the stronghold token <color=#c44b0e>Jiujiang fish pole</color> behind. I won't stop you.

However, if you want to run away, all your previous efforts in the stronghold will be in vain, and the water stronghold will no longer welcome you. Your stronghold talent <color=#097a76>Upstream walk</color> and contributions will also be erased. Have you thought it through?
I've made up my mind! <color=#c44b0e>(Return the Jiujiang fish pole)</color>
I've made up my mind! (Don't return the Jiujiang fish pole)
I was just kidding.
Alright, from today on, you're no longer a brother of the water stronghold.\nIf you become an enemy of the water stronghold, don't blame me for not remembering old times!
Since you're so determined, get out of Jiujiang Water Camp, I don't want to see you again!
{PlayerSurName} brother, are you also leaving me?\nSigh, fine, if you want to leave, then leave.
I've made up my mind. <color=#0574a8>(Leave Jiujiang Water Camp)</color>
Let me think about it.
Leader, take care.
Establishing the Water Stronghold
Intercepting Supplies
Intercept the ships carrying supplies on the river.
Go back and report to the leader.
You're too weak now, going out on a mission might mess things up and lose face for the water stronghold. I'll only trust you with tasks when you reach at least <color=#c44b0e>level 20</color>.
{PlayerName}, you've been with the water stronghold for a while now, there's a business opportunity that I want to entrust to you, don't disappoint me.
Just give the order, leader.
I recently got news that a batch of grain and grass is being transported by water to the Chu-Xiang region. How can we let it pass without taking a share!
Understood, I will go and collect the goods for the leader right away!
General, there are often water bandits around here, I'm afraid...
We are soldiers, they are thieves, there's no such thing as soldiers being afraid of thieves.
I can only say that you guys are too inexperienced.
How dare you thieves, even the official's ship you dare to plunder!
Who told you to be so rich?\nIt would be wise to give up resistance, it would save me some trouble.
The military merit that comes to the door must not let this kid run away.
Yes!
You few want to catch me for military merit, are you blind?
This task is too easy, go back and report to the leader.
Well done, you didn't let this camp leader down!
Now, I can officially teach you our Water Camp's exclusive talent <color=#097a76>Upstream walk</color>.
From today on, you are a brother of our Water Camp, sharing both blessings and hardships!
Thank you for your appreciation, Camp Leader.
The business of Jiujiang Water Camp
Business
Go to Lin'an City, convince the owner of Wine God Tower to hire the cargo ship of Jiujiang Water Camp, and pay a deposit.
Return to Jiujiang Water Camp and report to Ding Fengbo.

Young man, don't aim too high. There will be plenty of tasks for you in the future.\nThe most urgent task is to build good relations with the brothers in the water camp, after all, you are also a part of the water camp.
\n|(It seems that I need to make my relations with the water camp reach <color=#097a76>Friendly (Relations 20)</color> first, so that the camp leader can trust me with new tasks.)
The Wine God Tower in Lin'an City is ignorant, daring to hire other families' cargo ships to transport goods for them. Do they look down on our Jiujiang Water Camp?
{PlayerName}, you go and warn the shopkeeper of the Wine God Tower. If they don't use the ships of Jiujiang Water Camp for transportation, I guarantee their goods will never reach their destination.
These merchants are all cunning. To prevent them from reneging after agreeing, collect <color=#097a76>10 taels of Gold bullion</color> from them as a deposit!
Yes, sir!
Shopkeeper, I have a business proposal to discuss with you.
That's great, I wonder if you have a new wine recipe or a way to get more wine?

Neither, I represent the Jiujiang Water Camp. Please hire our Jiujiang Water Camp's ships for your business in the future. This way, both you and our water camp will benefit, it's a win-win situation.
Our water camp's reputation and strength will definitely reassure you. Before that, you need to pay 10 taels of Gold bullion as a deposit, and then we can consider this deal done.
But I've already made arrangements with other ship owners. If I break my word, the business of this Wine God Tower will be impossible to do in the future.
(What can I do to change the shopkeeper's mind?)
Convince with force! (Specific battle)
Persuade to convince. (Persuade reaches level 3 Advance)
Rely on relations with the shopkeeper. (Relations with the shopkeeper reach 60)
Come back later.
Alas, I am a person who values relationships.\nFor your sake, brother, I will cooperate with your Jiujiang Water Camp this time.
Thank you for your consideration, shopkeeper. I wish the Wine God Tower a prosperous business and abundant wealth in the future.

The world is bustling, all for profit; the world is bustling, all for profit. \nCooperating with Wine God Tower is a win-win situation for Jiujiang Water Camp, which will only make Wine God Tower more profitable than ever...
Half a shichen later...
Well, you do have a point.\nI'll take your word for it this time and cooperate with Jiujiang Water Camp.
Thank you for your consideration, shopkeeper. I wish the Wine God Tower a prosperous business and abundant wealth in the future.
Don't you dare to refuse the toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit, there's nothing Jiujiang Water Camp can't do!
Are you trying to cause trouble in Lin'an City?
I'd like to see what the consequences would be.
I heard someone is causing trouble at Wine God Tower? Who's so bold!
Officer, this guy claims to be from Jiujiang Water Camp, he came to Wine God Tower to extort money and threatened to commit violence if he failed, he was taught a lesson by the staff in the tower.
Jiujiang Water Camp... How could there be such a weakling in Jiujiang Water Camp, he must be an imposter, lock him up in Prison to prevent him from causing trouble.
I heard someone is causing trouble at Wine God Tower? Who's so bold!
Officer, this guy claims to be from Jiujiang Water Camp, he came to Wine God Tower to extort money and threatened to commit violence if he failed, he crippled all the staff in my tower.
Are you from Jiujiang Water Camp?
Yes, our leader sent me to do business with Wine God Tower.
Well, since it's a business matter, the government should not interfere, you should negotiate and solve it by yourselves.
Officer, don't ignore me.
Can we continue to discuss the business now?
Collusion between officials and bandits, collusion between officials and bandits...
You guys from Jiujiang Water Camp have eyes and ears everywhere, I admit defeat, I'll cooperate with Jiujiang Water Camp this time.
Thank you for your consideration, shopkeeper. I wish the Wine God Tower a prosperous business and abundant wealth in the future.
Kid, hand over all the valuable things on you!
I have quite a few valuable things on me, if you have the ability, come and get them.
I didn't expect you to have good things on you!\nThese Gold bullion will be your tribute, we are not interested in anything else.
You guys from Horse King Cave took the merchant's deposit, how am I going to explain to the leader when I go back.
That's your problem, it has nothing to do with us, get lost.
(It seems I have to find a way to rob Horse King Cave and get the deposit back.)
A bunch of useless people, trying to rob like others? Humph!
I have successfully persuaded the owner of Wine God Tower to cooperate with us, here is the deposit he handed over.
You did a clean and beautiful job, the leader will reward you heavily!
Thank you, leader!
As long as you don't lose face for our water camp, you don't have to worry about causing trouble in Wine God Tower, the government won't interfere with our affairs.
Shopkeeper, I have a business proposal to discuss with you.
That's great, I wonder if you have a new wine recipe or a way to get more wine?

Neither, I represent the Jiujiang Water Camp. Please hire our Jiujiang Water Camp's ships for your business in the future. This way, both you and our water camp will benefit, it's a win-win situation.
Our water camp's reputation and strength will definitely reassure you. Before that, you need to pay 10 taels of Gold bullion as a deposit, and then we can consider this deal done.
I'll bring it to you right away!
You look more pleasing to the eye than the previous owner, I don't need to say much.
Yes, sir! Yes, sir!
Kang Wang's envoy
Special envoy
column3: ทูตพิเศษ

column2: Go to the river to chase the special envoy.
Return to Jiujiang Water Camp to report.
If you're not strong enough, don't rush to stand out, or you'll lose your life.
(I'll come back to the leader for a task when I reach level 40.)
Well, with your strength, you can help the leader do some things.\nThere will be a distinguished guest visiting later, you stay here first.
Subordinate obeys.
Ding Fengbo pays respect to the special envoy.
Hmm?
{PlayerName}, pay your respects to the special envoy quickly!
Jiujiang Water Camp's unknown soldier {PlayerName}, pays respect to the special envoy.
Ding Fengbo, this little brother of yours is a bit ignorant.
I will definitely discipline him strictly, please don't worry about it, special envoy.
(Murmuring) Using power to bully others
Hmm?
There are quite a few flies and mosquitoes in your Jiujiang Water Camp, buzzing around and annoying me.
Camp Leader Ding, you have repeatedly delayed the tasks assigned by His Highness Kang Wang. His Highness asked me to inquire if you have any complaints against him?
His Highness Kang Wang saved my life, I dare not have any complaints.
It's just that the tasks His Highness assigns each time are not easy tasks, they take quite a bit of effort, so I had to delay them for a while.
If it were easy tasks, would we need to bother your Jiujiang Water Camp?

Ding Fengbo, remember this, you are nothing more than a dog of His Highness Kang Wang. Only by obeying the master's orders can you have meat to eat. Moreover, His Highness has more than one dog, don't overestimate your importance!
I will keep this in mind and ensure that I won't cause any trouble for His Highness in the future.
Envoy, there is a banquet prepared in the kitchen to welcome you, please honor us with your presence.
I'm not eating. What good food can you have here? You even smell like fish, and it can't be washed off.
I don't want to stay in this broken place for a moment, I will report back to His Highness now.
Then... I bid you farewell, Envoy.
Big brother, this Duke Kang's manor is increasingly looking down on us. Now even a eunuch dares to boss around in front of you.
We work hard for His Highness, but the credit goes to others. If we make the slightest mistake, we will be blackmailed for bribes.

Big brother, it's a chaotic world now. Our water camp is well-equipped and solid as gold soup. Why should we continue to work under Kang Wang's control? It's better to break up with Kang Wang sooner and no longer be controlled by him.
Camp leader, I have a word of advice: a small tolerance can prevent a big plan from being ruined.
{PlayerName}！
I'm here!
The envoy left in a hurry just now and forgot to take the silver ticket that I had prepared. Please catch up with the envoy and deliver the silver ticket.
(Taking the silver ticket)
I will definitely handle this matter properly.
The silver ticket that the camp leader gave me just now seems a bit strange...
(Taking out the silver ticket)
This is not a silver ticket, it's just a piece of waste paper. What does the camp leader mean by this?
Two generals (40 level elites with Passive) +5 (35 level Song soldiers) behind the envoy\nFacing the protagonist
If I remember correctly, you are the little guy next to Ding Fengbo. What are you doing here? Did Ding Fengbo mess up and want me to clean up after him?
(The camp leader gave me a piece of waste paper, claiming that I was to deliver a silver ticket. What should I do?)
Offer 10 strings of silver coins, gracious envoy. (10000Coin)
Hand over the blank waste paper. (Start the fight directly)
Well, Camp Leader Ding still knows some manners, I'll accept this token of appreciation.
Little guy, I see you are not ordinary, let's form a good relationship today, it may come in handy in the future.
Thank you, Envoy.
What do you mean by that?
What do you think it means?
You came all the way here to give me paper money for the dead...
So that's what the camp leader meant...
Yes, this money is for your journey to the afterlife.
You little monkey, you're courting death!
The camp leader offered a generous amount of gold, the envoy's guards were tempted and killed the envoy, then they quarreled over the spoils...
With such arrangements, no one would notice that it's Vulnerable.
Reporting to the leader, the silver has been delivered, and the special envoy is very satisfied.
{PlayerName} You've worked hard.\nYou handled this matter appropriately, truly a rare talent in Jiujiang Water Camp.
I will teach you my unique skill as a reward.
Thank you, leader.
The special envoy should still be Above river, not far away, you must personally deliver the silver ticket to him.
Hongmen Banquet
column3: งานเลี้ยงหงเหมิน

column2: Attend the banquet
column3: เข้าร่วมงานเลี้ยง

column2: Go to Lin'an CityDuke Kang's manor to meet Kang Wang.
Return to Jiujiang Water Camp to report.
column3: กลับไปรายงานที่ค่ายน้ำจิ่วเจียง

column2: I'm not very confident about entrusting this task to you, let's think it over.
(It seems that the leader still has doubts about my strength, I'll come back when my Level reaches 50.)
Kang Wang invites me to a banquet in Lin'an City, there's no good wine or banquet, I wonder what he's up to.
Ignore whatever damn banquet it is, we just don't care.\nThis is a real Hongmen Banquet, just waiting for the big brother to walk in.
If the leader goes to the banquet, it shows that he has a clear conscience. If Kang Wang is against the leader, he will lose the people's heart. Who will work for him in the future!

{PlayerSurName} Brother, I want you to represent me at the banquet. Firstly, we Jiujiang Water Camp have done the courtesy, secondly, Kang Wang will not embarrass you for fear of hurting the mouse, you can take the opportunity to probe the reality.
Yes, sir!
I thought the leader of Jiujiang Water Camp would not dare to come in person, but I didn't expect you to be sent. This really poses a big problem for me.
{PlayerName}, Ding Fengbo has repeatedly defied my will. He thinks he has enough troops and food to compete with me, so he wants to break away from my control.
You are the one I value, I will not embarrass you today.\nHowever, I advise you to leave Jiujiang Water Camp as soon as possible to avoid being implicated in the future.
Since you are not the one I want to deal with, this Hongmen Banquet has nothing to do with you. You tell Ding Fengbo to take care of himself.
I sincerely invited, but the leader of Jiujiang Water Camp refused to come, what a big scene.
The leader is not feeling well, I am here to represent the leader at the banquet, please forgive me, Kang Wang.
{PlayerName}, you are not qualified in front of me.
It's too early for Kang Wang to say that.
Humph, so confident, then I'll give you an appetizer first, see if you can eat it!
Guards!
This man is just a lowly servant in the mansion, let him play with you.
Since you lost the martial arts competition, you know the rules of Duke Kang's manor.
Yes!
{PlayerName}, you have aroused my curiosity, I want to know how capable you are.
Please continue the banquet, your highness.
(Clapping hands)
Please teach me.
Considering your past merits, I'll punish you to be a small soldier on the frontier.
Thank you for your magnanimity, your majesty.
It seems that if this Hongmen Banquet doesn't serve some hard dishes, I'm afraid it will be laughed at by you Jiujiang Water Camp.
Trained army uses soldiers for a while
Sir, you can make a move now
I pay my respects to your highness.
You've been lurking in my mansion for many years, today it's time for you to show me something.
Thanks to your highness's kindness for many years, today is the day to repay you.
{PlayerName}, this dish was originally prepared for Ding Fengbo. Now that he is not fortunate enough to enjoy it, you can enjoy it on his behalf.
Sir, you are old, it's better to return to your hometown and enjoy your old age.
I feel ashamed in front of your highness!
Why are you doing this?
I have betrayed your highness's trust, only death can repay your kindness.
{PlayerName}, I take back my previous contempt for you, I can have a frank discussion with you.
Ding Fengbo has repeatedly defied my will, he probably thinks that his troops and supplies are sufficient to compete with me, so he wants to break away from my control.
I value your abilities, I will not make things difficult for you today. However, I advise you to leave Jiujiang Water Camp as soon as possible to avoid getting involved in the future.
Today's feast is over, you go back and tell Ding Fengbo to take care of himself.
Subordinate has successfully completed the task and is here to report.
You tell Ding Fengbo about your experience at Duke Kang's manor without missing a word...
Take care of yourself... take care of yourself
Kang Wang told me to take care of myself, it seems he is planning to take action against the water camp.
Since we have fallen out with Duke Kang's manor, we may face retaliation from Duke Kang's manor at any time. The top priority is to enhance our strength to deal with future uncertainties.

{PlayerSurName} brother, you are the most trusted person in the camp and have made great contributions. Today, I will pass on this peerless knife technique to you, hoping that you can save the water camp from crisis in the future with this technique.
Subordinate only looks up to the camp leader!
There is no good wine, no good feast, you have to be careful.
Crisis of the Water Camp
Go to Jiujiang Water Camp to report.
By the order of Kang Wang, seal off Wuyue ferry, no boats are allowed to go down the water!
(Kang Wang is really taking action against Jiujiang Water Camp, the camp leader is still unaware, should I break through the blockade and rush to report?)
Force through! (Start the battle directly)
Think long-term.
I'm just passing by...
Then run away quickly!
Humph, you overestimate yourself!
Where is the ferryman of this ferry?
He, he was taken by us.
Let him go!
Defying Kang Wang's order, you can't escape death.
Release the ferryman, and I will spare your life. You can still leave Duke Kang's manor and live in hiding; otherwise, when this matter gets out, do you think Kang Wang will spare you?
Okay, okay, I'll go and release him now.
Thank you for your rescue.
It's my duty, no need for formalities.
Young hero, can I, can I leave now?
Go, the further the better.
{yell} Zhu Ge Shenji, I have treated you well, why do you want to poison me!
A wise man submits to circumstances, the conditions offered by Duke Kang left me no reason to refuse.
Big brother was blind to save you, a thankless wretch!
Ding Fengbo, give up resistance. Duke Kang's army is coming, Jiujiang Water Camp has no other way but to surrender completely.
Big brother, don't believe his nonsense!
Do you want me to surrender and let you slaughter me?
Your life in exchange for the lives of thousands of people in Jiujiang Water Camp, this is a very worthwhile deal.
{PlayerSurName} brother, a good bird chooses a tree to nest in, what is your choice now?
Coexist or perish with Jiujiang Water Camp!
Leave Jiujiang Water Camp.
No matter how well the leader treats me, he is not my parents. At this moment, survival is the most important.
Fine, I was blind. I, Ding Fengbo, am a so-called hero, but I have raised two ungrateful wolves!
{PlayerSurName}, you betrayed your big brother, you betrayed Jiujiang Water Camp, you will not die a good death!
Just the two of you, trying to force the leader of this camp to submit, it's simply wishful thinking.
It seems you have underestimated Prince Kang Wang.
Prince Kang Wang {yell} has ordered, the bandit leader Ding Fengbo should be killed on the spot, and the rest will be forgiven.
Kill Ding Fengbo!|Kill, kill!|Leader, we can only live if you die.
