Originally a dominant force on the water with strong soldiers and abundant provisions, it turned into a nightmare due to internal strife in the Righteous Hall.\nA generation of heroes, despite their unwillingness, could not reverse this carefully set up situation.\nWhen a person dies, it's like a lamp going out, and the grand plan of domination comes to a halt...
column3: เดิมทีเป็นกองกำลังที่โดดเด่นเหนือผืนน้ำพร้อมด้วยทหารที่แข็งแกร่งและเสบียงที่อุดมสมบูรณ์ มันกลายเป็นฝันร้ายเนื่องจากความขัดแย้งภายในหอคุณธรรม\nวีรบุรุษรุ่นหนึ่งแม้จะไม่เต็มใจ แต่ก็ไม่สามารถพลิกกลับสถานการณ์ที่เตรียมไว้อย่างรอบคอบนี้ได้\nเมื่อมีคนตายก็เหมือนตะเกียงดับลง และแผนการครอบงำอันยิ่งใหญ่ก็หยุดชะงักลง...

column2: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>Jiujiang Water Camp, annihilated!</color></size>
{PlayerSurName} brother, you made the right choice, fortunately we did not have to meet with swords.
This manual was used by Ding Fengbo to win people's hearts. Today I present it to {PlayerSurName} brother as a gift, which is also the intention of Prince Kang Wang.
Prince Kang Wang has entrusted me with the management of Jiujiang Water Camp, and from now on, {PlayerSurName} brother will be a distinguished guest of Jiujiang Water Camp.
After this battle, Jiujiang Water Camp has suffered heavy losses. How many people can stay? What's the point of you sitting in this position?
Although Jiujiang Water Camp has been hurt, under my management, it will not take long to become even more powerful than when it was under Ding Fengbo.
Maybe you will be the next Ding Fengbo, the lesson is right in front of you.
Kang Wang's extermination plan is really ruthless, a simple internal strife easily wiped out the dominant Jiujiang Water Camp on the water, it seems I need to be careful of this guy.
I'm willing to do anything, but I don't want to be a traitor, so...
Opposing Prince Kang Wang, you are seeking your own death!
{PlayerSurName}, you are really loyal!
Zhu Ge Shenji, the bird that sticks its head out gets shot. Now you are alone, aren't you afraid that the leader of this camp will use you to make an example?
It seems you have underestimated Prince Kang Wang.
Prince Kang Wang {yell} has ordered, the bandit leader Ding Fengbo should be killed on the spot, and the rest will be forgiven.
Kill Ding Fengbo!|Kill, kill!|Leader, we can only live if you die.
Hmph, a bunch of rabble.
I didn't expect Kang Wang had already infiltrated Jiujiang Water Camp. If it weren't for {PlayerSurName} brother's timely return, I'm afraid I would have been collecting my body.
I've always felt that Zhu Ge Shenji was sneaky and not a good thing, but the big brother thought that talented people always have some quirks...
I really misjudged this time, I have been cultivating him with all my heart, this time it can be considered as removing a cancer for Jiujiang Water Camp.
{PlayerSurName} brother, this time you saved the water camp from danger, I really don't have anything worthy to reward you for your contribution...
What do you think of my sister, Haitang?
{yell}, what nonsense are you talking about? Are you trying to use your sister as a gift?
I almost forgot, this Manual is the internal martial arts method that I relied on to establish myself in the martial arts world. I will give it to you today.
Used in conjunction with the Devouring Blade I taught you before, it will have unexpected effects!
Brother, hold on, don't run away, Haitang...
Miss Haitang, the dead cannot be resurrected, please mourn.
{PlayerName}, my brother won't die, right?
I hope so too, but unfortunately, this is not something that can be reversed by human power.
Jiujiang Water Camp is now severely injured. Miss Haitang needs to cheer up and clean up the mess as soon as possible, otherwise the camp leader's life's hard work will be wasted.
This, this situation, I'm afraid I can't handle it.
I'm here, I'll help you, I won't let Jiujiang Water Camp fall.
You must remember your promise to me today.
Meet Ding Haitang, the camp leader.
{PlayerGivenName}, I will always remember that you are the benefactor of Jiujiang Water Camp and my benefactor, Ding Haitang.
Kang Wang's extermination plan is really ruthless, a simple internal strife easily wiped out the dominant Jiujiang Water Camp on the water, it seems I need to be careful of this guy.
Now that Jiujiang Water Camp is in name only, it doesn't make sense for me to stay any longer. I'll leave the camp.
{yell}, I've treated you well, why did you poison me!
A wise man submits to circumstances, the conditions offered by Duke Kang left me no reason to refuse.
I didn't expect there to be a white-eyed wolf like you in the camp!
Ding Fengbo, give up resistance. Duke Kang's army is coming, Jiujiang Water Camp has no other way but to surrender completely.
Big brother, don't believe his nonsense!
Do you want me to surrender and let you slaughter me?
Your life in exchange for the lives of thousands of people in Jiujiang Water Camp, this is a very worthwhile deal.
Brother, good birds choose trees to nest. Following Lord Kang Wang, wealth and glory are just around the corner. Why be a thief in the camp?
I'm willing to do anything, but I don't want to be a traitor, so...
Opposing Prince Kang Wang, you are seeking your own death!
{PlayerSurName}, you are really loyal!
The bird that sticks out gets shot. You're alone now, aren't you afraid of being used by the camp leader to make an example?
It seems you have underestimated Prince Kang Wang.
Prince Kang Wang {yell} has ordered, the bandit leader Ding Fengbo should be killed on the spot, and the rest will be forgiven.
Kill Ding Fengbo!|Kill, kill!|Leader, we can only live if you die.
Hmph, a bunch of rabble.
I didn't expect Kang Wang had already infiltrated Jiujiang Water Camp. If it weren't for {PlayerSurName} brother's timely return, I'm afraid I would have been collecting my body.
I've been advising my brother not to accept everyone. There are all kinds of people here, and there might be spies from other forces.
Alas, it seems that I was a bit too hasty.
{PlayerSurName} brother, this time you saved the water camp from danger, I really don't have anything worthy to reward you for your contribution...
What do you think of my sister, Haitang?
{yell}, what nonsense are you talking about? Are you trying to use your sister as a gift?
I almost forgot, this Manual is the internal martial arts method that I relied on to establish myself in the martial arts world. I will give it to you today.
Used in conjunction with the Devouring Blade I taught you before, it will have unexpected effects!
Brother, hold on, don't run away, Haitang...
Miss Haitang, the dead cannot be resurrected, please mourn.
{PlayerName}, my brother won't die, right?
I hope so too, but unfortunately, this is not something that can be reversed by human power.
Jiujiang Water Camp is now severely injured. Miss Haitang needs to cheer up and clean up the mess as soon as possible, otherwise the camp leader's life's hard work will be wasted.
This, this situation, I'm afraid I can't handle it.
I'm here, I'll help you, I won't let Jiujiang Water Camp fall.
You must remember your promise to me today.
Meet Ding Haitang, the camp leader.
{PlayerGivenName}, I will always remember that you are the benefactor of Jiujiang Water Camp and my benefactor, Ding Haitang.
Kang Wang's extermination plan is really ruthless, a simple internal strife easily wiped out the dominant Jiujiang Water Camp on the water, it seems I need to be careful of this guy.
Now that Jiujiang Water Camp is in name only, it doesn't make sense for me to stay any longer. I'll leave the camp.
Please wait!
I have been practicing martial arts since I was a child, and now I have achieved a little. I want to compete with you!
I'm not interested in competing with you. No matter who gets hurt, it's not good.
It seems that you still don't know about the <color=#c44b0e>competition</color>.

<color=#c44b0e>Defeating the opponent for the first time, you will gain corresponding Fame and a lot of EXP based on the opponent's identity</color>. This is a shortcut to stand out in the martial arts world.
Correspondingly, the higher the Fame, the more trouble will come. For example, more powerful characters will come to compete. If you can't satisfy them, they will follow you like annoying flies.
It seems that you won't give up unless I accept your challenge today.\nIn that case...
Accept the challenge!
Refuse the challenge.
Hmph, <color=#c44b0e>tomorrow</color> I will come to find you again, don't think I will be easily dismissed.
How about your consideration today? If you still refuse to compete, I will harass you every day!
Today's battle will be the battle that will make me famous in this life!
Are you satisfied now? You won't bother me anymore, will you?
I won't waste my time on a weakling like you. My goal is to challenge all the famous masters in the world. You are just a stepping stone for me.
Damn it...
Are you satisfied now? You won't bother me anymore, will you?
My goal is to challenge all the famous masters in the world, but I didn't expect that I can't even defeat a weakling like you...
When you deny yourself, can you not belittle others?
Do I have to keep lowering my standards for the challenges I take on? Damn it...
Mr. Shi, how dare you sell me defective goods! Believe it or not, I'll smash your Glittering Artifact House!
I guarantee with my reputation that there is not a single defective item in the Glittering Artifact House. Please don't make false accusations.
Then you should check on the spot whether this is a defective product!
(Takes the handed over item)
This thing of yours is shattered, it's absolutely defective. But how can you prove that it was bought from our store?
I bought it from you, and you want to deny it!
Alright, then tell me, how much did you pay for it initially?
This, this... Anyway, it was very expensive. Why are you asking so many questions?
Even if I were to compensate you, I would need to know the original price.
That's true... It seems like it was 1 guan? 5 guan, oh no, it seems like it was 10 guan...
If you're trying to extort money, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Do you not know what my Glittering Artifact House does?
I don't care what you do, today you either pay money, or mortgage your <color=#c44b0e>extra courtyard</color> to me, otherwise we will stay here and not leave!
It seems like I've encountered a situation of extortion...
Help the shopkeeper out. (Specific battle)
Don't meddle in other's business.
It seems you prefer punishment over a friendly toast. Let's show him what we're capable of, brothers!
Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
Is this the legendary Decisive Throw, the ultimate skill of throwing money at people!
Which distinguished guest has arrived at the door?
I am {PlayerName}, invited by the owner of the Glittering Artifact House.
So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, I am the owner, Shi Wansan.
You guys really prefer punishment over a friendly toast.
Who do you think you are, trying to meddle in our affairs?
I am an invited guest. You guys ruined my mood. This is not meddling, right?
Today, you'll learn the consequences of meddling!
Please spare us, we won't dare to do it again.
Get lost, don't embarrass yourself here.
I wonder which distinguished guest has arrived, I failed to welcome you from afar, please forgive me?
I am {PlayerName}, invited by the owner of the Glittering Artifact House.
So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, I am the owner, Shi Wansan.

Thank you, Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, for your righteous action. I had an important event to hold here today. If those guys had ruined it, the reputation of my Glittering Artifact House would have been tarnished.
It's a small effort, you don't have to be so polite.

The matter of the young hero is a trivial matter, but for me, reputation is a big deal. I have a vacant courtyard outside Daliang City. If the young hero doesn't mind, please accept it as a token of my gratitude.
A courtyard? That's too generous, I can't accept it.
Actually, this courtyard is not mine, but I'm looking for a worthy person on behalf of my deceased friend.

My friend specifically instructed that only a person of good character and martial arts skills is qualified to be the new owner of this courtyard. So it's your destiny, and it also fulfills my friend's wish.
In that case, thank you, Mr. Shi, and your friend.
You have not received an invitation from the host, it's not appropriate to stay here for long, please leave quickly!
You dare to compete with me, you'll all end up dead!
Happiness shared is happiness doubled.
The secret of Wuxian Mountain has been leaked.
None of you are willing to back down, let's see who's the real deal.
Kill, kill, let them all die.
There seems to be a fierce competition for some treasure ahead...
Strike first and gain the upper hand! (Fight immediately)
Approach and ask for the reason.
Fall back, return the way you came.
What are you guys fighting over? We meet by fate, how about sharing a piece with me!
A greenhorn like you also wants a piece of the action, what a daydream!
This kid is not small talk, he must be powerful.\nLet's join forces to get rid of him first, so he won't take advantage of us!
The treasure is not on these people, I should have left one alive.
Gentlemen, what are you fighting over here?
This is none of your business, get lost!
I beg to differ, the treasure has not been found yet, one more person means one more chance.
Do you think you can search the entire Wuxian Mountain by yourself?

I might as well tell you, there is a rumor in the martial arts world that there is a fairyland in Wuxian Mountain. Someone once cultivated a unique skill in the fairyland and dominated the world at a young age.

Wuxian Mountain is covered by clouds all year round, blocking the view, and the mountain road is very steep and dangerous. Only these few days of the year will the clouds dissipate. We all came here to find that fairyland and practice that legendary skill.
Did you leak the information about Wuxian Mountain?
It's better to help the world than to be selfish, I won't keep the good stuff to myself, the more people share, the better.
I think you just want to stir up trouble and take advantage of the situation.
We haven't found the fairyland yet, but we're killing each other. This is how someone with ulterior motives can take advantage.
Enough talk, let's work together to find the fairyland first!
In that case, let's each look for the fairyland now, and the first one to find it will signal with fireworks!
Agree!
That was close, I almost fell off the cliff, it's safer to stay away from this dangerous place.
I'm curious about what's down there, the storybooks always say that there are fairy caves or reclusive masters under the cliffs...
Climb down the cliff (Strength20, Stamina100)
Jump down the cliff (Dexterity20, Stamina100)
Use a rope to go down (Rope20, Stamina100)
Safety first, stay away from danger
Do you want to go down and explore again?
This is...
Could this be the fairyland those people were talking about?
Should I signal those people to come over now, so they won't say I'm not trustworthy...
Send a signal
Don't send a signal
It will take those people a long time to get here, I'll take a look around first.
Good boy, you really are trustworthy!
I didn't expect those people to find this place so quickly.
Kid, you really want to keep it all to yourself, you didn't even signal us!
I didn't expect those people to find this place so quickly.
I thought it was a fairyland like a paradise, but it's just so-so here.
Kid, have you found anything good here?
No special findings were discovered.
It's rare to come down here, everyone should check carefully, don't miss any good things.
What a gain, there's actually a big peach here!
I actually found a peach here too.
Unexpectedly, there are witch saltwater fish here!
It's a pity that I didn't bring fishing gear, otherwise I would have to fish a few and taste them.
There's something strange here!
Ya--Ha!!!
The grave doesn't look like a grave, the tomb doesn't look like a tomb, what a broken thing!
Nothing at all!
I don't know which bastard is playing a prank.
It seems that this is not the fairyland we are looking for, what a waste of effort!
This kid is simply misleading us, let's go and look elsewhere.
Phew, these few gentlemen finally left.
It seems that this is not the fairyland we are looking for, what a waste of effort!
I suspect that this kid came first and hid all the good things.
Kid, hand over everything you found!
You guys can't find anything on your own, so you want to rob me?
Stop talking nonsense with him, clean him up first, then search his body!
Although I haven't found any good things yet, I still have to thank you guys, you have brought me a lot of good things for no reason.
No, no special findings were discovered.
Your expression is a bit strange!
Everyone should check carefully, don't miss any good things.
No abnormalities were found here.
I didn't find anything special here either.
A few common small miscellaneous fish, nothing rare.
Here...
It seems that someone is not telling the truth.
Kid, I knew you were hiding something, hand over the things you dug up!
Are you still planning to rob?
Since this kid doesn't play by the rules, let's clean him up and then search his body!
Things that fall into my hands can't be taken back even by the king!\nBut I still have to thank you guys, you have brought me a lot of good things for no reason.
How can there be a small mound here, it doesn't look like a grave.
There seems to be a stone slab here, with some faint inscriptions on it, but the inscriptions are blurred and can't be recognized, could it be someone's visit?
It's a pity that I don't have an Iron shovel, otherwise I could dig it up and see what's inside.
There might be something buried under this mound, should we dig it up and see?
Dig up the mound (consume Iron shovel, Stamina30)
Don't touch other people's things casually
There are really good things hidden in here!
Sitting on this rock seems to be able to recover a little Stamina...
Meditate for one shichen
Meditate for three shichen
It's not time to meditate yet
One shichen later...
Three shichen later...
The vines here are very strong, you can climb out from here...
Climb up along the vines (Stamina100)
Don't want to run away for now
Three shichen later...
Demonstrate to the Three Sects!
Three Sects
Surrender Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple.
Destroy Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple.
{PlayerName}, now you help me do one last thing!
You're not going to let me provoke the three religions, are you?
You can exterminate the Jiuli tribe, are you afraid of a few old guys in the Three Sects?
Which head of the Three Sects is not a top-notch master, they are not comparable to that waste Miao Muli, aren't you sending me to death?
Take the Melody House's internal power method and learn it, those old guys are nothing.
You're really generous in order to send me to death.
If it weren't for your refusal to help me improve my cultivation, why would I need you, an outsider, to do this.
I'm not asking you to exterminate them, just to <color=#c44b0e>subdue</color> them, to make these high and mighty sects submit to you, a young man, just like back then...
Back then? What happened back then?
This has nothing to do with you!
They killed Chu Kuangsheng, they must pay for this!
What do you want me to do?
Naturally, it's an eye for an eye. I want you to wipe out these three sects!
(If she knew it was my doing, would she turn against me on the spot...)
You seem to look unwell?
No, nothing.
What are you waiting for, get to work!

Hmph, the so-called prestigious sects, aren't they now obediently submitting under others' feet. Just like when they didn't accept Chu Kuangsheng back then, didn't they end up submitting obediently in the end.
Perhaps these sect leaders didn't accept it in their hearts, so they used despicable means to imprison Chu Kuangsheng.
Now that Chu Kuangsheng has broken free from the prison, those who betrayed him, wait for him to come and settle the score with you!
Zhong Yangzi, Hui Yuan, Cai Yuanchang...
I will use the destruction of your three sects to commemorate the person you once admired the most...
To commemorate Chu Kuangsheng, who once dominated the martial arts world and stood above the three sects!
Little Taoist from the Taoist Sect, please step aside for a word.
What can I do for you two?

You Taoist Sect don't take our two factions seriously, not only often publicly defaming us, but also often seriously injuring our disciples under the name of sparring, today we must seek justice from you.
There may be some misunderstanding in this, the other party is aggressive, how should I respond?
Persuade the other party! (PersuadeSkill level 3)
Rise up and resist. (Specific battle)
Quickly escape. (Dexterity reaches 10)
Both of you, calm down, let me explain...
A moment later...
Taoist Sect would never do such a despicable thing, I will find out the truth as soon as possible and give everyone an explanation.

If it weren't for hearsay, we wouldn't want to believe it's true. But what you said makes sense, we won't make things difficult for you for now, we hope you can find out the truth soon and prove Taoist Sect's innocence.
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
Cowardly kid, you're really guilty, you're a disgrace to your Taoist Sect!
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
Hmph, Taoist Sect disciples are nothing more than this, all are paper tigers.
If you're not as skilled as others, you can only suffer in silence when you encounter such unreasonable things...

This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. I can't take this beating for nothing.
Hmph, Taoist Sect's martial arts are extraordinary, we can't deal with you today, we'll see!
Seeing their anger, this matter doesn't seem to be false, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. Our Taoist Sect can't be blamed for no reason.
Are you a disciple of Shifa Temple? I have something to ask you!
What can I do for you two?

You Shifa Temple don't take our two factions seriously, not only often publicly defaming us, but also often seriously injuring our disciples under the name of sparring, today we must seek justice from you.
Both of you, calm down, let me explain...
A moment later...
Shifa Temple would never do such a despicable thing, I will find out the truth as soon as possible and give everyone an explanation.

If it weren't for hearsay, we wouldn't want to believe it's true. But what you said makes sense, we won't make things difficult for you for now, we hope you can find out the truth soon and prove Shifa Temple's innocence.
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
Cowardly kid, you're really guilty, you're a disgrace to your Shifa Temple!
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
Hmph, Shifa Temple disciples are nothing more than this, all are paper tigers.
If you're not as skilled as others, you can only suffer in silence when you encounter such unreasonable things...

This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. I can't take this beating for nothing.
Hmph, Shifa Temple's martial arts are extraordinary, we can't deal with you today, we'll see!
Seeing their anger, this matter doesn't seem to be false, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. Our Shifa Temple can't be blamed for no reason.
Are you from Confucius Temple? I have something to ask you.
What can I do for you two?

You Confucius Temple don't take our two factions seriously, not only often publicly defaming us, but also often seriously injuring our disciples under the name of sparring, today I must seek justice for my fellow disciples.
Both of you, calm down, let me explain...
A moment later...
Confucius Temple would never do such a despicable thing, I will find out the truth as soon as possible and give everyone an explanation.

If it weren't for the hearsay, we wouldn't want to believe it's true. But you do make some sense, so we won't make things difficult for you for now. We hope you can find out the truth soon and prove the innocence of Confucius Temple.
Scene transition, the two disappear.
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
The fact that you fled in guilt suggests that you've admitted your guilt.
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
Amitabha, what goes around comes around. If Confucius Temple continues to be unrestrained, don't blame this little monk for using his vajra eyes to subdue demons!
If you're not as skilled as others, you can only suffer in silence when you encounter such unreasonable things...

This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues. I can't take this beating for nothing.
Confucius Temple's martial arts are impressive, but there may be stronger people in the future. If you don't restrain yourself, you will suffer the consequences sooner or later!
Seeing their anger, this doesn't seem to be a lie. I'll go to a bustling place to see if I can find out some news. Maybe there will be clues. We, Confucius Temple, can't be scapegoats for no reason.
Stinky Taoist priest, what's so great about your Taoist Sect? You dare to look down on Confucius Temple!
You are restless and irritable, aren't you losing face for Confucius Temple?
The bald monks of Shifa Temple should stop pretending to be good people here, you have caused us a lot of trouble!
It turns out that disciples from three sects had a dispute. It seems that they have grudges against each other, and it's hard to tell who's right and who's wrong...
Step forward to mediate between the three parties! (Specific battle)
Just watch the changes.
{yell} Please stop!
Who are you to interfere?
I am {PlayerName}, I saw the three of you fighting as soon as you disagreed. What's the matter?
It's all because these stinky Taoist priests from Taoist Sect always slander our Confucius Temple.
Nonsense, I only heard that the bald monks of Shifa Temple incite the pilgrims on the mountain to worship Buddha at Shifa Temple, saying that the gods of Taoist Sect are ineffective.
Amitabha, as a monk, I am not involved in worldly affairs, but I am accused by you scholars of Confucius Temple of being thieves and prostitutes. Sin, sin.
Did you see these things with your own eyes, or did you hear them from others?
It's all over Chuxiang City, how could it be false?
I haven't witnessed it myself.
The little monk also heard it from others.
Since it's just hearsay, there might be some misunderstandings. If you trust me, I am willing to investigate this matter and clear the names of your sects.
Good, good, thank you, young hero.
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
A moment later, all three of them were heavily injured and could no longer fight...
I am {PlayerName}, I saw the three of you fighting as soon as you disagreed. What's the matter?
These stinky Taoist priests from Taoist Sect always slander our Confucius Temple.
Nonsense, I only heard that the bald monks of Shifa Temple incite the pilgrims on the mountain to worship Buddha at Shifa Temple, saying that the gods of Taoist Sect are ineffective.
Amitabha, as a monk, I am not involved in worldly affairs, but I am accused by you scholars of Confucius Temple of being thieves and prostitutes. Sin, sin.
Did you see these things with your own eyes, or did you hear them from others?
It's all over Chuxiang City, how could it be false?
I haven't witnessed it myself.
The little monk also heard it from others.
Since it's just hearsay, there might be some misunderstandings. If you trust me, I am willing to investigate this matter and clear the names of your sects.
Good, good, thank you, young hero.
This matter doesn't seem to be groundless, there should be many people who know about it, I'll go to a busy place to see if I can find out some news, maybe there will be clues.
Investigate the truth
Go to the Market, Forgotten House, and Hotel Prosperous to see if you can find out some news.
column3: ไปที่ตลาด หอสุราลืมทุกข์ และโรงเตี๊ยมรุ่งโรจน์ เพื่อดูว่าเจ้าจะสามารถหาข่าวได้หรือไม่

column2: It seems that no one is talking about the martial arts sects. Is it not the right time?
Have you heard? The people of Confucius Temple colluded with bandits and were caught red-handed by the people of Taoist Sect.
These two sects have always been at odds, won't this lead to a big fight?
Isn't it? Taoist Sect couldn't stand against the joint forces of the other side and finally fled in disgrace, completely losing face for Taoist Sect.
It seems that there are people talking about the grudges of these martial arts sects. I'll go elsewhere to find out more.
There are also people talking about the conflicts between the disciples of the three religions here, but why does the speaker seem familiar?
The entanglements of these major sects are really unfathomable...
No wonder I feel this person is familiar. The news of the discord between these sects was spread by him alone. It looks very strange!
While he's not far away, I'll follow him to see what's going on!
There are monks in Shifa Temple who do not abide by the rules and precepts, even eating meat and drinking alcohol. It is said that some have been seen visiting the Maiden House.
How can there be such unruly monks? Doesn't Shifa Temple care?
The so-called law does not blame the public. If discovered, they would claim to be secular disciples, not bound by the precepts.
A scholar from Confucius Temple once wrote a Coin chapter condemning these degenerates of the Buddhist sect, but was accused by those monks of being Pretentious and pseudo-Honorable.
Have you heard? A disciple of the Taoist Sect spent the night at a widow's house, and the widow's lover turned out to be a secular disciple of Shifa Temple...
This is going to be interesting.
Who can disagree? This is a deep-seated grudge. That night, two disciples from prestigious sects fought over a widow.
I suppose the secular disciple of Shifa Temple couldn't stand against the Taoist of the Taoist Sect.
You're wrong. Who doesn't know that Shifa Temple is the dominant force in the martial arts world? Even their secular disciples can beat the true disciples of the Taoist Sect.
This guy came to this place, should I continue to follow him?
Keep following!
Talk about it later.
I have spread the news as you instructed.
You did well. I don't believe that with all this explosive news, the three sects won't be in chaos.
These news are half true and half false, do you think they will believe it?

These righteous sects value their reputation the most. When they hear someone speaking ill of them, they will definitely defend themselves in every possible way, without calmly distinguishing the truth.
Moreover, the bystanders only care about the excitement, who cares about the truth? They will be more willing to add fuel to the fire.
Wait until the three sects start infighting, hehe...
Kid, you've eavesdropped long enough. You're really not afraid of death!
Damn, I've been discovered!
Isn't this the Taoist who gave me the Cold medicinal pill!
So it was you who stirred up trouble, aiming to cause internal strife among the three sects, and then conveniently reap the benefits!
Since you know so much, I can't let you go!
Kid, I am Sun Daoren from the Nine Factions Sect, remember that! Those who offend the Nine Factions Sect never live long, you better watch out.
Your exposure of the Nine Factions Sect's plot to incite the three sects has earned you high praise from the leaders of the three sects.
The Disaster of Daliang
Clue
Find the patrolling constable to understand the situation.
I heard that many shopkeepers in the city have disappeared, and their whereabouts are still unknown.
Prince Qi Wang is pressuring the prefect. If the case is not solved within the deadline, the prefect will be demoted and all the officers will be dismissed for investigation.
Such a thing happened in the first district of virtue. If these shopkeepers can't be found, the closure of the shops is secondary. Who would dare to do business in Daliang in the future.
I can go to the patrolling officers to understand the situation, maybe I can find some valuable clues.
I heard that the whereabouts of the shopkeepers in the city are unknown, and I want to help the government solve this problem.
We can't solve it, what can you do to solve this case?

People in the rivers and lakes are sometimes more flexible than the government. Anyway, I want to understand some clues first. If I can help the government solve the case, it would be best. If I can't solve the case, the situation won't be worse than it is now.
Alright, what information do you want to know?
(What should I ask?)
Which shopkeepers have disappeared?
Do these shopkeepers have any enemies?
Have these shops received any strange guests?
How does the government view this case?
Have there been any horse carriages leaving the city recently?
I have no further inquiries.
What else would you like to know?
The shopkeepers of Golden Fortune Shop, Literature Bookstore, Fragrance Square, Cloud Fabric Shop, and the doctor of Clinic House.
With so many people involved, this case seems quite tricky. No wonder Prince Qi Wang is furious and demands a solution within a deadline.

Cases like this have happened before and were eventually left unresolved; but this time it has caused such a stir that it has damaged Qi Wang's reputation and popularity, hence the demand for a thorough investigation.
What else would you like to know?
They occasionally have some quarrels with customers, but nothing that could be considered as having enemies.
However, the character of these shopkeepers is a bit hard to describe.
What else would you like to know?
From what I understand, apart from a few customers asking about some strange and curious items, there are people who have seen these shops thriving and have discussed business cooperation.
These shops indeed do very well. It is said that the money they make in a day is more than what an ordinary person can earn in a lifetime.
What else would you like to know?
We believe this is a typical case of kidnapping and extortion, but so far no one has demanded a ransom.
What else would you like to know?
In recent days, horse carriages, cargo trucks, and even cargo ships leaving the city have been strictly inspected. It is basically impossible for these shopkeepers to be smuggled out of the city.

As long as these shopkeepers are still alive, we can assert that they are still in Daliang City. However, the city is a complex web of power, and it is not easy for the government to conduct searches.
What if they left the city through a secret tunnel?
If that's the case, we can only leave it to fate.
Assuming that the missing shopkeepers did not run away from Daliang City but were hidden, it should not be difficult to find them after careful investigation.
I didn't get any useful clues, did I miss any key information?
Search for suspicious locations
Look for places in Daliang City that are remote, large, and difficult to access.

The number of people involved in making so many shopkeepers disappear in a short period of time must be quite large; hiding these shopkeepers also requires a certain amount of space, so this place must not be too small.
If there are often strangers coming and going nearby, or if the environment is likely to attract attention, then it would be easy for things to be exposed, so this place should be relatively remote.
To reduce the risk of being discovered, this place should be difficult for ordinary people to enter or appear to be completely inaccessible on the surface.
Look for such places in the city, and you might find something.
The gate is tightly closed, and the courtyard wall is damaged, it seems that it has been uninhabited for a long time.
A remote courtyard with a tightly closed gate, this is a good place to hide people. But how should I go in and investigate?
Use Qinggong to jump over the courtyard wall. (Qinggong 100)
Use skills to unlock the door. (Machinery reaches level 3 Advance)
Force the door open!
Come back later.
This low wall can't stop me!
Unlocking this lock is no problem at all
Who are you and what are you doing here!
It seems I was right, the shopkeepers in the city are all locked up here by you.\nToday I'm going to rescue them, and if possible, bring you to justice!
Kid, don't let your self-proclaimed righteousness cloud your judgment. There's not a single innocent merchant here. If you save them, who knows how many common people will suffer in the future.

This Golden Fortune Shop owner not only colludes with the Tomb Raider Sect to resell burial objects, but also forges antiques and sells them at high prices. Most of the fake antiques in Daliang City come from him!
Mercy, I won't dare to do it again.

The Literature Bookstore owner has taken many bribes, tampering with children's primers, distorting classic Coin chapters into unrecognizable and meaningless texts. Can you expect the children who read these books to become pillars of society in the future?
I'm not the only one who took the benefits, don't let me take the blame alone.

The Fragrance Square owner has been living a luxurious life for the past few years, completely losing the honesty and integrity of a merchant. He dares to sell shoddy goods at high prices to customers, and those who come to argue are met with sharp and sarcastic ridicule.
I have betrayed everyone's trust in me.
The goods sold by Cloud Fabric Shop are indeed not problematic, and the reputation is not bad...
Thank you for your praise.

However, every year the government orders merchants to set up porridge stalls to help the poor and collect clothes for the disaster-stricken to keep warm. What have you done? You should know how many people have frozen and starved to death because of you.
As for you, the doctor of Clinic House, you might be thinking, what kind of handle could I have on a living Bodhisattva like you who has a miraculous hand to Regenerate and has saved countless lives.

You have three principles for treating diseases: no money, no treatment; severe illness, no treatment; cheap medicine, no treatment. How many people's treatment have you delayed with these three principles? Don't you think you are extremely guilty with these three principles!
Inseparable has a life, what does it have to do with me!
This guy is hopeless...
Knowing what they have done, do you still plan to save these people?
What are you planning to do with these people you've captured? Demand a ransom?

If they can sincerely repent, I will let them transfer their shops. The money they earned in the first half of their lives is enough for them to retire in their hometown; if they refuse to repent, then I don't mind Acting for the heavens and let them atone with their lives.
Our Nine Factions Sect always acts with a clear conscience, we will not wrong the good people, nor will we indulge the evil ones.
Acting for the heavens in name, but in fact for your own selfish desires, your Nine Factions Sect really knows how to whitewash your actions.
Since the matter has been exposed, I have no choice but to leave no survivors. Kid, you're unlucky!
Evil of Nine Factions Sect, surrender now!

Hmph, a greenhorn who still smells of mother's milk, you want to catch me!\nLet me tell you, I am E Qigai of the Nine Factions Sect. Today you ruined my good deeds, I will make you pay ten times in the future!

After expressing their gratitude to you, the shopkeepers hurriedly fled back to their shops, fearing they would be captured again.\nThis time you helped Lin'an government solve a big problem and received a large reward. Of course, this money all comes from the shopkeepers you rescued.

None of the captured shopkeepers survived. Although you thwarted the plot of the Nine Factions Sect, you did not successfully solve the problem of the Lin'an government, so you will not receive any reward.
{PlayerName}, entering the palace without a decree is a serious crime, aren't you afraid of death?
Of course I'm afraid of death, but I'm more afraid of living like a walking corpse.
How am I not the same? A man in this world, if he cannot feast on the Five Tripods in life, he should be cooked in the Five Tripods in death!

Speaking of which, your contribution to my smooth ascension to the throne is undeniable. If it weren't for you persuading Yan to withdraw its troops and stop invading the south, even if I ascended the throne, I wouldn't be able to sit securely on this land.
Did you come here to ask for rewards for your contributions?
I came to...
Advise you to abdicate for now.
Acting for the heavens, to remove you, the incompetent ruler!
Hahahaha
I didn't expect such madness to come from the mouth of the famous {PlayerName}.
How many years have I waited, how much effort have I spent to sit on this throne, and you want me to give it up with a few words?
After all, your throne is not legitimate, the Imperial Seal is missing, you have no edict of succession, you have no evidence to convince the people!
I am a royal relative, holding half of the world's troops and horses! \nI am the one chosen by destiny, I am the current emperor, who dares to disobey!
If you insist on this, it will only lead to the lords of various places following suit and declaring themselves kings. When the world is in chaos, the common people will suffer!
The troops and horses in my hands are not vegetarians.
It seems you are not willing to give up the throne...
When I've had enough of being emperor, I'll naturally pass on the throne. But this is my family affair, it has nothing to do with you.
Alas, I knew it wouldn't be so easy...
Since words are useless, I have to take action to remove you, the root of the problem.
Do you think my palace is made of paper? Do you think I, the emperor, am at your mercy?
Brother Emperor, {PlayerGivenName} has his difficulties, don't blame him. For the sake of the world, can you temporarily give up the throne...
{yell} How dare you!

Even if you are my imperial sister, what right do you have to make me give up the throne! \nNot only can you not persuade {PlayerName} to be loyal to me, but you also help the tyrant. Today, you two will die together!
{PlayerName}, you are against my brother emperor, I can't let you hurt him...
...I can't be with you anymore.
Rebel {PlayerName}, plotting rebellion, committing treason, execute on the spot!
I've been waiting for this moment, let's go all out!
The dream of being an emperor for a thousand autumns ends here, like a daylily, a moment of glory, it falls as soon as it blooms.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you are indeed invincible, my guards seem to be no match for you.
In extraordinary times, extraordinary measures must be taken.\nIf not, I would find it hard to face you.
Since I ascended the throne, many martial artists have pledged allegiance to me, and I naturally won't treat them badly. Did you come here to pledge allegiance to me?
I came to...
Advise you to abdicate for now.
Acting for the heavens, to remove you, the incompetent ruler!
How I wish I could be a leisurely and peaceful prince instead of sitting in this position.
The previous emperor died, the country had no heir, Kang Wang established a false dynasty in Wu and Yue, confusing the people, and the country gradually showed signs of division.

The main ministers of the dynasty, in order to correct the view and establish the legitimacy of the court, forced me to sit on this throne by following the ancestral system of appointing the eldest and the virtuous.
I feel like I'm sitting on pins and needles now...
Since being an emperor is uncomfortable, why not take the brave step of stepping down and giving up the throne?

A country cannot be without a monarch for a day. If I do not occupy this position to declare the orthodoxy, I don't know how many people in the world will stand on their own and how many will claim to be kings.
If it weren't for you and Kang Wang successively standing on their own and starting this catastrophe, who would dare to be the emperor!
You speak as if you were forced, but in fact, you are still coveting the throne and unwilling to give up the imperial power at hand.
I cannot fail the expectations of the ministers, nor can I leave the people of the world without support.
In that case, I have nothing more to say.
I love and cherish talents, but you are stubborn and cannot understand my difficulties, sigh...
Rebel {PlayerName}, disturbing the holy driver, your sin should be punished!
All strategies are exhausted, and in the end, you can't escape the fate of the heavens. The imperial hegemony is all dust.
{yell} Bold and reckless, you speak rebellious and absurd words, your crime deserves death!
Since His Majesty ascended the throne, he has widely repaired Benevolence to benefit the people, and you dare to slander His Majesty!
My merits and demerits will be commented on by future generations, and I will not make people guilty of words.
Your Majesty is generous and does not care, you should not thank the emperor for his grace!
Emperor Longxing, put away your hypocrisy.\nIf I am Invincible, you can't sleep at night; if you are Invincible, my heart is uneasy!
Alas, the stubborn ones are incorrigible...
Rebel {PlayerName}, disturbing the holy driver, your sin should be punished!
{PlayerSurName} Brother, you have killed the double dragons by yourself, which can be said to be unprecedented.
I don't know whether this is a blessing or a curse for the people of the world.
There will be no disputes in the world soon, and the people will enjoy peace and happiness, which is naturally a great blessing.
How do you know that there will be no more disputes in the world?
Because I will end this chaotic world and completely unify the north and south!
You, you want to be the emperor yourself!
I am just taking back what belongs to me, why are you so surprised.
If it weren't for the rebel to usurp the throne, this emperor's position would have been mine, and now it's just returning to its original owner!
You are so cunning, you have been using me, letting me clear the obstacles for you and pave the way for your emperor!
You should feel honored to help me achieve the imperial career. I can grant you the honor of founding the country, and even grant you the position of being above all others!
The hare is dead and the dog is cooked, do you think I will believe you?
If you can't be used by me, then you are my enemy. Are you ready to be my enemy?

I am no longer the little Character who first entered the rivers and lakes and was inexperienced. I {PlayerName} have come to this day, experienced countless blood and rain, countless Inseparable hesitations, do you think you can scare me with your turtle-like prince!
Huh, a bit of backbone!
Is this your bottom line as the master of Fengwen Terrace?
The good show is just beginning...
King Chai has given a lot of benefits to the tribe, it seems that the Jiuli tribe is expected to prosper in my hands!
A good bird chooses a tree to nest, and Confucius Temple will only follow King Chai's orders in the future!
His Royal Highness King Chai is wise and martial, which is not something you can contend with.
Killing a strong man is more attractive to me than having thousands of beauties!
If it weren't for His Royal Highness King Chai's help, Ding Fengbo would have become a lonely ghost long ago. I came here today to repay my gratitude!
Today I will learn about your martial arts again, please don't hesitate to teach!
Whoever gives more benefits, the old monster naturally helps whoever, this is called helping the reason, not helping the relatives.
Benevolence and morality are not meant to restrain people like us.
You have strayed from the right path, how can this old Taoist sit idly by!
Amitabha, lay down your butcher's knife and become a Buddha on the spot.
If it weren't for His Royal Highness King Chai's help, Ding Fengbo would have become a lonely ghost long ago. I came here today to repay my gratitude!
My precious sword will be sharpened with your evil blood today!
Those who are rich but unkind, today I will kill the unkind!
Whoever gives more benefits, the old monster naturally helps whoever, this is called helping the reason, not helping the relatives.
Villain, when will you surrender if not now!
I didn't expect the master of Fengwen Terrace to have such a method, commanding so many experts to deal with me.
There are always grudges in the world, even without grudges there are disputes, let alone others fanning the flames, so it's not difficult to prepare this deadly trap for you.
So many voices can melt gold, and constant criticism can wear away bones...
It's good that you know, with so many top experts seeing you off, you can have no regrets in this life.
You seem to have misunderstood something...
They are not here to see me off, but to accompany you in death.
Before me... all are mere ants.
At last, it's all over.

In order to restore the old dynasty, Chai Wang, who plotted his whole life and calculated everything, ended up on the throne. But in the end, it was nothing more than a tragic ending of chasing illusions and grasping at the moon in the water.

With the death of Kang Wang and Qi Wang, there are no more bloodlines in the Zhao royal family eligible to inherit the throne. This throne has been vacant for a long time, and it is bound to cause a lot of chaos.
You are now world-renowned, possessing unparalleled martial arts, holding the Imperial Seal, and having elite soldiers as your support. You are truly the one destined by heaven!
The heavy responsibility of unifying the world is yours alone, and the supreme position of the emperor is also yours!
The supreme emperor...
Would rather be a chicken head than a phoenix tail!\nLet me be the one to pacify the world and end this chaotic situation!
Now that I am world-renowned, possessing unparalleled martial arts, holding the Imperial Seal, and having elite soldiers as my support, it seems that I am truly the one destined by heaven!
I will shoulder the responsibility of unifying the world, and the throne will undoubtedly belong to me!
I will be the one to bring peace to the world and end this chaos!
Many years later...

Wan Yan Wuzhu, on behalf of the Yan Kingdom, presents a national letter to the Emperor, expressing the Yan Kingdom's willingness to bow down to your country, and the descendants will always abide by their loyalty, never to betray.
Liu Sheng Wucang, the lord of Dragonfly City, is awed by the Emperor's might and leads his people to surrender, at the Emperor's disposal.
Miao Muli, the tribal chief of the Jiuli Tribe, leads the various tribes of Jiuli to swear allegiance to the Emperor, never to betray!
Taoist Sect, Zhong Yangzi...
Shifa Temple, Hui Yuan...
Confucius Temple, Cai Yuanchang...
Greetings to the Emperor
Wishing the Emperor a stable and everlasting reign.

Great Emperor, the countries of the Western Regions have entrusted me to express their high respect to you. We are willing to be your subordinate countries, paying tribute and pledging allegiance year after year, forever being your most loyal subjects.
Now that the world is unified and peaceful, all of you have made great contributions and deserve rewards!
Long live the Emperor
Long live
Long live forever!
You have witnessed life and death, and experienced deception,
Do you still remember your original intention when you first stepped into the martial world?
To be good or evil, follow your heart; to become a Buddha or a demon, it's all in a thought.
Along the way, you have made countless choices,
Some were impulsive, some were knowingly wrong but still done, and there were also helplessness and regrets.
Each choice you make paves a new path for you.
Thousands of people have walked through thousands of different worlds,
Your journey has come to an end,
Opening a new chapter will bring a different life.
You look down at the courtiers in the hall, they are submissive and humble.
From this moment on, you can easily decide the fate of these high-ranking officials,
The essence of imperial power is the power of life and death,
Countless heroes have fallen for it over the centuries
Who could have imagined that the unknown shrimp of the past,
Has now become a dragon flying in the sky, the Peak of Jianghu!
The world of swords and shadows has left you far behind,
What awaits you will be a more bloody and brutal struggle in the court.
Experience +666

I will cherish your motorcycle...|Military cap... my military cap
You're really bored, here's something for you...

Neck durability -1...|Uric acid +1...|Do you want to race in the fourth ring TT...|Wind and freedom (only wind)...|I want to play Give Him Love 6...|The old thief's golden tree is not yet on sale...|The glory of the glass slag is no more...|Jack... I will cherish your motorcycle...|Military cap... my military cap|Stop clicking... I really don't have anything else to give you...
I've only been here a few months, and I haven't had time to prepare a suitable gift. How about I give you a BUG I inherited from the previous programmer as a souvenir?
The new BUG hasn't reproduced yet, the one I gave you is a limited edition, extremely rare.
It's so cool|My limbs have never felt so relaxed...|It feels like flying|All worries are gone with the wind

There is a precedent of ancient people sleeping on a cold jade bed to practice Yin cold internal strength, I wonder if the cold air from this object will also be beneficial to the practice of internal strength!
A day and a night later...
Ah--
{yell} Achoo!!!
Ah--
{yell} Achoo!!!
Better stay away from it.

I heard that there was once a strange woman with the surname Shi, who studied horse riding with the coachman of Chuxiang City for 8 years, but still got the commands for the horse to run and stop wrong.
It would be dangerous to ride a horse.
Later, the coachman refunded her 66 coins of tuition and told her not to mention her experience of learning to ride with him to others.
How do you know about such a hidden thing?
I said I heard about it, how would I know how this thing got out in the first place.
It's you guys who spread rumors and confuse people!
You really don't know the rules, who digs deep into gossip, just listen for fun.
How did I run into a fool today
I wonder if what he said about the strange woman is true...
Excuse me, I heard that a strange woman studied horse riding with you for 8 years and still didn't learn it. Is this true?
Shh, keep it down, don't spread this rumor anymore, I don't know where you guys get your gossip from.
It seems this thing is indeed false.
The thing is true, and the person does exist...
You admitted it yourself, so it's not a rumor.
8 years ago she couldn't even tame a normal dwarf horse, but later she got advice from a master, and had an epiphany, not to mention riding a horse, riding a pig, a wolf, a bear is all easy for her.
Who dares to laugh at her now? She's like a legend in our eyes.
Later, she gave me something out of gratitude for my past guidance. But I couldn't see its use, so I might as well give it to you.
The Goose's Request
Catch 5 Bass for the village goose.
This goose seems a bit different from the others.
column3: เจ้าห่านตัวนี้ดูแปลกตาไปจากห่านตัวอื่นๆแฮะ

column2: How so?
column3: แตกต่างยังไงหรอ?

column2: I can actually understand what the goose is saying!!!
column3: หาา ข้าเข้าใจที่ห่านมันพูดได้จริงๆหรอเนี้ย!!!

column2: Come and get beaten!
column3: ช่วยมาใกล้ๆ ให้ข้าต่อยหน่อยสิ!

column2: What's going on? I was ambushed by a goose.
column3: เกิดอะไรขึ้น? อยู่ๆข้าก็โดนเจ้าห่านเนี้ยดักโจมตี

column2: Quack, quack~ You lost, now we can communicate on equal terms.
column3: แคว๊ก แคว๊ก ฮองค์~ เจ้าแพ้แล้ว ทีนี้เราก็พูดคุยกันอย่างเท่าเทียมได้สักที

column2: Human, I admit you are strong. From now on, we can communicate as equals, quack~
column3: เจ้ามนุษย์ ข้ายอมรับแล้วว่าเจ้าแข็งแกร่ง จากนี้ไปเราคุยกันอย่างเท่าเทียมกันเถอะ ฮองค์~

column2: I, the goose, want to eat fish. Human, get 5 Bass for me to taste.
column3: ข้า ท่านห่านผู้นี้ปรารถนาอยากจะกินปลา เจ้ามนุษย์จงไปหาปลากระพง 5 ตัวมาให้ข้าลิ้มลองหน่อยซิ

column2: What kind of equal communication is this? I'm being treated like a runner.
column3: การพูดคุยที่เท่าเทียมเช่นไรกัน? เริ่มต้นมาข้าก็ถูกปฏิบัติเยี่ยงคนรับใช้

column2: Meow~ How dare you brush me off!
column3: เหมียว~ กล้าดียังไงถึงได้กล้าเมินข้า!

column2: I, the goose, am very satisfied. I want to reward you. Accept my gift, human, quack~
column3: ข้า ท่านห่านผู้นี้พึ่งพอใจอย่างมาก ข้าอยากมอบรางวัลให้กับเจ้า รับของขวัญจากข้าไปซะเจ้ามนุษย์ ฮองค์~

column2: This is the third page of the diary I found. It seems I've found all the pages. Let's see what it is when I put them together...
Half a shichen later...
It turns out to be an unnamed diary, recording the insights of a predecessor in the martial arts world who has traveled all over the world...
Keep Smiling
Go to Wild Wolf Valley to retrieve the sheep skull mask.
Return to the city and give the sheep skull mask to Ni Feng Xiao.
Ah, what should I do
Ah, I knew I shouldn't have gone to that place
Young man, you seem troubled. Do you need my help with anything?
I heard from others that the scenery of Wild Wolf Valley is beautiful, so I went into the valley to enjoy the scenery, but there was no scenery at all, only Scorpions and big gray wolves!

While being chased by the wolves, I not only knocked out my front teeth, but also lost my beloved treasure in Wild Wolf Valley. I don't want to go to that dangerous place a second time, but I can't bear to leave my things in the valley.
What treasure did you lose? I'll go to Wild Wolf Valley and retrieve it for you.
A sheep skull mask. Such a unique item can be easily identified anywhere.
Your taste is really unique...
This must be the item Ni Feng Xiao lost here. The design is indeed unique.
Brother, my happiness in the second half of my life depends on you.
(Put on the sheep skull mask you found)
Finally, it's a day full of energy again~
You are my benefactor. I'll give you another treasure I've collected as a memento.
Let's continue the adventure~
I laugh with pride
Laughing proudly again
Laughing at the world without aging
The three emperors and five sovereigns of morality, the fame of Xiahou and Shangzhou
Heroes and five hegemonies make a fuss in Spring and Autumn, the rise and fall are in a moment
A few lines of history, countless barren hills in Beimang
The fields of the predecessors are harvested by the successors, what's the point of dragon and tiger fights!

City Gate Guard
Enter Lin'an City to find another Lin'an City Guard.
Young man, you look familiar. Can you do me a small favor?
Let's hear it. I'm not sure if I can help.
Today, it's my brother and I who are on duty. The brother next to me has been diligent for more than ten years and has never missed a shift. I don't know why he hasn't shown up today.
Can you help me find him in the city? If he doesn't come back, I won't be able to hold on by myself.
Do you have any clues? Otherwise, I have no idea where to start.
He usually arrives before me. Today, all that's left at his post is this half of a chicken egg.
(Takes the half chicken egg)
Is this chicken egg dirty? It stinks!
No, it smells pretty good to me.
If your brother ate this stinky chicken egg, vomiting and diarrhea would be the least of his problems. If he doesn't get medical attention soon, he might be in danger...
Don't scare me. I couldn't help but lick it just now.
You really disgust me.
So you're here. Your brother, who was guarding the city gate with you, was worried about you and asked me to find you.
I can't believe my reputation is ruined by a stinky chicken egg. Why was I so curious to taste it...
You and your brother are a perfect match. If he had met me later, I guess you two would have been a pair in this room.
You don't seem to have recovered yet. Didn't the doctor treat you?
I was in a hurry when I came and didn't bring much money. I couldn't afford the consultation fee, so the doctor told me to cool off.
They say doctors have a parental heart, but now these clinic owners are all about the money.
I wonder if my current skills can help him...
Treat him myself. (Medical>49)
Administer the <color=#c44b0e>Antidote powder</color> to him. (1 Antidote powder required)
Ask a teammate for medical assistance. (Any teammate with Medical >49)
Temporarily helpless.
One shichen later...
Phew, barely saved a life...
Thank you for your life-saving grace, young hero. I will give you this amulet as a token of my gratitude.
By the way, a few years ago, my brother and I met a martial artist who called himself Brother Yu. He saw that we were good at wielding axes, so he gave us a small axe.
We studied it for a while but didn't find anything special, so we'll give it to you, hero!
Exactly!
